Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 3. Add marinara, crushed tomatoes, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper. Simmer 15 min, stirring occasionally. 4. In bowl, mix cream cheese and sour cream until smooth. 5. In greased 9x13 baking dish, layer half the spaghetti. Spread cream cheese mixture over pasta. Top with half the meat sauce, then half the mozzarella. Layer remaining spaghetti, remaining meat sauce, remaining mozzarella. Sprinkle Parmesan on top. 6. Cover with foil, bake 30 min. Remove foil, bake 15 min more until cheese is golden and bubbly. Let rest 10 min before serving.

Fettuccine alfredo.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb fettuccine, 1 cup unsalted butter, 2 cups heavy cream, 2 cups Parmesan cheese, freshly grated, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook fettuccine until al dente, 8-10 min. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 2. While pasta cooks, melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 1 min until fragrant. 3. Add heavy cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5 min, stirring occasionally, until slightly thickened. 4. Reduce heat to low. Gradually whisk in Parmesan cheese, stirring constantly until melted and smooth. 5. Add salt, pepper, nutmeg. Add drained pasta to sauce, toss to coat. Add pasta water 2 tbsp at a time if needed to reach creamy consistency. 6. Serve immediately topped with parsley and extra Parmesan.

Chicken alfredo.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb fettuccine, 2 lbs boneless skinless chicken breasts, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 lb Salt and pepper to taste, 3 tbsp olive oil, 6 tbsp butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups heavy cream, 2 cups Parmesan cheese, grated, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped. 1. Season chicken breasts with Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, pepper. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken 6-7 min per side until golden and internal temp reaches 165°F. Remove, rest 5 min, slice into strips. 2. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook fettuccine al dente, reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 1 min until fragrant. Add cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5-7 min, stirring, until slightly thickened. 4. Reduce heat to low. Gradually whisk in Parmesan until melted and smooth. Add nutmeg, salt, pepper to taste. 5. Add drained pasta and sliced chicken to sauce. Toss to coat, adding pasta water if needed for creamy consistency. 6. Serve immediately garnished with parsley and extra Parmesan.

Sausage alfredo.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb fettuccine, 1 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 6 tbsp butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups heavy cream, 2 cups Parmesan cheese, grated, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes, 2 tablespoons dried parsley. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook fettuccine until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 2. While pasta cooks, cook sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8-10 min, breaking up meat, until browned and cooked through. Transfer to plate, leaving 1 tbsp drippings in pan. 3. Reduce heat to medium. Add butter and garlic to skillet, cook 1 min until fragrant. Add heavy cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5 min, stirring occasionally, until slightly thickened. 4. Reduce heat to low. Gradually whisk in Parmesan until melted and smooth. Add nutmeg, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes. Return sausage to pan. 5. Add drained pasta to sauce, toss to coat. Add pasta water 2 tbsp at a time if needed for creamy consistency. 6. Serve immediately garnished with parsley and extra Parmesan.

Pasta primavera (no veg, just butter her.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne or farfalle, 1/2 cup butter, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup dry white wine, 1 cup heavy cream, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 3 tbsp fresh basil, chopped, 2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped, 1 tbsp fresh oregano, chopped. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook pasta until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 2. Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 2 min until fragrant and golden. Add wine, simmer 3 min until reduced by half. 3. Add heavy cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5 min, stirring occasionally, until slightly thickened. 4. Reduce heat to low. Add Parmesan, stir until melted. Add basil, parsley, oregano, lemon zest. Season with salt, pepper, red pepper flakes. 5. Add drained pasta to sauce, toss to coat. Add pasta water 2 tbsp at a time if needed for creamy consistency. 6. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and fresh herbs.

Rigatoni with meat sauce.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb rigatoni, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 lb ground beef, 1/2 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 2 medium onions, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 6 oz tomato paste, 1 cup red wine, 2 tsp dried oregano, 2 tsp dried basil, 3 bay leaves, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/4 tsp red pepper flakes, 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped. 1. Heat oil in large pot over medium-high heat. Add beef and sausage, cook 8-10 min, breaking up meat, until browned. Add onion, cook 5 min until softened. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 2. Add tomato paste, cook 2 min, stirring, until paste darkens. Add red wine, scrape up browned bits. Simmer 5 min until wine reduces by half. 3. Add crushed tomatoes, oregano, basil, bay leaf, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes. Bring to boil, reduce to low simmer. Cook partially covered 45 min, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens. Add water if too thick. 4. Remove bay leaf. Taste and adjust seasoning. Keep warm on low heat. 5. Cook rigatoni in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 6. Add pasta to sauce, toss to coat. Add pasta water if needed to loosen sauce. Serve topped with Parmesan and fresh basil.

Vodka sauce pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb rigatoni or penne, 4 tbsp butter, 2 cups 1 shallot, minced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 6 oz tomato paste, 3/4 cup vodka, 2 cups heavy cream, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 3 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 2 teaspoons dried basil, 2 cups Extra Parmesan for serving. 1. Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1.5 cups pasta water before draining. 2. Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Add shallot, cook 3 min until soft. Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 min until fragrant. 3. Add tomato paste, cook 3-4 min, stirring constantly, until paste is deep brick red and very fragrant. This step is crucial for flavor. 4. Add vodka, stir well to combine. Simmer 5-7 min until alcohol cooks off and mixture is thick and jammy. 5. Reduce heat to medium-low. Stir in heavy cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 6-8 min, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens and turns vibrant coral color. Add Parmesan, stir until melted. Season generously with salt and pepper. 6. Add drained pasta, toss to coat. Add pasta water 2 tbsp at a time if needed for silky texture. Serve topped with basil and extra Parmesan.

Sausage vodka rigatoni.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb rigatoni, 1 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 4 tbsp butter, 1 s hallot, minced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 6 oz tomato paste, 3/4 cup vodka, 2 cups heavy cream, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated. 1. Cook rigatoni in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1.5 cups pasta water before draining. 2. Brown sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8-10 min, breaking up meat. Transfer to plate, leaving drippings. 3. Reduce heat to medium. Add butter and shallot to skillet, cook 3 min. Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 min. 4. Add tomato paste, cook 3-4 min, stirring constantly, until deep red and fragrant. Add vodka, simmer 5-7 min until thick and jammy. 5. Reduce heat to medium-low. Stir in cream, simmer 6-8 min until thickened and coral-colored. Add Parmesan, stir until melted. Return sausage to pan. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Add drained rigatoni, toss to coat. Add pasta water 2 tbsp at a time if needed. Serve garnished with basil and extra Parmesan.

Bolognese.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 tbsp olive oil, 4 oz pancetta, diced, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 1 cup 1 carrot, finely diced, 3 stalks celery, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 lb ground beef, 1 lb ground pork, 1 cup whole milk, 1 cup dry white wine, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp dried oregano, 1/2 tsp nutmeg, 3 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 1 lb pappardelle or tagliatelle. 1. Heat oil in large Dutch oven over medium heat. Add pancetta, cook 5 min until crispy. Add onion, carrot, celery, cook 8 min until softened. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 2. Increase heat to medium-high. Add beef and pork, breaking up with spoon. Cook 10 min until browned. Season with salt and pepper. 3. Add milk, simmer until absorbed, about 5 min. Add wine, simmer until reduced by half, 8 min. 4. Add crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, bay leaves, oregano, nutmeg. Bring to boil, reduce to low simmer. Cover partially, cook 2.5-3 hours, stirring every 30 min. Add water if sauce gets too thick. 5. Remove bay leaves. Taste, adjust seasoning. 6. Cook pasta al dente in salted water. Reserve 1 cup pasta water. Toss pasta with sauce, adding pasta water to reach desired consistency. Serve with Parmesan.

Lasagna soup.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 1 onion, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 6 cups chicken broth, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 6 oz tomato paste, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 tsp dried basil, 1 bay leaf, 8 lasagna noodles, broken into pieces, 1 cup ricotta cheese, 1 cup mozzarella, shredded, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated. 1. In large Dutch oven, cook sausage over medium-high heat 8 min, breaking up meat. Add onion, cook 5 min until softened. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 2. Add chicken broth, crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, Italian seasoning, basil, bay leaf. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cook 15 min to develop flavors. 3. Add broken lasagna noodles, cook 12-15 min, stirring occasionally, until noodles are tender. Remove bay leaf. Season with salt and pepper. 4. In bowl, mix ricotta with half the mozzarella and Parmesan. 5. Ladle soup into bowls. Top each with dollop of ricotta mixture and remaining mozzarella. 6. Garnish with fresh basil and extra Parmesan. Serve with garlic bread.

Baked penne.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 1 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 15 oz marinara sauce, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes, 15 oz ricotta cheese, 1 lb 1 egg, 16 oz mozzarella, shredded, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook penne in salted boiling water 2 min less than package directions. Drain well. 2. Brown sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8 min, breaking up meat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 3. Add crushed tomatoes, marinara, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes. Simmer 15 min, stirring occasionally. 4. In bowl, mix ricotta and egg. 5. In large bowl, combine cooked penne, meat sauce, ricotta mixture, and half the mozzarella. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. Top with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan. 6. Cover with foil, bake 25 min. Remove foil, bake 15 min more until cheese is golden and bubbly. Broil 2 min for extra browning. Rest 10 min, garnish with basil before serving.

Manicotti.directions: Ingredients needed: 14 manicotti shells, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 3 large eggs, 2 cups marinara sauce, 1.5 teaspoons Italian seasoning, 5 cloves garlic, minced. Cook manicotti until pliable. Mix ricotta, half mozzarella, parmesan, egg, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt. Pipe filling into shells. Spread marinara in baking dish, arrange shells, top with more sauce and remaining mozzarella. Bake covered at 375°F 30 minutes, uncovered 10 minutes.

Stuffed shells.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 box (12 oz) jumbo pasta shells, 15 oz ricotta cheese, 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 egg, 2 cups fresh spinach, chopped, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 jar (24 oz) marinara sauce, 2 tbsp fresh basil, chopped, 2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp black pepper, 1/4 tsp nutmeg. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook pasta shells according to package directions until al dente. Drain and rinse with cold water. 2. In large bowl, combine ricotta, 1.5 cups mozzarella, 3/4 cup Parmesan, egg, spinach, garlic, basil, parsley, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Mix well. 3. Spread 1.5 cups marinara sauce in bottom of 9x13 baking dish. 4. Fill each cooked shell with 2-3 tablespoons cheese mixture. Arrange filled shells in baking dish. 5. Pour remaining marinara sauce over shells. Sprinkle with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan. 6. Cover with foil. Bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and bake 10-15 minutes more until cheese is melted and bubbly. Let rest 5 minutes before serving.

Pastitsio.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 1.5 lbs ground beef (80/20), 2 cups diced ham (12 oz), 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup milk, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 3 large eggs. Cook pasta. Brown beef with cinnamon. Make béchamel with butter, flour, milk, nutmeg, egg yolks. Layer: pasta, meat, more pasta, béchamel. Top with parmesan. Bake at 350°F 45 minutes until golden.

Pasta e fagioli (skip beans or sub potat.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 tbsp olive oil, 1 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 1 large onion, diced, 2 cups sliced carrots, 1 cup diced celery, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 6 cups chicken broth, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 3 bay leaves, 2 tsp dried oregano, 1 tsp dried basil, 1 cup ditalini or small pasta, 1 lb Salt and pepper to taste, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped. 1. Heat oil in large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add sausage, cook 8 min breaking up meat until browned. Add onion, carrots, celery. Cook 8 min until vegetables soften. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 2. Add chicken broth, crushed tomatoes, diced potatoes, bay leaves, oregano, basil. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cover, cook 25 min until potatoes are tender. 3. Using potato masher, partially mash some of the potatoes to thicken soup. Add pasta, cook 10-12 min until pasta is al dente. Add more broth if too thick. 4. Remove bay leaves. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 5. Serve in bowls topped with Parmesan, drizzle of olive oil, and fresh parsley. Serve with crusty bread.

ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
Spaghetti aglio e olio with sausage.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb spaghetti, 1 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 3/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, 10 cloves garlic, thinly sliced, 1.5 tsp red pepper flakes, 1/2 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 1.5 cups Salt and black pepper to taste, 1 large lemon. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Reserve 2 cups pasta water before draining. 2. While pasta cooks, cook sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8-10 min, breaking up meat, until browned. Remove to plate. 3. Wipe skillet, add olive oil, heat over medium-low. Add garlic, cook gently 3-4 min, stirring constantly, until golden and fragrant but not brown. Add red pepper flakes, cook 30 seconds. 4. Add 1/2 cup pasta water to skillet, increase heat to medium. Bring to simmer. Return sausage to pan. 5. Add drained pasta to skillet, toss vigorously for 2 min, adding more pasta water 1/4 cup at a time to create light sauce that coats pasta. 6. Remove from heat. Add parsley, Parmesan, lemon zest, salt, pepper. Toss well. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and red pepper flakes.

Chicken parm over spaghetti.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken breasts, 1 cup flour, 4 large eggs, 2 cups Italian breadcrumbs, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 lb Salt and pepper to taste, 1/2 cup olive oil, 3 cups marinara sauce, 8 oz mozzarella, shredded, 1 lb spaghetti, 1 teaspoon dried basil. 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. Pound chicken to 1/2 inch thickness. Season with salt and pepper. Set up breading: flour in dish one, eggs in dish two, breadcrumbs mixed with 1/2 cup Parmesan and Italian seasoning in dish three. 2. Dredge chicken in flour, dip in egg, coat in breadcrumbs. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry chicken 3-4 min per side until golden and 165°F internal temp. Drain on paper towels. 3. Spread 1 cup marinara in 9x13 baking dish. Place chicken on top. Spoon remaining sauce over chicken. Top with mozzarella and remaining Parmesan. Bake 15 min until cheese melts and bubbles. 4. Meanwhile, cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente. Drain. 5. Serve chicken over spaghetti. Garnish with basil and extra Parmesan.

Lazy lasagna.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne or rigatoni, 1 lb ground beef, 1 lb Italian sausage, 1 onion, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 24 oz marinara sauce, 15 oz ricotta cheese, 2 eggs, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 16 oz mozzarella, shredded, 2 tsp Italian seasoning. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook pasta in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain well. 2. Brown beef and sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8-10 min, breaking up meat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic and Italian seasoning, cook 1 min. Add marinara, simmer 10 min. Season with salt and pepper. 3. In bowl, mix ricotta, eggs, and 1/2 cup Parmesan. 4. In large bowl, combine cooked pasta, meat sauce, ricotta mixture, and half the mozzarella. Mix well. 5. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. Top with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan. 6. Cover with foil, bake 25 min. Remove foil, bake 15 min more until bubbly and golden. Broil 2 min for extra browning. Rest 10 min, garnish with basil.

Pappardelle with pork ragu.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz spaghetti, 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes, 1/2 cup dry wine, 4 cups beef broth, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tablespoon dried rosemary, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 3 tablespoons olive oil. Brown cubed pork. Add wine, reduce. Add tomatoes, broth, garlic, rosemary. Simmer covered 3 hours until pork shreds easily. Cook pappardelle. Toss with ragu and parmesan.

Mostaccioli.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz spaghetti, 1 lb smoked sausage, sliced, 1 (24 oz) jar marinara sauce, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1.5 teaspoons Italian seasoning. Cook pasta. Remove sausage from casing, brown. Add marinara. Layer in dish: pasta, ricotta, meat sauce, mozzarella. Repeat. Top with parmesan. Bake at 375°F 25 minutes.

Cincinnati chili.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef (80/20), 1 onion diced fine, 4 cloves garlic minced, 1 can (15 oz) tomato sauce, 2 cups beef broth, 3 tbsp chili powder, 1 tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 tsp allspice, 1/2 tsp cayenne, 2 tbsp apple cider vinegar, 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tsp salt, 1 lb spaghetti. 1. Brown ground beef in large pot over medium-high heat 7-8 min, breaking up finely. Don't drain. 2. Add onion and garlic, cook 3 min. 3. Stir in tomato sauce, broth, and all spices (chili powder through cayenne). Add vinegar and Worcestershire. 4. Bring to boil, reduce heat to low. Simmer uncovered 2 hours, stirring occasionally, until thick and rich. 5. Cook spaghetti according to package directions. 6. Serve 3-way: spaghetti, chili, shredded cheddar. Add beans for 4-way, onions for 5-way.

Sausage and ricotta baked pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb rigatoni, 1 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 1 onion, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 15 oz marinara sauce, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 15 oz ricotta cheese, 2 eggs, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 16 oz mozzarella, shredded, 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook rigatoni in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain. 2. Brown sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8 min, breaking up meat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic and Italian seasoning, cook 1 min. 3. Add crushed tomatoes and marinara, simmer 15 min. Season with salt and pepper. 4. In bowl, mix ricotta, eggs, Parmesan, and half the basil. 5. In large bowl, toss cooked pasta with half the sausage sauce. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. Dollop ricotta mixture over pasta. Pour remaining sauce on top. Sprinkle with mozzarella. 6. Bake 30 min until bubbly and cheese is golden. Rest 10 min. Garnish with remaining basil.

Creamy chicken pasta bake.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 3 cups cooked chicken, cubed, 6 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup flour, 3 cups chicken broth, 1.5 cups heavy cream, 2 cups mozzarella, shredded, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook penne in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain well. 2. Melt butter in large pot over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 1 min. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min to make roux. Gradually whisk in chicken broth and cream. Bring to simmer, cook 5-7 min, whisking, until thickened. 3. Reduce heat to low. Add half the mozzarella and half the Parmesan. Stir until melted. Add Italian seasoning, salt, pepper. 4. Fold in cooked pasta and chicken. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. Top with remaining mozzarella and half the remaining Parmesan. 5. Toss panko with 3 tbsp melted butter and remaining Parmesan. Sprinkle over top. 6. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and golden. Garnish with parsley.

Pasta with butter and egg.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb spaghetti or linguine, 6 tbsp butter, 4 egg yolks, 2 whole eggs, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 2 tsp black pepper, freshly cracked. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook pasta until al dente. Reserve 2 cups pasta water before draining. 2. While pasta cooks, cut butter into cubes and place in large serving bowl. In separate bowl, whisk egg yolks, whole eggs, Parmesan, and black pepper. 3. Add hot drained pasta to bowl with butter, toss until butter melts completely. 4. Working quickly, add egg mixture, tossing constantly and vigorously. Add pasta water 2-3 tbsp at a time, tossing continuously, until creamy sauce forms that coats pasta. The heat from pasta cooks eggs without scrambling. 5. Season with salt to taste. Serve immediately garnished with parsley, extra Parmesan, and cracked black pepper.

Spaghetti pie.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz spaghetti, 6 tbsp butter, 2/3 cup Parmesan, grated, 3 large eggs, 1 lb ground beef, 1/2 lb Italian sausage, 2 medium onions, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 24 oz marinara sauce, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 cup ricotta cheese, 2 cups mozzarella, shredded, 2 teaspoons dried basil. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Cook spaghetti al dente, drain. Toss hot spaghetti with butter, Parmesan, and beaten eggs. Press into greased 10-inch pie dish or springform pan, creating crust on bottom and up sides. 2. Brown beef and sausage in skillet over medium-high heat 8 min, breaking up meat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic and Italian seasoning, cook 1 min. Add marinara, simmer 10 min. Season with salt and pepper. 3. Spread ricotta in bottom of spaghetti crust. Top with meat sauce. Sprinkle mozzarella on top. 4. Bake 30-35 min until cheese is melted and bubbly. 5. Let rest 10 min before slicing. Garnish with basil. Serve hot.

ingredients: (10.5 oz) can cream of mushroom soup
Tetrazzini.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb spaghetti, 4 (6-8 oz) boneless chicken breasts, 1 (10.5 oz) can cream of mushroom soup, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 12 oz fresh mushrooms, sliced, 1/4 cup dry sherry, 4 tablespoons butter, 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs. Cook pasta and chicken. Sauté mushrooms. Mix with soup, cream, sherry, half the parmesan. Toss with pasta and diced chicken. Pour into dish. Top with breadcrumbs and remaining parmesan. Bake at 350°F 25 minutes.

American goulash.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs ground beef (80/20), 8 oz elbow macaroni, 2 (14.5 oz) cans diced tomatoes, 1 (8 oz) can tomato sauce, 3 cups beef broth, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning, 5 cloves garlic, minced. Brown beef with garlic. Add tomatoes, sauce, broth, Worcestershire, Italian seasoning. Add uncooked macaroni. Cover, simmer 15-20 minutes until pasta is tender.

Cajun chicken pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 2 lbs boneless skinless chicken breasts, sliced, 3 tbsp Cajun seasoning, 4 tbsp olive oil, 4 tbsp butter, 1 large red bell pepper, diced, 1 g reen bell pepper, sliced, 1 large onion, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups heavy cream, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper, 1.5 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped. 1. Season chicken with 2 tbsp Cajun seasoning. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken 6-8 min, stirring occasionally, until golden and cooked through (165°F). Transfer to plate. 2. Cook penne in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add bell peppers and onion, cook 6 min until softened. Add garlic and remaining 1 tbsp Cajun seasoning, cook 1 min. 4. Add heavy cream and chicken broth, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5-7 min, stirring, until sauce thickens. Add Parmesan and cayenne, stir until cheese melts. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Return chicken to skillet. Add drained pasta, toss to coat. Add pasta water if needed for creamy consistency. 6. Serve garnished with parsley and extra Parmesan.

Orecchiette with sausage.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 1 lb smoked sausage, sliced, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 3 cups chicken broth, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 2 tablespoons olive oil. Remove sausage from casing, brown and crumble. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Add broth, simmer 10 minutes. Cook pasta, add to sauce with some pasta water. Toss with parmesan and olive oil.

Rotini with meat sauce.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz spaghetti, 1 lb ground beef, 1 (15 oz) can tomato sauce, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 large onion, diced, 2 teaspoons Italian seasoning, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese. Brown ground beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce and Italian seasoning, simmer 20 minutes. Cook rotini, drain and toss with meat sauce. Top with parmesan.

Cheesy beef pasta skillet.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 2 medium onions, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups beef broth, 1 cup whole milk, 12 oz penne pasta, 15 oz tomato sauce, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 2 cups cheddar cheese, shredded, 1 cup mozzarella, shredded, 1.5 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 1/3 cup fresh parsley. 1. Brown beef in large skillet over medium-high heat 8 min, breaking up meat. Drain excess fat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 2. Add beef broth, milk, and uncooked pasta. Stir to combine. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cover, cook 12-15 min, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender and liquid is mostly absorbed. 3. Stir in tomato sauce, tomato paste, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, onion powder. Simmer uncovered 3-5 min until thickened. 4. Remove from heat. Stir in cheddar and mozzarella until melted and creamy. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Garnish with parsley. Serve immediately.

Creamy sausage rigatoni.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb rigatoni, 1 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 4 tbsp butter, 2 medium onions, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 1/2 cup dry white wine, 2 cups heavy cream, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 2 cups baby spinach, 2 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 2 teaspoons dried basil. 1. Cook rigatoni in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 2. While pasta cooks, cook sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8-10 min, breaking up meat, until browned. Transfer to plate. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion, cook 5 min until softened. Add garlic, sun-dried tomatoes, red pepper flakes. Cook 2 min. 4. Add wine, simmer 2 min until reduced by half. Add heavy cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5-7 min until thickened. 5. Add Parmesan, stir until melted. Return sausage to skillet. Add spinach, cook 1-2 min until wilted. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Add drained rigatoni, toss to coat. Add pasta water if needed for creamy consistency. Serve garnished with basil and extra Parmesan.

Pasta with brown butter and sage.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pasta (pappardelle or fettuccine), 3/4 cup butter, 25 fresh sage leaves, 6 cloves garlic, thinly sliced, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 1/4 tsp nutmeg. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook pasta until al dente. Reserve 2 cups pasta water before draining. 2. While pasta cooks, melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Add sage leaves, cook 3-4 min until crispy and butter turns golden brown with nutty aroma. Remove sage to paper towel. 3. Add garlic to brown butter, cook 1-2 min until golden. Watch carefully so it doesn't burn. 4. Add drained pasta to skillet with brown butter and garlic. Toss well to coat. Add pasta water 1/4 cup at a time, tossing, until silky sauce forms. 5. Add Parmesan, nutmeg, salt, pepper. Toss until cheese melts and coats pasta. 6. Serve topped with crispy sage, toasted walnuts, lemon zest, and extra Parmesan.

Cavatappi with vodka sauce.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz spaghetti, 3 tablespoons tomato paste, 1/2 cup vodka, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 3 tablespoons butter, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon dried basil. Sauté garlic and red pepper flakes in butter. Add tomato paste, cook 2 minutes. Add vodka, simmer 3 minutes. Add cream, simmer 5 minutes. Toss with pasta and parmesan. Top with basil.

Beefaroni from scratch.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 1/2 cup elbow macaroni, 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes, 2 cups tomato sauce, 4 cups beef broth, 2 teaspoons Italian seasoning, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup sugar. Brown beef with garlic. Add tomatoes, sauce, broth, Italian seasoning, sugar. Add macaroni. Cover, simmer 15-20 minutes until pasta is tender and sauce thickens.

ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
Linguine with clam sauce... no clams.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb linguine, 1/2 cup olive oil, 8 cloves garlic, thinly sliced, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 1 cup dry white wine, 1 cup clam juice, 1/2 cup chicken broth, 1/2 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 4 tbsp butter, 1 large lemon, 3 cups Salt and black pepper to taste. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook linguine until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 2. Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 2-3 min until golden and fragrant but not brown. Add red pepper flakes, cook 30 seconds. 3. Add white wine, bring to boil. Simmer 3-4 min until reduced by half. Add clam juice and chicken broth, bring to simmer. Cook 5 min to concentrate flavors. 4. Add butter, swirl pan until melted. Add parsley and lemon zest. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Add drained pasta to skillet. Toss vigorously for 2 min, adding pasta water 2 tbsp at a time to create silky sauce that coats pasta. 6. Serve immediately with extra parsley, lemon wedges, and crusty bread to soak up sauce.

ingredients: (10.5 oz each) cream of chicken soup
Chicken noodle casserole.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 cups cooked chicken, diced, 12 oz egg noodles, 2 cans (10.5 oz each) cream of chicken soup, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup frozen peas and carrots, 1 cup chicken broth, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup crushed Ritz crackers, 4 tbsp butter, melted, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp onion powder. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 9x13 baking dish. 2. Cook egg noodles according to package directions until al dente. Drain. 3. In large bowl, combine cream of chicken soup, sour cream, chicken broth, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. 4. Stir in cooked noodles, chicken, frozen vegetables, and 1.5 cups cheese. Mix well. 5. Transfer mixture to baking dish. Top with remaining cheese. 6. In small bowl, mix crushed crackers with melted butter. Sprinkle over casserole. 7. Bake 35-40 minutes until bubbly and cracker topping is golden brown. Let rest 5 minutes before serving.

Broken lasagna noodles in broth.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 lasagna noodles, broken into pieces, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 1 onion, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 6 cups chicken broth, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 bay leaf, 2 cups baby spinach, 1 cup ricotta cheese, 1 cup Parmesan, grated. 1. Heat oil in large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add sausage, cook 8 min breaking up meat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 2. Add chicken broth, crushed tomatoes, Italian seasoning, bay leaf. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cook 10 min to develop flavors. 3. Add broken lasagna noodles, cook 12-15 min, stirring occasionally, until noodles are tender. Add spinach, cook 2 min until wilted. Remove bay leaf. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Ladle into bowls. Top each with dollop of ricotta and sprinkle of Parmesan. 5. Garnish with fresh basil. Serve with crusty bread.

Penne alla buttera.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 6 oz pancetta or guanciale, diced, 4 tbsp butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup heavy cream, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 3 egg yolks, 2 tsp black pepper, freshly cracked. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook penne until al dente. Reserve 1.5 cups pasta water before draining. 2. Cook pancetta in large skillet over medium heat 8 min until crispy and fat renders. Add butter and garlic, cook 1 min until fragrant. 3. Add cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 3-4 min until slightly thickened. 4. In bowl, whisk egg yolks with Parmesan and black pepper. 5. Remove skillet from heat. Add drained pasta, toss to coat. Working quickly off heat, add egg yolk mixture, tossing constantly. Add pasta water 2 tbsp at a time, tossing vigorously, until creamy sauce forms. Season with salt. 6. Serve immediately garnished with parsley and extra Parmesan and black pepper.

Mac and cheese with meat.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef (80/20), 1 lb elbow macaroni, 6 tbsp butter, 6 tbsp flour, 4 cups whole milk, 4 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese, 2 cups shredded American cheese, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs, 2 tbsp melted butter. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Brown ground beef in skillet 7-8 min, drain and set aside. Cook macaroni 6-7 min until al dente, drain. 2. Melt 6 tbsp butter in large pot over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min. 3. Gradually add milk, whisking constantly. Simmer 5 min until thickened. 4. Remove from heat. Stir in 3 cups cheddar and all American cheese until melted. Add salt, pepper, and garlic powder. 5. Fold in macaroni and ground beef. Transfer to greased 9x13 dish. 6. Mix panko with melted butter and remaining cheddar. Sprinkle over top. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and golden.

Million dollar spaghetti.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb spaghetti, 2 lbs ground beef, 1 jar (24 oz) marinara sauce, 8 oz cream cheese, softened, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup ricotta cheese, 3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, 1/2 cup chopped fresh basil. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease 9x13-inch baking dish. 2. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package directions until al dente. Drain and toss with melted butter and garlic. 3. In large skillet over medium-high heat, cook ground beef until browned, about 10 minutes. Drain fat. Add marinara sauce and Italian seasoning, simmer for 5 minutes. 4. In medium bowl, mix cream cheese, sour cream, and ricotta until smooth. 5. Spread half the buttered spaghetti in prepared baking dish. 6. Spread cream cheese mixture evenly over spaghetti. Top with 1 cup mozzarella. 7. Add remaining spaghetti layer. Top with meat sauce. 8. Cover with remaining 2 cups mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. 9. Bake for 30-35 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly. 10. Broil for 2-3 minutes to brown top. Let stand 10 minutes, garnish with basil, and serve.

Marry me chicken pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne or rigatoni, 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, 1/4 cup flour, 4 tbsp olive oil, 4 tbsp butter, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 1 tsp red pepper flakes. 1. Season chicken with salt, pepper, Italian seasoning. Dredge in flour. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken 6-7 min per side until golden and 165°F internal temp. Remove to plate. 2. Cook pasta in salted water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 1 min. Add chicken broth, scrape up browned bits. Simmer 3 min. 4. Add heavy cream and sun-dried tomatoes. Simmer 5 min until thickened. Add Parmesan and red pepper flakes, stir until cheese melts. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Slice chicken, return to sauce with any juices. Add drained pasta, toss to coat. Add pasta water if needed. 6. Serve garnished with basil and extra Parmesan.

Sausage and pepper pasta (no peppers).directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 1.5 lbs Italian sausage links, 3 tbsp olive oil, 1 onion, sliced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup white wine, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 1 cup Parmesan, grated. 1. Cook penne in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 2. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Brown sausage links 8-10 min, turning, until cooked through. Remove, slice into coins. 3. In same skillet, add onion. Cook 6 min until softened and golden. Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 min. 4. Add wine, scrape up browned bits. Simmer 2 min until reduced. Add crushed tomatoes and Italian seasoning. Bring to simmer, cook 15 min, stirring occasionally. 5. Return sliced sausage to sauce. Season with salt and pepper. Add drained pasta, toss to coat. Add pasta water if needed to loosen sauce. 6. Serve topped with Parmesan and fresh basil.

Shells and cheese with ground beef.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz spaghetti, 2 lbs ground beef, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1.5 cups milk, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 4 cloves garlic, minced. Cook shells. Brown beef with garlic powder, salt, pepper. Cube Velveeta, melt with milk over low heat. Combine pasta, beef, and cheese sauce.

ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
Tuscan chicken pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne or rigatoni, 2 lbs boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces, 1 lb Salt and pepper to taste, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 4 tbsp olive oil, 4 tbsp butter, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped, 3 cups baby spinach, 2 cups heavy cream, 1.5 cups Parmesan cheese, grated, 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes, 2 teaspoons dried basil. 1. Season chicken with salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken 6-8 min, stirring occasionally, until golden and cooked through (165°F internal temp). Transfer to plate. 2. Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and sun-dried tomatoes, cook 2 min until fragrant. Add spinach, cook 2 min until wilted. 4. Add heavy cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5 min, stirring, until slightly thickened. Add Parmesan and red pepper flakes, stir until cheese melts. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Return chicken to skillet. Add drained pasta, toss to coat. Add pasta water if needed for creamy consistency. 6. Serve immediately garnished with basil and extra Parmesan.

Angel hair with butter and garlic.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 3 tablespoons butter, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons dried parsley, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Cook pasta. Melt butter with sliced garlic until garlic is golden. Toss with pasta, parmesan, parsley, salt, and pepper.

Beef stroganoff with penne.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 1.5 lbs beef sirloin, sliced thin, 4 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 onion, sliced, 16 oz mushrooms, sliced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup dry white wine, 2 cups beef broth, 2 tbsp Dijon mustard, 2 tsp Worcestershire sauce, 1.5 cups sour cream, 2 tbsp flour. 1. Season beef with salt and pepper. Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Sear beef in batches 2 min per side until browned. Don't overcrowd. Remove to plate. 2. Reduce heat to medium. Add butter to skillet. Add onion, cook 5 min until softened. Add mushrooms, cook 8 min until golden. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 3. Add wine, scrape up browned bits. Simmer 2 min until reduced. Add beef broth, Dijon, Worcestershire. Bring to simmer, cook 5 min. 4. Mix sour cream with flour. Reduce heat to low, stir sour cream mixture into sauce. Simmer gently 3-4 min until thickened. Don't boil. Return beef and any juices to pan. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Cook penne in salted water until al dente. Drain. Serve stroganoff over penne. Garnish with parsley.

Pork ragu pappardelle.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 1 lb penne pasta, 1/4 cup tomato paste, 1 cup dry white wine, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tablespoon dried rosemary, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 3 tablespoons olive oil. Brown pork chunks in oil. Add onion, garlic, tomato paste, wine, and rosemary. Braise at 325°F for 3 hours until falling apart. Shred pork, toss with cooked pappardelle. Top with parmesan.

Creamy pesto pasta (if you have pesto or.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pasta (linguine or penne), 3 cups fresh basil leaves, packed, 1/2 cup pine nuts or walnuts, toasted, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup Parmesan cheese, grated, 1/2 cup Pecorino Romano, grated, 3/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, 1 cup heavy cream, 3 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 1 large lemon. 1. Toast nuts in dry skillet over medium heat 3-4 min, stirring constantly, until golden and fragrant. Cool completely. 2. In food processor, pulse basil, nuts, and garlic until finely chopped. With processor running, slowly drizzle in olive oil until smooth paste forms. Transfer to bowl. Stir in Parmesan, Pecorino, lemon zest, salt, pepper. 3. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook pasta until al dente. Reserve 1.5 cups pasta water before draining. 4. In large skillet, heat cream over medium heat until steaming. Reduce heat to low, whisk in pesto until smooth and creamy. 5. Add drained pasta to skillet, toss to coat. Add pasta water 2-3 tbsp at a time, tossing constantly, until sauce becomes creamy and coats pasta perfectly. 6. Serve immediately topped with extra Parmesan, toasted nuts, fresh basil leaves, and drizzle of olive oil.

ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
Spaghetti with fried eggs.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb spaghetti, 6 tbsp butter, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 4 tbsp olive oil, 4 eggs. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Reserve 2 cups pasta water before draining. 2. Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 2 min until fragrant. Add 1/2 cup pasta water, bring to simmer. 3. Add drained pasta to skillet, toss well. Add Parmesan, toss constantly, adding more pasta water 2 tbsp at a time until creamy sauce forms. Season with salt and pepper. Keep warm on low heat. 4. In separate skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Fry eggs sunny side up 3-4 min until whites are set but yolks remain runny. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Divide pasta among plates. Top each serving with fried egg. Garnish with parsley and extra Parmesan. Break yolk and mix into pasta while eating.

Garlic butter spaghetti with chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb spaghetti, 2 lbs boneless skinless chicken breasts, sliced, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 4 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 cup butter, 10 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 1/2 cup fresh parsley, chopped. 1. Season chicken with salt, pepper, Italian seasoning. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken 6-8 min, stirring occasionally, until golden and cooked through (165°F). Transfer to plate. 2. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Reserve 2 cups pasta water before draining. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 2-3 min until garlic is fragrant and golden but not brown. 4. Add 1 cup pasta water to skillet, bring to simmer. Add drained pasta, toss well. Add Parmesan, tossing constantly, adding more pasta water 2 tbsp at a time until creamy sauce forms. 5. Return chicken to skillet. Add parsley and lemon zest, toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan.

ingredients: (10.5 oz) can cream of mushroom soup
Cheesy baked rotini.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz pasta, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 (10.5 oz) can cream of mushroom soup, 1 cup milk, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Cook rotini. Mix with soup, milk, half the cheeses. Transfer to baking dish. Top with remaining cheese. Bake at 375°F 25 minutes until bubbly and golden.

ingredients: diced tomatoes with green chiles (10 oz)
Chicken spaghetti.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb spaghetti, 3 cups cooked chicken, shredded, 4 tbsp butter, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 1 g reen bell pepper, diced, 8 oz mushrooms, sliced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups chicken broth, 1 can cream of chicken soup (10.5 oz), 1 can diced tomatoes with green chiles (10 oz), 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 16 oz cheddar cheese, shredded, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Cook spaghetti in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain well. 2. Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and bell pepper, cook 5 min until softened. Add mushrooms, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 3. Add chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, diced tomatoes with chiles, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper. Stir to combine, bring to simmer. 4. In large bowl, combine cooked spaghetti, chicken, sauce mixture, and half the cheddar cheese. Mix well. 5. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. Top with remaining cheddar and Parmesan. 6. Bake 30-35 min until bubbly and cheese is golden. Let rest 10 min before serving.

Dump and bake meatball pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb frozen meatballs, 12 oz penne pasta, uncooked, 24 oz marinara sauce, 2 cups water, 1 cup heavy cream, 2 cups mozzarella, shredded, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tsp Italian seasoning. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. In 9x13 baking dish, combine frozen meatballs, uncooked pasta, marinara sauce, water, cream, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper. Stir to mix. 2. Cover tightly with foil. Bake 35 min. 3. Remove foil, stir well. Pasta should be tender and sauce should be bubbling. If pasta is still firm, add 1/2 cup water, cover, bake 5 min more. 4. Top with mozzarella and Parmesan. Return to oven uncovered 10 min until cheese melts and bubbles. 5. Broil 2 min for golden top. Let rest 5 min. Garnish with basil.

Hungarian noodles.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb egg noodles, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 4 tablespoons butter, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 6 slices bacon, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Cook and crumble bacon. Cook noodles. Mix hot noodles with sour cream, cottage cheese, and butter. Season with paprika, salt, pepper. Top with bacon crumbles.

ingredients: (10.5 oz) cans cream of mushroom soup
Beef and noodle bake.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs ground beef (80/20), 12 oz wide egg noodles, 2 (10.5 oz) cans cream of mushroom soup, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Brown beef with garlic. Cook noodles. Mix beef, noodles, soup, sour cream. Transfer to baking dish. Top with cheese. Bake at 350°F 25 minutes until bubbly.

Sausage and ricotta stuffed shells.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 box (12 oz) jumbo pasta shells, 1 lb Italian sausage, 15 oz ricotta cheese, 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 egg, 1 jar (24 oz) marinara sauce, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped, 2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp black pepper, 1/4 tsp red pepper flakes. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook shells according to package directions. Drain and rinse. 2. Remove sausage from casings and crumble into skillet. Cook over medium-high heat 8-10 minutes until browned. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Drain and cool slightly. 3. In bowl, mix ricotta, 1 cup mozzarella, 3/4 cup Parmesan, egg, basil, parsley, Italian seasoning, salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes. Fold in cooked sausage. 4. Spread 1.5 cups marinara in 9x13 baking dish. Fill each shell with sausage-cheese mixture and arrange in dish. 5. Pour remaining marinara over shells. Sprinkle with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan. 6. Cover with foil. Bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and bake 10-15 minutes until cheese is golden and bubbly. Let rest 5 minutes.

Creamy garlic chicken pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne or rigatoni, 2 lbs boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed, 2 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 4 tbsp olive oil, 6 tbsp butter, 10 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup dry white wine, 2 cups heavy cream, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 1/2 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes. 1. Season chicken with salt, pepper, Italian seasoning. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken 7-9 min, stirring occasionally, until golden and cooked through (165°F). Transfer to plate. 2. Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 2 min until fragrant and golden but not brown. 4. Add wine, scrape up browned bits. Simmer 2 min until reduced by half. Add heavy cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5-7 min, stirring, until sauce thickens. 5. Add Parmesan and red pepper flakes, stir until cheese melts. Return chicken to skillet. Add drained pasta and parsley, toss to coat. Add pasta water if needed. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and parsley.

Johnny Marzetti.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 1/2 cup elbow macaroni, 1 (8 oz) can tomato sauce, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 2 medium onions, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1.5 cups 1, sliced pepper. Brown beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce and Worcestershire, simmer 15 minutes. Cook macaroni, combine with meat sauce. Top with cheese and bake at 350°F for 25 minutes until bubbly.

Linguine carbonara.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb linguine, 8 oz pancetta or guanciale, diced, 5 egg yolks, 2 whole eggs, 1.5 cups Pecorino Romano, finely grated, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 tsp black pepper, freshly cracked. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook linguine until al dente. Reserve 2 cups pasta water before draining. 2. While pasta cooks, cook pancetta in large skillet over medium heat 8-10 min until fat renders and meat is crispy. Remove from heat. 3. In bowl, whisk together egg yolks, whole eggs, Pecorino, Parmesan, and lots of black pepper. 4. Add hot drained pasta to skillet with pancetta, toss off heat for 30 seconds. 5. Working quickly off heat, pour egg mixture over pasta, tossing vigorously and constantly. Add pasta water 2 tbsp at a time, tossing continuously, until creamy sauce forms that coats pasta without scrambling. 6. Plate immediately. Top with more Pecororo and cracked pepper. Serve at once.

Ground beef stroganoff noodles.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs ground beef (80/20), 1 lb egg noodles, 6 cups beef broth, 1/2 cup sour cream, 3 tablespoons butter, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 4 cloves garlic, minced. Brown beef with garlic. Add flour, cook 1 minute. Add broth and Worcestershire, simmer 10 minutes. Cook noodles. Remove from heat, stir in sour cream. Toss with noodles. Season.

Three cheese baked ziti.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 3 cups marinara sauce, 2 teaspoons Italian seasoning, 6 eggs. Cook ziti. Mix ricotta with egg, half mozzarella, Italian seasoning. Layer in dish: pasta, ricotta mixture, marinara, mozzarella. Repeat. Top with parmesan. Bake at 375°F 30 minutes.

Cheeseburger pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 1 onion, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups beef broth, 1 cup whole milk, 12 oz elbow macaroni, 1/2 cup ketchup, 2 tbsp mustard, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 3 cups cheddar cheese, shredded. 1. Brown beef in large skillet over medium-high heat 8 min, breaking up meat. Drain excess fat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 2. Add beef broth, milk, and uncooked macaroni. Stir to combine. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cover, cook 12-15 min, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender and liquid is mostly absorbed. 3. Stir in ketchup, mustard, and Worcestershire sauce. Simmer uncovered 2-3 min until thickened. 4. Remove from heat. Stir in cheddar cheese until melted and creamy. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve topped with diced pickles, shredded lettuce, and diced tomatoes.

Spicy sausage pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 1 lb hot Italian sausage, casings removed, 4 tbsp butter, 1 onion, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 1/2 cup white wine, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 1 cup heavy cream, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 2 cups baby spinach. 1. Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 2. Brown sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8-10 min, breaking up meat. Transfer to plate. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 min. 4. Add wine, simmer 2 min until reduced. Add crushed tomatoes, bring to simmer. Cook 10 min, stirring occasionally. 5. Add cream, simmer 5 min until sauce thickens. Add Parmesan, stir until melted. Return sausage to pan. Add spinach, cook 2 min until wilted. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Add drained pasta, toss to coat. Add pasta water if needed. Serve garnished with basil and extra Parmesan.

Ravioli bake.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs frozen cheese ravioli, 1 lb Italian sausage, casings removed, 2 medium onions, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 24 oz marinara sauce, 15 oz crushed tomatoes, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 cup ricotta cheese, 16 oz mozzarella, shredded, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped, 1.5 cups Salt and pepper to taste. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Brown sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat 8 min, breaking up meat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic and Italian seasoning, cook 1 min. 2. Add marinara and crushed tomatoes, simmer 10 min. Season with salt and pepper. 3. Spread 1 cup sauce in bottom of greased 9x13 baking dish. Layer half the frozen ravioli (don't thaw). Dollop half the ricotta over ravioli. Top with half remaining sauce and half the mozzarella. Repeat layers with remaining ravioli, ricotta, sauce, and mozzarella. Sprinkle Parmesan on top. 4. Cover tightly with foil. Bake 40 min. 5. Remove foil, bake 15 min more until bubbly and cheese is golden. Broil 2 min for extra browning. 6. Let rest 10 min. Garnish with basil before serving.

Hamburger gravy over noodles.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef (80/20), 4 tbsp butter, 4 tbsp all-purpose flour, 3 cups beef broth, 1 onion diced, 2 cloves garlic minced, 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp garlic powder, 12 oz wide egg noodles. 1. Cook egg noodles according to package directions. Drain and keep warm. 2. Brown ground beef in large skillet over medium-high heat 7-8 min. Drain excess fat, set beef aside. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 4. Sprinkle flour over onions, stir and cook 2 min until golden. 5. Gradually add broth, whisking to prevent lumps. Add Worcestershire, salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Bring to simmer. 6. Return beef to skillet, simmer 5-7 min until gravy thickens. 7. Serve beef gravy over hot egg noodles.

ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into chunks
One pot chicken and pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into chunks, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 3 tbsp olive oil, 1 onion, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 3 cups chicken broth, 1 cup heavy cream, 12 oz penne pasta, 1 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped, 2 cups baby spinach, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated. 1. Season chicken with salt, pepper, Italian seasoning. Heat oil in large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Cook chicken 6-8 min, stirring occasionally, until golden and cooked through. Remove to plate. 2. Add onion to pot, cook 5 min until softened. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 3. Add chicken broth, heavy cream, and uncooked pasta. Stir to combine. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cover, cook 12-15 min, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender. 4. Stir in sun-dried tomatoes and spinach. Cook 2 min until spinach wilts. Return chicken to pot. 5. Remove from heat. Stir in Parmesan until melted and creamy. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Garnish with basil. Serve immediately.

Biscuits and gravy.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb biscuits, 1 lb Italian sausage, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1.5 cups milk, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Brown sausage in skillet, breaking into crumbles. Add 3 tbsp flour, stir 1 minute. Slowly whisk in 2.5 cups milk. Simmer until thickened, 5-7 minutes. Season generously with pepper and salt. Split warm biscuits, ladle gravy over top.

Pancakes and sausage.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 cups all-purpose flour, 3.5 tsp baking powder, 1 tbsp sugar, 1/4 tsp salt, 1.25 cups milk, 1 egg, 3 tbsp melted butter, 1 lb breakfast sausage links. 1. Cook sausages in skillet over medium heat, turning occasionally, until browned and cooked through, 12-15 min. Keep warm. 2. Whisk flour, baking powder, sugar, salt in bowl. 3. Make well, add milk, egg, melted butter. Mix until smooth. 4. Heat griddle to 375°F, lightly grease. 5. Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake. Cook until bubbles form and edges set, 2-3 min. Flip, cook 1-2 min until golden. 6. Serve pancakes with sausages and maple syrup.

ingredients: maple syrup and powdered sugar for serving
French toast.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 slices thick bread (brioche or challah), 4 eggs, 1 cup whole milk, 2 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1/4 tsp salt, 4 tbsp butter (divided). 1. Whisk together eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt in shallow bowl. 2. Heat large skillet or griddle over medium heat, melt 1 tbsp butter. 3. Dip bread slices in egg mixture, coating both sides, let excess drip off. 4. Cook 2-3 slices at a time, 3-4 min per side until golden brown. 5. Add more butter to pan as needed between batches. 6. Keep finished toast warm in 200°F oven while cooking remaining slices. 7. Serve hot with maple syrup and dusted with powdered sugar.

ingredients: For hollandaise: 3 egg yolks, 1/2 cup melted butter, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1/4 tsp cayenne, salt to taste
Eggs benedict.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 English muffins, split, 8 slices Canadian bacon or ham, 8 eggs, 1 tbsp white vinegar. 1. Make hollandaise: Whisk egg yolks, lemon juice, cayenne in double boiler over simmering water. Slowly drizzle in melted butter whisking constantly until thick, 3-4 min. Season with salt, keep warm. 2. Bring pot of water to gentle simmer, add vinegar. 3. Crack each egg into small cup, slide into water. Poach 3-4 min until whites set but yolks runny. 4. Toast English muffins. Heat Canadian bacon in skillet 1-2 min per side. 5. Assemble: muffin half, bacon, poached egg, hollandaise. Garnish with chives.

Fried egg sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 eggs, 8 slices bread (white, sourdough, or English muffins), 4 slices American or cheddar cheese, 4 tbsp butter, 4 strips cooked bacon (optional). 1. Melt 2 tbsp butter in large nonstick skillet over medium heat. 2. Crack eggs into skillet, season with salt and pepper. Cook 3-4 min for sunny side up, or flip and cook 1 min more for over-easy. 3. Toast bread slices until golden. Butter with remaining butter. 4. Place cheese slice on 4 bread slices. Top with fried egg, bacon if using, and hot sauce if desired. 5. Top with remaining bread slices. 6. Cut in half and serve immediately.

ingredients: Salsa and sour cream for serving
Breakfast burrito.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 large eggs, 1/2 lb breakfast sausage or chorizo, 4 large flour tortillas, 1 cup shredded cheese, 1 cup hash browns or diced potatoes, 1/4 cup milk, 2 tbsp butter, 1/2 cup diced onion, 1/2 cup diced bell pepper. 1. Cook sausage in large skillet over medium heat 6-8 min, breaking into crumbles. Remove and set aside. 2. In same pan, add potatoes, cook 8-10 min until golden and tender. Add onion and pepper, cook 3-4 min. Remove and set aside. 3. Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper. Melt butter in pan over medium-low heat. Add eggs, scramble gently 3-4 min until just set. 4. Warm tortillas in microwave 20 sec or on griddle 15 sec per side. 5. Layer each tortilla with eggs, sausage, potatoes, and cheese. Fold in sides, roll tightly. 6. Optional: brown burritos seam-side down in skillet 1-2 min per side. Serve with salsa and sour cream.

ingredients: medium russet potatoes, peeled and grated
Hash browns and eggs.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 medium russet potatoes, peeled and grated, 1 s mall onion, finely diced, 4 tbsp vegetable oil or butter, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/4 tsp paprika, 4 eggs. 1. Grate potatoes, rinse in cold water, squeeze out excess moisture using clean towel. 2. Heat 2 tbsp oil in large cast iron skillet over medium-high heat. 3. Add potatoes and onion, season with salt, pepper, paprika. Press down with spatula. 4. Cook without stirring 5-6 min until bottom is golden and crispy. Flip in sections, add remaining oil. Cook 5-6 min more. 5. Make wells in hash browns, crack eggs into wells. Cover, cook 4-5 min until eggs reach desired doneness. Garnish with parsley.

Shakshuka (no tomato chunks).directions: Ingredients needed: 4 large eggs, 1 (15 oz) can tomato puree, 1 large onion, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1/4 tsp cayenne, 3 tablespoons olive oil. Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add tomato puree, cumin, paprika, cayenne, and salt. Simmer until thickened. Make wells and crack in eggs. Cover and cook until whites are set.

ingredients: 1 refrigerated pie crust or homemade pastry
Quiche.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup 1 refrigerated pie crust or homemade pastry, 4 large eggs, 1 1/2 cups heavy cream, 1 cup shredded Gruyère cheese, 6 oz bacon, cooked and crumbled, 2 medium onions, diced, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Press pie crust into 9-inch tart pan or pie dish. Prick bottom with fork. 2. Line crust with parchment, fill with pie weights or dried beans. Blind bake 15 min. Remove weights and parchment, bake 5 min more until lightly golden. Remove from oven. 3. Whisk eggs and cream in bowl. Stir in cheese, bacon, onion, nutmeg, 3/4 tsp salt, and pepper. 4. Pour filling into pre-baked crust. 5. Bake 35-40 min until center is just set with slight jiggle. Edges should be puffed and golden. 6. Cool 15 min before slicing. Serve warm or room temperature.

Frittata.directions: Ingredients needed: 10 eggs, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1 cup shredded cheese (cheddar or gruyere), 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 cup vegetables (bell peppers, 1/2 cup cooked meat (bacon, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1/4 cup fresh herbs (parsley. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. 2. Whisk eggs, cream, salt, and pepper in large bowl. 3. Stir in 3/4 cup cheese and herbs. 4. Heat oven-safe 10-inch skillet over medium heat with olive oil. 5. Sauté vegetables 5-7 min until softened. 6. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 7. Add cooked meat if using, stir to combine. 8. Pour egg mixture over vegetables in skillet, gently stir to distribute evenly. 9. Cook on stovetop 2-3 min without stirring until edges begin to set. 10. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. 11. Transfer skillet to oven, bake 18-22 min until center is set and top is golden. 12. Let rest 5 min, slice into wedges and serve.

Grilled cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 slices bread (white, 8 slices cheese (American, 4 tbsp butter (softened). 1. Heat large skillet or griddle over medium heat. 2. Butter one side of each bread slice (or spread with mayo for extra crispy exterior). 3. Place 4 bread slices buttered-side down in pan. 4. Top each with 2 cheese slices. 5. Cover with remaining bread slices, buttered-side up. 6. Cook 3-4 min until bottom is golden brown. 7. Flip sandwiches carefully, press down gently with spatula. 8. Cook another 3-4 min until second side is golden and cheese is fully melted. 9. Serve immediately while hot and melty.

Tuna melt.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb sushi-grade tuna, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 4 slices bread, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Mix drained tuna with mayo, salt, pepper. Toast bread with butter. Top with tuna salad and cheese slices. Broil until cheese melts and bubbles.

Patty melt.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 1 large yellow onion (sliced), 8 slices rye bread, 8 slices Swiss cheese, 4 tbsp butter, 1 tbsp vegetable oil. 1. Season ground beef with salt and pepper, form into 4 thin oval patties. 2. Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat, cook patties 3-4 min per side until browned, set aside. 3. In same skillet, caramelize onions in 1 tbsp butter for 15-20 min until deep golden brown. 4. Butter one side of each bread slice. 5. On unbuttered side, layer: cheese, patty, caramelized onions, cheese, then top with second bread slice (buttered side out). 6. Grill sandwiches in skillet over medium heat 3-4 min per side until bread is golden and cheese melts. 7. Serve immediately.

Sloppy joes.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 1 lb ham, cubed, 1/3 cup ketchup, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 2 tablespoons yellow mustard, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Brown beef, drain. Add ketchup, brown sugar, Worcestershire, mustard, garlic powder. Simmer 15 minutes until thickened. Season. Serve on toasted buns.

French dip.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 3 cups beef broth, 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 4 slices bread, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter. Season roast with salt, sear all sides. Add broth, Worcestershire, garlic, thyme. Cover, braise at 300°F 3-4 hours until very tender. Shred beef. Toast buttered French bread with provolone. Fill with beef. Serve with strained jus for dipping.

Philly cheesesteak.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs ribeye steak thinly sliced, 2 tbsp vegetable oil, 2 onions sliced, 2 g reen bell peppers sliced, 8 oz mushrooms sliced (optional), 8 slices provolone cheese, 4 hoagie rolls. 1. Freeze steak 30 min for easier slicing. Slice as thinly as possible against the grain. 2. Heat 1 tbsp oil in large skillet or griddle over medium-high heat. Add onions and peppers, cook 7-8 min until caramelized. Add mushrooms if using, cook 3-4 min more. Remove and set aside. 3. Add remaining oil, increase heat to high. Add steak in single layer, season with salt and pepper. Cook undisturbed 2-3 min until browned, then stir and cook 2 min more. 4. Mix vegetables back in. Divide into 4 portions on griddle, top each with 2 cheese slices. Let melt 1-2 min. 5. Split hoagie rolls, scoop steak mixture into rolls and serve immediately.

Pulled pork sandwiches.directions:
Ingredients needed: 4 lbs pork shoulder (Boston butt), trimmed, 2 tbsp brown sugar, 2 tbsp paprika, 1 tbsp chili powder, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp onion powder, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper, 1 cup apple cider vinegar, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 cup BBQ sauce, 8 hamburger buns. 1. In a small bowl, combine 2 tbsp brown sugar, 2 tbsp paprika, 1 tbsp chili powder, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp onion powder, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, and 1/2 tsp cayenne. Mix well.
2. Rub spice mixture all over 4 lbs pork shoulder, coating thoroughly. Let sit 30 minutes at room temperature.
3. Preheat oven to 300°F.
4. Place pork in a large roasting pan or Dutch oven. Pour 1 cup apple cider vinegar and 1 cup chicken broth around (not over) the pork.
5. Cover tightly with foil or lid. Roast at 300°F for 5-6 hours, until pork is very tender and easily pulls apart with a fork (internal temperature 195-205°F).
6. Remove pork from liquid. Let rest 15 minutes, then shred with two forks, discarding any large fat pieces.
7. Skim fat from cooking liquid. Pour 1 cup of the liquid over shredded pork and toss. Add 1 cup BBQ sauce and mix well.
8. Serve on toasted hamburger buns with coleslaw if desired.

Hot dogs.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 hot dogs, 1/2 cup hot dog buns, 1 tablespoon mustard, 1/2 cup ketchup, 3 tablespoons relish. Grill, boil, or pan-fry hot dogs until heated through and slightly charred. Toast buns if desired. Place hot dog in bun. Top with desired condiments.

Corn dogs.directions: Ingredients needed: 10 hot dogs, 1 (15 oz) can corn, drained, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 3 large eggs, 2 cups whole milk, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/4 cup sugar, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Mix cornmeal, flour, baking powder, sugar, salt. Add egg and milk to form thick batter. Insert sticks into hot dogs. Coat in batter. Deep fry at 365°F 3-4 minutes until golden brown.

Pigs in a blanket.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb smoked sausage, sliced, 1 cup crescent roll dough, 3 tablespoons mustard. Wrap each sausage in triangle of crescent dough. Bake at 375°F 12-15 minutes until golden. Serve with mustard for dipping.

Empanadas.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pie crust, 1.5 lbs ground beef (80/20), 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1 cup sliced black olives, 6 eggs, 1/2 cup raisins, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Cook beef with cumin and paprika. Add chopped olives, diced egg, raisins. Roll dough into circles. Add filling to half, fold, crimp edges with fork. Brush with egg wash. Bake at 400°F 20-25 minutes until golden. Or deep fry.

Pierogies from scratch.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup flour, 4 large eggs, 1/2 cup sour cream, 4 tablespoons butter, 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 8 oz shredded cheese, 1/2 lb bacon. Make dough: flour, egg, sour cream, salt. Rest 30 minutes. Make filling: mashed potatoes with cheese. Roll dough thin, cut circles. Add filling, fold and seal edges. Boil until they float. Pan-fry in butter until golden. Serve with bacon.

Pot pie (no veg).directions: Ingredients needed: 3 cups cooked chicken, diced, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of chicken soup, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp dried thyme, 2 refrigerated pie crusts, 1 egg, beaten. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. 2. In large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour and cook 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly until golden. 3. Gradually whisk in chicken broth and cream. Bring to simmer, whisking frequently. Cook 5-7 minutes until thickened. 4. Stir in cream of chicken soup, garlic powder, onion powder, thyme, salt, and pepper. Add chicken and mix well. Remove from heat. 5. Press one pie crust into 9-inch deep dish pie pan. Pour chicken filling into crust. 6. Top with second pie crust. Trim and crimp edges to seal. Cut 4-5 slits in top for steam vents. Brush with beaten egg. 7. Place on baking sheet. Bake 45-50 minutes until crust is golden brown and filling is bubbly. Let rest 10 minutes before serving.

ingredients: heet puff pastry, cut into squares
Chicken pot pie soup.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 cups cooked chicken, diced, 4 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup all-purpose flour, 3 cups chicken broth, 2 cups heavy cream, 1 cup whole milk, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp dried thyme, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1 s heet puff pastry, cut into squares, 1 egg, beaten. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F for puff pastry. Place puff pastry squares on baking sheet, brush with egg, and bake 15-18 minutes until golden and puffed. Set aside. 2. In large pot or Dutch oven, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour and cook 3-4 minutes, stirring constantly. 3. Gradually whisk in chicken broth, then heavy cream and milk. Bring to simmer, whisking frequently. Cook 10-12 minutes until thickened to creamy soup consistency. 4. Stir in garlic powder, onion powder, thyme, salt, and pepper. Add diced chicken and heat through, 3-5 minutes. 5. Ladle soup into bowls. Top each with baked puff pastry square. Garnish with fresh parsley.

Beef pot pie.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs beef stew meat, cubed, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour (for dredging), 1/4 cup butter, 1 medium onion, diced, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups beef broth, 1 cup red wine, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 3 tbsp all-purpose flour (for gravy), 1 tsp dried thyme, 1 tsp dried rosemary, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 2 refrigerated pie crusts, 1 egg, beaten. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Season beef with salt and pepper. Dredge in 1/2 cup flour. 2. In Dutch oven, melt butter over medium-high heat. Brown beef in batches, 3-4 minutes per side. Remove and set aside. 3. In same pot, sauté onion 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Sprinkle with 3 tbsp flour and cook 2 minutes. 4. Add tomato paste, cook 1 minute. Gradually whisk in beef broth and wine. Add Worcestershire, thyme, rosemary, and bay leaves. 5. Return beef to pot. Bring to boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer 1.5 hours until beef is very tender. Remove bay leaves. 6. Press one pie crust into 9-inch deep dish pie pan. Pour beef filling into crust. Top with second crust, trim and crimp edges. Cut vents and brush with egg. 7. Bake 40-45 minutes until golden brown and bubbly. Let rest 10 minutes.

Shepherd's pie.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground lamb, 2 lbs russet potatoes, peeled and quartered, 1 large onion, diced, 2 carrots, diced, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup frozen peas, 2 cups lamb or beef broth, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 2 tbsp flour, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 4 tbsp butter, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 2 tsp fresh thyme leaves, 1 tsp fresh rosemary, minced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. 2. Boil potatoes in salted water until tender, 15-20 min. Drain well. 3. Mash potatoes with butter and cream until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside. 4. Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Brown lamb, breaking up with spoon, 8-10 min. Season with salt and pepper. Remove to plate. 5. In same pan, sauté onion and carrots over medium heat until softened, 8 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 6. Return lamb to pan. Sprinkle with flour, stir 1 min. Add tomato paste, cook 1 min. 7. Add broth, Worcestershire, thyme, and rosemary. Bring to boil, reduce heat, simmer 15 min until thickened. Stir in peas, cook 2 min. Adjust seasoning. 8. Transfer meat mixture to 9x13 baking dish. Spread mashed potatoes evenly over top. Use fork to create texture on surface. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. 9. Bake 25-30 min until potatoes are golden and filling is bubbling. Let rest 10 min before serving.

Cottage pie.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef (85/15), 2 lbs russet potatoes, peeled and quartered, 1 large onion, diced, 2 carrots, diced, 2 celery stalks, diced, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup frozen peas, 2 cups beef broth, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 2 tbsp flour, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 4 tbsp butter, 1 egg yolk, 2 tsp fresh thyme leaves, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. 2. Boil potatoes in salted water until tender, 15-20 min. Drain well, return to pot. 3. Mash potatoes with butter, cream, and egg yolk until smooth and fluffy. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside. 4. Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Brown beef, breaking up with spoon, 8-10 min. Season with salt and pepper. Remove to plate. 5. In same pan, sauté onion, carrots, and celery over medium heat until softened, 10 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 6. Return beef to pan. Sprinkle with flour, stir constantly 2 min. Add tomato paste, cook 1 min. 7. Add broth, Worcestershire, and thyme. Bring to boil, reduce heat, simmer 15 min until thick and rich. Stir in peas, cook 2 min. Adjust seasoning. 8. Transfer meat mixture to 9x13 baking dish. Spread mashed potatoes evenly over top. Use fork to create peaks and ridges. 9. Bake 25-30 min until potatoes are golden brown and filling is bubbling at edges. Let rest 10 min before serving.

ingredients: Sour cream and cilantro for serving
Tamale pie.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained, 1 can (15 oz) corn, drained, 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes, 1 cup salsa, 1 tbsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1 cup cornmeal, 3 cups chicken broth, 2 cups shredded cheese, 2 tbsp butter. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Brown ground beef in large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat 6-8 min. Drain fat. 2. Add beans, corn, tomatoes, salsa, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper. Simmer 10 min. Stir in 1 cup cheese. 3. In saucepan, bring broth and butter to boil. Slowly whisk in cornmeal, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to low, cook 5 min until thick, stirring frequently. 4. Spread cornmeal mixture over beef filling. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. 5. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and top is golden. Let stand 10 min. Serve with sour cream and cilantro.

ingredients: Toppings: sour cream, diced tomatoes, shredded lettuce, jalapeños, diced onion
