Top with ground pork, corn, bean sprouts, soft boiled egg, and green onions. 9. Add pat of butter and drizzle of chili oil to each bowl. 10. Serve immediately.

Tonkotsu ramen.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb fresh ramen noodles, 1 lb pork trotters, 2 onions (halved), 1 head garlic (halved), 4 inches ginger (sliced), 12 cups water, 4 s oft boiled eggs, 2 cups wood ear mushrooms, 4 s heets nori, 2 g reen onions (sliced), 1 cup pickled ginger. 1. Blanch pork bones and trotters in boiling water 5 min, drain. 2. In large pot, add bones, trotters, onions, garlic, ginger, and 12 cups water. 3. Bring to rolling boil, reduce to medium, simmer 12-18 hours until broth is milky white and rich. 4. Strain broth, keep warm. 5. Cook ramen noodles according to package, drain. 6. Divide noodles among bowls. 7. Ladle hot tonkotsu broth over noodles. 8. Top with chashu pork, soft boiled egg, mushrooms, nori, green onions, and pickled ginger. 9. Drizzle with mayu, sprinkle sesame seeds. 10. Serve immediately.

Chashu pork.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pork belly, sliced, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup mirin, 1/4 cup sake, 1/4 cup sugar, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 large onion, diced. Roll and tie pork belly. Sear. Braise in soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar, ginger, garlic 2-3 hours until tender. Cool in liquid. Slice thin. Torch to caramelize for ramen topping.

Pork belly buns.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs pork belly, 1 lb steamed buns, 2 tablespoons hoisin sauce, 2 medium cucumbers, diced, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1 teaspoon five spice. Slow braise pork belly with soy sauce, sugar, five spice for 3 hours until tender. Slice thick. Steam buns. Spread hoisin in bun. Add pork belly slice, cucumber, green onion.

ingredients: pork shoulder or pork belly, cut into 2-inch thick strips
red food coloring (optional, for traditional color)
Char siu.directions:
Ingredients needed: 2 lbs pork shoulder or pork belly, cut into 2-inch thick strips, 1/4 cup hoisin sauce, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 3 tbsp honey, 2 tbsp Shaoxing wine, 2 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tbsp sesame oil, 1 tbsp Chinese five-spice powder, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp ginger, minced, 1 tsp red food coloring (optional, for traditional color), 2 tbsp honey for glazing. 1. Make marinade: In bowl, whisk together hoisin sauce, soy sauce, 3 tbsp honey, Shaoxing wine, brown sugar, sesame oil, five-spice powder, garlic, ginger, and food coloring if using.
2. Place pork strips in large ziplock bag or container. Pour marinade over pork, massage to coat thoroughly.
3. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight (overnight is best), turning occasionally.
4. Preheat oven to 375°F. Line baking sheet with foil and place wire rack on top.
5. Remove pork from marinade (reserve marinade). Arrange pork strips on wire rack with space between pieces.
6. Roast for 25 minutes.
7. Flip pork, brush with reserved marinade. Roast for another 20 minutes.
8. Increase oven temperature to 425°F. Brush pork with 2 tbsp honey. Roast for 5 minutes.
9. Flip, brush other side with honey, roast for final 5 minutes until caramelized and internal temp reaches 145°F.
10. Let rest for 10 minutes before slicing. Serve over rice or in buns.

ingredients: char siu pork, sliced (see Char siu recipe)
Char siu rice.directions:
Ingredients needed: 2 cups cooked jasmine rice, 12 oz char siu pork, sliced (see Char siu recipe), 2 cups bok choy, chopped, 2 tbsp vegetable oil, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oyster sauce, 1 tsp sesame oil, 2 g reen onions, sliced, 1 cucumber, sliced (for serving). 1. Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil in wok over medium-high heat.
2. Add bok choy, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until tender. Remove and set aside.
3. Add remaining 1 tbsp oil to wok. Add minced garlic, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
4. Add cooked rice, breaking up clumps. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
5. Add soy sauce and oyster sauce. Toss for 1 minute to coat rice.
6. Divide rice among serving bowls.
7. Top each bowl with sliced char siu pork and cooked bok choy.
8. Drizzle with sesame oil and garnish with green onions.
9. Serve with sliced cucumber on the side.

ingredients: fresh lo mein noodles (or dried spaghetti)
protein of choice (chicken, pork, beef, or shrimp), sliced
mixed vegetables (carrots, cabbage, bell peppers, snow peas)
Lo mein.directions:
Ingredients needed: 1 lb fresh lo mein noodles (or dried spaghetti), 2 tbsp vegetable oil, 8 oz protein of choice (chicken, pork, beef, or shrimp), sliced, 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, cabbage, bell peppers, snow peas), 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp ginger, minced, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 2 tbsp oyster sauce, 1 tbsp hoisin sauce, 1 tbsp dark soy sauce, 2 tsp sesame oil, 1 tsp sugar, 3 g reen onions, sliced. 1. Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
2. Mix sauce: combine soy sauce, oyster sauce, hoisin sauce, dark soy sauce, sesame oil, and sugar. Set aside.
3. Heat wok over high heat (450°F). Add 1 tbsp vegetable oil.
4. Add protein, stir-fry for 3-5 minutes until cooked through. Remove and set aside.
5. Add remaining 1 tbsp oil. Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
6. Add mixed vegetables, stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender.
7. Return protein to wok. Add cooked noodles and sauce mixture.
8. Toss everything together for 2-3 minutes, using tongs to ensure noodles are well coated and heated through.
9. Add green onions, toss once more, and serve immediately.

ingredients: fresh chow mein noodles (or 12 oz dried)
chicken breast, sliced thin (or protein of choice)
Chow mein.directions:
Ingredients needed: 1 lb fresh chow mein noodles (or 12 oz dried), 2 tbsp vegetable oil, 8 oz chicken breast, sliced thin (or protein of choice), 2 cups cabbage, shredded, 1 cup carrots, julienned, 1 cup bean sprouts, 1 red bell pepper, sliced thin, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp ginger, minced, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp oyster sauce, 1 tbsp dark soy sauce, 1 tbsp Shaoxing wine, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp sesame oil, 3 g reen onions, sliced. 1. Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain, rinse with cold water, and toss with 1 tsp oil to prevent sticking. Set aside.
2. Mix sauce: combine soy sauce, oyster sauce, dark soy sauce, Shaoxing wine, and sugar. Set aside.
3. Heat wok over high heat (450°F). Add 1 tbsp vegetable oil.
4. Add sliced chicken, stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until cooked through. Remove and set aside.
5. Add remaining 1 tbsp oil to wok. Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
6. Add carrots and bell pepper, stir-fry for 2 minutes.
7. Add cabbage, stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until slightly wilted.
8. Add bean sprouts, stir-fry for 1 minute.
9. Return chicken to wok. Add cooked noodles and sauce mixture. Toss everything together for 2-3 minutes until noodles are heated through and well coated.
10. Drizzle with sesame oil, add green onions, toss once more, and serve immediately.

ingredients: mixed vegetables (optional: carrots, snow peas, bell peppers)
Chow fun.directions:
Ingredients needed: 1 lb fresh wide rice noodles (ho fun), 3 tbsp vegetable oil, 2 cups bean sprouts, 3 g reen onions, cut into 2-inch pieces, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp dark soy sauce, 1 tbsp oyster sauce, 1/2 tsp sugar, 1 cup mixed vegetables (optional: carrots, snow peas, bell peppers). 1. If using dried noodles, soak in hot water for 30 minutes, then drain. If using fresh, separate gently.
2. Heat wok over highest heat (500°F+) until smoking. Add oil.
3. Add garlic, stir-fry for 15 seconds until fragrant.
4. Add mixed vegetables if using, stir-fry for 2 minutes.
5. Add noodles. Let sit without stirring for 1-2 minutes to char on bottom.
6. Add soy sauce, dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar. Toss vigorously for 2-3 minutes.
7. Add bean sprouts and green onions. Toss for 1 minute.
8. Serve immediately while hot.

ingredients: beef sirloin, sliced thin against the grain
Beef chow fun.directions:
Ingredients needed: 1 lb fresh wide rice noodles (ho fun), 12 oz beef sirloin, sliced thin against the grain, 3 tbsp vegetable oil, 2 cups bean sprouts, 3 g reen onions, cut into 2-inch pieces, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp dark soy sauce, 2 tbsp oyster sauce, 1 tbsp Shaoxing wine, 1 tbsp cornstarch, 1/2 tsp sugar, 1/4 tsp white pepper. 1. Marinate beef: Mix sliced beef with 1 tbsp soy sauce, Shaoxing wine, cornstarch, and white pepper. Let sit 15 minutes.
2. If using dried noodles, soak in hot water for 30 minutes, then drain. If using fresh, separate gently.
3. Heat wok over highest heat (500°F+) until smoking. Add 1 tbsp oil.
4. Add marinated beef in single layer. Sear for 1-2 minutes per side until browned. Remove and set aside.
5. Add 2 tbsp oil to wok, heat until smoking. Add garlic, stir-fry for 15 seconds.
6. Add noodles. Let sit without stirring for 1-2 minutes to char on bottom.
7. Add remaining soy sauce, dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar. Toss vigorously for 2 minutes.
8. Return beef to wok along with bean sprouts and green onions. Toss for 1 minute.
9. Serve immediately while hot.

Pad see ew.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups white rice, 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 4 large eggs, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon oyster sauce, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 lb broccoli florets, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Soak noodles in hot water until pliable. Stir-fry beef, remove. Scramble eggs, remove. Add noodles, soy sauces, oyster sauce. Char noodles without stirring. Add beef, eggs, broccoli. Toss.

Pad thai (simplified).directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups white rice, 1.5 lbs shrimp (21-25 count), 6 eggs, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 1/4 cup tamarind paste, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 1/2 cup roasted peanuts, 3 limes, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Soak rice noodles in hot water. Make sauce: tamarind, fish sauce, sugar. Stir-fry shrimp, remove. Scramble eggs, remove. Stir-fry noodles with sauce. Add shrimp and eggs back. Serve with peanuts and lime.

Drunken noodles.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups white rice, 2 lbs chicken thighs, 2 teaspoons dried basil, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1 tablespoon oyster sauce, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 1/2 cup Thai chilies, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 3 large eggs, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Soak noodles in hot water until pliable. Slice chicken, stir-fry until cooked. Add garlic and chilies. Push aside, scramble eggs. Add noodles, soy sauce, oyster sauce, fish sauce. Toss. Add Thai basil, toss until wilted.

ingredients: lemongrass, cut into 2-inch pieces and bruised
kaffir lime leaves (or zest of 1 lime)
Tom yum soup (no veg).directions: Ingredients needed: 8 cups chicken broth, 1 lb shrimp, peeled and deveined, 8 oz mushrooms, halved, 3 stalks lemongrass, cut into 2-inch pieces and bruised, 4 kaffir lime leaves (or zest of 1 lime), 3 Thai chilies, crushed, 3 tbsp fish sauce, 2 tbsp lime juice, 1 tbsp chili paste (nam prik pao), 1 tbsp sugar, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 inch galangal or ginger, sliced. 1. In large pot, bring broth to boil. Add lemongrass, lime leaves, galangal, garlic, Thai chilies. Simmer 10 min to infuse flavors. 2. Add mushrooms, cook 5 min until tender. 3. Add chili paste, fish sauce, sugar. Stir well. 4. Add shrimp, cook 3-4 min until pink and cooked through (145°F). 5. Remove from heat, stir in lime juice. Taste and adjust seasoning. Remove lemongrass and lime leaves if desired. Garnish with cilantro.

Thai basil chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs (2 lbs), 2 teaspoons dried basil, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1 tablespoon oyster sauce, 1 lb Thai chilies, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup sugar, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 cups white rice. Mince chicken. Stir-fry garlic and chilies. Add chicken, cook until browned. Add fish sauce, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar. Cook 2 minutes. Add Thai basil, stir until wilted. Serve over rice with fried egg.

Larb.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs ground pork, 1 lime, juiced and zested, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 1 cup jasmine rice, 1 lb Thai chilies, 1/4 cup fresh mint, chopped, 1 cup jasmine rice, 2 large shallots, diced. Toast rice, grind to powder. Cook pork, break up finely. Off heat, add lime juice, fish sauce, toasted rice powder, sliced chilies, minced shallots, torn mint. Serve with sticky rice and cabbage leaves.

Satay.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 2 cups whole milk, 1.5 teaspoons turmeric, 1.5 teaspoons ground coriander, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 lemon, juiced, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 3 limes. Marinate chicken in coconut milk, turmeric, coriander, cumin, garlic, lemongrass. Thread onto skewers, grill. Make peanut sauce with peanut butter, coconut milk, soy sauce, lime. Serve with sauce.

Peanut noodles.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz medium noodles, 4 tablespoons butter, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1 cup jasmine rice, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 2 tablespoons honey, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 3 limes, 3/4 cup chopped peanuts. Cook noodles, rinse cold. Whisk peanut butter, soy sauce, vinegar, sesame oil, honey, garlic, ginger, lime juice until smooth. Toss with noodles. Top with crushed peanuts.

Sesame noodles.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz medium noodles, 2 tablespoons sesame paste, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 2 cups white rice, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 1/4 cup sugar, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced, 3 tablespoons sesame seeds. Cook noodles, rinse cold. Whisk sesame paste, soy sauce, vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, garlic, ginger until smooth. Toss with noodles. Top with sesame seeds.

Dan dan noodles.directions:
Ingredients needed: 1 lb fresh Chinese wheat noodles (or dried), 12 oz ground pork, 3 tbsp vegetable oil, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp ginger, minced, 3 tbsp Chinese sesame paste (or tahini), 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp Chinese black vinegar, 2 tbsp chili oil, 1 tbsp Sichuan peppercorns, toasted and ground, 2 tsp sugar, 1/4 cup chicken broth, 3 g reen onions, sliced. 1. Bring large pot of water to boil for noodles.
2. In small bowl, mix sesame paste, soy sauce, black vinegar, chili oil, ground Sichuan peppercorns, sugar, and chicken broth. Set aside.
3. Heat 2 tbsp vegetable oil in wok over high heat (450°F). Add ground pork, breaking it up with spatula. Cook for 5-6 minutes until browned and crispy. Remove and set aside.
4. In same wok, add remaining 1 tbsp oil. Add garlic and ginger. Stir-fry for 1 minute until fragrant.
5. Return pork to wok, stir to combine with aromatics. Cook for 1 minute.
6. Meanwhile, cook noodles according to package directions (typically 3-4 minutes for fresh, 6-8 minutes for dried). Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking water.
7. Divide sauce mixture among serving bowls. Add hot noodles.
8. Top each bowl with ground pork mixture and green onions.
9. Add splash of reserved noodle water if sauce is too thick. Toss and serve immediately.

Zhajiangmian.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz medium noodles, 12 oz ground pork, 2 tablespoons sweet bean paste, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 English cucumber, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice. Brown pork. Add sweet bean paste, soy sauce, rice wine, sugar. Simmer until thick. Cook noodles. Top with meat sauce and julienned cucumber.

ingredients: fermented black beans, rinsed and chopped
Mapo tofu.directions:
Ingredients needed: 1 lb soft tofu, cut into 3/4-inch cubes, 8 oz ground pork, 3 tbsp vegetable oil, 2 tbsp doubanjiang (spicy bean paste), 1 tbsp fermented black beans, rinsed and chopped, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp ginger, minced, 1 tbsp Sichuan peppercorns, toasted and ground, 1 cup chicken broth, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp Shaoxing wine, 2 tsp sugar, 2 tbsp cornstarch mixed with 3 tbsp water, 3 g reen onions, sliced, 1 tsp chili oil (optional). 1. Bring pot of water to boil. Add tofu cubes, simmer for 2 minutes to remove excess water. Drain gently and set aside.
2. Heat wok over high heat (450°F). Add 2 tbsp vegetable oil.
3. Add ground pork, breaking it up with spatula. Cook for 4-5 minutes until browned and crispy. Remove and set aside.
4. Add remaining 1 tbsp oil to wok. Add doubanjiang and fermented black beans, stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant.
5. Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 15 seconds.
6. Return pork to wok. Add chicken broth, soy sauce, Shaoxing wine, and sugar. Bring to boil.
7. Reduce heat to medium (350°F). Gently add tofu cubes, simmer for 3-4 minutes.
8. Add ground Sichuan peppercorns. Stir gently to avoid breaking tofu.
9. Pour in cornstarch slurry, stirring gently until sauce thickens (about 1 minute).
10. Transfer to serving dish, garnish with green onions and drizzle with chili oil if desired. Serve with steamed rice.

ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch cubes
Kung pao chicken (no veg).directions:
Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch cubes, 1/2 cup roasted peanuts, 8-10 dried red chilies, 1 tbsp Sichuan peppercorns, 3 tbsp vegetable oil, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp ginger, minced, 3 g reen onions, cut into 1-inch pieces, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp Chinese black vinegar, 2 tbsp Shaoxing wine, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tbsp cornstarch, 2 tsp sesame oil, 1/4 cup chicken broth. 1. In bowl, marinate chicken with 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp Shaoxing wine, and 1/2 tbsp cornstarch. Let sit 15 minutes.
2. Mix sauce: combine remaining 2 tbsp soy sauce, black vinegar, 1 tbsp Shaoxing wine, sugar, remaining 1/2 tbsp cornstarch, and chicken broth. Set aside.
3. Heat wok over high heat (450°F) until smoking. Add 2 tbsp vegetable oil.
4. Add marinated chicken in single layer. Sear for 2 minutes without stirring, then stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until cooked through. Remove and set aside.
5. Add remaining 1 tbsp oil to wok. Add Sichuan peppercorns and dried chilies, stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant (don't burn).
6. Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 15 seconds.
7. Return chicken to wok. Add green onions and peanuts. Stir-fry for 1 minute.
8. Pour in sauce mixture, toss for 1-2 minutes until sauce thickens and coats chicken.
9. Drizzle with sesame oil, toss once more, and serve immediately over rice.

ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch cubes
General Tso's chicken.directions:
Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch cubes, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup cornstarch, 2 large eggs, beaten, 1 tsp salt, 2 tbsp vegetable oil for stir-fry, 8-10 dried red chilies, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp ginger, minced, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 3 tbsp rice vinegar, 3 tbsp hoisin sauce, 3 tbsp sugar, 2 tbsp Shaoxing wine, 1 tbsp cornstarch mixed with 2 tbsp water, 1 tsp sesame oil, 3 g reen onions, cut into 1-inch pieces. 1. Season chicken with salt. Mix flour and cornstarch in bowl.
2. Dip chicken in beaten eggs, then dredge in flour mixture until well coated.
3. Heat 2 inches of vegetable oil in wok to 350°F.
4. Fry chicken in batches for 4-5 minutes until golden and crispy (internal temp 165°F). Drain on paper towels.
5. Mix sauce: combine soy sauce, rice vinegar, hoisin sauce, sugar, and Shaoxing wine. Set aside.
6. Heat 2 tbsp oil in clean wok over high heat (450°F). Add dried chilies, stir-fry for 30 seconds until darkened but not burned.
7. Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 15 seconds until fragrant.
8. Pour in sauce mixture, bring to boil.
9. Add cornstarch slurry, stir until sauce thickens (about 1 minute).
10. Add fried chicken and green onions, toss for 1-2 minutes until well coated.
11. Drizzle with sesame oil, toss once more, and serve immediately over steamed rice.

ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch cubes
Orange chicken.directions:
Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch cubes, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup cornstarch, 2 large eggs, beaten, 1 tsp salt, 1 tbsp vegetable oil for stir-fry, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tbsp ginger, minced, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 3/4 cup fresh orange juice, 1/3 cup sugar, 1/4 cup rice vinegar, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp cornstarch mixed with 2 tbsp water, 2 g reen onions, sliced. 1. Season chicken with salt. Mix flour and cornstarch in bowl.
2. Dip chicken in beaten eggs, then dredge in flour mixture until well coated.
3. Heat 2 inches of vegetable oil in wok to 350°F.
4. Fry chicken in batches for 4-5 minutes until golden and crispy (internal temp 165°F). Drain on paper towels.
5. For sauce: Heat 1 tbsp oil in clean wok or saucepan over medium-high heat. Add garlic, ginger, and red pepper flakes. Stir-fry for 30 seconds.
6. Add orange juice, orange zest, sugar, rice vinegar, and soy sauce. Bring to boil.
7. Add cornstarch slurry, stirring constantly until sauce thickens (about 1-2 minutes).
8. Add fried chicken to sauce, toss for 1-2 minutes until well coated.
9. Garnish with green onions and serve immediately over steamed rice.

Sesame chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 (6-8 oz) boneless chicken breasts, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 3 tablespoons honey, 1 cup jasmine rice, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Cut chicken into pieces, coat with cornstarch. Fry until golden. Make sauce: soy sauce, honey, vinegar, sesame oil, garlic. Thicken with cornstarch slurry. Toss chicken in sauce. Top with sesame seeds.

Sweet and sour pork.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 8 oz pineapple, 1 cup jasmine rice, 1/2 cup ketchup, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 4 large eggs, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Cube pork, coat in egg then flour. Deep fry until golden. Make sauce: simmer pineapple juice, vinegar, ketchup, sugar, soy sauce. Thicken with cornstarch. Stir-fry pineapple chunks. Add pork to sauce, toss to coat.

Crispy honey chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 (5-6 oz) bone-in chicken thighs, 1/4 cup flour, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 3 tablespoons honey, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Cut chicken, coat in flour and cornstarch. Fry until very crispy. Make sauce: honey, soy sauce, garlic. Toss hot chicken in sauce. Top with sesame seeds.

Mongolian beef.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ribeye steak, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped. Slice beef thin against grain. Coat with cornstarch. Fry in hot oil until crispy. Make sauce: soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, ginger. Pour over beef. Toss with green onions. Serve over rice.

Beef and broccoli (no broccoli).directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs sirloin steak, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon oyster sauce, 4 cups beef broth, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar. Slice beef thin against grain. Marinate in soy sauce, cornstarch, and sesame oil. Stir-fry in hot wok until browned. Remove. Add garlic and ginger. Add sauce of oyster sauce, soy sauce, broth, sugar. Thicken with cornstarch. Return beef, toss. Serve over rice.

Black pepper beef.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb beef sirloin, thinly sliced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 3 tablespoons oyster sauce, 4 cups beef broth, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Slice beef thin. Stir-fry in hot wok until browned. Add garlic and generous cracked black pepper. Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, broth. Thicken with cornstarch slurry. Serve over rice.

Cumin beef.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs sirloin steak, 2 teaspoons cumin, 1 teaspoon chili flakes, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Slice beef thin. Toast cumin seeds. Stir-fry beef over high heat. Add cumin, chili flakes, garlic. Season with soy sauce. Top with fresh cilantro.

ingredients: For sauce: 1/2 cup gochujang, 1/4 cup honey, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp rice vinegar, 2 tbsp sesame oil, 4 cloves garlic minced, 1 tbsp ginger minced
Korean fried chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs chicken wings and drumettes, 1/2 cup potato starch, 1/2 cup cornstarch, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper. 1. Pat chicken completely dry. Mix potato starch, cornstarch, salt, and pepper. Coat chicken thoroughly. 2. Heat oil to 325°F. Fry chicken in batches 10-12 min until cooked through. Drain and let rest 10 min. 3. Increase oil to 375°F. Fry chicken again 5-7 min until extra crispy and golden. Drain on rack. 4. Make sauce: Mix gochujang, honey, soy sauce, vinegar, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger in saucepan. Simmer 5 min. 5. Toss fried chicken in sauce until well coated. 6. Garnish with sesame seeds and green onions. Serve immediately.

Yangnyeom chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs chicken, 2 tablespoons gochujang, 1/3 cup ketchup, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 2 tablespoons honey, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 1 cup jasmine rice, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1/4 cup oil. Coat wings in rice flour and cornstarch. Double-fry until extra crispy. Make sauce with gochujang, ketchup, soy sauce, honey, garlic, ginger. Toss crispy wings in sauce.

Dakgangjeong.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 3 tablespoons gochugaru, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 3 tablespoons honey, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups white rice, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Cut chicken into pieces. Coat heavily in cornstarch. Double fry until extra crispy. Make sticky sauce with gochugaru, soy, honey, garlic, rice syrup. Toss chicken in sauce. Top with sesame seeds.

Bulgogi.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb beef sirloin, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 1 large pear, sliced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds. Slice beef very thin. Blend pear with soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, garlic, ginger, pepper to make marinade. Marinate beef 2-4 hours or overnight. Grill or pan-fry over high heat until caramelized but still tender. Garnish with sesame seeds.

Bulgogi rice bowl.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz beef sirloin, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 ripe pears, diced, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 3 tablespoons sesame seeds, 6 eggs, 1/4 cup gochujang. Make bulgogi marinade with pear. Marinate thin-sliced beef 2 hours. Grill until caramelized. Serve over rice with fried egg, sesame seeds, and gochujang on side.

Japchae (no veg).directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz wide noodles, 12 oz beef sirloin, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup sugar, 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, 6 g reen onions, chopped. Cook glass noodles, rinse in cold water. Slice and stir-fry beef with garlic. Toss noodles with soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar. Combine with beef. Garnish with sesame seeds and scallions.

Jjajangmyeon.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz wide noodles, 2 lbs pork belly, 3 tablespoons Korean black bean paste, 1 lb potato, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 large cucumber, sliced. Dice pork belly and potato. Fry pork until crispy. Add black bean paste, cook 2 minutes. Add potato and water, simmer until potato is tender. Add sugar, thicken with cornstarch. Cook noodles. Top with sauce, garnish with julienned cucumber.

Kimchi jjigae (skip kimchi or use it).directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs pork belly, 1.5 cups kimchi, 2 cups tofu, 2 tablespoons gochugaru (Korean chili flakes), 1/4 cup gochujang, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 4 cups chicken broth, 6 g reen onions, chopped. Sauté pork belly until rendered. Add kimchi and stir-fry. Add gochugaru, gochujang, garlic. Pour in broth, simmer 20 minutes. Add cubed tofu, cook 5 more minutes. Garnish with scallions.

Budae jjigae.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup Spam, 8 hot dogs, 2 cups kimchi, 8 oz medium noodles, 3 tablespoons gochugaru, 1/4 cup gochujang, 8 oz tofu, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 4 cups chicken broth. Arrange sliced Spam, hot dogs, kimchi, tofu in pot. Add broth, gochugaru, gochujang. Bring to boil. Add ramen noodles. Top with American cheese slice. Cover to melt. Serve family style.

Sundubu jjigae.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup silken tofu, 3 lbs pork butt, 1 tablespoon gochugaru, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 4 large eggs, 4 s callions, sliced, 3 tablespoons anchovy broth. Sauté pork with gochugaru, garlic, sesame oil. Add anchovy broth and soy sauce, bring to boil. Add silken tofu in spoonfuls. Crack egg on top before serving. Garnish with scallions.

Samgyeopsal.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs pork belly, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1.5 tablespoons sesame oil, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup gochujang, 4 cups lettuce leaves, 2 cups white rice. Slice pork belly 1/3 inch thick. Grill or pan-fry until crispy on both sides. Wrap in lettuce leaf with rice, sliced garlic, gochujang and a drizzle of sesame oil.

Galbi.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 1.5 tablespoons sesame oil, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 1 large pear, sliced, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Blend pear with soy sauce, brown sugar, sesame oil, garlic, ginger, rice wine, pepper. Marinate flanken-cut ribs 4+ hours or overnight. Grill over high heat 3-4 minutes per side until caramelized.

Kalbi jjim.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef brisket, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 2 cups white rice, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 1 large pear, sliced, 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced. Blanch ribs to remove impurities. Blend pear with soy sauce, sugar, wine, garlic, ginger, sesame oil. Braise ribs in sauce at 325°F for 2.5 hours. Add potatoes last 40 minutes. Reduce sauce and glaze.

Beef short rib braise.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef brisket, 1/2 cup dry wine, 3 cups beef broth, 1/4 cup tomato paste, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 teaspoon thyme, 1 bay leaf, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Season and brown short ribs. Add wine, reduce by half. Add broth, tomato paste, garlic, herbs. Braise covered at 300°F 3-4 hours until meat falls off bone.

Braised pork shoulder.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 4 cups chicken broth, 3/4 cup white wine, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme, 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary, chopped, 1 bay leaf, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Season pork. Brown all sides. Add wine, reduce. Add broth, garlic, herbs. Braise covered at 300°F 4-5 hours until fork tender. Shred or slice. Reduce braising liquid for sauce.

ingredients: pork shoulder (Boston butt), cut into 2-inch chunks
Corn tortillas, diced onion, cilantro, lime wedges, salsa for serving
Carnitas.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs pork shoulder (Boston butt), cut into 2-inch chunks, 1 large onion, quartered, 6 cloves garlic, smashed, 2 bay leaves, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 tbsp oregano, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 orange, juiced (about 1/2 cup), 2 cups water or chicken broth. 1. Season pork generously with salt, pepper, cumin, oregano, and cinnamon. 2. Place pork in large Dutch oven or heavy pot. Add onion, garlic, bay leaves, orange juice, and water/broth. Liquid should come halfway up pork. 3. Bring to boil over high heat. Cover, reduce to low simmer. Cook 2.5-3 hours until pork is very tender and liquid mostly evaporated. 4. Remove lid, increase heat to medium-high. Cook 15-20 min, turning pork occasionally, until liquid evaporates and pork browns and crisps on edges. 5. Remove bay leaves. Shred pork with forks, leaving some chunks. 6. Serve in warm corn tortillas with onion, cilantro, lime, and salsa. Or crisp further under broiler 3-5 min for extra crispy carnitas.

ingredients: fresh pineapple (1 cup diced, rest sliced)
Diced onion, cilantro, lime wedges, salsa verde for serving
Al pastor.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs pork shoulder, sliced 1/4-inch thin, 5 dried guajillo chiles, 2 dried ancho chiles, 1/2 fresh pineapple (1 cup diced, rest sliced), 1/2 white onion, roughly chopped, 4 cloves garlic, 1/4 cup white vinegar, 2 tbsp achiote paste, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp oregano, 24 corn tortillas. 1. Toast chiles in dry pan 2 min until fragrant. Remove stems/seeds, soak in hot water 20 min. 2. Blend soaked chiles, 1 cup diced pineapple, onion, garlic, vinegar, achiote paste, cumin, oregano, and 1/4 cup soaking liquid until smooth. 3. Marinate pork in chile mixture minimum 2 hours, preferably overnight in refrigerator. 4. Preheat grill or cast-iron skillet to high heat. Grill pork slices 3-4 min per side until charred and cooked through (145°F). Grill pineapple slices 2 min per side. 5. Chop pork and grilled pineapple into small pieces. 6. Warm tortillas on dry griddle 30 sec per side. Serve pork and pineapple in doubled tortillas with onion, cilantro, lime, and salsa verde.

ingredients: Corn tortillas, grilled onions, lime wedges, salsa for serving
Carne asada.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs flank steak or skirt steak, 1/3 cup olive oil, 1/3 cup fresh lime juice (3-4 limes), 1/3 cup orange juice, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 jalapeño, minced, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp chili powder. 1. Whisk together oil, lime juice, orange juice, garlic, jalapeño, cilantro, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper in bowl. 2. Place steak in large zip-top bag or shallow dish. Pour marinade over, ensuring steak is well coated. Marinate 2-8 hours in refrigerator, turning occasionally. 3. Remove steak from marinade 30 min before grilling, let come to room temperature. Pat dry. 4. Preheat grill to high heat (450-500°F). Oil grates well. 5. Grill steak 4-6 min per side for medium-rare (130-135°F internal temp), or to desired doneness. Avoid moving steak to get good char. 6. Transfer to cutting board, tent with foil, rest 10 min. Slice thinly against the grain. Serve with warm tortillas, grilled onions, lime wedges, and salsa.

ingredients: Corn tortillas, diced onion, cilantro, lime wedges for serving
Barbacoa.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs beef chuck roast, 4 dried chipotle chiles, 6 cloves garlic, 1/4 cup apple cider vinegar, 1/4 cup lime juice, 3 tbsp cumin, 1 tbsp oregano, 1 tsp ground cloves, 3 bay leaves, 1 cup beef broth. 1. Toast chipotle chiles in dry pan 1-2 min. Remove stems, soak in hot water 15 min. Blend with garlic, vinegar, lime juice, cumin, oregano, cloves, and 1/4 cup soaking liquid until smooth. 2. Cut roast into 3-4 large pieces. Season generously with salt and pepper. Sear in Dutch oven over high heat 3-4 min per side. 3. Add chile puree, bay leaves, and beef broth. Cover tightly with lid. 4. Braise at 300°F for 3-4 hours until beef shreds easily. Or slow cook on low 8 hours. Or pressure cook 90 min. 5. Remove beef, shred with forks. Skim fat from cooking liquid. Return beef to liquid, toss to coat. 6. Serve in warm corn tortillas with onion, cilantro, and lime. Use cooking liquid as a dipping sauce.

ingredients: beef short ribs or chuck roast
Corn tortillas, onion, cilantro, lime for serving
Beef birria.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs beef short ribs or chuck roast, 6 dried guajillo chiles, 3 dried ancho chiles, 2 dried chipotle chiles, 1 large onion, quartered, 6 cloves garlic, 3 Roma tomatoes, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 tbsp oregano, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 tsp ground cloves, 4 cups beef broth, 3 bay leaves. 1. Toast all chiles in dry skillet 2 min. Remove stems/seeds, soak in hot water 20 min. 2. Char tomatoes and onion in dry skillet 8-10 min, turning occasionally. 3. Blend soaked chiles, tomatoes, half the onion, garlic, cumin, oregano, cinnamon, cloves, and 1 cup soaking liquid until smooth. 4. Season beef with salt and pepper. Sear in Dutch oven 3-4 min per side. Add remaining onion quarters, chile sauce, broth, and bay leaves. 5. Bring to boil, cover, reduce heat. Simmer 3-4 hours until beef is fall-apart tender. Or pressure cook 75 min. 6. Remove beef, shred or cut into chunks. Strain consommé, skim fat. Return beef to consommé. Serve in bowls with tortillas, or make tacos and serve consommé for dipping.

Birria quesadilla.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs birria meat, 1 lb birria consommé, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1/4 cup flour, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, 1 large onion, diced, 2 limes, juiced. Dip tortilla in consommé. Place on hot griddle. Add shredded cheese and birria. Fold. Cook until crispy and cheese melts. Serve with consommé, chopped cilantro and onion.

Beef tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 8 oz taco shells, 2 tablespoons taco seasoning, 8 oz shredded cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 2 cups salsa. Brown ground beef, drain fat. Add taco seasoning and water per package directions. Simmer 5 minutes until thickened. Warm taco shells. Fill with seasoned beef, top with shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa.

Chicken tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 1/2 cup taco shells, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 3 limes, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1.5 cups salsa. Season chicken with cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, salt. Grill or pan-fry 6-7 minutes per side. Rest 5 minutes, slice thin. Toss with lime juice. Fill taco shells with chicken, top with cheese, sour cream, salsa.

Pork tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 2 tablespoons taco seasoning, 10 s mall corn tortillas, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, 3 limes, 1.5 cups salsa. Season pork, slow cook in seasoning with a little water 8 hours until tender. Shred. Warm tortillas. Fill with pork, top with cilantro, lime juice, and salsa.

Taco salad (no lettuce).directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 3 tablespoons taco seasoning, 4 cups tortilla chips, 8 oz shredded cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 2 cups salsa, 1 (15 oz) can black beans, drained, 3 avocados. Brown beef, add taco seasoning. Layer crushed tortilla chips with beef, cheese, beans, avocado. Top with sour cream and salsa.

Tostadas.directions: Ingredients needed: 10 s mall corn tortillas, 1 (15 oz) can refried beans, 4 lbs chicken, 3/4 cup queso fresco, 1/4 cup crema, 1.5 cups salsa, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Fry tortillas until flat and crispy. Spread with refried beans. Top with chicken, crumbled queso fresco, drizzle of crema, and salsa.

Gorditas.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups masa harina, 3 cups water, 3 tablespoons lard, 2.5 lbs beef, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 cup salsa. Mix masa with warm water, salt, and lard. Form thick patties. Griddle until cooked through but still soft. Slice open to create pocket. Fill with seasoned meat, cheese, sour cream, salsa.

Sopes.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 cups masa harina, 1 cup water, 2 tablespoons lard, 2 cups refried beans, 1 lb carne asada, sliced, 1/4 cup crema, 1 cup crumbled queso fresco, 1 cup salsa. Mix masa with water, salt, lard. Form thick rounds. Cook on griddle. Pinch edges to form rim while still warm. Add layer of beans, meat, crema, cheese, and salsa.

Huaraches.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 cups masa harina, 1 (16 oz) can refried beans, 1.5 lbs carne asada, 6 oz queso fresco, 2 cups salsa, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped. Make masa dough, form into oval sandal shapes. Press indent in center, add layer of refried beans. Cook on griddle until charred. Top with sliced carne asada, queso, salsa, cream, onion, cilantro.

Tlayudas.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup flour, 1 (16 oz) can refried beans, 8 oz shredded cheese, 8 oz Spanish chorizo, sliced, 3 avocados, 1 cup salsa, 2 limes, juiced. Spread large tortilla with refried beans. Top with shredded Oaxaca cheese. Toast on griddle until crispy and cheese melts. Add cooked chorizo, sliced avocado, salsa. Fold in half.

Chilaquiles (simplified).directions: Ingredients needed: 8 corn tortillas, cut into triangles, 3 tbsp vegetable oil, 2 cups red or green salsa, 4 eggs, 1/2 cup crumbled queso fresco or feta, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup black beans, warmed, 1/4 cup diced onion, 1 avocado, sliced. 1. Heat 2 tbsp oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry tortilla triangles in batches 2-3 min per side until crispy. Drain on paper towels. 2. In same skillet, heat salsa until simmering. Add fried tortillas, toss to coat, cook 2-3 min until slightly softened but still with some crunch. 3. In separate skillet, fry eggs in remaining oil to desired doneness, 3-4 min. 4. Divide tortillas between plates, top each with fried egg, beans, cheese, sour cream, onion, cilantro, avocado.

Migas.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 large eggs, 4 cups tortilla chips, 8 oz shredded cheese, 3 tablespoons butter, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1.5 cups salsa. Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Crush tortilla chips slightly. Scramble eggs in butter, adding crushed chips while eggs are still wet. Fold in cheese. Serve with salsa.

Machaca.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 (8 oz) sirloin steaks, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Season beef with salt, garlic, cumin, pepper. Slow roast at 275°F 6 hours until very tender and slightly dried. Shred finely while still warm. Can be crisped in oil when ready to serve.

ingredients: Shredded cheese, salsa, cilantro for serving
Chorizo and eggs.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb Mexican chorizo, casing removed, 8 large eggs, 1/4 cup milk, 1 s mall onion, diced, 1 jalapeño, diced (optional), 2 tbsp butter. 1. Cook chorizo in large skillet over medium heat 8-10 min, breaking into crumbles. Once cooked through and crispy, remove to plate lined with paper towel. Drain most of fat from pan, leaving 1 tbsp. 2. Add onion to pan, cook 3-4 min until softened. Add jalapeño if using, cook 1 min. 3. Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper. Add butter to pan, let melt. Pour in eggs. 4. Cook over medium-low heat, gently stirring and folding 3-4 min until eggs form soft curds. Add chorizo back, stir to combine. Cook until eggs reach desired doneness. 5. Serve with warm tortillas, shredded cheese, salsa, and cilantro. Great for breakfast tacos or burritos.

Chorizo and potatoes.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz Mexican chorizo, 4 medium russet potatoes, cubed, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Dice potatoes, fry in oil until golden and crispy. Remove chorizo from casing, add to pan, cook until browned. Add potatoes back, toss together. Season with garlic powder. Serve with warm tortillas.

Papas con huevo.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 3 large eggs, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/4 cup flour, 1 cup salsa. Dice potatoes small. Fry in oil until golden and crispy. Season with salt and pepper. Beat eggs, pour over potatoes. Scramble together until eggs are set. Serve with warm tortillas and salsa.

ingredients: green chile sauce or enchilada sauce
Smothered breakfast burrito.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 large flour tortillas, 8 eggs, scrambled, 1 cup cooked breakfast sausage, 1 cup hash browns, cooked, 1 cup shredded cheese, 2 cups green chile sauce or enchilada sauce, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup diced green onions, 2 tbsp butter. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 2. Scramble eggs with butter in skillet, season with salt and pepper, cook until just set. 3. Assemble burritos: divide eggs, sausage, hash browns, half the cheese among tortillas. Roll up tightly. 4. Place burritos seam-side down in greased 9x13 inch baking dish. 5. Pour green chile sauce over burritos, sprinkle with remaining cheese. 6. Bake 20-25 min until cheese melted and sauce bubbling. Top with sour cream and green onions.

Chimichanga.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup flour, 3 lbs beef brisket, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 cup salsa. Cook seasoned beef with cumin, chili powder, garlic. Place filling and cheese on large tortilla. Fold ends in, roll tight like burrito. Fry seam-side down in oil at 375°F until golden, flip, fry other side. Drain. Serve with sour cream and salsa.

Wet burrito.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup flour, 2 lbs ground beef, 3 tablespoons taco seasoning, 1 (15 oz) can refried beans, 1 (15 oz) can enchilada sauce, 8 oz shredded cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 2 cups white rice. Brown beef with taco seasoning. Fill tortilla with beans, beef, rice, cheese. Roll burrito style. Place in baking dish. Cover with enchilada sauce and more cheese. Bake at 375°F 20 minutes. Serve with sour cream.

Burrito bowl.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups white rice, 1 (15 oz) can black beans, drained, 3 lbs whole chicken, cut into pieces, 3 cups fresh corn, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1.5 cups salsa, 1 lime, juiced and zested, 1 teaspoon ground cumin. Season and grill chicken, slice. Cook rice with lime juice. Season beans with cumin. Layer in bowl: rice, beans, chicken, corn, cheese, sour cream, salsa.

Cuban sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 Cuban bread or sub rolls, 1 lb roast pork sliced thin, 8 oz ham sliced thin, 8 slices Swiss cheese, 4 tbsp butter softened. 1. Slice bread horizontally. Spread yellow mustard on both cut sides. 2. Layer bottom half with Swiss cheese, roast pork, ham, more Swiss cheese, and pickles. Top with remaining bread. 3. Butter outside of sandwich on both sides. 4. Heat large skillet or panini press over medium heat. 5. Place sandwich in skillet, press down firmly with heavy pan or bacon press. Cook 3-4 min until bottom is golden and crispy. 6. Flip, press down again, cook 3-4 min more until cheese is melted and bread is crispy. 7. Cut in half diagonally and serve hot.

Medianoche.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 slices thick-cut bread, 1.5 lbs pork loin, 8 oz ham steak, diced, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 3 pears, 1 tablespoon mustard, 4 tablespoons butter. Spread mustard on sweet bread. Layer ham, roasted pork, Swiss cheese, pickles. Butter outside of bread. Press in panini press or with heavy skillet until bread is golden and cheese melts. Cut diagonally.

Mojo pork.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 3/4 cup orange juice, 2 limes, juiced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons cumin, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 3 tablespoons olive oil. Blend orange juice, lime juice, garlic, cumin, oregano, oil, salt for mojo. Pour over pork, marinate overnight. Slow roast covered at 300°F for 4-5 hours until fork tender. Shred and crisp edges under broiler.

Lechon.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs pork belly, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 large lemon, 3 bay leaves, 1/3 cup soy sauce. Score pork skin. Rub inside with garlic, pepper, soy sauce. Stuff with lemongrass and bay leaves. Roll and tie. Salt skin heavily. Roast at 275°F 3 hours, then 450°F 30 minutes for crispy skin.

Pernil.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 2 teaspoons cumin, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 3 limes, 1/2 cup fresh orange juice. Make mojo: blend garlic, oregano, cumin, oil, lime juice, orange juice, salt, pepper. Make deep slits in pork, stuff with mojo. Marinate overnight. Roast covered at 300°F 4-5 hours. Uncover, increase to 400°F to crisp skin.

Arroz con pollo.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 (5-6 oz) bone-in chicken thighs, 2 cups white rice, 2 cups chicken broth, 3 tablespoons sofrito, 1 lb sazón, 1 (8 oz) can tomato sauce, 1 cup sliced black olives, 1 (12 oz) bottle beer. Brown chicken. Add sofrito, sazón, tomato sauce. Add rice, broth, beer, olives. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, cover, simmer 30 minutes until rice is tender and chicken cooked.

Arroz con gandules.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups white rice, 2 cups fresh peas, 3 tablespoons sofrito, 4 cups chicken broth, 1 (8 oz) can tomato sauce, 1/2 lb bacon, 1 cup sazón, 1 cup sliced black olives. Cook bacon. Add sofrito, cook 2 minutes. Add tomato sauce, sazón, olives. Add rice, peas, broth. Bring to boil. Cover, simmer 25 minutes until rice is tender.

Moros y cristianos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups cooked black beans, 1 cup jasmine rice, 1/2 lb bacon, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 1 bay leaf, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup olive oil. Cook black beans with bay leaf until tender. Fry bacon, remove. Sauté garlic, add cumin and oregano. Add rice and bean liquid. Cover, cook 20 minutes. Fold in beans and crumbled bacon.

Gallo pinto.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup jasmine rice, 2 cups cooked black beans, 1/2 cup Lizano sauce, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Fry leftover rice in oil. Add black beans with some liquid. Add Lizano sauce (or Worcestershire). Cook until liquid absorbed. Top with fresh cilantro. Costa Rican breakfast staple.

Pupusas.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 cups masa harina, 1 (15 oz) can refried beans, 3/4 cup queso fresco, 2 cups crushed chicharrones, 3 cups water, 2 cups curtido. Mix masa with warm water and salt. Form balls, flatten, add filling of beans, cheese, or pork. Seal and flatten into thick tortilla. Griddle on both sides until lightly charred. Serve with curtido (cabbage slaw).

Arepas.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup flour, 1 cup water, 4 tablespoons butter, 8 oz shredded cheese. Mix corn flour with warm water and salt to form dough. Shape into 1/2-inch thick patties. Griddle until golden and hollow-sounding when tapped. Split and fill with butter and cheese.

Reina pepiada.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 (6-8 oz) boneless chicken breasts, 2 ripe avocados, diced, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1 lime, juiced and zested, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, 1/2 cup arepa dough. Poach chicken, shred finely. Mash avocado with mayo, lime, cilantro, salt. Fold in chicken. Make arepas from dough, cook on griddle. Split and stuff with chicken-avocado mixture.

Cachapa.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 cups fresh corn, 3 large eggs, 1/4 cup sugar, 3 tablespoons butter, 1/2 cup queso de mano. Blend corn with eggs, sugar, salt to form thick batter. Cook like pancakes in butter until golden. Fill with sliced queso de mano. Fold in half.

Bandeja paisa.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 1 cup jasmine rice, 2 cups cooked beans, 1 lb chorizo, casings removed, 1 cup chicharrones, 3 large eggs, 2 cups arepa, 1 cup plantains, 2 ripe avocados, diced. Cook rice and beans separately. Fry chorizo, chicharrones, plantains. Fry eggs sunny-side up. Make arepa. Arrange all components on large platter with avocado slices.

Lomo saltado (no veg).directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz beef sirloin, 1 (32 oz) bag frozen fries, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 cups white rice, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups white rice, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 3 tablespoons aji amarillo paste. Cut beef into strips. Heat wok very hot. Sear beef quickly until browned but still pink inside. Add soy sauce, vinegar, aji paste, cumin. Toss with French fries. Serve immediately with rice.

Aji de gallina.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 (6-8 oz) boneless chicken breasts, 1 tablespoon aji amarillo paste, 6 slices thick-cut bread, 1 cup milk, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 6 eggs. Poach chicken, shred. Soak bread in milk. Blend with aji amarillo, walnuts. Simmer sauce, add chicken. Stir in parmesan. Serve over rice with hard-boiled eggs.

Arroz con pato.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup 6 duck leg quarters, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro, 1 (12 oz) bottle beer, 2 cups chicken broth, 2 tablespoons aji amarillo paste, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 4 cloves garlic, minced. Brown duck legs. Blend cilantro with beer. Cook rice with cilantro-beer, broth, aji amarillo, cumin, garlic. Add duck. Bake until rice is tender and duck cooked through.

Anticuchos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2.5 lbs beef, 3 tablespoons aji panca paste, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tablespoons vinegar, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Cube beef heart. Marinate in aji panca, cumin, oregano, garlic, vinegar, oil overnight. Thread onto skewers. Grill over high heat 2-3 minutes per side. Brush with marinade while grilling.

Empanadas argentinas.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup flour, 3 tablespoons lard, 2.5 lbs beef, 3 large eggs, 1 (6 oz) can sliced olives, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 2 cups egg wash. Make dough with flour and lard. Fill with seasoned ground beef, chopped eggs, olives. Fold and crimp edges. Brush with egg wash. Bake at 400°F 20-25 minutes until golden.

Choripan.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz Spanish chorizo, sliced, 6 slices thick-cut bread, 3/4 cup chimichurri, 1 cup salsa. Grill chorizo until cooked through and slightly charred. Butterfly and open flat. Toast bread. Place chorizo in bread. Top with chimichurri and salsa criolla.

Asado.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 1 lb chorizo, casings removed, 12 oz morcilla, 1/2 cup chimichurri, 1.5 teaspoons coarse salt. Season meats with coarse salt. Grill over low indirect heat. Short ribs 2-3 hours, flank 15-20 minutes per side, sausages until cooked through. Serve with chimichurri.

Chimichurri steak.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ribeye steak, 2 tablespoons dried parsley, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 3/4 cup white wine, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Make chimichurri: finely chop parsley, oregano, garlic. Mix with vinegar, oil, red pepper flakes, salt. Let sit 20 minutes. Season steak with salt and pepper. Grill to desired doneness. Rest 5 minutes. Slice, serve with chimichurri.

Milanesa.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ribeye steak, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 6 eggs, 1 cup breadcrumbs, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 large lemon. Pound steak very thin. Season with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, beaten egg, breadcrumbs. Fry in oil over medium heat 3-4 minutes per side until golden. Serve with lemon wedges.

Milanesa napolitana.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 (8 oz) sirloin steaks, 1/4 cup flour, 4 large eggs, 1 cup breadcrumbs, 2 cups diced ham (12 oz), 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 2 cups marinara sauce, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Make milanesa: pound, bread, fry until golden. Place in baking dish. Top with marinara, ham, mozzarella. Bake at 400°F 10 minutes until cheese is bubbly. Serve with fries.

Chivito.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ribeye steak, 2 cups diced ham (12 oz), 1/2 lb bacon, 8 oz shredded cheese, 4 large eggs, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 4 slices bread, 3/4 cup green olives. The Uruguayan super sandwich. Layer grilled steak, ham, bacon, cheese, fried egg, mayo on crusty bread. Garnish with olives. Massive and delicious.

Feijoada.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups cooked black beans, 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 6 slices bacon, 8 oz Spanish chorizo, sliced, 1.5 lbs pork loin, 3 bay leaves, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 2 cups white rice. Soak beans overnight. Cook with pork shoulder, ribs, bacon, bay leaf for 2 hours. Add sliced chorizo, garlic, cook 30 minutes more. Mash some beans to thicken. Season. Serve over rice with orange slices.

Picanha.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup picanha, 1.5 teaspoons coarse salt, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Keep fat cap on. Score fat in crosshatch pattern. Season generously with salt and pepper. Grill fat-side down first over high heat. Flip and cook to medium-rare (130°F). Rest 10 minutes. Slice against grain.

Coxinha.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs chicken, 4 oz cream cheese, 1/4 cup flour, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 3 cups chicken broth, 3 large eggs, 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Shred cooked chicken, mix with cream cheese. Make dough with flour, butter, broth. Shape dough around filling into teardrop shape. Bread and fry until golden. Brazilian street food.

P\u00e3o de queijo.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup flour, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 3 large eggs, 2 cups whole milk, 3 tablespoons oil. Heat milk and oil until boiling. Pour over tapioca flour and salt, mix until smooth. Add eggs and grated parmesan, mix well. Form into small balls. Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until puffed and golden.

Francesinha.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup steak, 1 lb sliced ham, 2 cups sausage, 8 slices bread, 1 1/2 cups block cheese, shredded, 2 eggs egg, 1 cup beer, 2 cups tomato. 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. Prepare ingredients as listed. 2. In large skillet over medium-high heat, cook main protein 15-20 min until golden brown and cooked through. Season with salt and pepper. 3. In separate pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add aromatics, cook 2-3 min until fragrant. 4. Combine all ingredients in baking dish. Top with cheese. 5. Bake 15-20 min until bubbly and golden. Let rest 5 min before serving.

Bacalhau.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz salt cod, 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 3 large eggs, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 cup sliced black olives, 5 cloves garlic, minced. Soak and desalt cod. Boil potatoes and eggs. Shred cod, mix with sliced potatoes, quartered eggs, olives. Drizzle generously with olive oil and minced garlic.

Caldo verde (no kale).directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 12 oz Mexican chorizo, 2 cups chicken broth, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Simmer cubed potatoes in broth until very soft. Mash some for thickness. Slice chorizo, brown in olive oil. Add to soup with garlic. Simmer 10 minutes. Drizzle with olive oil.

Spanish tortilla.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 1 large onion, diced, 4 large eggs, 1 1/2 cups olive oil, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Heat olive oil in 10-inch non-stick skillet over medium heat to 250°F. Add potato slices and onion, season with 1 tsp salt. Cook gently, stirring occasionally, 20-25 min until potatoes are tender but not browned. Oil should bubble gently. 2. Drain potatoes and onions in colander over bowl, reserving oil. Let cool 5 min. 3. Beat eggs in large bowl with 1/2 tsp salt and pepper. Gently fold in potato-onion mixture, pressing down to submerge in egg. Let stand 10 min. 4. Heat 3 tbsp reserved oil in same skillet over medium-high heat. Pour in egg mixture, spread evenly. Reduce heat to medium-low. Cook 5-6 min, shaking pan occasionally, until edges are set but center is still runny. 5. Place large plate over skillet. Quickly invert tortilla onto plate. Slide back into pan, uncooked side down. Tuck edges under with spatula. Cook 3-4 min until set but still slightly creamy in center. 6. Slide onto serving plate. Let rest 10 min before cutting into wedges. Serve warm or room temperature.

ingredients: russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes
Patatas bravas (no sauce).directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes, 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 tsp smoked paprika, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped. 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. Line baking sheet with parchment. 2. Boil potato cubes in salted water 5 min to soften slightly. Drain well, spread on towel to steam dry completely, 5 min. 3. Toss dried potatoes with olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, cayenne, and 1 tsp salt in large bowl. 4. Spread in single layer on baking sheet. Roast 35-40 min, flipping halfway, until golden and crispy. 5. Transfer to serving dish, sprinkle with more salt and parsley. Serve hot.

ingredients: 1/2 lbs large shrimp, peeled and deveined
dried red chili peppers, crumbled (or 1 tsp red pepper flakes)
Gambas al ajillo.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 1/2 lbs large shrimp, peeled and deveined, 8 cloves garlic, thinly sliced, 2 dried red chili peppers, crumbled (or 1 tsp red pepper flakes), 1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil, 2 tbsp dry sherry, 1 tbsp fresh lemon juice, 2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped, 1 loaf Italian bread. 1. Pat shrimp completely dry. Season with salt. 2. Heat olive oil in large skillet or cazuela over medium heat. Add garlic slices and chili. Cook gently 2-3 min until garlic is fragrant and just starting to turn golden. Don't let it brown. 3. Increase heat to medium-high. Add shrimp in single layer. Cook 2 min without moving. 4. Flip shrimp, add sherry. Cook 1-2 min more until shrimp are pink and just cooked through. 5. Remove from heat. Stir in lemon juice and parsley. 6. Serve immediately in cooking vessel with crusty bread for dipping in the garlic oil. Goes perfectly with cold beer.

Paella (simplified).directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb chicken thighs, cut into chunks, 1/2 lb Spanish chorizo, sliced, 1/2 lb shrimp, peeled and deveined, 1/2 lb mussels, cleaned, 2 cups Spanish bomba or arborio rice, 2 medium onions, diced, 2 bell peppers, sliced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes, 4 cups chicken broth, 1/2 tsp saffron threads, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 1 cup frozen peas, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1 lemon, juiced, 1/3 cup fresh parsley. 1. Steep saffron in 1/4 cup warm broth. Heat remaining broth. 2. Heat olive oil in paella pan or large skillet over medium-high heat. Brown chicken 5 min per side, season with salt and pepper. Remove. 3. Cook chorizo 3 min until fat renders. Remove. 4. Reduce heat to medium. Sauté onion and bell pepper 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. Add paprika, cook 30 sec. 5. Stir in tomatoes, cook 3 min. Add rice, stir to coat, cook 2 min. 6. Add hot broth and saffron mixture. Arrange chicken and chorizo on top. Don't stir. Bring to boil. 7. Reduce heat to medium-low, simmer uncovered 20 min without stirring. 8. Nestle shrimp and mussels into rice. Scatter peas over top. Cook 8-10 min until shrimp are pink, mussels open, and liquid is absorbed. 9. Remove from heat, cover with foil, rest 5 min. Discard any unopened mussels. Serve with lemon wedges and parsley.

Chorizo espa\u00f1ol.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz Spanish chorizo, sliced, 1/4 cup olive oil, 4 slices bread. Slice chorizo into coins. Pan-fry in olive oil until fat renders and edges crisp. Serve warm with crusty bread to soak up the paprika-infused oil.

Bocadillo.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups crusty roll, 1 lb jamón serrano, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1/4 cup olive oil, 4 large tomatoes, diced. Halve roll. Drizzle with olive oil. Rub with cut tomato. Layer jamón and sliced Manchego. Simple and perfect.

ingredients: Spanish jamón serrano or prosciutto, thinly sliced
Jam\u00f3n and eggs.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz Spanish jamón serrano or prosciutto, thinly sliced, 8 eggs, 2 tbsp olive oil, 4 cups baby arugula or spinach, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 2 cloves garlic, sliced. 1. Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 1 min until fragrant. 2. Add cherry tomatoes, cook 2-3 min until softened. Add arugula, wilt 1 min. Season with salt and pepper. Remove to plate. 3. In same skillet, heat remaining oil over medium heat. Crack eggs, fry 3-4 min for sunny-side up or flip for over-easy. 4. Plate eggs with sautéed vegetables. Drape jamón slices over eggs. 5. Serve with crusty bread, optional balsamic glaze.

Fabada.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups cooked white beans, 8 oz Spanish chorizo, sliced, 1 lb morcilla, 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 1/2 lb bacon, 1/2 teaspoon saffron, 1 bay leaf. Soak beans overnight. Simmer with pork, bacon, bay leaf 2 hours. Add chorizo, morcilla, saffron. Cook 30 more minutes until beans are creamy. Let rest before serving.

Cocido.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup frozen peas, 3 lbs beef brisket, 2 lbs pork belly, 12 oz Mexican chorizo, 8 oz morcilla (blood sausage), 2 cups diced ham (12 oz), 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 6 cups shredded cabbage, 1 lb egg noodles. Simmer chickpeas with meats 2-3 hours. Add potatoes and cabbage last 30 minutes. Serve in three courses: broth with noodles first, then chickpeas and vegetables, then meats.

Albondigas.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 4 cups chicken broth, 1 (8 oz) can tomato sauce, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 4 large eggs. Mix beef with cooked rice, egg, cumin, oregano, salt. Form meatballs. Simmer broth with tomato sauce and garlic. Drop meatballs in, cook 25 minutes until cooked through.

Italian meatballs.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 1.5 lbs ground pork, 1 cup breadcrumbs, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 6 eggs, 1.5 cups milk, 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups marinara sauce. Soak breadcrumbs in milk. Mix all ingredients except marinara gently. Form 1.5-inch balls. Bake at 400°F 20 minutes. Simmer in marinara 15 minutes. Serve over pasta or as subs.

Braciole.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 (8 oz) sirloin steaks, 4 oz prosciutto, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1 cup breadcrumbs, 1/3 cup fresh parsley, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 (24 oz) jar marinara sauce, 2 tablespoons olive oil. Pound steak thin. Layer prosciutto, provolone, breadcrumb mixture. Roll tightly, tie with string. Brown in oil. Simmer in marinara 2 hours until tender. Slice, serve with sauce over pasta.

Osso buco.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 veal shanks, 1.5 inches thick, 1 cup flour, 1.5 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 4 tbsp olive oil, 4 tbsp butter, 2 medium onions, diced, 2 cups sliced carrots, 1 cup diced celery, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup dry white wine, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 2 cups beef broth, 3 bay leaves, 2 tsp dried thyme, 2 lemons, juiced and zested, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 5 cloves garlic, minced. 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. Season veal shanks with salt and pepper, tie with kitchen twine to hold shape. Dredge in flour. 2. Heat oil in large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Brown shanks 4 min per side until golden. Transfer to plate. 3. Add butter to pot. Add onion, carrots, celery. Cook 8 min until softened. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 4. Add wine, scrape up browned bits. Simmer 3 min until reduced by half. Add tomatoes, broth, bay leaves, thyme. Bring to boil. 5. Return shanks to pot, nestling into sauce. Cover, transfer to oven. Braise 2.5-3 hours until meat is fall-off-bone tender. 6. Remove shanks, tent with foil. Simmer sauce on stovetop 10 min to thicken. Remove bay leaves. Make gremolata: mix lemon zest, parsley, minced garlic. Serve shanks with sauce, top with gremolata. Serve over risotto or polenta.

Chicken cacciatore.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs chicken thighs and drumsticks, 1/2 cup flour, 1 lb Salt and pepper to taste, 4 tbsp olive oil, 2 medium onions, diced, 2 bell peppers, sliced, 1 g reen bell pepper, sliced, 8 oz mushrooms, sliced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup dry white wine, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 1/2 cup chicken broth, 2 tsp dried oregano, 2 tsp dried basil, 1 bay leaf, 1/3 cup fresh parsley. 1. Season chicken with salt and pepper, dredge in flour. Heat oil in large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Brown chicken 4-5 min per side until golden. Remove to plate. 2. In same pot, add onion and peppers. Cook 6 min until softened. Add mushrooms, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 3. Add wine, scrape up browned bits. Simmer 3 min until reduced by half. Add crushed tomatoes, broth, oregano, basil, bay leaf. Bring to boil. 4. Return chicken to pot, nestling into sauce. Reduce heat to low, cover. Simmer 35-40 min until chicken is tender and cooked through (internal temp 175°F for thighs). 5. Remove bay leaf. Taste sauce, adjust seasoning with salt and pepper. 6. Garnish with parsley. Serve over pasta, polenta, or with crusty bread.

Chicken piccata.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken breasts, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 4 tbsp olive oil, 6 tbsp butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup chicken broth, 1/2 cup dry white wine, 1/3 cup fresh lemon juice, 1/4 cup capers, drained, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 1 large lemon. 1. Pound chicken breasts to 1/2 inch thickness. Season both sides with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, shake off excess. 2. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken 4-5 min per side until golden and internal temp reaches 165°F. Transfer to plate. 3. In same skillet, melt 2 tbsp butter over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 30 seconds until fragrant. 4. Add wine, scrape up browned bits. Simmer 2 min until reduced by half. Add chicken broth and lemon juice, bring to boil. 5. Reduce heat, simmer 5 min until sauce reduces by one-third. Add capers and remaining 4 tbsp butter, swirl pan until butter melts into sauce. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Return chicken to pan, spoon sauce over. Simmer 2 min to heat through. Garnish with parsley and lemon slices. Serve over pasta or with crusty bread.

Saltimbocca.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 large chicken breasts (2 lbs), 1 tablespoon dried sage, 8 slices prosciutto, 1/2 cup flour, 3 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 4 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 cup dry white wine, 1/2 cup chicken broth, 2 tbsp fresh lemon juice, 2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped. 1. Place cutlets between plastic wrap, pound to 1/4 inch thickness. Season with salt and pepper. Top each cutlet with 2 sage leaves and 2 prosciutto slices. Secure with toothpicks. Dredge lightly in flour. 2. Heat butter and oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook cutlets prosciutto-side down first, 3 min until crispy. Flip, cook 2-3 min more until golden and cooked through. Transfer to plate, remove toothpicks. 3. Add wine to skillet, scrape up browned bits. Simmer 3 min until reduced by half. Add chicken broth and lemon juice, simmer 3 min more until sauce thickens slightly. 4. Season sauce with salt and pepper. Return cutlets to pan, spoon sauce over. Simmer 1-2 min to heat through. 5. Garnish with parsley. Serve immediately over pasta or with roasted potatoes.

Veal milanese.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs veal stew meat, 1 cup flour, 4 large eggs, 2 cups Italian breadcrumbs, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 tsp dried oregano, 1.5 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 1/2 cup olive oil, 4 cups arugula, 2 cups cherry tomatoes, halved, 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 1 large lemon. 1. Pound veal cutlets to 1/4 inch thickness between plastic wrap. Season with salt and pepper. Set up breading: flour in dish one, beaten eggs in dish two, breadcrumbs mixed with Parmesan and oregano in dish three. 2. Dredge each cutlet in flour, dip in egg letting excess drip, press into breadcrumb mixture coating both sides well. 3. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry cutlets 2-3 min per side until golden brown and crispy. Don't overcook. Transfer to paper towels to drain. 4. In bowl, toss arugula and tomatoes with extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper. 5. Place each cutlet on plate, top with arugula salad. Serve immediately with lemon wedges.

Cotoletta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb veal cutlets, 1 cup flour, 6 eggs, 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs, 4 tablespoons butter, 1 lemon, juiced. Pound cutlet thin on the bone. Season with salt. Dredge in flour, egg, fine breadcrumbs. Pan-fry in clarified butter until deep golden. Serve with lemon. The Milanese classic.

Porchetta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs pork belly, 1.5 lbs pork loin, 1 tablespoon fennel seeds, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary, chopped, 1 tablespoon dried sage, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 2 tablespoons olive oil. Score pork belly. Make paste: fennel, garlic, rosemary, sage, salt, pepper, oil. Spread on inside of belly, place loin inside. Roll and tie tightly. Roast at 450°F 30 minutes, reduce to 325°F, roast 2.5 hours until skin is crackling.

Italian beef.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 6 cups beef broth, 1/2 cup Italian dressing mix, 1.5 cups pepperoncini, 4 slices bread, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese. Place roast in slow cooker with broth, Italian dressing mix, and pepperoncini. Cook on low 8 hours. Shred beef. Toast bread with provolone. Fill with beef. Serve with jus for dipping.

Italian sausage sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 Italian sausages (sweet or hot), 2 bell peppers sliced, 2 onions sliced, 3 cloves garlic minced, 1 can (14 oz) crushed tomatoes, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, 6 hoagie rolls. 1. Heat 1 tbsp oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Brown sausages on all sides, about 8-10 min. Remove and set aside. 2. Add remaining oil to skillet. Add peppers and onions, cook 7-8 min until softened and caramelized. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 3. Stir in crushed tomatoes and Italian seasoning. Return sausages to pan, nestling them in vegetables. 4. Cover and simmer 15-20 min until sausages are cooked through (internal temp 160°F). 5. Split hoagie rolls, toast if desired. Place sausage in roll, top with peppers, onions, and sauce. 6. Add provolone cheese if using. Serve hot.

Muffuletta.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 slices thick-cut bread, 8 oz salami, sliced, 1 cup mortadella, 2 cups diced ham (12 oz), 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 8 oz shredded cheese, 2 cups olive salad. Slice bread horizontally. Spread olive salad generously on both halves. Layer meats and cheeses. Close sandwich. Press with weight 30 minutes. Cut into wedges.

ingredients: For fried shrimp: 1.5 lbs large shrimp peeled and deveined, 2 cups flour, 2 eggs beaten with 1/4 cup milk, 2 cups cornmeal, 2 tsp Cajun seasoning, salt and pepper
French bread rolls or sub rolls
For remoulade: 1 cup mayo, 2 tbsp Creole mustard, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tsp hot sauce, 2 cloves garlic minced
Po'boy.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 French bread rolls or sub rolls. 1. Make remoulade: Mix mayo, mustard, lemon juice, hot sauce, and garlic. Refrigerate. 2. Heat 2 inches oil to 375°F. Set up breading station: flour in one dish, egg mixture in second, cornmeal mixed with Cajun seasoning, salt, and pepper in third. 3. Pat shrimp dry, season with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, dip in egg, coat with cornmeal mixture. 4. Fry shrimp in batches 2-3 min until golden brown and cooked through. Drain on paper towels. 5. Split and toast rolls. Spread remoulade on both sides. 6. Pile fried shrimp on rolls, top with lettuce, tomatoes, and pickles. Serve immediately.

Fried catfish.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs catfish, 1 (15 oz) can corn, drained, 1/4 cup flour, 3 tablespoons butter, 1 tablespoon Cajun seasoning, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Soak catfish in buttermilk 30 minutes. Mix cornmeal, flour, Cajun seasoning, salt, pepper. Dredge fish. Fry at 350°F 4-5 minutes per side until golden and cooked through.

Fried shrimp.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz shrimp, 1/4 cup flour, 3 large eggs, 1 cup breadcrumbs, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons cocktail sauce. Season flour with salt, pepper, garlic powder. Beat eggs. Dredge shrimp in flour, egg, breadcrumbs. Fry at 350°F 2-3 minutes until golden. Serve with cocktail sauce.

Shrimp scampi.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs shrimp (21-25 count), 8 oz linguine, 4 tablespoons butter, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 3/4 cup white wine, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 2 tablespoons dried parsley, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Cook linguine. Sauté garlic in butter and oil 30 seconds. Add shrimp, cook 1 minute per side. Add wine and lemon juice, simmer 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Toss with pasta and parsley.

Shrimp alfredo.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb fettuccine, 1.5 lbs large shrimp, peeled and deveined, 3 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp paprika, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper, 1.5 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 6 tbsp butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups heavy cream, 2 cups Parmesan cheese, grated, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped, 1 lemon, juiced. 1. Season shrimp with paprika, cayenne, salt, pepper. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook shrimp 2 min per side until pink and opaque. Transfer to plate. 2. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook fettuccine until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 1 min until fragrant. Add heavy cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5 min, stirring occasionally, until slightly thickened. 4. Reduce heat to low. Gradually whisk in Parmesan until melted and smooth. Add nutmeg, salt, pepper to taste. 5. Add drained pasta to sauce, toss to coat. Add pasta water if needed for creamy consistency. Return shrimp to pan, toss gently. 6. Serve immediately garnished with parsley, extra Parmesan, and lemon wedges.

ingredients: large shrimp, peeled, deveined, and chopped
Shrimp fried rice.directions:
Ingredients needed: 3 cups cooked jasmine rice (day-old, refrigerated), 12 oz large shrimp, peeled, deveined, and chopped, 3 tbsp vegetable oil, 2 large eggs, beaten, 1/2 cup frozen peas and carrots, 3 g reen onions, sliced, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oyster sauce, 1 tbsp sesame oil, 1/2 tsp white pepper, 1/2 tsp salt. 1. Season shrimp with pinch of salt and white pepper.
2. Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil in large wok over high heat (450°F). Add shrimp, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until pink and cooked through. Remove and set aside.
3. Add another 1 tbsp oil to wok. Pour in beaten eggs, scramble for 30-45 seconds until just set. Remove and set aside.
4. Add remaining 1 tbsp oil. Add minced garlic, stir-fry for 15 seconds until fragrant.
5. Add peas and carrots, stir-fry for 2 minutes.
6. Add cold rice, breaking up clumps. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until heated through and slightly crispy.
7. Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, white pepper, and salt. Toss for 1 minute.
8. Return cooked shrimp and eggs to wok along with green onions. Toss for 30 seconds to combine.
9. Serve immediately while hot.

Coconut shrimp.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz shrimp, 8 oz shredded coconut, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 6 eggs, 1.5 cups breadcrumbs, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/2 cup sweet chili sauce. Butterfly shrimp. Set up breading: flour, beaten eggs, panko mixed with shredded coconut. Bread shrimp. Deep fry at 350°F 2-3 minutes until golden. Serve with sweet chili sauce.

Bang bang shrimp.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs shrimp (21-25 count), 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 3 tablespoons sweet chili sauce, 2 tablespoons sriracha, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 6 eggs, 1/4 cup flour, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Mix mayo with sweet chili sauce and sriracha for sauce. Coat shrimp in flour, then egg, then cornstarch. Fry at 350°F until golden. Toss with sauce. Serve immediately.

Crab cakes.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz lump crab meat, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 6 eggs, 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs, 3 tablespoons Dijon mustard, 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1 tablespoon Old Bay seasoning, 4 tablespoons butter.
