Press rice down firmly to create even layer, drizzle 2 tbsp oil around edges. 6. Cook without stirring 5-7 min until bottom is crispy and golden. 7. Drizzle with sesame oil, toss to mix. 8. Transfer to plates, crispy bottom on top. 9. Heat remaining 2 tbsp oil in pan, fry eggs sunny-side up 3-4 min. 10. Top each serving with fried egg, garnish with green onions, sesame seeds, and seaweed.

Budae jjigae loaded.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz Korean instant ramen noodles, 1 can (12 oz) Spam (sliced), 8 hot dogs (sliced), 8 oz kimchi (chopped), 4 oz Korean rice cakes, 2 cups napa cabbage (chopped), 1 cup mushrooms (sliced), 1 onion (sliced), 4 cloves garlic (minced), 4 cups chicken or anchovy broth, 3 tbsp gochugaru (Korean chili flakes), 2 tbsp gochujang, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 2 American cheese slices, 2 g reen onions (sliced), 1 tbsp sesame oil. 1. In large pot, arrange Spam, hot dogs, kimchi, rice cakes, cabbage, mushrooms, and onion in sections. 2. Mix broth with gochugaru, gochujang, soy sauce, and garlic, pour over ingredients. 3. Bring to boil over high heat, reduce to medium, simmer 10-15 min. 4. Add ramen noodles, cook 3-4 min. 5. Top with American cheese slices, let melt. 6. Drizzle with sesame oil, garnish with green onions. 7. Serve bubbling hot in the pot at the table.

Galbi with ssamjang.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 3 pears, 1/2 cup ssamjang, 4 cups lettuce leaves, 2 cups white rice. Make galbi marinade with pear. Marinate flanken-cut ribs overnight. Grill until caramelized. Serve with lettuce wraps, ssamjang sauce, and rice.

Bo ssam feast.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 1/4 cup gochujang, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 3 tablespoons butter, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 1.5 cups kimchi. Rub pork with salt and sugar. Roast at 300°F 6 hours, then blast at 500°F until caramelized. Make gochujang sauce with vinegar. Shred pork. Serve with lettuce, rice, sauce, and kimchi for wrapping.

Samgyeopsal with all the sides.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pork belly, sliced, 1/2 cup 1 head lettuce, torn, 1/4 cup perilla leaves, chopped, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 lb ssamjang, 2 cups kimchi, 1 cup jasmine rice, 1.5 tablespoons sesame oil. Slice pork belly thick. Grill until rendered and crispy on edges. Dip in sesame oil and salt. Wrap in lettuce or perilla with ssamjang, grilled garlic, and kimchi. Serve with rice.

KBBQ-style ribeye.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs flank steak, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, 1 cup jasmine rice. Slice ribeye thin. Marinate in soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, sugar, pepper for 30 minutes. Grill on high heat quickly, 1-2 minutes per side. Serve over rice with sesame seeds.

Jjajangmyeon with extra sauce.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb egg noodles, 1.5 lbs pork belly, 2 medium onions, diced, 8 oz zucchini, 1/2 cup potato, 1/4 cup black bean paste, 1 large cucumber, sliced, 3 tablespoons oil, 3 tablespoons cornstarch. Dice pork, potato, onion, zucchini. Fry pork until rendered. Add vegetables, cook until soft. Add black bean paste and water. Simmer and thicken with cornstarch. Serve over boiled noodles with cucumber.

Filipino adobo with crispy skin.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 cups white rice, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 bay leaves, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black peppercorns, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Marinate chicken in soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaf, peppercorns 1-4 hours. Transfer all to pot, add 1/2 cup water. Simmer covered 30 minutes. Remove chicken, reduce sauce. Pan-fry chicken skin-side down until very crispy. Serve with sauce.

Lechon kawali.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pork belly, sliced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1 bay leaf, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup vinegar, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Simmer pork belly with bay leaves, salt, pepper until tender, about 1.5 hours. Drain, refrigerate until cold and dry. Deep fry at 375°F until skin is crispy. Serve with soy-vinegar dipping sauce with garlic.

Sisig.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs pork belly, 3 lbs pork butt, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup calamansi juice, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1 jalapeño, seeded and minced, 3 tablespoons butter, 3 large eggs. Boil pork until tender. Grill or broil until crispy. Chop finely. Sizzle on hot plate with butter, soy sauce, calamansi, jalapeños. Stir in mayo. Top with raw egg to cook on hot sizzling plate.

Kare-kare.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs oxtail, 4 tablespoons butter, 8 oz annatto, 2 medium onions, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 8 oz eggplant, 1 lb bok choy, 2 cups cooked beans, 12 oz shrimp, 1 cup jasmine rice. Braise oxtail until tender, 3 hours. Make sauce with peanut butter, annatto oil, broth. Add vegetables, simmer until cooked. Serve with rice and shrimp paste on the side.

Crispy pata.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs pork shoulder, 1 bay leaf, 2 cups corn kernels, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 3 tablespoons vinegar, 5 cloves garlic, minced. Simmer pork leg with bay and peppercorns 2-3 hours until tender. Refrigerate until cold and dry. Deep fry at 350°F until skin is super crispy. Serve with soy-vinegar-garlic dip.

Lomi.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz medium egg noodles, 3 lbs pork butt, 2 lbs pork shoulder, 1 cup fish balls, 4 large eggs, 3 cups chicken broth, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 3 tablespoons cornstarch. Sauté garlic and onion. Add pork, cook through. Add liver and fish balls. Pour in broth, bring to boil. Add noodles, cook until soft. Thicken with cornstarch. Crack eggs and stir gently for ribbons.

Sinigang with pork ribs.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs pork butt, 1/3 cup tamarind paste, 1 tablespoon fish sauce, 10 oz frozen spinach, thawed and drained, 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes, 1 lb radish. Boil pork ribs until tender, about 1 hour. Add tamarind paste and fish sauce. Add radish, cook 10 minutes. Add water spinach last minute. Season with salt. Serve with rice.

ingredients: For rice: 4 cups day-old rice, 4 cloves garlic minced, 2 tbsp oil, salt
Banana ketchup or spiced vinegar for serving
Spam silog.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 can (12 oz) Spam, sliced 1/4 inch thick, 4 eggs, fried, 4 cups cooked garlic fried rice (sinangag). 1. Make garlic rice: Heat 2 tbsp oil in wok over medium-high heat. Add garlic, fry until golden, 2 min. Add rice, breaking up clumps. Stir-fry 4-5 min until heated through and slightly crispy. Season with salt. 2. Heat skillet over medium-high heat, fry Spam slices 3-4 min per side until crispy and caramelized. 3. Fry eggs in same pan to desired doneness, 3-4 min. 4. Plate garlic rice, top with Spam and fried egg. Serve with tomatoes, cucumber, and banana ketchup or vinegar.

ingredients: For rice: 4 cups day-old rice, 4 cloves garlic minced, 2 tbsp oil
Longganisa and eggs.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb Filipino longganisa sausages (8-10 links), 1/4 cup water, 8 eggs, fried, 4 cups cooked garlic fried rice. 1. Place longganisa in skillet with water over medium heat. Cover, cook 8-10 min, turning occasionally, until water evaporates and sausages release their oil. 2. Uncover, continue cooking 5-7 min in their own fat until browned and caramelized all over. Remove to plate. 3. Make garlic rice: Drain most fat, add oil and garlic. Fry until golden, 2 min. Add rice, stir-fry 4-5 min. 4. Fry eggs in separate pan, 3-4 min. 5. Plate rice, longganisa, and eggs together. Serve with spiced vinegar, tomatoes, and cucumber.

Tocino.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup pineapple juice, 8 oz annatto, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 3 large eggs, 1/4 cup oil. Slice pork thin. Cure with sugar, salt, garlic, pineapple juice, annatto for 3+ days. Pan-fry with splash of water until caramelized. Serve with garlic rice and fried egg.

Tapsilog.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs sirloin steak, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup calamansi juice, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 6 eggs, 1 cup jasmine rice, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 cups 1, sliced pepper. Slice beef thin. Marinate in soy sauce, calamansi, garlic, pepper overnight. Pan-fry beef quickly over high heat. Fry eggs. Make garlic rice. Serve together - tapa, sinangag, itlog.

Hawaiian loco moco piled high.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs ground beef (80/20), 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 4 large eggs, 4 cups beef broth, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1 cup brown gravy mix, 3 tablespoons butter, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Cook rice. Make thick gravy with broth and mix. Form beef into patties, season, pan-fry. Fry eggs with runny yolks. Stack: rice, patty, more patty, gravy, fried egg on top. Drizzle more gravy.

Kalua pig with crispy bits.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 8 oz Hawaiian salt, 1/3 cup liquid smoke, 2 tablespoons banana leaves, chopped. Rub pork with salt and liquid smoke. Wrap in banana leaves (or foil). Slow roast at 275°F 8-10 hours until fall-apart tender. Shred. Crisp some shreds under broiler or in hot pan.

Laulau without the lau.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 2.5 lbs beef, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 2 cups Hawaiian salt, 3 tablespoons ti leaves, chopped, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Cut pork and beef into chunks. Season with Hawaiian salt. Place meat and butterfish on ti leaves (or foil if unavailable). Wrap tightly. Steam for 4 hours until pork is fall-apart tender.

Chicken katsu curry.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken breasts, 1 cup Japanese curry roux, 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 1/4 cup flour, 6 eggs, 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 cups white rice. Make curry: cook cubed potatoes in water until tender, add curry roux blocks. Make chicken katsu: bread and fry cutlet. Serve rice with curry sauce, topped with sliced katsu.

Katsu sando.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs pork butt, 2 cups whole milk, 1 cup flour, 3 large eggs, 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs, 1/3 cup tonkatsu sauce, 6 cups shredded cabbage, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Make tonkatsu: pound, bread with flour, egg, panko. Fry until golden. Spread tonkatsu sauce on soft milk bread. Add shredded cabbage, sliced cutlet, more sauce. Press slightly. Cut off crusts, slice diagonally.

Wagyu sando.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 6 slices thick-cut bread, 1/4 cup tonkatsu sauce, 1 s mall head cabbage, shredded, 2 tablespoons yellow mustard, 1.5 cups panko, 6 eggs, 1/4 cup flour, 3 tablespoons oil. Pound wagyu thin. Bread in flour, egg, panko. Deep fry until golden but still medium-rare inside. Trim crusts from shokupan. Spread with mustard, add cabbage, cutlet, tonkatsu sauce. Cut into rectangles.

ingredients: For sauce: 1/4 cup ketchup, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 2 tbsp sake or white wine, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp sugar, 1/2 cup beef broth
Japanese hamburg steak.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 1/2 lb ground pork, 1 onion minced fine, 1/2 cup panko breadcrumbs, 1/4 cup milk, 1 egg, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 2 tbsp vegetable oil. 1. Sauté half the minced onion in 1 tbsp oil until soft, 5 min. Let cool. 2. Mix ground beef, pork, cooked onion, raw onion, panko, milk, egg, salt, and pepper. Knead until sticky. Form into 4 oval patties. 3. Heat remaining oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Cook patties 4-5 min per side until browned. Remove and set aside. 4. In same skillet, add all sauce ingredients. Bring to simmer. 5. Return patties to skillet, spoon sauce over top. Cover and simmer 7-8 min until cooked through. 6. Serve patties with sauce spooned over top.

Omurice.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup jasmine rice, 6 (5-6 oz) bone-in chicken thighs, 1/3 cup ketchup, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 3 large eggs, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Cook diced chicken in butter. Add cooked rice and ketchup, stir-fry until well mixed. Shape into mound on plate. Beat eggs, cook thin omelette. Slide omelette over rice mound. Drizzle with more ketchup.

Yoshinoya-style gyudon.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz beef sirloin, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 1 cup jasmine rice, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup mirin, 1/4 cup sake, 1.5 cups dashi, 1/4 cup sugar, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 6 eggs. Slice beef paper thin. Simmer onion in dashi, soy, mirin, sake, sugar until soft. Add beef, cook just until no longer pink. Serve over hot rice. Top with raw egg and pickled ginger.

Beef donburi with torched beef.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz beef sirloin, 2 cups white rice, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 3 tablespoons mirin, 1/4 cup sake, 1/4 cup sugar, 6 eggs, 1 large onion, diced, 2 s heets nori. Make sauce: simmer soy, mirin, sake, sugar. Slice beef thin. Sear quickly then torch for char. Arrange over rice. Drizzle sauce. Top with raw egg yolk, green onions, nori strips.

Mentaiko pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb spaghetti, 4 oz mentaiko (spicy cod roe), membrane removed, 6 tbsp butter, softened, 2 tbsp heavy cream, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp sake or white wine, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup Parmesan, grated. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Reserve 1.5 cups pasta water before draining. 2. While pasta cooks, in large bowl, mix mentaiko, softened butter, cream, soy sauce, sake, garlic, and lemon zest. Mash with fork until relatively smooth paste forms. 3. Add hot drained pasta to bowl with mentaiko mixture. Toss vigorously to coat. Add pasta water 2 tbsp at a time, tossing constantly, until creamy sauce forms that coats pasta. 4. Add Parmesan, toss to combine. The heat from pasta will cook the mentaiko slightly. 5. Serve immediately topped with nori strips and green onions. Optionally add more mentaiko on top for presentation.

ingredients: Salt and white pepper to taste
Tori paitan ramen.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs chicken bones and carcasses, 1 lb chicken wings, 12 cups water, 1 onion, halved, 1 leek, chopped, 1 head garlic, halved, 2 inch ginger, sliced, 4 packs ramen noodles, 1 lb chicken thighs, cooked and sliced, 4 s oft-boiled eggs, 4 g reen onions, sliced. 1. Blanch chicken bones and wings in boiling water 5 min, drain, rinse. 2. In large pot, combine bones, wings, 12 cups water, onion, leek, garlic, ginger. Bring to vigorous boil, maintain for 4-6 hours, adding water as needed. Broth should turn white and creamy. 3. Strain broth through fine mesh, season with salt and white pepper. 4. Cook chicken thighs until 165°F, slice. Prepare soft-boiled eggs: boil 6.5 min, ice bath, peel, halve. 5. Cook noodles according to package. 6. Assemble: noodles in bowl, ladle hot creamy broth, top with sliced chicken, egg, green onions, nori.

Tsukemen.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz wide noodles, 1 lb pork belly, sliced, 3 cups dashi, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 2 tablespoons mirin, 1 cup jasmine rice, 3 large eggs, 6 nori sheets, 6 g reen onions, chopped, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Make concentrated dipping broth with dashi, soy, mirin. Chill noodles after cooking. Braise and slice pork belly. Serve cold noodles separately from hot dipping broth. Dip noodles, slurp, repeat.

Mazemen.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz wide noodles, 1 lb ground pork, 6 egg yolks, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1.5 tablespoons sesame oil, 3 tablespoons oil, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 4 s callions, sliced, 6 nori sheets. Cook thick noodles. Brown ground pork with garlic. Toss noodles with soy sauce, sesame oil, and chili oil. Top with pork, raw egg yolk, scallions, nori. Mix everything together before eating.

Tantanmen.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz wide noodles, 12 oz ground pork, 2 tablespoons sesame paste, 3 tablespoons oil, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 3 cups chicken broth, 1 (15 oz) can corn, drained, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 6 g reen onions, chopped, 1 cup bok choy. Make broth with chicken stock, sesame paste, chili oil, soy sauce. Brown ground pork with Sichuan peppercorns. Cook noodles and bok choy. Serve noodles in sesame broth topped with spicy pork and scallions.

Champon.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb egg noodles, 1.5 lbs pork belly, 12 oz squid, 12 oz shrimp, 6 cups shredded cabbage, 1 cup milk, 2 cups chicken broth, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 3 tablespoons sake, 5 cloves garlic, minced. Stir-fry pork, seafood, and cabbage. Add broth, milk, soy sauce, sake, garlic. Simmer 10 minutes. Add noodles. Cook until noodles tender. The Nagasaki specialty.

Yakisoba with extra sauce and nori.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz wide noodles, 1 lb pork belly, sliced, 6 cups shredded cabbage, 1/4 cup yakisoba sauce, 6 nori sheets, 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced, 1.5 tablespoons sesame oil. Slice pork belly, stir-fry until crispy. Add shredded cabbage. Add noodles and generous yakisoba sauce. Toss until well coated. Serve topped with nori strips and pickled ginger.

Takoyaki without octopus.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup flour, 2 cups dashi stock, 3 large eggs, 8 slices thick-cut bacon, 8 oz shredded cheese, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 1/4 cup takoyaki sauce, 8 oz kewpie mayo, 2 teaspoons bonito flakes. Make batter with flour, dashi, eggs. Heat takoyaki pan, fill molds. Add bacon and cheese cubes to each. Turn with picks until spherical and golden. Top with sauce, mayo, bonito flakes.

Okonomiyaki.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup dashi or water, 6 eggs, 3 cups cabbage, finely shredded, 4 g reen onions, chopped, 8 oz pork belly, thinly sliced (or bacon), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 4 s heets nori, 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined. In large bowl, whisk flour and dashi until smooth. Add eggs and whisk well. Fold in cabbage and green onions. Mix gently (batter will be thick with vegetables). Heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium heat. Pour 1/4 of batter into pan, spreading into 7-8 inch circle about 3/4 inch thick. Lay 2-3 slices of pork belly on top of pancake. Cook 5-6 minutes until bottom is golden brown and edges are set. Carefully flip. Cook another 5-6 minutes until pork is crispy and pancake is cooked through. Transfer to plate. Repeat with remaining batter. Drizzle generously with okonomiyaki sauce and Japanese mayo in crosshatch pattern. Sprinkle with bonito flakes and aonori. Serve hot.

Hiroshima-style okonomiyaki.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 cups shredded cabbage, 1 lb pork belly, sliced, 1 lb egg noodles, 6 eggs, 1 cup flour, 1.5 cups dashi, 2 tablespoons okonomiyaki sauce, 2 cups kewpie mayo, 2 medium onions, diced. Make thin crepe. Pile shredded cabbage on top. Add pork slices. Cook yakisoba separately with sauce. Fry eggs flat. Stack: crepe, cabbage, pork, noodles, fried egg. Flip. Top with sauce and mayo.

Monjayaki.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 cups shredded cabbage, 1 cup flour, 2 cups dashi stock, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 1.5 lbs shrimp (21-25 count), 8 oz shredded cheese, 1/2 cup mochi pieces, 1 lb mentaiko. Make thin batter with flour and dashi. Mix with cabbage, shrimp, toppings. Pour on griddle, form ring. Pour batter in center. When bottom is crispy, scrape and eat directly from griddle with small spatula.

Tonpeiyaki.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs pork belly, 4 large eggs, 6 cups shredded cabbage, 6 g reen onions, chopped, 1/2 cup okonomiyaki sauce, 1/2 cup kewpie mayo. Cook thin slices of pork belly until crispy. Beat eggs, pour over pork to form thin omelette. Add shredded cabbage. Roll into cylinder when eggs are set. Drizzle with sauce and mayo, top with scallions.

Negima... just chicken thighs.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs (2 lbs), 1/4 cup soy sauce, 3 tablespoons mirin, 1/4 cup sake, 1/4 cup sugar, 8 oz bamboo skewers. Cut thighs into bite-sized pieces. Thread onto skewers. Make tare by simmering soy, mirin, sake, sugar until reduced. Grill skewers, basting repeatedly with tare. Serve with extra tare drizzled over.

Tsukune with raw egg dip.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup sugar. Mix chicken with panko, ginger, salt. Form ovals on skewers. Grill, basting with tare made from soy, mirin, sake, sugar. Serve with raw egg yolk for dipping, garnish with scallions.

Chicken nanban.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 1/4 cup flour, 3 large eggs, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 6 eggs, 2 ripe pears, diced, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Make tartar sauce: mayo, chopped hard-boiled egg, pickles. Cut chicken, dredge in flour and egg. Fry until golden. Make nanban sauce: vinegar, soy sauce, sugar. Dip fried chicken in sauce. Top with tartar.

Karaage.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs (2 lbs), 1/3 cup soy sauce, 3 tablespoons sake, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup potato starch, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 large lemon. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Marinate in soy sauce, sake, grated ginger, garlic 30 minutes. Coat generously with potato starch. Fry at 340°F 3 minutes, rest 2 minutes, fry again at 375°F 2 minutes until very crispy. Serve with lemon.

Miso black cod.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs cod fillets, 3 tablespoons white miso, 2 tablespoons mirin, 1/4 cup sake, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced. Make marinade: mix miso, mirin, sake, sugar. Marinate cod for 2-3 days. Wipe off excess marinade. Broil until caramelized and fish flakes easily. Serve with pickled ginger.

Sake-glazed salmon.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 (5 oz) salmon portions, 3 tablespoons sake, 1/4 cup mirin, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup sugar, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 2 tablespoons sesame seeds. Make glaze by reducing sake, mirin, soy sauce, sugar with ginger. Sear salmon skin-side down. Flip, baste with glaze. Finish in oven at 400°F. Glaze again, top with sesame seeds.

Unagi don.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup unagi (eel), 2 cups white rice, 1/3 cup unagi sauce, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 2 tablespoons mirin, 1/3 cup sake, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 lb sansho pepper. Make tare by reducing soy, mirin, sake, sugar until glossy. Brush eel with tare, broil until glazed. Repeat 3-4 times for thick glaze. Serve over hot rice, drizzle with extra tare, sprinkle sansho pepper.

Chirashi bowl.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup basmati rice, 1 lb sashimi fish, 1 cup tamagoyaki, 1.5 lbs salmon fillet, 6 nori sheets, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1 tablespoon wasabi paste, 1 teaspoon ground ginger. Season rice with rice vinegar. Arrange assorted sashimi slices over rice. Add tamagoyaki, roe, nori strips. Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

Spicy tuna crispy rice.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups white rice, 1 lb sushi-grade tuna, 3 tablespoons sriracha, 8 oz kewpie mayo, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 6 g reen onions, chopped, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Press sushi rice into rectangles, chill. Pan-fry rice cakes until crispy on both sides. Dice tuna, mix with sriracha, mayo, sesame oil. Top each crispy rice with spicy tuna. Garnish with scallions and sesame.

Beef tataki.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb beef sirloin, thinly sliced, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 cups white rice, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1.5 tablespoons sesame oil, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped. Sear beef on all sides until just charred outside but rare inside. Ice bath to stop cooking. Slice thin. Make ponzu-style sauce with soy, vinegar, ginger, garlic. Drizzle over beef. Top with green onions.

Poke bowl.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb sushi-grade tuna, 2 cups white rice, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, 8 oz seaweed salad, 2 ripe avocados, diced. Cube raw tuna. Marinate in soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar for 15 minutes. Serve over warm rice. Top with avocado, seaweed salad, sesame seeds.

Spam musubi deluxe.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups Spam, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 6 nori sheets, 2 cups furikake, 1/4 cup teriyaki sauce, 3 large eggs, 2 teaspoons sesame oil. Slice Spam thin, pan-fry until crispy. Glaze with teriyaki. Make thin egg sheet. Season rice with furikake. Layer in musubi mold: rice, egg, glazed Spam, more rice. Wrap with nori strip.

Shoyu poke.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs fresh tuna, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 1 large onion, diced, 2 medium onions, diced, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, 1 cup jasmine rice, 1 cup seaweed salad. Cube fresh ahi tuna. Toss with soy sauce, sesame oil, thinly sliced sweet onion, scallions, sesame seeds. Let marinate 15 minutes. Serve over rice with seaweed salad on the side.

ingredients: beef tenderloin or sirloin (very fresh, high quality)
Toast points or crostini for serving
Steak tartare.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb beef tenderloin or sirloin (very fresh, high quality), 2 s hallots minced fine, 2 tbsp capers minced, 2 tbsp cornichons (small pickles) minced, 2 tbsp fresh parsley chopped, 2 tsp Dijon mustard, 2 tsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tbsp olive oil, 4 egg yolks. 1. Using very sharp knife, finely mince beef by hand into small uniform pieces. Place in mixing bowl, keep cold. 2. Add shallots, capers, cornichons, parsley, mustard, Worcestershire, and olive oil. Mix gently but thoroughly. 3. Season generously with salt and pepper. Taste and adjust seasoning (tartare should be well-seasoned). 4. Divide mixture among 4 chilled plates, forming into neat mounds or using ring molds. 5. Make small indentation in top of each portion, place egg yolk in center. 6. Serve immediately with toast points or crostini.

Beef carpaccio.directions: Ingredients needed: 2.5 lbs beef, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 cup arugula, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup capers, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Freeze beef 1-2 hours for easier slicing. Slice paper thin. Pound even thinner between plastic. Arrange on cold plates. Season with salt and pepper. Top with arugula, shaved parmesan, capers. Drizzle oil and lemon juice.

ingredients: For café de Paris butter: 1 cup butter softened, 2 cloves garlic minced, 2 tbsp fresh parsley chopped, 1 tbsp Dijon mustard, 1 tbsp capers minced, 1 tbsp fresh tarragon chopped, 1 tsp anchovy paste, 1 tsp paprika, 1/2 tsp curry powder, juice of 1/2 lemon
large russet potatoes for fries, oil for frying
Steak frites with caf\u00e9 de Paris but.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 ribeye steaks (12 oz each), 2 tbsp oil, 4 large russet potatoes for fries, oil for frying. 1. Make compound butter: Mix all butter ingredients until well combined. Form into log, wrap in plastic wrap, refrigerate. 2. For fries: Cut potatoes into sticks, soak 30 min. Double-fry at 325°F then 375°F until golden and crispy. Season with salt. 3. For steaks: Season with salt and pepper. Heat oil in cast iron over high heat. Sear 3-4 min per side for medium-rare. 4. Let steaks rest 5 min. 5. Slice steaks, top with generous pats of café de Paris butter. Serve with hot fries.

Duck confit.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs duck legs, 1/4 cup kosher salt, 4 cloves garlic, smashed, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme, 1 bay leaf, 1 tsp black peppercorns, 4 cups duck fat (or lard). 1. DAY 1: Rub duck legs all over with salt. Place in dish with garlic, thyme, bay leaves, and peppercorns. Cover, refrigerate 24 hours. 2. DAY 2: Rinse duck thoroughly, pat completely dry. 3. Preheat oven to 225°F. Place duck legs in deep baking dish or Dutch oven. Melt duck fat, pour over duck to completely submerge. Add garlic and herbs from cure. 4. Cover tightly with foil or lid. Bake 3-4 hours until meat is very tender and pulling away from bone. 5. Let cool in fat. Can store submerged in fat in refrigerator up to 1 month. 6. TO SERVE: Remove duck from fat, scrape off excess. Heat skillet over medium-high heat. Cook duck skin-side down 6-8 min until skin is crispy. Flip briefly to warm through. Serve with salad or potatoes.

Duck fat roasted potatoes.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 medium russet potatoes, cubed, 2 tablespoons duck fat, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 3 sprigs fresh rosemary, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Parboil quartered potatoes 10 minutes. Drain, rough up edges. Toss in hot duck fat with herbs. Roast at 425°F, turning occasionally, until golden and crispy, about 45 minutes.

ingredients: dried white beans (flageolet or navy), soaked overnight
Cassoulet.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb dried white beans (flageolet or navy), soaked overnight, 6 duck leg quarters, 1 lb pork shoulder, cubed, 1/2 lb pork belly, cubed, 1/2 lb garlic sausage or kielbasa, sliced, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 4 carrots, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes, 4 cups chicken stock, 1/2 teaspoon thyme, 2 bay leaves, 2 cups breadcrumbs, 1/4 cup duck fat, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Drain soaked beans. Simmer in fresh water with 1 onion and bay leaf 45 min until tender but not falling apart. Drain, reserve liquid. 2. Preheat oven to 300°F. Brown pork shoulder and belly in Dutch oven over medium-high heat, 8 min. Remove. Brown sausage, remove. 3. Sauté onion and carrots 6 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 4. Return meats to pot. Add beans, tomatoes, stock, thyme, and bay leaves. Bring to simmer. 5. Nestle duck confit into beans. Cover, transfer to oven. Bake 2 hours. 6. Remove lid. Sprinkle breadcrumbs over surface, drizzle with duck fat. Bake uncovered 45 min until crust is golden. 7. Let rest 15 min. Serve from pot with crusty bread.

ingredients: whole chicken (4 lbs), cut into 8 pieces
Coq au vin.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 whole chicken (4 lbs), cut into 8 pieces, 8 oz bacon, diced, 1 bottle (750ml) dry red wine, 2 cups chicken broth, 8 oz pearl onions, peeled, 8 oz cremini mushrooms, halved, 4 carrots, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tbsp flour, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 1/2 teaspoon thyme, 3 bay leaves, 1/4 cup cognac or brandy, 3 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 2 tablespoons dried parsley. 1. Season chicken pieces with salt and pepper. 2. Cook bacon in Dutch oven over medium heat until crispy, 8 min. Remove. 3. Brown chicken in batches in bacon fat, skin-side first, 4-5 min per side until golden. Remove. 4. Pour off all but 2 tbsp fat. Add carrots, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 5. Sprinkle flour over vegetables, stir 2 min. Add tomato paste, cook 1 min. 6. Add cognac, let it flame if desired. Add wine, scraping browned bits. Add broth, thyme, and bay leaves. 7. Return chicken and bacon to pot. Bring to simmer. Cover, reduce heat to low. Simmer gently 45 min until chicken is tender. 8. Meanwhile, sauté pearl onions in 2 tbsp butter until golden, 10 min. Remove. Sauté mushrooms in 1 tbsp butter until browned, 8 min. 9. Add onions and mushrooms to pot, simmer uncovered 15 min to reduce sauce. 10. Remove bay leaves and thyme. Skim fat. Adjust seasoning. Garnish with parsley. Serve with crusty bread or boiled potatoes.

Boeuf bourguignon.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef chuck, cut into 2-inch cubes, 6 oz bacon, diced, 1 bottle (750ml) dry red wine, 2 cups beef broth, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 1 lb pearl onions, peeled, 1 lb cremini mushrooms, quartered, 3 medium carrots, sliced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tbsp flour, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme, 1 bay leaf, 3 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. Pat beef dry, season generously with salt and pepper. 2. Cook bacon in Dutch oven over medium heat until crispy, 8 min. Remove with slotted spoon. 3. Brown beef in batches in bacon fat over medium-high heat, 3-4 min per side. Don't crowd. Remove to plate. 4. Reduce heat to medium. Sauté carrots 5 min until starting to brown. Add garlic, cook 1 min until fragrant. 5. Sprinkle flour over vegetables, stir constantly 1-2 min. 6. Pour in wine, scraping up browned bits. Add broth, tomato paste, thyme, and bay leaves. Stir to combine. 7. Return beef and bacon to pot. Bring to simmer. 8. Cover with tight-fitting lid, transfer to oven. Braise 2 hours until beef is fork-tender. 9. Meanwhile, sauté pearl onions in 2 tbsp butter over medium heat until golden, 8-10 min. Remove. 10. In same pan, sauté mushrooms in remaining 1 tbsp butter until browned, 8 min. 11. Add onions and mushrooms to stew for last 30 min of cooking. 12. Remove bay leaves and thyme sprigs. Skim fat from surface. Adjust seasoning. Serve over egg noodles or mashed potatoes.

Beef daube Proven\u00e7al.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef chuck, cut into 2-inch cubes, 1/2 cup dry wine, 4 oz salt pork or pancetta, diced, 1 lb carrots, cut into chunks, 2 medium onions, diced, 6 cloves garlic, smashed, 1 can (14 oz) whole tomatoes, crushed, 2 cups beef broth, 1/2 cup zest of 1 orange, 1/2 teaspoon thyme, 3 bay leaves, 1 tsp herbes de Provence, 1 cup Niçoise or Kalamata olives, pitted, 3 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Season beef with salt and pepper. Marinate in wine with onion, garlic, thyme, and bay leaves. Refrigerate overnight. 2. Preheat oven to 300°F. Remove beef from marinade, pat dry. Strain marinade, reserve liquid and aromatics separately. 3. Cook salt pork in Dutch oven over medium heat until crispy, 8 min. Remove. 4. Brown beef in batches in rendered fat over medium-high heat, 3-4 min per side. Remove. 5. Sauté carrots 5 min. Add reserved aromatics from marinade, cook 3 min. 6. Return beef and salt pork to pot. Add reserved wine, broth, tomatoes, orange zest, and herbes de Provence. Bring to simmer. 7. Cover, transfer to oven. Braise 2 1/2 hours until beef is very tender. 8. Stir in olives, cook 15 min more. Remove bay leaves and thyme stems. Skim fat. Adjust seasoning. Serve with egg noodles or polenta.

Chicken fricassee.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 1 cup flour, 4 cups chicken broth, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 3 bay leaves, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Season chicken, dust with flour. Brown in butter 4 minutes per side. Add garlic, thyme, bay leaf. Add broth, cover, simmer 35 minutes. Remove chicken. Add cream, reduce until thickened. Return chicken, adjust seasoning.

Poulet r\u00f4ti.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 whole chicken (4-5 lbs), 4 tbsp butter, softened, 2 tbsp fresh herbs (thyme, rosemary, tarragon), chopped, 2 lemons, juiced and zested, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 3 tablespoons olive oil. 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. Pat chicken completely dry inside and out. 2. Mix butter with herbs, 1 tsp salt, and pepper. Gently loosen skin over breast and thighs. Spread herb butter under skin. 3. Season cavity with salt and pepper. Stuff with lemon halves and garlic. Tie legs together with kitchen twine. Tuck wing tips under. 4. Rub outside with olive oil, season generously with salt and pepper. 5. Place chicken breast-side up in roasting pan or cast iron skillet. 6. Roast 1 hour to 1 hour 15 min until skin is deeply golden and crispy, and thigh reaches 165°F. 7. Transfer to cutting board, tent with foil. Rest 15 min before carving. Serve with pan juices.

Duck \u00e0 l'orange.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups duck breasts, 3/4 cup orange juice, 1 cup orange zest, 1/2 cup Grand Marnier, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 1/4 cup sugar, 4 cups chicken broth, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Score duck skin, season with salt and pepper. Start skin-side down in cold pan, render fat over medium heat 15 minutes. Flip, cook 5 minutes. Rest. Make sauce: caramelize sugar, add orange juice, broth, Grand Marnier, reduce. Swirl in butter. Slice duck, serve with sauce.

Steak au poivre with cognac cream.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 strip steaks (10 oz each), 1 1/2 inches thick, 4 tbsp black peppercorns, coarsely crushed, 2 tbsp vegetable oil, 3 tbsp butter, 4 s hallots, thinly sliced, 1/3 cup cognac, 1 cup beef stock, 1 cup heavy cream, 1 tbsp Dijon mustard, 1 tsp green peppercorns (optional). 1. Pat steaks dry, season with salt. Press crushed black peppercorns firmly onto both sides. Rest 30 min at room temp. 2. Heat oil in large skillet over high heat until smoking. Sear steaks 4 min per side for medium-rare (130°F). Transfer to plate, tent with foil. 3. Reduce heat to medium. Add 1 tbsp butter and shallots, cook 2 min. 4. Remove pan from heat, add cognac, return to heat and ignite carefully. Let flames subside. 5. Add beef stock, simmer 5 min, scraping browned bits, until reduced by half. 6. Add cream and mustard, simmer 4-5 min until thick enough to coat spoon. Stir in green peppercorns if using. 7. Remove from heat, swirl in remaining 2 tbsp butter. Taste, adjust salt. 8. Return steaks and any accumulated juices to pan, turn to coat in sauce. Serve immediately.

ingredients: beef tenderloin steaks (6 oz each, 1-inch thick)
Steak Diane tableside.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 beef tenderloin steaks (6 oz each, 1-inch thick), 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, 3 tbsp butter, 2 s hallots minced, 8 oz mushrooms sliced, 2 cloves garlic minced, 1/4 cup brandy or cognac, 1 cup beef broth, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 2 tbsp Dijon mustard, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 2 tbsp fresh parsley chopped. 1. Pat steaks dry, season with salt and pepper. 2. Heat 2 tbsp butter in large skillet over high heat. Sear steaks 3-4 min per side for medium-rare. Remove and keep warm. 3. Reduce heat to medium. Add remaining butter, shallots, and mushrooms. Cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 4. Remove pan from heat, add brandy. Return to heat and carefully ignite (flamb锟斤拷). Let flames subside. 5. Add broth, cream, mustard, and Worcestershire. Simmer 5-7 min until thick. 6. Return steaks to pan, spoon sauce over top. Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

Chateaubriand for two.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef brisket, 4 tablespoons butter, 3 s hallots, minced, 1/2 cup dry wine, 3 cups beef broth, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/2 cup béarnaise sauce. Season thick tenderloin (2+ inches). Sear all sides. Roast at 400°F to 125°F internal. Rest. Make pan sauce with wine, broth, shallots, thyme. Slice, serve with sauce and béarnaise.

Lobster thermidor.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 whole lobsters (1 1/2 lbs each), cooked, 4 tbsp butter, 2 large shallots, diced, 1/4 cup dry white wine, 1 cup heavy cream, 2 tbsp Dijon mustard, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 2 tbsp fresh tarragon, chopped, 4 egg yolks, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/2 cup breadcrumbs. 1. Split lobsters lengthwise. Remove meat, cut into chunks. Reserve shells. 2. Melt 3 tbsp butter in saucepan over medium heat. Sauté shallots 3 min. Add wine, reduce by half, 2 min. 3. Add cream, bring to simmer. Cook 5 min until slightly thickened. 4. Temper egg yolks with some hot cream, then whisk back into sauce. Add mustard, half the Parmesan, tarragon, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Don't boil. 5. Fold in lobster meat. 6. Preheat broiler. Spoon lobster mixture into reserved shells. Top with breadcrumbs and remaining Parmesan. Dot with remaining butter. 7. Broil 3-4 min until golden and bubbling. Serve immediately.

ingredients: whole lobsters (1 1/2 lbs each), cooked, meat removed and chunked
Lobster Newburg.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 whole lobsters (1 1/2 lbs each), cooked, meat removed and chunked, 4 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp cognac or brandy, 1/4 cup dry sherry, 1 1/2 cups heavy cream, 6 egg yolks, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 2 tablespoons dried parsley, 2 s heets puff pastry. 1. Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Add lobster meat, sauté 2 min. 2. Add cognac, carefully ignite. When flames die, add sherry. Simmer 2 min. 3. In bowl, whisk egg yolks with cream, cayenne, nutmeg, salt, and pepper. 4. Reduce heat to low. Slowly pour cream mixture into lobster, stirring constantly. Cook gently, stirring, until sauce thickens, 5-7 min. Don't boil or eggs will curdle. 5. Adjust seasoning. Garnish with parsley. Serve in puff pastry shells or over toast points.

Shrimp de Jonghe.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz shrimp, 4 tablespoons butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons sherry, 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs, 2 tablespoons dried parsley, 1/2 teaspoon paprika. Melt butter with garlic. Add sherry, cook 1 minute. Place shrimp in baking dish. Pour garlic butter over. Top with breadcrumbs mixed with parsley and paprika. Bake at 400°F 15-18 minutes until bubbly.

Oysters Rockefeller.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups oysters, 10 oz frozen spinach, thawed and drained, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1.5 cups breadcrumbs, 8 oz Pernod, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Sauté spinach with garlic in butter. Add Pernod, season. Top each oyster on half shell with spinach mixture, breadcrumbs, parmesan. Bake at 450°F 10-12 minutes until bubbly and golden.

Clams casino.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs littleneck clams, 8 slices thick-cut bacon, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1.5 cups breadcrumbs, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 1/4 cup lemon juice. Shuck clams, loosen meat, leave on half shell. Mix soft butter with garlic, parsley, lemon juice. Top each clam with butter mixture, then breadcrumbs mixed with parmesan, then small piece of bacon. Broil until bacon is crispy and breadcrumbs golden.

Stuffed clams.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese. Steam clams open, reserve shells. Chop clam meat. Mix with sautéed garlic, breadcrumbs, bacon bits, parsley, lemon zest. Fill shells with mixture. Top with parmesan. Bake at 400°F until golden.

Mussels in white wine butter.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb mussels, 3/4 cup white wine, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 4 s hallots, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 4 slices bread. Clean and debeard mussels. Sauté shallots and garlic in butter. Add wine, bring to boil. Add mussels, cover, cook 5 minutes until opened. Add cream and parsley. Serve with crusty bread for soaking up broth.

ingredients: firm white fish (halibut, cod, monkfish), cut into chunks
Bouillabaisse.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs firm white fish (halibut, cod, monkfish), cut into chunks, 1 lb mussels, scrubbed, 1 lb large shrimp, peeled, 1/2 lb sea scallops, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 1 cup 1 fennel bulb, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes, 6 cups fish stock, 1/2 cup dry white wine, 1/4 teaspoon saffron threads, 2 cups zest of 1 orange, 3 tbsp tomato paste, 4 tbsp olive oil, 1 bay leaf, 1 tsp fennel seeds, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 4 slices bread, 8 oz rouille for serving. 1. Heat olive oil in large pot over medium heat. Sauté onion and fennel 8 min until soft. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 2. Add tomato paste, cook 2 min. Add wine, reduce 2 min. 3. Add tomatoes, fish stock, saffron, orange zest, bay leaf, and fennel seeds. Bring to boil, reduce heat, simmer 20 min. 4. Season broth well with salt and pepper. Increase heat to medium-high. 5. Add fish chunks, simmer 5 min. Add scallops and shrimp, simmer 3 min. Add mussels, cover, cook 3-4 min until mussels open. 6. Discard any unopened mussels and bay leaf. Adjust seasoning. 7. Serve in wide bowls over toasted bread rubbed with garlic. Top with dollop of rouille (garlic-saffron mayo). Serve with more crusty bread.

ingredients: firm white fish, cut into chunks
Cioppino.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 tbsp olive oil, 2 medium onions, diced, 2 cups 1 fennel bulb, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 1 cup dry white wine, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 2 cups fish stock or clam juice, 2 bay leaves, 2 tsp dried oregano, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1 lb firm white fish, cut into chunks, 1 lb mussels, scrubbed, 1 lb clams, scrubbed, 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 4 slices bread. 1. Heat oil in large Dutch oven over medium heat. Add onion and fennel, cook 8 min until softened. Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 min. 2. Add wine, bring to boil. Simmer 3 min until reduced by half. Add crushed tomatoes, fish stock, bay leaves, oregano, salt, pepper. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cook 20 min to develop flavors. 3. Add fish chunks, simmer 5 min. Add mussels and clams, cover pot. Cook 5-7 min until shells open. Add shrimp, cook 3-4 min until pink and opaque. Discard any unopened shells. 4. Remove bay leaves. Taste, adjust seasoning. 5. Ladle into bowls, garnish with parsley. Serve with crusty bread for dipping in broth.

ingredients: fresh clams or 3 cans (6.5 oz each) chopped clams
clam juice (from fresh clams plus bottled)
Salt, pepper, and cayenne to taste
New England clam chowder loaded.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs fresh clams or 3 cans (6.5 oz each) chopped clams, 6 slices bacon, chopped, 1 onion, diced, 3 celery stalks, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 4 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed, 3 cups clam juice (from fresh clams plus bottled), 2 cups heavy cream, 1 cup whole milk, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup flour, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp thyme. 1. If using fresh clams, steam in 2 cups water until open, 8-10 min. Remove meat, chop. Strain liquid, reserve. 2. In large pot, cook bacon until crisp, 6-8 min. Remove bacon, reserve. 3. In bacon fat, sauté onion and celery 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 4. Melt butter, whisk in flour, cook 2 min. Gradually whisk in clam juice, then cream and milk. 5. Add potatoes, bay leaves, thyme. Simmer 15-20 min until potatoes are tender. 6. Add chopped clams, cook 5 min. Season with salt, pepper, cayenne. Remove bay leaves. Top with crispy bacon. Serve with oyster crackers.

ingredients: fresh clams or 3 cans (6.5 oz each) chopped clams
Manhattan clam chowder.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs fresh clams or 3 cans (6.5 oz each) chopped clams, 6 slices bacon, chopped, 1 onion, diced, 2 carrots, diced, 3 celery stalks, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 4 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed, 1 can (28 oz) crushed tomatoes, 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes, 3 cups clam juice, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp thyme, 1 tsp oregano, 1/4 tsp cayenne. 1. If using fresh clams, steam in 2 cups water until open, 8-10 min. Remove meat, chop. Strain liquid, reserve. 2. In large pot, cook bacon until crisp, 6-8 min. Remove bacon, reserve. 3. In bacon fat, sauté onion, carrots, celery 6-8 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 4. Add crushed tomatoes, diced tomatoes, clam juice, potatoes, bay leaves, thyme, oregano, cayenne. 5. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cook 20 min until potatoes are tender. 6. Add chopped clams, simmer 5 min. Season with salt and pepper. Remove bay leaves. Top with crispy bacon and parsley.

ingredients: fresh crab meat (with roe if available)
She-crab soup.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb fresh crab meat (with roe if available), 4 tbsp butter, 1/4 cup flour, 4 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/2 cup dry sherry, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1/4 tsp white pepper, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 2 hard boiled eggs (chopped), 1/4 cup green onions (minced). 1. Melt butter in large pot over medium heat, whisk in flour to make roux. 2. Cook roux 3-4 min until golden, whisking constantly. 3. Slowly whisk in milk and cream, stirring until smooth. 4. Add nutmeg, white pepper, cayenne, and Worcestershire. 5. Simmer 10-15 min until thickened, stirring frequently. 6. Add crab meat (and roe), green onions, and chopped eggs. 7. Heat through 5 min, do not boil. 8. Stir in sherry, heat 2 min more. 9. Season with salt to taste. 10. Serve in bowls garnished with paprika and parsley.

Crawfish \u00e9touff\u00e9e.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz crawfish tails, 4 tablespoons butter, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 2 cups chicken broth, 1.5 tablespoons Cajun seasoning, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 2 cups white rice. Make blonde roux: cook flour in butter 10 minutes until golden. Add garlic, Cajun seasoning, cayenne. Add broth, stir until smooth. Add crawfish, simmer 15 minutes. Season with salt. Serve over rice.

Shrimp and grits deluxe.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined, 3/4 cup quick grits, 1/2 lb bacon, 4 tablespoons butter, 8 oz shredded cheese, 2 cups chicken broth, 1 cup heavy cream, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 lb smoked sausage, sliced, 2 medium onions, diced. Cook grits in broth with cream. Stir in butter and cheese. Cook bacon and sausage. Sauté shrimp with garlic. Serve shrimp, bacon, sausage over grits. Garnish with green onions.

Shrimp Creole.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz shrimp, 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes, 2 cups chicken broth, 1.5 tablespoons Cajun seasoning, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 2 cups white rice, 4 tablespoons butter, 1 cup flour. Make roux with butter and flour. Add garlic and Cajun seasoning. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer 30 minutes. Add shrimp, cook 5 minutes until pink. Serve over rice.

Shrimp \u00e9touff\u00e9e.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs shrimp (21-25 count), 3 tablespoons butter, 1/4 cup flour, 4 cups chicken broth, 2 teaspoons Cajun seasoning, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice. Make blonde roux with butter and flour. Add garlic and Cajun seasoning. Add broth, stir until smooth. Add shrimp last 5 minutes. Serve over rice.

ingredients: large shrimp (shell-on, heads on if available)
BBQ shrimp New Orleans style.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs large shrimp (shell-on, heads on if available), 1 cup (2 sticks) butter, 1/2 cup Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 6 cloves garlic minced, 2 tbsp Creole seasoning, 1 tbsp black pepper, 2 tsp hot sauce, 1 tsp dried rosemary, 1 lemon sliced. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F or use stovetop. In large oven-safe skillet or pot, melt butter over medium heat. 2. Add garlic, cook 1 min until fragrant. Stir in Worcestershire, lemon juice, Creole seasoning, black pepper, hot sauce, and rosemary. 3. Bring to simmer, cook 5 min to meld flavors. 4. Add shrimp and lemon slices, toss to coat. 5. If using oven: Transfer to oven, roast 10-12 min, stirring halfway, until shrimp are pink. If stovetop: Cook 7-8 min, stirring frequently. 6. Serve in bowls with lots of sauce and French bread for dipping.

Blackened redfish.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs redfish fillets, 2 teaspoons Cajun seasoning, 2 teaspoons paprika, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tablespoons butter. Coat fish heavily with butter then Cajun blackening spices. Heat cast iron until smoking hot. Cook 3-4 minutes per side until charred crust forms. The original blackened fish.

Blackened catfish.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs catfish, 1.5 tablespoons Cajun seasoning, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme, 3 tablespoons butter. Mix spices for blackening seasoning. Coat fish heavily with butter then seasoning. Cook in very hot cast iron pan 3-4 minutes per side. The spices should char but not burn.

Pecan-crusted trout.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 (8 oz) trout fillets, 1/2 cup pecan halves, 4 tablespoons butter, 1/4 cup flour, 6 eggs, 2 lemons, juiced and zested, 2 tablespoons dried parsley, 2 cups 1, sliced pepper. Chop pecans finely, mix with flour. Dredge trout in flour, dip in egg, coat in pecans. Pan-fry in butter until golden and fish flakes. Serve with brown butter, lemon, and parsley.

Crab-stuffed flounder.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup mayonnaise. Mix crab with breadcrumbs, mayo, Dijon, Old Bay. Place stuffing on fillets, roll. Bake at 375°F with butter 20-25 minutes until fish flakes. Serve with lemon.

Crab imperial.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz lump crab meat, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 3 large eggs, 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 1 tablespoon Old Bay seasoning, 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs, 4 tablespoons butter. Gently fold crab with mayo, egg, Dijon, Worcestershire, Old Bay. Place in ramekins or crab shells. Top with buttered breadcrumbs. Bake at 375°F 20-25 minutes until golden and heated through.

Crab Norfolk.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz lump crab meat, 3 tablespoons butter, 3/4 cup white wine, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/3 cup fresh parsley. Sauté crab gently in butter. Add wine, lemon juice, Worcestershire. Heat through without breaking up crab. Garnish with parsley. Virginia classic.

Deviled crab.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz lump crab meat, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 2 cups whole milk, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 1.5 cups breadcrumbs, 12 oz crab meat, 2 tablespoons dried parsley. Make béchamel, add mustard, cayenne. Fold in crab. Stuff into clean crab shells. Top with buttered breadcrumbs. Bake at 375°F 20 minutes until golden.

ingredients: For remoulade: 1 cup mayo, 2 tbsp Creole mustard, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 2 cloves garlic minced, 1 tsp hot sauce
Soft shell crab sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 s oft shell crabs cleaned, 1 cup flour, 1 cup cornmeal, 2 tsp Old Bay seasoning, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp cayenne, 2 eggs beaten with 1/4 cup milk, 4 brioche buns. 1. Make remoulade: Mix mayo, mustard, lemon juice, garlic, and hot sauce. Refrigerate. 2. Mix flour, cornmeal, Old Bay, salt, and cayenne in shallow dish. 3. Heat 1/2 inch oil in large skillet to 375°F. 4. Dip crabs in egg mixture, then coat in flour mixture. 5. Fry crabs 3-4 min per side until golden brown and crispy. Drain on paper towels. 6. Toast buns, spread remoulade on both sides. Add lettuce, fried soft shell crab, and tomato. Serve immediately.

Soft shell crab amandine.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb lump crab meat, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 4 tablespoons butter, 3/4 cup chopped almonds, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/3 cup fresh parsley, 2 cups 1, sliced pepper. Clean crabs. Dredge in seasoned flour. Pan-fry in butter until golden. Remove. Toast almonds in same butter until golden. Add lemon juice and parsley. Pour almond butter over crabs.

Alligator bites.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs alligator meat, 1 cup flour, 1 tablespoon Cajun seasoning, 3 tablespoons butter, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Cut alligator into bite-sized pieces. Marinate in buttermilk 2 hours. Season flour with Cajun seasoning. Dredge and fry at 350°F until golden, about 4 minutes.

Frog legs.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb frog legs, 1/4 cup flour, 3 tablespoons butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Season frog legs with salt and pepper, dust with flour. Sauté in butter until golden and cooked through, about 4-5 minutes per side. Add garlic last minute. Finish with lemon juice and parsley.

ingredients: For waffles: 2 cups flour, 2 tbsp sugar, 1 tbsp baking powder, 1/2 tsp salt, 2 eggs, 1.75 cups milk, 1/2 cup melted butter
Maple syrup and butter for serving
Chicken and waffles.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 chicken thighs or breast tenders, 1 cup buttermilk, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp cayenne. 1. Marinate chicken in buttermilk 2 hours or overnight. 2. Mix flour, paprika, garlic powder, cayenne, salt, pepper. 3. Heat oil to 350°F in deep skillet. Dredge chicken in seasoned flour, fry 6-8 min per side until golden and cooked through (165°F). Drain. 4. Make waffles: Mix dry ingredients. Whisk eggs, milk, butter separately. Combine wet and dry. 5. Cook waffles in preheated waffle iron 4-5 min until golden. 6. Serve fried chicken on top of waffles with maple syrup and butter.

Chicken and waffles with hot chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 1/4 cup maple syrup. Make Nashville hot chicken: buttermilk marinate, flour dredge, fry, brush with cayenne-sugar-lard paste. Make waffles. Stack hot chicken on waffle. Drizzle maple syrup.

Biscuits and gravy with sausage patties.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb biscuits, 1 lb Italian sausage, 1/4 cup flour, 1 cup milk, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Make gravy with sausage drippings. Form and cook sausage patties separately. Split biscuits, ladle gravy over, crown with sausage patties.

Country ham and red-eye gravy.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz ham steak, diced, 4 tablespoons butter, 1 cup coffee, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 3 large eggs, 1 cup stone-ground grits. Pan-fry country ham in butter. Remove. Add strong coffee and brown sugar to drippings, simmer to make red-eye gravy. Serve ham with gravy, fried eggs, and grits.

ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts pounded thin
For gravy: 4 tbsp pan drippings, 4 tbsp flour, 2.5 cups whole milk, salt and pepper
Chicken-fried chicken with white gravy.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts pounded thin, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tsp paprika, 2 tsp garlic powder, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp cayenne, 2 cups buttermilk, 2 eggs beaten. 1. Mix buttermilk and eggs. Mix flour with paprika, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and cayenne. 2. Pound chicken to 1/2-inch thickness. Dredge in flour, dip in buttermilk, then flour again. 3. Heat 1/2 inch oil in skillet to 350°F. Fry chicken 4-5 min per side until golden and 165°F internal temp. Drain on rack. 4. For gravy: Pour off all but 4 tbsp oil. Whisk in 4 tbsp flour, cook 2 min. Gradually add milk, whisking. Simmer 5-7 min until thick. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve chicken smothered in white gravy.

Smothered pork chops in onion gravy.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 (6-8 oz each) bone-in pork chops, 2 medium onions, diced, 1/4 cup flour, 3 cups chicken broth, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 6 cloves garlic, minced. Season chops, dredge in flour. Brown in butter, remove. Caramelize sliced onions in drippings. Add flour, cook 1 minute. Add broth. Return chops. Cover, simmer 40 minutes until chops are very tender.

Smothered chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 (5-6 oz) bone-in chicken thighs, 1 cup flour, 3 cups chicken broth, 3/4 cup heavy cream, 4 tablespoons butter, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon thyme. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Brown in butter 4 minutes per side. Remove. Add flour, cook 1 minute. Add broth, cream, thyme, garlic. Return chicken. Cover, simmer 30 minutes until chicken is tender.

Country captain chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 (5-6 oz) bone-in chicken thighs, 1 tablespoon curry powder, 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes, 1/2 cup raisins, 1 cup slivered almonds, 3 cups chicken broth, 4 tablespoons butter, 1 cup jasmine rice. Brown chicken. Add curry powder, cook 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer 30 minutes. Add raisins. Serve over rice, topped with toasted almonds.

Hot brown.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup turkey breast, 1 cup Texas toast, 2 tablespoons Mornay sauce, 6 slices bacon, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 3 tablespoons butter, 1 cup flour, 1.5 cups milk. Make Mornay: roux with butter and flour, add milk, stir in parmesan until smooth. Toast bread in baking dish. Top with sliced turkey. Cover with Mornay sauce. Top with bacon. Broil until bubbly and browned.

ingredients: For cheese sauce: 4 tbsp butter, 4 tbsp flour, 2 cups milk, 1 cup beer, 3 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 tsp Worcestershire, 1/2 tsp mustard powder, Salt and pepper
Horseshoe sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 slices Texas toast, 1.5 lbs hamburger patties or ham steaks, 4 cups French fries (frozen or homemade). 1. Toast Texas toast slices. Cook burger patties or ham steaks until done. Prepare French fries according to package or recipe. 2. Make cheese sauce: Melt butter in saucepan over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min. Gradually add milk and beer, whisking constantly. Bring to simmer. 3. Reduce heat to low. Stir in cheese, Worcestershire, and mustard powder until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Keep warm. 4. Assemble on plates: 2 toast slices, top with meat, pile French fries on top. 5. Smother everything generously with cheese sauce. 6. Sprinkle with paprika and serve immediately.

Jibarito.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 g reen plantains, peeled, 1 lb skirt steak, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 tbsp lime juice, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp oregano, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, 4 slices American cheese, 2 large tomatoes, sliced, 1 large onion, sliced, 2 cups shredded lettuce, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tbsp ketchup, 1 tbsp hot sauce. 1. Cut each plantain in half crosswise. Heat 2 inches of vegetable oil in large skillet to 350°F. 2. Fry plantain halves for 3-4 minutes until golden. Remove and drain. 3. Place each fried plantain between plastic wrap. Using heavy pan or tostonera, flatten to 1/4-inch thick. 4. Return flattened plantains to 375°F oil and fry for 2-3 minutes per side until crispy and golden. Drain and season with salt. 5. Marinate steak: Mix garlic, olive oil, lime juice, cumin, oregano, salt, and pepper. Coat steak and marinate 30 minutes. 6. Heat grill or cast iron skillet to high heat (450°F). Cook steak for 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare. Let rest 5 minutes, then slice thin against the grain. 7. Mix mayo, ketchup, and hot sauce for sauce. 8. To assemble: Use 2 flattened plantains as bread. Spread sauce on both pieces. 9. On bottom plantain, layer lettuce, sliced steak, cheese, tomato, and onion. Top with second plantain. 10. Cut in half and serve immediately.

ingredients: For coney sauce: 1 lb ground beef, 1 onion minced fine, 2 cloves garlic minced, 2 tbsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp paprika, 1/2 cup water, 2 tbsp ketchup, 1 tbsp yellow mustard, salt and pepper
Flint coney.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 all-beef hot dogs, 8 hot dog buns. 1. Make coney sauce: Brown ground beef in skillet over medium heat, breaking it up very fine, 7-8 min. Drain excess fat. 2. Add minced onion and garlic, cook 3 min. Stir in chili powder, cumin, paprika, water, ketchup, mustard, salt, and pepper. 3. Simmer 20-25 min, stirring occasionally, until thick and flavorful. 4. Grill or boil hot dogs until heated through and slightly charred, about 5-7 min. 5. Steam or toast buns. Place hot dogs in buns. 6. Top each with yellow mustard stripe, generous portion of coney sauce, and diced onions. Serve immediately.

ingredients: For chili: 1 lb ground beef, 1 can (8 oz) tomato sauce, 1 cup beef broth, 2 tbsp chili powder, 1 tbsp cocoa powder, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 tsp allspice, salt
Skyline chili cheese fries.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs frozen French fries, 3 cups shredded cheddar cheese. 1. Cook French fries according to package directions until crispy. 2. Make Cincinnati-style chili: Brown beef in pot 7-8 min, don't drain. Add tomato sauce, broth, chili powder, cocoa, cinnamon, allspice, and salt. Simmer 30 min until thick. 3. Arrange hot fries on serving platter or in individual dishes. 4. Top generously with hot chili. 5. Cover with shredded cheddar cheese. 6. Top with diced onions and hot sauce if desired. Serve immediately while fries are crispy.

ingredients: hamburger buns or hot dog buns
Chili size.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef (80/20), 1 onion diced fine, 3 cloves garlic minced, 1 can (8 oz) tomato sauce, 1 cup beef broth, 2 tbsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1/2 tsp paprika, 4 hamburger buns or hot dog buns, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese. 1. Brown ground beef in skillet over medium-high heat 7-8 min. Drain excess fat. 2. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 3. Stir in tomato sauce, broth, chili powder, cumin, and paprika. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Simmer 20-25 min until thick. 5. Split buns, toast if desired. Place on plates. 6. Top each with generous portion of chili, shredded cheese, and diced onions. Serve immediately.

Frito pie supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef (80/20), 1 onion diced, 2 cloves garlic minced, 1 can (15 oz) chili beans, 1 can (8 oz) tomato sauce, 2 tbsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1 large bag (13 oz) Fritos, 2 cups shredded cheddar, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup guacamole, 1 cup salsa. 1. Brown ground beef in skillet 7-8 min. Drain fat. Add onion, cook 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 2. Stir in beans, tomato sauce, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper. Simmer 15-20 min until thick. 3. Layer Fritos in serving dish or individual bowls. Top with hot chili and shredded cheese. 4. Add generous dollops of sour cream, guacamole, and salsa. 5. Top with jalapeños, tomatoes, green onions, olives, and cilantro. 6. Serve immediately while Fritos are still crispy.

Walking taco.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups Fritos chips, 1.5 lbs ground beef (80/20), 3 tablespoons taco seasoning, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 6 cups torn lettuce, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes, 1 cup salsa. Brown beef with taco seasoning. Open small Fritos bag from side. Add seasoned beef, shredded cheese, lettuce, tomato, sour cream, salsa. Eat directly from bag with fork.

Taco pizza.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, 1 lb ground beef, 1 packet taco seasoning, 1/2 cup water, 1 cup refried beans, 2 cups cheddar cheese, shredded, 1 cup mozzarella, shredded. 1. Preheat oven to 475°F. Brown beef in skillet over medium-high heat 8 min, breaking up meat. Drain fat. Add taco seasoning and water, simmer 5 min until thickened. 2. Roll pizza dough into 14-inch circle. Transfer to greased pizza pan. 3. Spread refried beans over dough as sauce. Sprinkle half the cheddar and all the mozzarella. Top with seasoned beef and remaining cheddar. 4. Bake 12-15 min until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly. 5. Remove from oven, top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, black olives. Drizzle with sour cream and salsa. Sprinkle crushed tortilla chips on top. 6. Slice and serve immediately.

Mexican pizza.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 (16 oz) can refried beans, 1.5 lbs ground beef (80/20), 3 tablespoons taco seasoning, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 3 cups enchilada sauce, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/2 cup sour cream. Cook beef with taco seasoning. Fry tortillas until crispy. Spread beans on one tortilla, add beef, top with another tortilla. Spread enchilada sauce and cheese on top. Bake at 400°F 10 minutes until cheese melts. Top with sour cream.

Navajo taco.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 2 cups whole milk, 1 lb ground beef, 3 tablespoons taco seasoning, 1 (16 oz) can refried beans, 8 oz shredded cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Make frybread: mix flour, baking powder, salt, milk. Roll into rounds, fry until golden and puffed. Top with refried beans, seasoned beef, cheese, sour cream.

Frybread.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1.5 cups milk, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Mix 2 cups flour, 1 tbsp baking powder, 1 tsp salt. Add 3/4 cup warm milk to form soft dough. Rest 30 minutes. Divide and roll into 6-inch circles. Fry in hot oil (375°F) until golden and puffed, about 2 minutes per side.

ingredients: bolillo rolls or hot dog buns
whole roasted green chiles or pickled jalapeños
Sonoran hot dog.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 all-beef hot dogs, 8 strips bacon, 8 bolillo rolls or hot dog buns, 1 can (16 oz) pinto beans warmed, 1 cup diced tomatoes, 1 cup diced white onion, 1/2 cup chopped cilantro, 8 whole roasted green chiles or pickled jalapeños. 1. Wrap each hot dog tightly with 1 bacon strip, securing with toothpicks. 2. Heat griddle or large skillet over medium heat. Cook bacon-wrapped hot dogs 8-10 min, turning frequently, until bacon is crispy and hot dog is heated through. 3. Brush buns with oil, toast on griddle until lightly browned. 4. Spread each bun with pinto beans. Place bacon-wrapped hot dog in bun. 5. Top with tomatoes, onion, cilantro, whole green chile, mustard, mayonnaise, and green salsa. 6. Serve immediately.

Danger dog.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef brisket, 6 slices bacon, 1/2 cup hot dog buns, 1 large onion, diced, 3 jalapeños, sliced, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon mustard, 1/3 cup ketchup. Wrap hot dogs in bacon, grill until bacon is crispy. Toast buns. Add dog with grilled onions, sliced jalapeños, mayo, mustard, ketchup. LA street food classic.

Seattle hot dog.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 all-beef hot dogs, 8 hot dog buns, 2 tbsp butter, 2 large onions sliced, 8 oz cream cheese softened. 1. Caramelize onions in butter over medium heat 15-20 min until deep golden brown. Set aside. 2. Grill hot dogs over medium-high heat 5-7 min, turning occasionally, until charred. 3. Toast buns on grill 1-2 min until lightly browned. 4. Spread generous amount of cream cheese inside each bun. 5. Place hot dog in bun, top with caramelized onions, yellow mustard, hot sauce, and jalapeños. 6. Serve immediately.

Chicago hot dog.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 all-beef hot dogs, 8 poppy seed hot dog buns, 4 tomato wedges per hot dog, 4 pickle spears, 8 s port peppers. 1. Bring large pot of water to boil. Add hot dogs, simmer 5 min until heated through. Alternatively, grill hot dogs over medium heat 5-7 min, turning occasionally. 2. Steam buns by placing them over the pot of hot dog water for 1-2 min, or wrap in damp towel and microwave 15-20 seconds. 3. Place hot dog in bun. 4. Top in this order: Yellow mustard stripe, bright green relish, chopped onion, 4 tomato wedges, pickle spear, 2 sport peppers. 5. Sprinkle generously with celery salt. 6. Serve immediately. Never add ketchup to a Chicago-style hot dog!

Corn dog with fancy mustards.directions: Ingredients needed: 10 hot dogs, 3 cups fresh corn, 1 cup flour, 4 large eggs, 1.5 cups milk, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1/4 cup sugar, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons yellow mustard, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard. Make corndog batter. Insert sticks, coat dogs in batter. Fry at 365°F until golden. Serve with variety of fancy mustards for dipping.

Pigs in blanket with everything bagel se.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 hot dogs, 1/2 cup crescent roll dough, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 1/2 teaspoon everything bagel seasoning, 2 tablespoons yellow mustard. Roll each mini hot dog in crescent dough triangle. Brush with melted butter. Sprinkle generously with everything bagel seasoning. Bake at 375°F for 12-15 minutes until golden. Serve with mustard.

ingredients: goat cheese or blue cheese, softened
Bacon-wrapped dates stuffed with cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 24 Medjool dates, pitted, 4 oz goat cheese or blue cheese, softened, 12 strips bacon, cut in half, 2 tbsp honey, 1/4 tsp black pepper, 24 toothpicks. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Line baking sheet with parchment. 2. Make slit in each date, remove pit if needed. Stuff with 1 tsp cheese and optional almond. 3. Wrap each date with half strip of bacon, secure with toothpick. 4. Place seam-side down on baking sheet. 5. Bake 20-25 min until bacon crispy, turning once halfway. 6. Drizzle with honey, sprinkle with black pepper. Let cool 5 min before serving.

Devils on horseback.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup chopped dates, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 8 slices thick-cut bacon. Stuff dates with blue cheese. Wrap each in half strip bacon. Secure with toothpicks. Bake at 400°F 15-20 minutes until bacon is crispy. Remove picks before serving.

Pimento cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 12 oz cream cheese, 1 cup pimentos, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 tsp cayenne, 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce. Grate cheddar, mix with softened cream cheese and mayo. Fold in drained chopped pimentos, minced garlic, cayenne, Worcestershire, salt. Chill before serving with crackers or as a spread.

Beer cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 4 oz cream cheese, 1 (12 oz) bottle beer, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1 tablespoon mustard, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper. Shred cheddar. Melt cream cheese, stir in cheddar. Add beer gradually while stirring. Season with garlic powder, Worcestershire, mustard, cayenne. Serve warm with pretzels.

Pub cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz shredded cheese, 4 oz cream cheese, 1 (12 oz) bottle beer, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 2 tablespoons yellow mustard, 1/4 tsp cayenne. Blend cheddar, cream cheese, splash of beer, garlic powder, Worcestershire, mustard, and cayenne until smooth. Chill for 2 hours for flavors to meld. Serve with soft pretzels or crackers.

Hot crab dip.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz lump crab meat, 8 oz cream cheese, softened, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 8 oz shredded cheese, 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 teaspoon Old Bay seasoning, 4 cloves garlic, minced. Mix soft cream cheese with mayo, Worcestershire, Old Bay, garlic. Fold in crab and half the cheddar. Transfer to baking dish. Top with remaining cheese. Bake at 350°F 25 minutes until bubbly. Serve with crackers.

ingredients: Celery sticks and tortilla chips for serving
Buffalo chicken dip.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 cups cooked chicken shredded, 8 oz cream cheese softened, 1 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup ranch dressing, 3/4 cup hot sauce (Frank's RedHot), 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese (divided), 1/4 cup blue cheese crumbles, 2 g reen onions sliced. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease 9x9 baking dish. 2. In large bowl, mix cream cheese, sour cream, ranch, and hot sauce until smooth. 3. Fold in chicken, 1.5 cups cheddar cheese, blue cheese, and half the green onions. 4. Transfer to baking dish, spread evenly. Top with remaining 1/2 cup cheddar. 5. Bake 20-25 min until bubbly and golden on top. 6. Garnish with remaining green onions. Serve hot with celery sticks and tortilla chips.

ingredients: warm tortillas or tortilla chips for serving
Queso fundido.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb Mexican chorizo, casings removed, 1/2 cup diced onion, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 jalapeño, seeded and diced, 3 cups shredded Oaxaca cheese (or mozzarella), 2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1/2 cup diced tomatoes, 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. 2. In large cast iron skillet over medium-high heat, cook chorizo, breaking it up with spoon, for 6-8 minutes until browned and crispy. 3. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeño. Cook for 3-4 minutes until softened. 4. Reduce heat to low. Add Oaxaca cheese, Monterey Jack, cheddar, and heavy cream. Stir continuously until cheeses begin to melt. 5. Transfer skillet to oven and bake for 10-12 minutes until cheese is completely melted, bubbly, and golden on top. 6. Remove from oven and top with diced tomatoes and cilantro. 7. Serve immediately while hot and gooey with warm tortillas or tortilla chips for scooping. Squeeze lime juice over top. Return to oven briefly if cheese starts to solidify.

Queso flameado.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 8 oz Spanish chorizo, sliced, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 3 cups poblano peppers, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour. Brown crumbled chorizo with diced onion and poblano. Place shredded Oaxaca cheese in cast iron skillet. Bake at 400°F until melted and bubbly. Top with chorizo mixture. Serve with warm tortillas.

Loaded queso.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 , sliced jalapeños. Brown beef, add taco seasoning. Cube Velveeta, melt with milk and Rotel over low heat, stirring. Add cooked beef and sliced jalapeños. Serve hot with chips.

ingredients: (10 oz) diced tomatoes with green chiles drained
Brisket queso.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb shredded smoked brisket, 2 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp flour, 1.5 cups milk, 1 cup beer, 3 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded pepper Jack cheese, 1 can (10 oz) diced tomatoes with green chiles drained, 1 tsp cumin, 1/2 tsp chili powder. 1. Melt butter in large saucepan over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min. 2. Gradually add milk and beer, whisking constantly. Bring to simmer. 3. Reduce heat to low. Stir in cheeses, whisking until smooth and melted. 4. Fold in brisket, tomatoes with chiles, cumin, and chili powder. Heat through 5 min, stirring frequently. 5. Transfer to serving bowl or keep warm in slow cooker. 6. Serve hot with tortilla chips for dipping.

Brisket nachos.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 bag (13 oz) tortilla chips, 2 cups shredded smoked brisket, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack, 1 cup BBQ sauce, 1/2 cup pickled jalapeños, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup diced red onion, 2 g reen onions sliced. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Line large baking sheet with parchment. 2. Spread half the chips on sheet. Top with half the brisket mixed with 1/2 cup BBQ sauce, and half the cheese. 3. Add second layer: remaining chips, brisket with BBQ sauce, and cheese. 4. Bake 10-12 min until cheese is melted and bubbly. 5. Remove from oven, immediately top with jalapeños, sour cream, red onion, green onions, and cilantro. 6. Serve immediately while hot and crispy.

Irish nachos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs russet potatoes, 1 lb cooked corned beef diced, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded Swiss cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup Thousand Island dressing, 1/2 cup sauerkraut drained, 4 g reen onions sliced. 1. Slice potatoes into 1/4-inch rounds. Soak in cold water 30 min, drain and pat dry. 2. Heat 2 inches oil to 375°F. Fry potato rounds in batches 4-5 min until golden and crispy. Drain on paper towels, season with salt. 3. Preheat oven to 400°F. Arrange fried potato rounds on large baking sheet. 4. Top with corned beef and both cheeses. Bake 8-10 min until cheese is melted. 5. Drizzle with sour cream and Thousand Island dressing. Top with sauerkraut, green onions, and parsley. 6. Serve immediately.

Totchos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups tater tots, 2 lbs ground beef, 2 tablespoons taco seasoning, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 jalapeño, seeded and minced, 1/2 cup sour cream, 2 cups salsa, 2 cups guacamole. Bake tots until extra crispy. Brown beef with taco seasoning. Layer tots on plate, top with beef, cheese, broil to melt. Add jalapeños, sour cream, salsa, and guacamole.

Waffle fry nachos supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 bag (28 oz) frozen waffle fries, 1 lb ground beef, 1 packet taco seasoning, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese, 1 can (15 oz) black beans drained, 1 cup salsa, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup guacamole, 1/4 cup sliced jalapeños, 1/4 cup diced tomatoes, 1/4 cup sliced black olives, 2 g reen onions sliced. 1. Cook waffle fries according to package directions until extra crispy. 2. Brown ground beef in skillet 7-8 min. Drain fat, add taco seasoning and water per package directions. Simmer 5 min. 3. Preheat oven to 400°F. Arrange half the waffle fries on large baking sheet. Top with half the seasoned beef, beans, and cheese. 4. Add second layer of fries, remaining beef, beans, and cheese. 5. Bake 8-10 min until cheese is melted and bubbly. 6. Remove from oven, top with salsa, sour cream, guacamole, jalapeños, tomatoes, olives, green onions, and cilantro. Serve immediately.
