Potato skins loaded.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup sour cream. Bake potatoes until tender. Halve, scoop out most of flesh. Brush skins with butter, bake until crispy. Fill with cheese and bacon. Bake until cheese melts. Top with sour cream and scallions.

Twice-baked potatoes stuffed high.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 , sliced pepper. Bake potatoes, halve and scoop flesh. Mash flesh with butter, sour cream, milk, half the cheese. Pile high back into skins. Top with remaining cheese and bacon. Bake until golden. Garnish with chives.

Hasselback loaded potatoes.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 , sliced pepper. Slice potatoes thinly across the top, leaving bottom intact. Brush with melted butter, season. Bake at 425°F for 45 minutes. Insert cheese and bacon between slices. Bake until cheese melts. Top with sour cream, chives.

Baked potato soup in bread bowl.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 large russet potatoes, 6 cups chicken broth, 1 onion, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup flour, 2 cups heavy cream, 1 cup sour cream, 3 cups sharp cheddar cheese, shredded, 10 slices bacon, cooked crispy and crumbled, 1/2 cup green onions, sliced, 4 large sourdough bread bowls. 1. Bake 4 potatoes at 400°F for 1 hour until tender. Peel and cube remaining 4 potatoes. 2. In pot, combine cubed potatoes, broth, onion, garlic. Boil, then simmer 20 min until tender. Mash some, leaving chunks. 3. Melt butter, whisk in flour, cook 2 min. Gradually whisk in cream. Add to soup, simmer 5 min. 4. Scoop flesh from baked potatoes, add to soup. Stir in sour cream and cheese until melted. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Hollow out bread bowls, brush with butter, toast at 350°F for 10 min. 6. Ladle soup into bread bowls. Top with bacon, green onions, extra cheese.

Loaded mashed potato cakes.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup sour cream. Mix cold mashed potatoes with cheese, bacon bits, scallions, egg, and flour. Form into patties. Pan-fry in butter until golden and crispy on both sides. Serve topped with sour cream.

Pommes dauphine.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 3 tablespoons butter, 1 cup flour, 3 large eggs, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Make mashed potatoes. Make choux: boil water with butter, add flour, stir until ball forms, beat in eggs one at a time. Mix equal parts mash and choux. Shape into balls. Fry at 350°F until golden and puffed.

Potato galette.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 3 tablespoons butter, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon thyme. Slice potatoes very thin (mandoline). Melt butter in oven-safe skillet. Layer potatoes in overlapping circles, brushing each layer with butter, seasoning with salt, pepper, thyme. Cover, bake at 400°F 40 minutes. Uncover, broil to brown top.

R\u00f6sti.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 3 tablespoons butter, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Parboil potatoes, let cool completely. Grate coarsely. Season with salt and pepper. Melt butter in nonstick pan. Add potatoes in even layer, press firmly. Cook 10-12 minutes per side until golden and crispy throughout.

Latkes.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 medium russet potatoes, cubed, 3 large eggs, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup applesauce. Grate potatoes, squeeze out all moisture. Mix with beaten egg, flour, salt, pepper. Form patties. Fry in 1/4 inch oil until golden and crispy, 4-5 minutes per side. Drain on rack. Serve with sour cream and applesauce.

Latkes with cr\u00e8me fra\u00eeche and.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 medium russet potatoes, cubed, 2 medium onions, diced, 3 large eggs, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1.5 cups 1, sliced pepper, 1/4 cup oil, 2 cups crème fraîche, 8 oz caviar, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives. Grate potatoes and onion, squeeze dry. Mix with eggs, flour, salt, pepper. Form patties, fry in oil until golden and crispy. Top each latke with crème fraîche, caviar, and chives.

Potato pierogi with brown butter and bac.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup sour cream. Make dough with flour, egg, sour cream, salt. Fill with mashed potato-cheese mixture. Boil, then pan-fry in butter until golden. Top with brown butter, crispy bacon bits, and caramelized onion.

Loaded pierogi casserole.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 boxes (16 oz each) frozen pierogis, 1 lb bacon, chopped, 1 large onion, sliced, 2 cups sour cream, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of mushroom soup, 3 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup chicken broth, 4 g reen onions, sliced, 2 tbsp butter, 1 tsp garlic powder. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease a 9x13 baking dish. 2. Cook bacon in large skillet over medium heat until crispy, 8-10 minutes. Remove with slotted spoon and set aside. 3. In bacon fat, sauté sliced onion 8-10 minutes until caramelized. Remove and set aside. 4. In bowl, whisk together sour cream, cream of mushroom soup, chicken broth, and garlic powder. 5. Layer half the frozen pierogis in baking dish. Top with half the bacon, half the onions, half the soup mixture, and 1 cup cheese. 6. Repeat layers with remaining ingredients, ending with cheese on top. 7. Dot top with butter pieces. Cover with foil. Bake 45 minutes. Remove foil and bake 15 minutes more until bubbly and golden. Let rest 10 minutes. Garnish with green onions.

Gnocchi in brown butter sage.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs potato gnocchi (fresh or frozen), 1/2 cup butter, 2 tablespoons fresh sage, chopped, 4 cloves garlic, thinly sliced, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, grated, 2 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 2 lemons, juiced and zested. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook gnocchi according to package directions. Fresh gnocchi will float in 2-3 min; frozen takes 3-4 min. Reserve 1 cup cooking water before draining gently. 2. While gnocchi cooks, melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Add sage leaves, cook 2-3 min until crispy and butter begins to brown and smell nutty. Remove sage to paper towel. 3. Add garlic to brown butter, cook 1 min until fragrant. Watch carefully so garlic doesn't burn. 4. Add drained gnocchi to skillet with brown butter. Gently toss to coat. Cook 2-3 min until gnocchi develops golden crust on some sides. 5. Add nutmeg, salt, pepper. Add 2-3 tbsp reserved cooking water to create silky sauce. Add Parmesan, toss gently. 6. Serve immediately topped with crispy sage leaves, more Parmesan, lemon zest, and cracked black pepper.

Gnocchi alla vodka.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs potato gnocchi (fresh or frozen), 4 tbsp butter, 8 oz 1 shallot, minced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 6 oz tomato paste, 1/2 cup vodka, 1.5 cups heavy cream, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 cups baby spinach, 3 cups Salt and pepper to taste, 1 teaspoon dried basil. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook gnocchi until they float, 2-4 min. Reserve 1 cup cooking water, drain gently. 2. Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Add shallot, cook 3 min. Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 min. 3. Add tomato paste, cook 3 min, stirring constantly, until deep red and fragrant. Add vodka, simmer 5 min until thick. 4. Reduce heat to medium-low. Stir in cream, simmer 5 min until thickened and coral-colored. Add Parmesan, stir until melted. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Add gnocchi and spinach to sauce, toss gently. Cook 1-2 min until spinach wilts. Add cooking water if needed to loosen sauce. 6. Serve immediately topped with basil and extra Parmesan.

ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
Fried gnocchi with parmesan.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs potato gnocchi (fresh or frozen), 4 tbsp olive oil, 4 tbsp butter, 6 cloves garlic, sliced, 15 fresh sage leaves, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook gnocchi until they float, 2-4 min. Drain very well, pat dry with paper towels. This is crucial for crisping. 2. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add gnocchi in single layer, don't stir for 3-4 min to get golden crust on bottom. Flip, fry another 3 min until crispy all over. Work in batches if needed. Remove to plate. 3. In same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and sage, cook 2 min until garlic is golden and sage is crispy. 4. Return fried gnocchi to skillet, toss to coat in garlic butter. Add red pepper flakes, salt, pepper. Remove from heat. Add Parmesan and lemon zest, toss to combine. 5. Serve immediately garnished with parsley and extra Parmesan.

Gnocchi mac and cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs potato gnocchi, 6 tbsp butter, 6 tbsp flour, 4 cups whole milk, 3 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese, 2 cups shredded Gruyere cheese, 1 cup grated Parmesan, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs, 2 tbsp melted butter. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook gnocchi in boiling salted water 2-3 min until they float. Drain and set aside. 2. In large pot, melt 6 tbsp butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min. 3. Gradually add milk, whisking constantly. Bring to simmer, cook 5 min until thickened. 4. Remove from heat. Stir in cheddar, Gruyere, and half the Parmesan until melted. Add salt, pepper, and nutmeg. 5. Fold in cooked gnocchi. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. 6. Mix panko with melted butter and remaining Parmesan. Sprinkle over top. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and golden. Garnish with parsley.

Shepherd's pie with lamb and Guinness.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs lamb shoulder, cubed, 2 lbs potatoes, peeled and cubed, 1 large onion, diced, 2 carrots, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup Guinness stout, 1 cup lamb stock, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 2 tbsp flour, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 4 tbsp butter, 2 sprigs fresh rosemary, 2 sprigs fresh thyme, 1 cup frozen peas, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. Boil potatoes in salted water 15 min until tender. Drain, mash with butter and cream. Season, set aside. 2. Season lamb with salt and pepper. Brown in batches in Dutch oven with 2 tbsp olive oil over high heat, 3 min per side. Remove. 3. Sauté onion and carrots 6 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. Sprinkle flour, stir 2 min. Add tomato paste, cook 1 min. 4. Add Guinness, scraping browned bits. Add stock, Worcestershire, rosemary, and thyme. Return lamb. Bring to simmer. 5. Cover, transfer to oven. Braise 1 1/2 hours until lamb is very tender. 6. Remove herbs. Stir in peas. Transfer to 9x13 dish. Spread mashed potatoes on top, create texture with fork. 7. Increase oven to 400°F. Bake 25-30 min until golden. Rest 10 min.

Cottage pie with bone marrow gravy.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef (80/20), 4 oz bone marrow, scooped from bones, 2 lbs potatoes, peeled and cubed, 1 onion, diced, 2 carrots, diced, 2 celery stalks, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups beef stock, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 2 tbsp Worcestershire, 2 tbsp flour, 1/2 cup cream, 4 tbsp butter, 2 tsp thyme, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Boil potatoes in salted water 15 min. Drain, mash with butter and cream. Season well. 2. Heat bone marrow in large skillet over medium-high heat until melted, 2 min. Brown beef in marrow fat, breaking up, 8 min. Season. Remove. 3. Sauté onion, carrots, celery in fat 8 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 4. Return beef. Sprinkle flour, stir 2 min. Add tomato paste, cook 1 min. 5. Add stock, Worcestershire, thyme. Simmer 15 min until rich and thick. Adjust seasoning. 6. Transfer to 9x13 dish. Spread potatoes on top, create peaks with fork. 7. Bake 25-30 min until golden. Rest 10 min.

Bangers and mash with onion... skip onio.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 British pork sausages (Cumberland or similar), 2 lbs potatoes, peeled and cubed, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 4 tbsp butter, 2 cups beef stock, 2 tbsp flour, 1 tbsp butter for gravy, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Boil potatoes in salted water 15 min until tender. Drain well. Mash with cream and butter until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Keep warm. 2. Heat 1 tbsp oil in large skillet over medium heat. Cook sausages, turning often, 15-18 min until browned and cooked through (160°F). Remove, keep warm. 3. MAKE GRAVY: Pour off most fat, leave 1 tbsp. Add butter, melt. Sprinkle in flour, cook stirring 2 min. Gradually whisk in stock. Simmer 5 min until thickened. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Serve sausages over mashed potatoes with gravy poured over everything.

Toad in the hole with extra crispy batte.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 thick pork sausages, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup cornstarch, 4 large eggs, 1 1/2 cups whole milk, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp black pepper, 1/4 cup beef drippings or vegetable oil, 2 tsp fresh thyme leaves. 1. Make batter: Whisk flour, cornstarch, and salt. Whisk in eggs one at a time. Gradually add milk, whisking until very smooth. Add pepper and thyme. Refrigerate 1 hour. 2. Preheat oven to 450°F. Place sausages in 9x13 metal pan, drizzle with 1 tbsp fat. Bake 15 min until browned. 3. Remove pan. Add remaining fat, return to oven 5 min until smoking hot. 4. Give batter a quick whisk. Pour around sausages in one smooth motion. Immediately return to oven. 5. Bake 30-35 min without opening door until dramatically puffed, deep golden, and very crispy. 6. Serve immediately before it deflates. Accompany with rich onion gravy.

Full English minus the veg.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 British pork sausages, 8 slices streaky bacon, 4 large eggs, 8 oz black pudding, sliced, 8 oz mushrooms, halved, 4 slices white bread, 1 can (14 oz) baked beans, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 200°F for keeping food warm. 2. Heat 1 tbsp oil in large skillet over medium heat. Cook sausages, turning, 15 min until browned and cooked through. Transfer to oven. 3. In same pan, cook bacon until crispy, 6-8 min. Transfer to oven. 4. Cook black pudding slices 2-3 min per side until crispy outside. Transfer to oven. 5. Sauté mushrooms in pan drippings until golden, 6 min. Season. Transfer to oven. 6. Heat beans in small pot over low heat. 7. Toast bread, butter generously. 8. Fry eggs in clean skillet with butter to desired doneness. 9. Arrange everything on warm plates: sausages, bacon, black pudding, mushrooms, beans, fried eggs, and toast. Serve with strong tea.

Black pudding scotch egg.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 large eggs, plus 2 for breading, 8 oz pork sausage meat, 6 oz black pudding, crumbled, 1/2 cup flour, 2 cups panko breadcrumbs, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Boil 6 eggs 6 min 30 sec. Ice bath, peel carefully. 2. Mix sausage meat and crumbled black pudding together thoroughly. Season with salt and pepper. Divide into 6 portions. 3. Wrap each egg in sausage-black pudding mixture. 4. Coat in flour, beaten egg, then panko. 5. Heat oil to 350°F. Fry 8-9 min until deep golden and cooked through. 6. Drain, rest 3 min. Serve warm.

Scotch egg with runny yolk.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 large eggs, plus 2 for breading, 1 1/4 lbs premium pork sausage meat, 1/2 cup flour, 2 1/2 cups panko breadcrumbs, 1 tsp fresh sage, minced, 1/2 tsp fresh thyme leaves, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. 1. Boil 6 eggs exactly 5 min 30 sec for runny yolks. Immediately shock in ice water 5 min. Peel very carefully. 2. Mix sausage with sage, thyme, salt, and pepper. Divide into 6 equal portions. 3. Flatten sausage portions thin. Wrap each egg completely, making sure no gaps. Work gently to avoid breaking yolks. 4. Coat in flour, dip in beaten egg, roll in panko. 5. Refrigerate 30 min to firm up. 6. Heat oil to 325°F (lower temp for runny yolk version). Fry 2 at a time, 7-8 min, turning often for even browning. Internal temp of sausage should reach 160°F. 7. Drain, rest 2 min. Cut in half to reveal golden runny yolk. Serve immediately.

Beef Wellington individual portions.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 1 (17 oz) package puff pastry, 8 oz sliced mushrooms, 8 slices prosciutto, 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard, 3 large eggs, 1 teaspoon dried thyme. Sear medallions, brush with mustard. Wrap each in mushroom duxelles and prosciutto. Wrap in puff pastry. Brush with egg wash. Bake at 425°F 20-25 minutes until golden.

Pork Wellington.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs pork butt, 1 (17 oz) package puff pastry, 8 oz sliced mushrooms, 8 slices prosciutto, 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard, 3 large eggs, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme. Sear seasoned tenderloin. Finely chop mushrooms, cook until dry. Spread mustard on pork. Layer: plastic wrap, prosciutto, mushrooms. Place pork, roll tight. Wrap in puff pastry. Brush with egg. Bake at 425°F 25-30 minutes.

Chicken Kiev.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 (6-8 oz) boneless chicken breasts, 3 tablespoons butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 4 large eggs, 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Make garlic-herb butter: mix soft butter with garlic and parsley, freeze. Pound chicken thin. Wrap butter in chicken, roll tight. Freeze 30 min. Dredge in flour, egg, breadcrumbs. Fry at 350°F 8-10 minutes until golden and cooked. Butter should ooze when cut.

Chicken cordon bleu.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken breasts, 1 lb ham, cubed, 8 oz shredded cheese, 1 cup flour, 6 eggs, 1.5 cups breadcrumbs, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter. Pound chicken thin. Layer ham and Swiss on chicken, roll up tightly. Secure with toothpicks. Dredge in flour, egg, breadcrumbs. Pan-fry in butter 4 minutes per side until golden. Finish in 400°F oven 15 minutes. Remove picks before serving.

Stuffed chicken breast with boursin.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Cut pocket in chicken breast. Stuff with Boursin. Wrap with prosciutto. Secure with toothpicks. Season. Sear in oil, then bake at 375°F 20-25 minutes until cooked through. Remove picks.

Bacon explosion.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 strips thick-cut bacon, 1/2 cup italian sausage, 1 lb 1/2 cup bbq sauce, 1 lb 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 1 cup bbq rub. 1. Heat oil in deep pot to 375°F for frying. 2. Prepare breading station: flour in first bowl, beaten eggs in second, breadcrumbs in third. 3. Coat items in flour, dip in egg, roll in breadcrumbs. For extra crispy, double bread by repeating egg and breadcrumb steps. 4. Fry in batches 4-5 min until golden brown. Don't overcrowd. Maintain oil temperature. 5. Drain on paper towels, season with salt immediately. Serve hot.

Fatty melt.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef (80/20), 8 slices thick-cut bacon, 8 slices rye or sourdough bread, 8 slices American cheese, 2 large onions sliced, 4 tbsp butter (plus 2 tbsp for onions). 1. Cook bacon until crispy, chop and set aside. Caramelize onions in 2 tbsp butter over medium heat 15-20 min. 2. Mix ground beef with chopped bacon. Form into 4 patties, season with salt and pepper. Cook 4-5 min per side. 3. Butter one side of each bread slice. Place 4 slices butter-side down in skillet over medium heat. 4. Top each with 1 cheese slice, beef-bacon patty, caramelized onions, another cheese slice, then remaining bread butter-side up. 5. Cook 3-4 min per side until golden brown and cheese is melted. 6. Cut in half and serve hot.

Bacon weave BLT minus LT.directions: Ingredients needed: 16 strips bacon, 4 large slices bread (Texas toast), 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tbsp butter. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Create bacon weaves: For each sandwich, weave 4 bacon strips into tight square pattern on parchment paper. Bake 20-25 min until crispy. Drain on paper towels. 2. Toast bread slices until golden and crispy. 3. Spread mayo generously on each bread slice. 4. Place bacon weave on bread, top with second slice. 5. Cut in half and serve immediately.

Million dollar bacon.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Line sheet pan with foil. Arrange bacon. Mix brown sugar, maple syrup, cayenne, black pepper. Spread mixture on bacon. Bake at 400°F 20-25 minutes until caramelized and crispy. Cool slightly (sugar is molten hot).

Pig candy.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/4 tsp cayenne. Line bacon strips on rack over sheet pan. Coat generously with brown sugar, black pepper, and cayenne. Bake at 375°F for 25-30 minutes until caramelized and crispy. Cool completely before serving.

ingredients: pork belly, skin removed, cut into 1.5-inch cubes
Pork belly burnt ends.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs pork belly, skin removed, cut into 1.5-inch cubes, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp paprika, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp onion powder, 2 tsp black pepper, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp cayenne pepper, 1 cup BBQ sauce, 1/2 cup honey, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, cubed, 1/4 cup apple cider vinegar. 1. Preheat smoker or oven to 275°F. 2. In small bowl, mix brown sugar, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, salt, and cayenne. 3. Pat pork belly cubes dry. Season all sides generously with spice rub. 4. Arrange cubes on wire rack over baking sheet (or in smoker). 5. Smoke/bake for 2.5 hours until pork is tender and edges are crispy. 6. Transfer pork cubes to disposable aluminum pan. 7. Add BBQ sauce, honey, butter cubes, and apple cider vinegar to pan. Toss to coat pork. 8. Cover pan with foil and return to smoker/oven for 1 hour. 9. Remove foil and cook for additional 30-45 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes, until sauce is thick and sticky and pork is caramelized. 10. Serve hot with pickles and white bread for ultimate indulgence.

ingredients: For rub: 3 tbsp brown sugar, 2 tbsp paprika, 1 tbsp black pepper, 1 tbsp salt, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder
Brisket burnt ends.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef brisket point (fatty end), 1 cup BBQ sauce, 1/4 cup butter cubed, 2 tbsp honey. 1. Preheat smoker or oven to 250°F. Trim brisket point, leaving 1/4-inch fat cap. Cut into 1.5-inch cubes. 2. Mix rub ingredients, coat brisket cubes generously. 3. Smoke or roast 3-4 hours until bark forms and internal temp reaches 195-203°F. 4. Transfer cubes to aluminum pan. Add BBQ sauce, butter, and honey. Toss to coat. 5. Cover pan with foil, cook 1 more hour until cubes are tender and saucy. 6. Remove foil, cook 15 min more to caramelize. Serve hot.

Poor man's burnt ends.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups chuck roast, 1 cup BBQ rub, 1/2 cup BBQ sauce, 4 cups beef broth, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 3 tablespoons butter, 3 tablespoons honey. Season chuck roast with rub. Smoke at 275°F for 3 hours. Cube into 2-inch pieces. Toss with butter, honey, BBQ sauce. Smoke uncovered 2 more hours, stirring occasionally until caramelized.

Smoked chuck roast.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups chuck roast, 1 lb BBQ rub, 4 cups beef broth, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 large onion, diced, 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce. Apply rub generously to chuck roast. Smoke at 250°F until internal temp reaches 165°F. Wrap in foil with broth. Continue until 203°F. Rest 30 minutes. Slice or pull and serve with juices.

Smoked beef cheeks.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef cheeks, 1 1/2 lbs beef rub, 2 lbs beef broth, 1 lb medium, diced onion, 1 tsp cloves, minced garlic, 1/2 cup butter. 1. Heat oil in deep pot to 375°F for frying. 2. Prepare breading station: flour in first bowl, beaten eggs in second, breadcrumbs in third. 3. Coat items in flour, dip in egg, roll in breadcrumbs. For extra crispy, double bread by repeating egg and breadcrumb steps. 4. Fry in batches 2-3 min until golden brown. Don't overcrowd. Maintain oil temperature. 5. Drain on paper towels, season with salt immediately. Serve hot.

Smoked oxtail.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs oxtail, 1 cup BBQ rub, 6 cups beef broth, 1 cup dry white wine, 2 medium onions, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tablespoons tomato paste, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme. Season oxtail with rub. Smoke at 250°F for 3 hours. Braise in broth, wine, tomato paste, garlic, onion, thyme for 4 hours until meat falls off bone. Serve with braising liquid.

ingredients: For rub: 1/4 cup coarse black pepper, 3 tbsp coarse salt, 2 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp onion powder, 1 tbsp paprika
Smoked short ribs.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs beef short ribs, 1 cup BBQ sauce (optional). 1. Remove membrane from back of ribs if present. Pat dry. 2. Mix rub ingredients, coat ribs generously on all sides. Let sit 1 hour at room temperature or refrigerate overnight. 3. Prepare smoker to 250°F with wood chips. Place ribs in smoker bone-side down. 4. Smoke 5-6 hours, spritzing with water every hour, until internal temp reaches 203-205°F and meat is probe-tender. 5. Optional: Brush with BBQ sauce during last 30 min. 6. Let rest 15 min, slice between bones and serve.

ingredients: For rub: 1/4 cup coarse black pepper, 3 tbsp coarse salt, 2 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp onion powder
Dino ribs.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs beef plate ribs (dinosaur ribs). 1. Preheat smoker to 250°F or oven to 275°F. Remove membrane from back of ribs if present. 2. Mix rub ingredients. Coat ribs generously on all sides, pressing rub into meat. 3. If smoking: Smoke ribs 6-8 hours, spritzing with water every hour, until internal temp reaches 203-205°F and meat is probe-tender. If oven roasting: Wrap ribs in foil, roast 4-5 hours until very tender. 4. Let rest 15-20 min loosely covered. 5. Slice between bones and serve. Ribs should be so tender the meat pulls away easily.

ingredients: For rub: 1/4 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp paprika, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp onion powder, 2 tsp chili powder, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp cayenne
Beef back ribs.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs beef back ribs, 1 cup BBQ sauce, 1/4 cup apple cider vinegar. 1. Preheat oven to 275°F. Remove membrane from back of ribs. 2. Mix all rub ingredients. Coat ribs generously on both sides with rub, pressing it in. 3. Wrap rib racks tightly in foil, place on baking sheet. Bake 3-3.5 hours until very tender. 4. Remove from oven. Preheat broiler or grill to high heat. 5. Mix BBQ sauce with vinegar. Unwrap ribs, brush generously with sauce. 6. Broil or grill 3-5 min per side until sauce is caramelized and sticky. Let rest 5 min, cut between bones and serve.

Smoked prime rib.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup prime rib roast, 1.5 cups 1, sliced pepper, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tablespoon dried rosemary, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 4 tablespoons butter, 2 tablespoons prepared horseradish. Season roast with salt, pepper, herbs. Smoke at 225°F until internal temp reaches 120°F for medium-rare. Rest 30 minutes. Sear in hot cast iron with butter. Slice and serve with horseradish cream.

Smoked tri-tip Santa Maria style.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup tri-tip, 1.5 cups 1, sliced pepper, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 large onion, diced, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 1/4 tsp cayenne. Season tri-tip with Santa Maria rub. Smoke at 225°F until internal temp reaches 130°F. Sear over high heat to develop crust. Rest 10 minutes. Slice thin against the grain.

Picanha on the spit.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup picanha, 1.5 teaspoons coarse salt, 1 lime, juiced and zested, 1 cup farofa. Keep fat cap on picanha. Slice into thick steaks following the grain. Skewer on rotisserie spit in C-shape. Salt generously. Rotisserie cook over coals, slicing outer layer as it cooks. Serve with lime and farofa.

Churrasco mixed grill.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup picanha, 4 (8 oz) sirloin steaks, 1 lb chorizo, casings removed, 12 oz morcilla, 1 cup short ribs, 2 teaspoons coarse salt, 1/2 cup chimichurri. Season all meats with coarse salt. Grill over various heat levels appropriate for each cut. Serve on wooden board with chimichurri. Brazilian churrasco feast.

Gaucho steak with chimichurri.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ribeye steak, 2 teaspoons coarse salt, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 1.5 teaspoons oregano, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 3/4 cup white wine, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes. Make chimichurri: chop parsley and oregano, mix with garlic, vinegar, oil, pepper flakes. Salt steak generously. Grill over high heat to desired doneness. Slice, serve with chimichurri.

Asado-style short ribs.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs beef short ribs, 3 tbsp vegetable oil, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, 4 cloves garlic minced, 2 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tbsp smoked paprika, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp oregano, 1/2 cup red wine vinegar, 1 cup beef broth, 2 bay leaves. 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. Season short ribs generously with salt and pepper. 2. Heat oil in Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Sear ribs on all sides 3-4 min per side until deep brown. Remove and set aside. 3. Reduce heat to medium, add garlic, cook 1 min. Stir in brown sugar, paprika, cumin, and oregano. Cook 30 seconds. 4. Add vinegar, scraping up browned bits. Add broth and bay leaves. Bring to simmer. 5. Return ribs to pot, cover tightly. Transfer to oven and braise 2.5-3 hours until meat is fall-off-bone tender. 6. Remove bay leaves. Serve ribs with pan sauce.

Vacio steak.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs flank steak, 2 teaspoons coarse salt, 3/4 cup chimichurri, 1 large lemon. Season vacio with coarse salt. Grill over high heat, fat side down first. Flip and cook to medium. Rest 10 minutes. Slice thin against grain. Serve with chimichurri and lemon wedges.

Entra\u00f1a.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs flank steak, 1 tablespoon coarse salt, 1/2 cup chimichurri, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Season skirt steak generously with coarse salt. Grill over high heat 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare. Rest. Slice against grain. Serve with chimichurri. Argentine favorite.

Provoleta.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz shredded cheese, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 4 slices bread. Place thick slice of provolone in small cast iron skillet. Top with oregano and red pepper flakes. Grill or broil until cheese is melted and bottom is crispy. Drizzle with olive oil. Serve with bread.

Choripan with extra crispy chorizo.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz Mexican chorizo, 6 slices thick-cut bread, 3/4 cup chimichurri, 1 cup salsa, 8 oz shredded cheese. Grill chorizo, butterfly, grill cut-side down until extra crispy. Melt provolone on bread. Add chorizo, generous chimichurri and salsa criolla.

Empanadas fritas.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup lard, 3 lbs beef brisket, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 2 teaspoons paprika, 6 eggs, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Make empanada dough. Fill with seasoned beef and chopped eggs. Seal and crimp edges. Deep fry at 350°F until golden and puffed. Drain on paper towels.

Sopes with carnitas.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 cups masa harina, 1/4 cup lard, 1 cup carnitas, 1 (15 oz) can refried beans, 1.5 cups salsa, 1/2 cup Mexican crema, 3/4 cup queso fresco, 1 lb 1 head lettuce, torn, 1 large onion, diced. Make thick masa patties, cook on griddle. Pinch up edges to form shallow cups. Fill with refried beans, crispy carnitas, salsa, crema, cheese, lettuce, and onion.

Huaraches loaded.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 1/4 cups warm water, 1/2 tsp salt; Toppings: 2 cups refried beans, 1 lb carne asada (grilled and sliced), 2 cups lettuce (shredded), 1 cup crema or sour cream, 1 cup queso fresco (crumbled), 1 cup salsa verde, 1 cup pico de gallo, 1 avocado (sliced). 1. Mix masa harina, water, and salt, knead until smooth dough forms. 2. Divide into 4 balls, rest 10 min. 3. Shape each ball into 10-inch oval (huarache shape). 4. Heat griddle or large skillet over medium-high heat with thin layer of oil. 5. Cook each huarache 3-4 min per side until lightly charred and cooked through. 6. Spread refried beans on each huarache. 7. Top with carne asada, lettuce, crema, queso fresco, salsa verde, and pico de gallo. 8. Add avocado slices and pickled jalapeños. 9. Serve immediately.

Tlayuda.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup large thin tortilla, 2 cups asiento, 1 (15 oz) can black beans, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1/2 cup tasajo, 2 ripe avocados, diced, 2 cups salsa. Spread large tortilla with asiento (pork lard) and refried beans. Top with shredded Oaxaca cheese. Toast on griddle until crispy. Add grilled tasajo, avocado, salsa. Fold in half or serve flat.

Mulita.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1.5 lbs carne asada, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1/2 cup cilantro, 2 limes, juiced. Season and cook carne asada, slice thin. Layer cheese and meat between two tortillas. Grill on each side until tortillas crispy and cheese melts. Top with cilantro and squeeze of lime.

Vampiro taco.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 (6-inch) corn tortillas, 1.5 lbs carne asada, 8 oz shredded cheese, 1 cup guacamole, 2 cups salsa, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 1/2 cup cilantro. Press corn tortilla on flat griddle until edges are crispy. Add shredded Oaxaca cheese to melt. Top with chopped carne asada. Fold and top with guacamole, salsa, onion, cilantro.

Birria tacos with consomm\u00e9 three wa.directions: Ingredients needed: 2.5 lbs birria, 1 cup birria consommé, 10 s mall corn tortillas, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro, 2 medium onions, diced, 2 limes, juiced, 1.5 cups salsa. Dip tortillas in consommé and griddle. Fill with meat and cheese. Serve tacos with: warm consommé for dipping, consommé as soup, and consommé-brushed tortillas for different textures.

Barbacoa cheeks.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 2 teaspoons 4 dried ancho chiles, 2 teaspoons 4 dried guajillo chiles, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1.5 teaspoons oregano, 4 whole cloves, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tablespoons vinegar, 3 cups beef broth. Toast and rehydrate chilies. Blend with spices, garlic, vinegar. Brown beef cheeks. Cover with sauce and broth. Braise covered at 300°F 5 hours until tender. Shred.

Lengua tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 3 bay leaves, 8 (6-inch) corn tortillas, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 2 cups salsa, 2 limes, juiced. Simmer tongue with onion, garlic, bay leaf for 3 hours until tender. Peel membrane, dice meat. Brown on griddle. Serve in tortillas with cilantro, onion, salsa verde, and lime.

Cabeza tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 8 (6-inch) corn tortillas, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 3 limes, 2 cups salsa. Braise beef head meat until very tender (from a taqueria, or slow cook yourself 6-8 hours). Chop. Serve in warm tortillas with cilantro, onion, lime, salsa verde.

Suadero tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 4-5 lbs beef brisket, 3 tablespoons lard, 12 corn tortillas, 1 large onion, diced, 1/2 cup cilantro, 1.5 cups salsa, 2 limes, juiced. Slice brisket thin. Confit in lard at low temperature until very tender. Brown pieces on hot griddle until crispy edges. Serve in warm tortillas with onion, cilantro, salsa, and lime.

Trompo al pastor at home.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 2 cups guajillo chiles, 2 tablespoons achiote paste, 8 oz pineapple, 1 large onion, diced, 3 tablespoons vinegar, 10 s mall corn tortillas, 1/2 cup cilantro. Blend soaked guajillos with achiote, pineapple juice, vinegar. Marinate thin-sliced pork overnight. Stack on vertical spit if available or roast. Slice off edges as they crisp. Serve with pineapple, onion, cilantro.

Cochinita pibil.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 1/4 cup achiote paste, 1/4 cup orange juice, 3 limes, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons cumin, 1.5 teaspoons oregano, 1/3 cup banana leaves, chopped. Blend achiote paste with orange juice, lime juice, garlic, cumin, oregano. Marinate pork overnight. Wrap in banana leaves (or foil). Slow roast at 300°F for 4-5 hours until falling apart. Shred, serve with pickled red onions and tortillas.

Chile colorado.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef brisket, 1/2 teaspoon dried red New Mexico chilies, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1.5 teaspoons oregano, 4 cups beef broth, 1 cup flour. Toast and rehydrate chilies. Blend with garlic, cumin, oregano, some broth. Brown cubed beef. Add chile sauce and remaining broth. Simmer 2-3 hours until beef is tender and sauce thick.

Carne adovada.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 1 tablespoon dried red New Mexico chilies, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 3 tablespoons vinegar. Toast and rehydrate chilies. Blend with garlic, oregano, cumin, vinegar. Cube pork, cover with chile sauce. Braise covered at 300°F 3-4 hours until very tender. Sauce should be thick and rich.

ingredients: Hatch green chiles, roasted, peeled, and chopped (or 2 cans diced green chiles)
Green chile stew.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs pork shoulder, cubed, 8 Hatch green chiles, roasted, peeled, and chopped (or 2 cans diced green chiles), 4 medium potatoes, cubed, 1 onion, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 4 cups chicken broth, 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 tsp oregano, 1/2 tsp cayenne, 2 tbsp flour. 1. Season pork with salt and pepper. In Dutch oven, brown pork in 2 tbsp oil over medium-high heat, 8-10 min. 2. Add onion, cook 4 min. Add garlic, cumin, oregano, cayenne, cook 1 min. 3. Sprinkle flour over mixture, stir to coat, cook 2 min. 4. Add broth, tomatoes, green chiles. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cook covered 1 hour. 5. Add potatoes, simmer 30 min more until pork and potatoes are tender. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Garnish with cilantro and lime. Serve with warm flour tortillas.

Posole rojo.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 1/2 cup hominy, 1 tablespoon 4 dried guajillo chiles, 8 oz 6 ancho chiles, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1.5 teaspoons oregano, 6 cups shredded cabbage, 1 lime, juiced and zested. Toast and rehydrate dried chilies, blend with garlic into paste. Brown cubed pork. Add chile paste, water, and hominy. Simmer 2-3 hours until pork is tender. Season with salt and oregano. Serve with shredded cabbage and lime.

Posole verde.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 1 lb hominy, 12 oz tomatillos, 2 cups poblano peppers, 1 lb 1 serrano pepper, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 medium onions, diced, 1.5 teaspoons oregano, 6 cups shredded cabbage, 8 oz radish, 1 lime, juiced and zested. Simmer pork until tender. Shred. Roast and blend tomatillos, peppers, garlic, onion. Add salsa to broth with hominy. Simmer 30 minutes. Serve with cabbage, radish, lime, oregano.

ingredients: beef tripe (cleaned and cut into 1-inch pieces)
red chile sauce: 6 dried guajillo chiles
Menudo.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef tripe (cleaned and cut into 1-inch pieces), 2 lbs beef feet (split), 1 large onion (quartered), 8 cloves garlic (whole), 2 tbsp salt, 1 tbsp black peppercorns, 3 bay leaves, 1 can (29 oz) hominy (drained), 3 dried ancho chiles, 4 cups water, 3 cloves garlic, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp oregano. 1. Rinse tripe thoroughly, place in large pot with beef feet, onion, garlic, salt, peppercorns, and bay leaves. 2. Cover with water (about 12 cups), bring to boil. 3. Reduce heat, simmer 4-5 hours until tripe is tender. 4. Make chile sauce: remove stems and seeds from chiles, toast in dry skillet 2 min. 5. Simmer toasted chiles in 4 cups water 15 min, blend with garlic, cumin, and oregano until smooth. 6. Strain chile sauce into tripe pot. 7. Add hominy, simmer 1 hour. 8. Remove beef feet, shred any meat, return to pot. 9. Season with salt to taste. 10. Serve in bowls with onion, cilantro, lime, oregano, crushed red pepper, and warm tortillas.

ingredients: dried guajillo chiles, stemmed and seeded
dried ancho chiles, stemmed and seeded
Cilantro, diced onion, lime, radishes for garnish
Birria ramen fusion.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs beef short ribs, 6 dried guajillo chiles, stemmed and seeded, 4 dried ancho chiles, stemmed and seeded, 10 cups beef broth, 1 onion, quartered, 8 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 tbsp Mexican oregano, 1 cinnamon stick, 1/4 cup apple cider vinegar, 3 bay leaves, 4 packs ramen noodles, 1 cup shredded Oaxaca cheese. 1. Toast dried chiles in dry skillet 30-60 seconds per side. Soak in hot water 20 min. Blend with 2 cups soaking liquid, onion, garlic, cumin, oregano, cinnamon, cloves until very smooth. 2. In Dutch oven, combine short ribs, chile mixture, broth, vinegar, bay leaves. Bring to boil, reduce to low simmer. Cook covered 3.5-4 hours until beef is fall-apart tender. 3. Remove beef, shred, discard bones. Strain broth through fine mesh, skim fat. Return beef and consommé to pot. 4. Cook ramen noodles according to package, drain. 5. Divide noodles among bowls. Ladle hot birria consommé and beef over noodles. Top with Oaxaca cheese, cilantro, diced onion, lime, sliced radishes.

Birria grilled cheese deluxe.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 slices Texas toast, 3 cups shredded birria beef (with fat), 2 cups Oaxaca cheese (shredded), 1 cup Monterey Jack cheese (shredded), 1/2 cup queso quesadilla (shredded), 6 tbsp butter (softened), 1/2 cup white onion (minced), 1/2 cup cilantro (chopped), 4 oz cream cheese (softened), 2 jalapeños (sliced), 2 cups birria consommé for dipping. 1. Mix cream cheese with 2 tbsp birria consommé until spreadable. 2. Spread cream cheese mixture on one side of each bread slice. 3. Butter opposite side of each slice. 4. Heat large skillet over medium heat. 5. Place 4 slices buttered-side down. 6. Layer Oaxaca, Monterey Jack, and queso quesadilla on bread. 7. Top with generous birria beef, onion, cilantro, and jalapeños. 8. Add more cheese on top of filling. 9. Cover with remaining bread slices (cream cheese side down, buttered side up). 10. Cook 5-6 min until deep golden brown. 11. Flip carefully, cook another 5-6 min. 12. Serve with hot birria consommé and lime wedges.

Birria pizza.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, 3 lbs birria meat, 8 oz birria consommé, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 8 oz shredded cheese, 1/2 cup cilantro, 1 lime, juiced and zested. Stretch dough. Brush with consommé. Top with shredded Oaxaca and mozzarella. Add birria meat. Bake at 475°F until crust is golden. Top with fresh cilantro. Serve with consommé for dipping.

Mexican street corn pizza.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, 3 tablespoons elote sauce, 8 oz shredded cheese, 2 cups corn kernels, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro, 1 lime, juiced and zested, 1.5 tablespoons chili powder, 1/4 cup crema. Spread dough, top with elote sauce (mayo-based) and mozzarella. Add corn kernels. Bake at 500°F until crust is golden. Top with crumbled cotija, cilantro, crema drizzle, chili powder, lime zest.

Carne asada fries.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs frozen french fries, 1 lb carne asada, diced, 2 cups shredded cheese, 1 cup guacamole, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup pico de gallo, 2 tbsp chopped cilantro. 1. Cook fries according to package directions until crispy (oven or air fryer works best). 2. Grill or pan-sear carne asada over high heat 3-4 min per side. Let rest 5 min, dice into bite-sized pieces. 3. Arrange hot fries on large serving platter. Sprinkle cheese over hot fries to melt. 4. Top with warm carne asada pieces. Add dollops of guacamole and sour cream. 5. Sprinkle with pico de gallo, cilantro, and pickled jalapeños. Serve with lime wedges. Eat immediately while fries are hot and crispy.

California burrito.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1.5 lbs carne asada, 1 (32 oz) bag frozen fries, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 2 cups guacamole, 8 oz pico de gallo. Grill carne asada, slice thin. Fill large tortilla with meat, hot fries, cheese, sour cream, guacamole, pico de gallo. Roll burrito style. The French fries inside are essential.

Surf and turf burrito.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup flour, 2 lbs carne asada, 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 1 lb dried beans, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1.5 cups guacamole, 1.5 cups salsa, 1/2 cup sour cream. Grill carne asada and sear shrimp. Slice steak thin. Warm tortilla, layer rice, beans, cheese, steak, shrimp, guacamole. Roll burrito. Serve with salsa and sour cream.

Burrito bowl with all the meats.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup jasmine rice, 1 (15 oz) can black beans, 1 lb carne asada, sliced, 1 cup carnitas, 4 lbs chicken, 1 lb chorizo, casings removed, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 cup guacamole, 1.5 cups salsa. Prepare each meat separately. Layer rice and beans in bowl. Top with all the meats, cheese, sour cream, guacamole, and salsa. The ultimate protein bowl.

Nachos with smoked brisket and queso.directions: Ingredients needed: 4-5 lbs smoked brisket, 2 , sliced jalapeños. Chop brisket into pieces. Make queso: melt Velveeta with Rotel. Layer chips, brisket, hot queso. Top with jalapeños, pickled onions, cilantro.

Queso birria nachos.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 bag tortilla chips (14 oz), 3 cups shredded birria beef (with consommé), 3 cups Oaxaca cheese (shredded), 1 cup Monterey Jack cheese (shredded), 1 cup queso blanco dip, 1/2 cup white onion (diced), 1/2 cup cilantro (chopped), 2 jalapeños (sliced), 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 cup guacamole, 1 lime (cut into wedges), 2 cups birria consommé for dipping. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. 2. Spread tortilla chips on large baking sheet. 3. Heat birria beef with some consommé until warm. 4. Layer half the Oaxaca and Monterey Jack cheese over chips. 5. Distribute birria beef evenly over cheese. 6. Top with remaining cheese. 7. Bake 10-12 min until cheese is melted and bubbly. 8. Remove from oven, drizzle queso blanco over nachos. 9. Top with diced onion, cilantro, and jalapeño slices. 10. Add dollops of sour cream and guacamole. 11. Serve immediately with warm birria consommé and lime wedges on the side for dipping.

Chilaquiles with carnitas.directions: Ingredients needed: 10 corn tortillas, cut into triangles, 3 cups shredded carnitas (braised pork), 2 cups red or green salsa, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 4 eggs, fried, 1 cup crumbled queso fresco, 1/2 cup Mexican crema or sour cream, 1/2 red onion, thinly sliced, 1 avocado, sliced. 1. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry tortilla triangles in batches 2-3 min per side until crispy. Drain on paper towels. 2. Heat carnitas in skillet until crispy edges, 4-5 min. Remove to plate. 3. Heat salsa in same skillet until simmering. Add fried tortillas, toss to coat. Cook 2-3 min until slightly softened but retaining crunch. 4. Fry eggs in separate pan, 3-4 min. 5. Divide chilaquiles among plates, top with carnitas, fried egg, queso fresco, crema, onion, avocado, cilantro. Serve with lime wedges.

Chilaquiles divorciados.directions: Ingredients needed: 10 corn tortillas, cut into triangles, 1.5 cups red salsa (salsa roja), 1.5 cups green salsa (salsa verde), 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 4 eggs, fried, 1 cup refried beans, warmed, 1 cup crumbled queso fresco, 1/2 cup Mexican crema, 1/4 red onion, sliced, 1 avocado, sliced. 1. Heat oil in large skillet, fry tortilla triangles in batches until crispy, 2-3 min per side. Drain. 2. Heat red salsa in one pan, green salsa in another until simmering. 3. Divide fried tortillas into two portions. Toss one portion with red salsa, the other with green salsa. Cook each 2-3 min until slightly softened. 4. Fry eggs to desired doneness, 3-4 min. 5. Plate chilaquiles side by side (divorced): red on one side, green on other. Place refried beans in center. Top with fried eggs, queso fresco, crema, onion, avocado, cilantro.

Migas with chorizo.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 large eggs, 1 (10 oz) bag tortilla chips, 12 oz Mexican chorizo, 8 oz shredded cheese, 4 tablespoons butter, 1.5 cups salsa. Remove chorizo from casing, cook until browned. Add crushed tortilla chips. Beat eggs, pour over mixture. Scramble together. Fold in cheese while eggs are still slightly wet. Serve with salsa.

Machaca con huevo.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, 6 eggs, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 cup flour, 1.5 cups salsa. Rehydrate machaca if dried. Scramble eggs. Add machaca to eggs while still wet, cook together until eggs are set. Serve with warm tortillas and salsa.

ingredients: ranchero sauce or salsa roja, heated
Huevos rancheros stacked.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 corn tortillas, 8 eggs, fried, 2 cups refried beans, warmed, 2 cups ranchero sauce or salsa roja, heated, 2 cups shredded cheese (cheddar and monterey jack), 1 cup pico de gallo, 1 avocado, sliced, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. 1. Heat oil in skillet, fry tortillas one at time until slightly crispy but still pliable, 1 min per side. Drain on paper towels. 2. Fry eggs to desired doneness, 3-4 min. 3. To stack: place one tortilla on plate, spread with beans, add cheese, top with second tortilla. Ladle ranchero sauce over. 4. Top with two fried eggs, more cheese, pico de gallo, avocado, sour cream. 5. Garnish with cilantro and pickled jalapeños. Serve with lime wedges.

Huevos divorciados.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 eggs, 4 corn tortillas, 1.5 cups red salsa (salsa roja), heated, 1.5 cups green salsa (salsa verde), heated, 2 cups refried beans, warmed, 1 cup shredded cheese, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1/4 cup Mexican crema or sour cream. 1. Heat oil in skillet, fry tortillas until slightly crispy, 1 min per side. Place on serving plates. 2. Fry eggs to desired doneness (traditionally sunny-side up), 3-4 min. 3. Spread warm refried beans down center of each tortilla, creating a divider. 4. Place two fried eggs on each plate, one on each side of the bean divider. 5. Ladle red salsa over one egg, green salsa over the other (divorced). 6. Sprinkle with cheese, drizzle with crema. Garnish with cilantro, serve with lime wedges.

ingredients: bolillo rolls or French bread sections (halved lengthwise)
Molletes loaded.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 bolillo rolls or French bread sections (halved lengthwise), 2 cups refried beans, 2 cups shredded cheese (Oaxaca, 1/2 cup chorizo (cooked and crumbled), 1 cup pico de gallo, 1/2 cup pickled jalapeños, 1/2 cup crema or sour cream, 1/4 cup cilantro (chopped), 4 tbsp butter (softened). 1. Preheat broiler to high. 2. Butter cut sides of bread, place on baking sheet butter-side up. 3. Broil 2-3 min until lightly toasted. 4. Spread refried beans generously on each piece. 5. Top with cooked chorizo and shredded cheese. 6. Return to broiler 3-5 min until cheese is melted and bubbly. 7. Remove from oven, top with pico de gallo and pickled jalapeños. 8. Drizzle with crema, garnish with cilantro. 9. Serve immediately with salsa verde on the side.

Torta ahogada.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 slices thick-cut bread, 1/2 cup carnitas, 2 cups refried beans, 2 cups tomato sauce, 1 large onion, diced, 2 limes, juiced, 2 teaspoons dried oregano. Split crusty birote roll. Spread with beans, fill with carnitas. Drown (ahogada) the torta in spicy chile de arbol tomato sauce. Top with sliced onion, oregano, and lime juice.

Torta cubana.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 slices thick-cut bread, 1 lb milanesa, 8 oz ham steak, diced, 10 hot dogs, 1/2 cup queso Oaxaca, 8 oz Spanish chorizo, sliced, 1 large avocado, sliced, 2 jalapeños, diced, 1 (15 oz) can beans. Split telera, spread with beans. Layer milanesa, sliced hot dog, ham, cooked chorizo, melted cheese. Top with avocado and pickled jalapeños. Press and grill until crusty.

Cemita.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb sesame brioche bun, 1/2 cup milanesa, 3 avocados, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1.5 cups chipotle peppers, 2 cups papalo, 1 (15 oz) can refried beans. Make beef milanesa. Toast sesame bun. Spread refried beans and chipotles. Layer milanesa, sliced avocado, melted Oaxaca cheese, papalo herb. A massive, perfect sandwich.

Pambazo.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 slices bread, 12 oz Mexican chorizo, 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 3 tablespoons guajillo sauce, 8 oz 1 head lettuce, torn, 3/4 cup crema, 3/4 cup queso fresco, 3 tablespoons oil. Make filling with crumbled chorizo and cubed potatoes. Dip bread in guajillo chile sauce. Griddle in oil until crispy. Fill with chorizo-potato mixture. Top with lettuce, crema, and cheese.

ingredients: lard or vegetable shortening; Filling: 1 lb carnitas or shredded chicken
Gordita stuffed thick.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 1/4 cups warm water, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 cup lard or vegetable shortening; Filling: 1 lb carnitas or shredded chicken, 1 cup refried beans, 1 cup lettuce (shredded), 1 cup crema, 1 cup queso fresco (crumbled), 1 cup salsa verde, 1 avocado (sliced). 1. Mix masa harina, water, salt, and lard until smooth dough forms. 2. Divide into 8 balls, rest 10 min covered. 3. Press or pat each ball into 4-inch thick disc. 4. Heat griddle over medium heat, cook gorditas 4-5 min per side until puffy and lightly charred. 5. Heat 1/2 inch oil in skillet to 350°F. 6. Fry gorditas 2-3 min per side until golden and puffed. 7. Drain on paper towels, let cool slightly. 8. Slice open on one side to create pocket. 9. Fill with refried beans, meat, lettuce, crema, queso fresco, salsa, and avocado. 10. Serve immediately.

Picaditas.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 cups masa harina, 1.5 cups salsa, 3/4 cup queso fresco, 1/4 cup crema, 2 medium onions, diced, 1 lb dried beans. Make thick masa patties, cook on griddle. While warm, pinch up edges to form rim. Add salsa and beans. Top with crumbled queso fresco, crema, and diced onion.

Chalupas.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups masa harina, 1 cup water, 3 tablespoons lard, 2 lbs pork shoulder, 1.5 cups salsa, 6 oz queso fresco, 1/2 cup sour cream. Make masa boats, fry until crispy. Top with shredded pork, salsa verde, crumbled queso fresco, drizzle of sour cream.

Tostada tower.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup tostadas, 1 (15 oz) can refried beans, 4 lbs chicken, 2 cups 1 head lettuce, torn, 1/4 cup crema, 3/4 cup queso fresco, 1.5 cups salsa, 3 avocados. Stack tostadas with refried beans, shredded chicken, lettuce, crema, cheese between each layer. Build 3-4 layers high. Top with avocado and salsa verde. Eat by breaking off sections.

Flautas.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 (6-inch) corn tortillas, 4 lbs chicken, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/2 cup sour cream, 2 cups guacamole, 1 cup crumbled queso fresco. Roll seasoned shredded chicken tightly in corn tortillas. Secure with toothpicks. Fry at 350°F until golden and crispy all over. Remove picks. Serve with sour cream, guacamole, crumbled queso fresco.

Taquitos dorados.directions: Ingredients needed: 10 s mall corn tortillas, 3 lbs whole chicken, cut into pieces, 3 tablespoons oil, 1/2 cup Mexican crema, 1 cup crumbled queso fresco, 1 lb 1 head lettuce, torn, 2 cups salsa, 2 jalapeños, diced. Fill tortillas with shredded seasoned chicken. Roll tightly, secure with toothpicks. Fry until golden and crispy. Remove picks. Top with crema, cheese, lettuce, salsa, and jalapeños.

Enchiladas suizas.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 (6-inch) corn tortillas, 4 lbs chicken, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 3 cups chicken broth, 1 lb tomatillos, husked, 5 cloves garlic, minced. Blend roasted tomatillos with cream, broth, garlic, salt. Dip tortillas in sauce to soften. Fill with chicken and cheese, roll. Place in baking dish, cover with sauce and more cheese. Bake at 375°F 20 minutes. Drizzle with sour cream.

Enchiladas mole.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 corn tortillas, 2.5 lbs chicken pieces, 2 tablespoons mole paste, 4 cups chicken broth, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds. Dissolve mole paste in warm chicken broth. Dip tortillas in warm mole to soften. Fill with shredded chicken and cheese, roll. Place seam-down in baking dish. Pour remaining mole over top. Bake at 375°F 20 minutes. Top with sour cream, sesame seeds.

Mole negro.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs chicken, 1/2 cup mulato chiles, 1/2 cup negro chiles, 8 oz chocolate, 1 cup slivered almonds, 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, 1 large onion, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons cumin, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice. Toast and rehydrate multiple dried chiles. Blend with toasted nuts, seeds, chocolate, spices, charred onion and garlic. Simmer with chicken broth for 1 hour. Serve over chicken with rice.

Mole rojo over chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 1 lb ancho chiles, 8 oz guajillo chiles, 2 (14.5 oz) cans diced tomatoes, 1 cup slivered almonds, 1 cup raisins, 1 lb Mexican chocolate, 2 medium onions, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons cumin, 1 cup jasmine rice. Toast and rehydrate chiles. Blend with roasted tomatoes, toasted almonds, raisins, onion, garlic, spices. Simmer sauce, add chocolate until melted. Braise chicken in mole. Serve with rice.

Pipi\u00e1n.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs pork loin, 2 cups pepitas, 1 lb tomatillos, husked, 2 cups 1 serrano pepper, diced, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro. Toast pepitas until they pop. Blend with roasted tomatillos, serrano, onion, garlic, cumin. Simmer sauce. Add braised pork, simmer together. Serve over rice with cilantro.

Adobo-braised chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 3 bay leaves, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black peppercorns, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Brown chicken in oil. Add soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns, and 1/2 cup water. Simmer covered 30-40 minutes until tender. Uncover, reduce sauce until thickened.

Pollo en crema.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 1 cup heavy cream, 3 cups chicken broth, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 4 tablespoons butter, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice. Season chicken, brown in butter 4 minutes per side. Remove. Sauté garlic. Add broth and cream. Return chicken, simmer 25 minutes until cooked through and sauce thickens. Serve over rice.

Tinga de pollo.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs (2 lbs), 1.5 cups chipotle peppers in adobo, 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes, 4 cups chicken broth, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 2 teaspoons cumin, 5 cloves garlic, minced. Simmer chicken in broth until cooked. Shred. Blend tomatoes with chipotles, garlic, oregano, cumin. Simmer sauce 15 minutes. Add shredded chicken. Cook 10 more minutes. Serve in tacos or tostadas.

Mixiotes.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs lamb stew meat, 1 lb guajillo chiles, 8 oz ancho chiles, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 1 large avocado, sliced, 1 cup parchment paper. Make adobo by blending soaked chiles with spices, garlic, onion. Marinate lamb in adobo overnight. Wrap in parchment with avocado leaf. Steam for 3 hours until very tender.

Alambre without peppers.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz beef sirloin, 1/2 lb bacon, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1/4 cup flour, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Cube beef, season with cumin and salt. Cook bacon until crispy, remove. Stir-fry beef in bacon fat. Top with melted Oaxaca cheese and crumbled bacon. Serve with warm tortillas.

Carne en su jugo.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb beef sirloin, thinly sliced, 1/2 lb bacon, 1 (15 oz) can pinto beans, drained, 1 lb tomatillos, husked, 3 cups 1 serrano pepper, diced, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, 6 cups beef broth. Cook bacon until crispy. Brown cubed beef. Blend tomatillos, serranos, cilantro. Add to beef with broth and beans. Simmer 30 minutes. Serve soupy with bacon on top.

Asado de boda.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 6 g uajillo chiles, 1 cup 6 ancho chiles, 2 cups chocolate, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 4 whole cloves, 2 teaspoons cumin, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tablespoons vinegar. Toast and rehydrate chilies. Blend with chocolate, spices, garlic, vinegar. Brown cubed pork. Add sauce, simmer covered 2 hours until pork is very tender and sauce thickens.

Carnitas Michoac\u00e1n style.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 3 tablespoons lard, 1/2 cup fresh orange juice, 1.5 cups milk, 2 cups Coca-Cola, 2 bay leaves. Cube pork, season with salt. Cook slowly in lard with orange juice, evaporated milk, Coca-Cola, and bay leaves until liquid evaporates and pork crisps in remaining fat. Traditional and delicious.

Chicharr\u00f3n in salsa verde.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup chicharrones, 12 oz tomatillos, 1 lb 1 serrano pepper, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 4 cups chicken broth, 1/2 cup cilantro, 10 s mall corn tortillas. Roast tomatillos and serranos. Blend with garlic and broth. Break chicharrones into pieces. Simmer in salsa verde until slightly softened but still textured. Serve with tortillas.

Chicharr\u00f3n prensado tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz chicharrón prensado, 8 (6-inch) corn tortillas, 1.5 cups salsa, 1/2 cup cilantro, 2 medium onions, diced, 1 lime, juiced and zested. Heat and crumble pressed chicharrón. Warm tortillas. Fill with chicharrón. Top with salsa verde, chopped cilantro and onion. Squeeze lime over top.

Fried chicharrones fresh.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs pork shoulder, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 lime, juiced and zested, 1 teaspoon hot sauce. Score and dry pork skin overnight. Simmer in water 2 hours. Cool, scrape off fat. Dry completely. Deep fry at 375°F until puffed and crispy. Season with salt. Serve with lime and hot sauce.

Chicharrones preparados.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 oz chicharrones, 1/2 cup cueritos, 2 limes, juiced, 2 teaspoons hot sauce, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 cup crumbled queso fresco, 6 cups shredded cabbage. Top large piece of chicharrón with cueritos (pickled pork skin), shredded cabbage, lime juice, hot sauce, sour cream, crumbled queso fresco. Mexican street food at its finest.

Cuban mojo pork with extra garlic.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 3/4 cup orange juice, 1 lime, juiced and zested, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons cumin, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1/4 cup olive oil. Blend marinade with lots of garlic (a whole head). Marinate pork overnight. Slow roast at 300°F 4-5 hours. Shred, crisp edges under broiler. Extra garlicky and delicious.

Cuban sandwich pressed paper thin.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 Cuban bread or sub rolls, 1 lb roast pork sliced paper-thin, 8 oz ham sliced paper-thin, 8 slices Swiss cheese, 4 tbsp butter softened. 1. Slice bread horizontally. Spread yellow mustard generously on both cut sides. 2. Layer bottom half with Swiss cheese, very thin layers of roast pork, ham, more Swiss cheese, and pickles. Keep layers very thin. Top with remaining bread. 3. Butter outside of sandwich on both sides. 4. Heat large skillet or panini press over medium heat. 5. Place sandwich in skillet, press down extremely firmly with heavy pan, brick, or multiple weights. Cook 3-4 min until nearly flat and bottom is golden and crispy. 6. Flip, press down hard again, cook 3-4 min more until paper-thin, cheese is melted and bread is very crispy. Cut in half and serve.

Medianoche on sweet bread.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 slices thick-cut bread, 2 lbs pork shoulder, 1 lb ham, cubed, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 2 ripe pears, diced, 3 tablespoons mustard, 3 tablespoons butter. Split sweet bread, spread with mustard. Layer roast pork, ham, Swiss cheese, and pickles. Butter outside. Press in sandwich press until bread is golden and cheese is melted.

Pan con lech\u00f3n.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 slices bread, 1.5 lbs pork loin, 2 tablespoons mojo sauce, 1 large onion, diced, 2 limes, juiced, 5 cloves garlic, minced. Split Cuban bread. Pile high with shredded mojo-marinated roast pork. Drizzle with mojo sauce (garlic, citrus, olive oil). Top with sliced onion. Press lightly and serve warm.

Vaca frita.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 (8 oz) sirloin steaks, 1 lime, juiced and zested, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper. Simmer flank steak until tender, 2 hours. Shred. Marinate in lime juice and garlic. Pan-fry in hot oil until very crispy edges. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with rice and black beans.

Ropa vieja.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs flank steak, 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes, 4 cups beef broth, 2 teaspoons cumin, 1.5 teaspoons oregano, 3 bay leaves, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup olive oil. Braise flank steak in broth with bay leaf until very tender, 2-3 hours. Shred meat. Sauté garlic, add tomatoes, cumin, oregano. Add shredded beef, simmer 20 minutes. Season with salt. Serve with rice and black beans.

Arroz con pollo amarillo.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 (5-6 oz) bone-in chicken thighs, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 1/2 teaspoon saffron, 2 cups chicken broth, 1 (15 oz) can tomato sauce, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 3/4 cup green olives, 1 cup frozen peas. Brown chicken. Add garlic, cumin, tomato sauce. Add rice, saffron-infused broth. Simmer covered until rice is tender. Add olives and peas last 5 minutes.

Arroz imperial.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 2.5 lbs chicken pieces, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 8 oz cream cheese, softened, 1.5 cups shredded cheese, 1 lb ham, cubed, 4 cups chicken broth, 6 cloves garlic, minced. Cook rice. Cook and shred chicken. Mix mayo with cream cheese. Layer: rice, mayo mixture, chicken, ham, cheese. Repeat. Bake at 375°F 25 minutes until cheese bubbles.

Pernil slow roasted.directions: Ingredients needed: 3-4 lbs pork shoulder, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 tablespoons vinegar, 1/4 cup orange juice, 1.5 cups 1, sliced pepper. Make adobo with garlic, oregano, cumin, oil, vinegar, citrus. Pierce pork deeply, rub adobo in and under skin. Marinate overnight. Roast covered at 325°F for 5 hours. Uncover last hour for crispy skin.

Carne frita.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs flank steak, 3 limes, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1.5 teaspoons oregano, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Cube beef. Season with lime, garlic, cumin, oregano, salt. Fry in hot oil until crispy edges but tender inside. Serve with rice and beans.

Chicharr\u00f3n de pollo.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs whole chicken, cut into pieces, 2 limes, juiced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Marinate chicken in lime juice, garlic, salt, pepper 2 hours. Dredge in flour. Deep fry at 350°F until golden and crispy, 12-15 minutes. Serve with mojo sauce.

Pollo guisado.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs (2 lbs), 3 tablespoons sofrito, 1 (15 oz) can tomato sauce, 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 1 (6 oz) can sliced olives, 2 tablespoons capers, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 2 teaspoons cumin, 2 cups sazon, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice. Brown chicken in oil. Add sofrito, tomato sauce, water, cubed potatoes, olives, capers, and seasonings. Simmer covered until chicken is cooked and potatoes are tender. Serve over rice.

Carne guisada.directions: Ingredients needed: 2.5 lbs beef, 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1.5 tablespoons chili powder, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 6 cups beef broth, 1 cup flour, 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Brown cubed beef. Add garlic, cumin, chili powder. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer 2 hours until tender. Thicken with flour slurry. Serve with flour tortillas.

Sancocho.directions: Ingredients needed: 2.5 lbs chicken pieces, 1.5 lbs pork loin, 8 oz yuca, 1 (15 oz) can corn, drained, 1 lb plantains, 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 1/2 cup sofrito, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 1/2 cup cilantro, 1 lime, juiced and zested, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice. Simmer chicken and pork in broth until tender. Add starchy vegetables in order of cooking time: yuca first, then potatoes, corn, plantains. Add sofrito and oregano. Serve with rice, lime, cilantro.

Mondongo.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef brisket, 8 oz ham steak, diced, 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 1 cup yuca, 3 tablespoons sofrito, 1 (15 oz) can tomato sauce, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 2 limes, juiced, 2 cups white rice. Simmer cleaned tripe and ham hock for 2-3 hours until tender. Add cubed potatoes and yuca. Add sofrito, tomato sauce, seasonings. Simmer until vegetables are cooked. Serve with rice and lime.

Asopao de pollo.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs (2 lbs), 2 cups white rice, 3 tablespoons sofrito, 1 (8 oz) can tomato sauce, 2 cups chicken broth, 1/2 cup sazón, 3/4 cup green olives, 3 tablespoons capers. Brown chicken. Add sofrito, tomato sauce, sazón. Add broth, bring to boil. Add rice. Simmer 25-30 minutes until rice is very tender and soupy. Add olives and capers.

Bacalaitos.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs salt cod, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 2 cups water, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Soak salt cod overnight, drain, shred finely. Mix with flour, baking powder, garlic powder, oregano, and water to form batter. Drop spoonfuls into 350°F oil. Fry until golden and crispy.

Sorullitos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups corn kernels, 1/4 cup sugar, 8 oz shredded cheese, 1/4 cup (4 tbsp) butter, 3 tablespoons oil. Boil water with butter, sugar, salt. Stir in cornmeal until thick. Add shredded cheese, mix until melted. Cool slightly. Roll into finger shapes. Deep fry until golden brown. Serve warm.

Empanadillas.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup flour, 3 tablespoons lard, 2.5 lbs beef, 3 tablespoons sofrito, 3/4 cup green olives, 1/4 cup capers, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Make Puerto Rican style dough. Fill with seasoned picadillo (ground beef with sofrito, olives, capers). Seal. Fry until golden. Serve with hot sauce.

Colombian bandeja paisa simplified.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 2 cups white rice, 1 lb dried beans, 12 oz Mexican chorizo, 4 oz chicharrones, 4 large eggs, 8 oz arepa, 3 avocados, 1/2 cup plantains. Cook each component separately. Arrange all on large platter: rice, beans, ground beef, fried chorizo, chicharrones, fried egg, arepa, sliced avocado, fried sweet plantains.

ingredients: butter; Filling: 1 lb shredded beef or chicken
Arepa stuffed with everything.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 1/2 cups warm water, 1 tsp salt, 2 tbsp butter; Filling: 1 lb shredded beef or chicken, 1 cup black beans, 1 cup queso fresco (crumbled), 1 cup avocado (sliced), 1 cup plantains (fried), 1/2 cup crema, 1/2 cup pico de gallo, 1/4 cup cilantro (chopped). 1. Mix masarepa, water, and salt, let rest 5 min. 2. Knead dough, adding more water if needed for smooth consistency. 3. Divide into 6-8 balls, flatten into 4-inch discs about 1/2 inch thick. 4. Heat griddle or large skillet over medium heat with butter. 5. Cook arepas 5-7 min per side until golden crust forms. 6. Transfer to 350°F oven, bake 15-20 min until arepas sound hollow when tapped. 7. Slice arepas horizontally to create pocket. 8. Fill with black beans, shredded meat, queso fresco, avocado, fried plantains, crema, and pico de gallo. 9. Garnish with cilantro and serve immediately.

Pabell\u00f3n criollo simplified.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs beef brisket, 1 (15 oz) can black beans, drained, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 2 cups plantains, 1 large onion, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1/4 cup oil, 4 large eggs. Shred beef, sauté with onion, garlic, cumin until slightly crispy. Cook rice. Fry sweet plantain slices until caramelized. Plate with rice, beans, shredded beef, plantains. Optional fried egg on top.

Hallacas.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup flour, 4 cups chicken broth, 3 tablespoons oil, 3 lbs pork butt, 2.5 lbs chicken pieces, 2.5 lbs beef, 1 cup sliced black olives, 1/4 cup capers, 3/4 cup raisins, 1/3 cup banana leaves, chopped. Make masa with corn flour, broth, annatto oil. Cook meats in stew. Spread masa on banana leaf, add meats, olives, capers, raisins. Fold and tie. Boil 1 hour. Unwrap to serve.

Teque\u00f1os.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup wonton wrappers, 1 cup queso blanco, 3 tablespoons oil. Cut queso blanco into finger-length sticks. Wrap each cheese stick in wonton wrapper, sealing edges with water. Deep fry at 350°F until golden and crispy. Serve immediately while cheese is molten.

Churrasco with three sauces.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup picanha, 2 lbs ribeye steak, 3/4 cup chimichurri, 1.5 cups salsa, 2 cups aioli, 2 teaspoons coarse salt. Grill steaks over high heat to desired doneness. Slice. Serve with trio of sauces: green chimichurri, fresh salsa criolla, and garlic aioli.

Lomo saltado minus veggies.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs sirloin steak, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 2 tablespoons vinegar, 1 (32 oz) bag frozen fries, 2 cups white rice, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons cumin, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Cut beef into strips. Stir-fry over very high heat with garlic. Add soy sauce, vinegar, cumin. Toss with fresh hot french fries. Serve immediately with white rice.

Causa.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 2 tablespoons aji amarillo paste, 2 limes, juiced, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 4 lbs chicken, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1 large avocado, sliced. Make mashed potatoes with aji amarillo, lime juice, oil. Mix chicken with mayo. Layer in ring mold: potato, chicken, avocado, more potato. Unmold. Garnish with olives and egg.

Papa rellena.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 1 lb ground beef, 1.5 teaspoons cumin, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1 (6 oz) can sliced olives, 3 large eggs, 1/4 cup flour, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Make mashed potatoes. Season and cook beef with cumin and paprika. Form mashed potato around filling of beef, olive, and egg slice. Roll in flour. Deep fry at 350°F until golden.

Jalea.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup mixed seafood, 1 lb fish fillets, 1.5 lbs shrimp (21-25 count), 8 oz calamari, 1 cup flour, 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 1.5 cups salsa, 2 cups yuca, 2 limes, juiced, 1/4 cup oil. Cut fish into pieces. Dredge all seafood in seasoned flour and cornstarch. Deep fry until golden and crispy. Serve mounded high with fried yuca, salsa criolla, and lime wedges.

Arroz chaufa.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 cups leftover rice, 3 lbs pork butt, 4 large eggs, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1.5 tablespoons sesame oil, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Stir-fry diced pork until cooked. Scramble eggs, set aside. Add rice, stir-fry on high. Add soy sauce, ginger. Return pork and eggs. Drizzle sesame oil. Top with green onions.

Lomo saltado chaufa.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs sirloin steak, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 6 eggs, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 6 g reen onions, chopped, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1/4 cup vinegar. Stir-fry beef strips over high heat. Remove. Scramble eggs, set aside. Fry day-old rice with garlic, ginger until toasted. Add soy, sesame oil. Return beef and eggs. Top with scallions.

Tallarin saltado.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb spaghetti, 12 oz beef sirloin, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 2 tablespoons vinegar, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 1 (28 oz) can crushed tomatoes, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons cumin, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Cook spaghetti. Cut beef into strips. Stir-fry beef over high heat, remove. Stir-fry onion and tomatoes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, cumin. Return beef, toss with noodles.

Pollo a la brasa.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lbs chicken, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 limes, juiced, 2 teaspoons cumin, 2 teaspoons paprika, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil. Blend marinade: soy sauce, lime juice, cumin, paprika, garlic, oregano, oil. Marinate chicken overnight. Roast at 400°F or spit-roast until skin is crispy and internal temp 165°F. Serve with aji verde and fries.

Aji verde sauce.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 tablespoons aji amarillo paste, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1/2 cup cilantro, 3 limes, 4 cloves garlic, minced. Blend all ingredients until smooth. Adjust lime juice and salt to taste. Refrigerate 30 minutes for flavors to meld. Serve with chicken, steak, or potatoes.

Seco de cordero.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs lamb leg, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, 1 (12 oz) bottle beer, 1 large onion, diced, 5 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups aji amarillo, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 2 lbs Yukon gold potatoes, diced, 2 cups cooked beans, 1.5 cups long-grain white rice. Blend cilantro to make sauce. Brown lamb pieces. Add onion, garlic, aji amarillo, cumin. Add cilantro sauce and beer. Braise until tender. Serve with potatoes, beans, and rice.

Tacu tacu.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 cups long-grain white rice, 1 lb dried beans, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups aji amarillo, 3 large eggs, 2 lbs ribeye steak, 1/4 cup oil. Mash day-old rice and beans together. Form into thick patty. Fry in oil until crispy on both sides. Serve topped with fried egg and pan-seared steak.

Ceviche.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz white fish, 3 limes, 1 medium yellow onion, chopped, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro, 3 cups 1 serrano pepper, diced, 1/2 cup tostadas. Dice fish small. 'Cook' in lime juice 20-30 minutes until opaque. Add sliced red onion, chopped cilantro, minced serrano, salt. Serve immediately on tostadas.

Tiradito.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/3 cup fresh fish, chopped, 3 limes, 1 tablespoon aji amarillo paste, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 3 tablespoons fish sauce, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, 3 cups fresh corn. Slice fish paper thin. Make sauce with lime juice, aji amarillo paste, garlic, ginger. Arrange fish on plate. Pour sauce over just before serving. Garnish with cilantro and toasted corn.

Leche de tigre.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz fish scraps, 3 limes, 2 cups aji amarillo, 2 medium onions, diced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons grated ginger, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, 3 cups fish stock. Blend fish scraps with lime juice, aji amarillo, onion, garlic, ginger, cilantro, and fish stock. Strain through fine mesh. Season with salt. Serve chilled as a shot or with fresh fish.

Aguachile.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz shrimp, 3 limes, 1 lb 1 serrano pepper, diced, 1 large cucumber, sliced, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro, 1 cup tostadas. Butterfly shrimp, 'cook' in lime juice 15 minutes. Blend lime juice with serranos and cilantro. Slice cucumber. Toss shrimp with green sauce, top with cucumber. Serve on tostadas.

Ceviche de camar\u00f3n.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 oz shrimp, 1 lime, juiced and zested, 2 (14.5 oz) cans diced tomatoes, 1 large onion, diced, 2 medium cucumbers, diced, 3 s errano peppers, sliced, 1/3 cup fresh cilantro, 2 teaspoons hot sauce.
