In large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt. 4. In separate bowl, whisk together milk, eggs, and vanilla. Add wet ingredients to dry and whisk until smooth. 5. Insert wooden skewer into each frozen Twinkie. Dip in batter, coating completely and sealing ends. 6. Carefully lower battered Twinkies into hot oil, frying 2-3 at a time for 2-3 minutes, turning occasionally, until deep golden brown. 7. Remove with slotted spoon and drain on paper towels. Remove skewers carefully. 8. Dust heavily with powdered sugar. 9. Drizzle with strawberry sauce and top with whipped cream. Serve immediately while hot and gooey inside.

Deep fried butter.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup unsalted butter, cold, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tbsp sugar, 2 tsp baking powder, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 1 1/4 cups whole milk, 1 large egg, 1 cup powdered sugar, 2 tsp cinnamon. 1. Cut butter into 12 equal pieces. Roll each piece into a ball and freeze for at least 3 hours until rock solid. 2. In large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon. 3. In separate bowl, whisk together milk and egg. Add to dry ingredients and mix until smooth batter forms. 4. Heat vegetable oil in deep fryer or large heavy pot to 375°F. 5. Working quickly, dip each frozen butter ball in batter, coating completely. 6. Immediately drop into hot oil and fry for 45-60 seconds until golden brown (don't fry longer or butter will leak out). 7. Remove with slotted spoon and drain briefly on paper towels. 8. Mix powdered sugar and cinnamon. Roll fried butter balls in cinnamon sugar while still hot. 9. Drizzle with honey and serve immediately. Warning: these are molten butter inside!

Deep fried Snickers.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup snickers, 1 lb pancake mix, 1 cup whole milk, 1/3 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup caramel sauce. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Prepare ingredients as listed. 2. In large skillet over medium-high heat, cook main protein 3-4 min until golden brown and cooked through. Season with salt and pepper. 3. In separate pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add aromatics, cook 2-3 min until fragrant. 4. Combine all ingredients in baking dish. Top with cheese. 5. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and golden. Let rest 5 min before serving.

Deep fried cheesecake.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup cheesecake cheese, shredded, 1 cup sliced graham cracker crumbs, 2 eggs egg, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tbsp vegetable oil, 1 cup strawberry sauce. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Prepare ingredients as listed. 2. In large skillet over medium-high heat, cook main protein 15-20 min until golden brown and cooked through. Season with salt and pepper. 3. In separate pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add aromatics, cook 2-3 min until fragrant. 4. Combine all ingredients in baking dish. Top with cheese. 5. Bake 8-10 min until bubbly and golden. Let rest 5 min before serving.

Deep fried ice cream.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 quart premium vanilla ice cream, 4 cups crushed corn flakes, 1 cup shredded coconut, 2 tsp cinnamon, 4 large eggs, beaten, 1 cup chocolate syrup, 1 cup caramel sauce, 2 cups whipped cream, 1/2 cup chopped pecans, 4 maraschino cherries. 1. Line baking sheet with parchment. Scoop 6 large ice cream balls using ice cream scoop. Freeze for 4 hours until rock solid. 2. Mix crushed corn flakes, coconut, and cinnamon in shallow dish. 3. Working very quickly, dip one frozen ice cream ball in beaten egg, then roll in corn flake mixture, pressing firmly. Return immediately to freezer. 4. Repeat with remaining balls. Freeze for 2 hours. 5. Double coat: Repeat egg and corn flake coating process once more for each ball. Freeze overnight. 6. Heat 3 inches of oil in large heavy pot to 375°F. 7. Fry ice cream balls one at a time for exactly 20-30 seconds, turning once, until golden. 8. Remove immediately and place in bowl. 9. Drizzle with chocolate syrup and caramel. Top with whipped cream, pecans, and cherry. 10. Serve immediately.

Fried mac and cheese balls.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups macaroni, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, shredded, 12 oz cream cheese, softened, 8 slices bread crumbs, 4 eggs egg, 2 tbsp vegetable oil. 1. Heat oil in deep pot to 350°F for frying. 2. Prepare breading station: flour in first bowl, beaten eggs in second, breadcrumbs in third. 3. Coat items in flour, dip in egg, roll in breadcrumbs. For extra crispy, double bread by repeating egg and breadcrumb steps. 4. Fry in batches 4-5 min until golden brown. Don't overcrowd. Maintain oil temperature. 5. Drain on paper towels, season with salt immediately. Serve hot.

Chicken fried bacon.directions: Ingredients needed: 16 strips thick-cut bacon, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tsp garlic powder, 2 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp cayenne pepper, 2 tsp black pepper, 2 tsp salt, 3 large eggs, 1 cup buttermilk, 4 tbsp butter, 1/4 cup flour (for gravy), 2 cups whole milk, 1 tsp black pepper. 1. Partially cook bacon in oven at 350°F for 10 minutes until some fat renders but bacon is still pliable. Drain and cool. 2. In shallow dish, mix 2 cups flour, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne, black pepper, and salt. 3. In another dish, whisk eggs and buttermilk. 4. Dip each bacon strip in egg mixture, then dredge in seasoned flour. Dip in egg again, then flour again for double coating. 5. Heat 1 inch of vegetable oil in large skillet to 350°F. 6. Fry bacon strips in batches for 2-3 minutes per side until golden brown and crispy. Drain on wire rack. 7. Make gravy: Pour off all but 4 tbsp frying oil. Add butter and melt. Whisk in 1/4 cup flour, cook 2 minutes. 8. Gradually whisk in milk. Simmer and whisk for 5-7 minutes until thick. Season with pepper. 9. Serve chicken fried bacon with gravy for dipping, plus ranch on the side. 10. Best enjoyed hot and crispy.

Deep fried pizza rolls.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, 2 cups mozzarella, shredded, 1 cup pepperoni, diced, 1 cup cooked Italian sausage, crumbled, 1/2 cup pizza sauce, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 2 cups marinara sauce, warmed. 1. Divide pizza dough into 16 pieces. Roll each into 4-inch circle. 2. In bowl, mix mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, pizza sauce, Parmesan, Italian seasoning. 3. Place 2 tbsp filling in center of each dough circle. Fold dough over filling, pinch edges to seal completely like empanada. Ensure no filling escapes. 4. Heat 3 inches oil in large pot to 350°F. Working in batches, fry pizza rolls 3-4 min, turning once, until golden brown and puffy. Don't overcrowd. 5. Remove to paper towel-lined plate. Immediately brush with garlic butter. 6. Serve hot with warm marinara sauce for dipping.

Bacon wrapped jalape\u00f1o poppers.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 large jalapeños, 8 oz cream cheese, softened, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 12 strips bacon (not thick-cut), 1/2 tsp garlic powder. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Line baking sheet with foil, place wire rack on top. 2. Cut jalapeños in half lengthwise. Remove seeds and membranes (wear gloves!). 3. Mix cream cheese, cheddar, and garlic powder. Fill each jalapeño half with cheese mixture. 4. Wrap each stuffed half with 1/2 strip bacon, securing with toothpick if needed. 5. Place on rack. Bake 20-25 min until bacon is crispy and cheese is bubbly.

Bacon wrapped hot dogs.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 beef hot dogs, 16 strips thick-cut bacon, 8 hot dog buns, toasted, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup diced onions, grilled, 1/2 cup diced jalapeños, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup ketchup, 1/4 cup yellow mustard, 1/4 cup sweet relish. 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat (400°F) or preheat oven to 400°F. 2. Wrap each hot dog with 2 strips of bacon in a spiral pattern, securing ends with toothpicks. 3. If grilling: Place bacon-wrapped hot dogs on grill, turning every 3-4 minutes until bacon is crispy all around, about 12-15 minutes total. 4. If baking: Place on wire rack over baking sheet. Bake for 25-30 minutes, turning halfway, until bacon is crispy. 5. During last 2 minutes of cooking, toast hot dog buns on grill or under broiler. 6. Remove toothpicks from hot dogs. Place each in a toasted bun. 7. Top generously with shredded cheddar, grilled onions, and jalapeños. 8. Drizzle with mayonnaise, ketchup, mustard, and relish. Serve immediately.

Bacon wrapped meatloaf.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 12 strips thick-cut bacon, 1 cup medium, diced onion, 8 slices bread crumbs, 2 eggs egg, 1/2 cup ketchup, 2 cups 1/4 cup packed brown sugar. 1. Heat oil in deep pot to 350°F for frying. 2. Prepare breading station: flour in first bowl, beaten eggs in second, breadcrumbs in third. 3. Coat items in flour, dip in egg, roll in breadcrumbs. For extra crispy, double bread by repeating egg and breadcrumb steps. 4. Fry in batches 2-3 min until golden brown. Don't overcrowd. Maintain oil temperature. 5. Drain on paper towels, season with salt immediately. Serve hot.

Bacon wrapped chicken thighs.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 1/2 lbs chicken thighs, 12 strips thick-cut bacon, 1 lb 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 2 tsp paprika, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp (to taste) black pepper to taste. 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. Line baking sheet with foil or parchment. 2. Season main ingredients with salt, pepper, and spices. Arrange in single layer on prepared sheet. 3. Drizzle with oil or dot with butter. 4. Bake 20-25 min, flipping halfway through if needed. 5. Top with cheese last 5 min of cooking. 6. Let rest 5 min, garnish and serve hot.

Bacon wrapped tater tots.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb tater tots, 12 strips thick-cut bacon, 1 lb 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 2 tsp 1/4 tsp cayenne, 1 cup 1/4 cup maple syrup. 1. Heat oil in deep pot to 350°F for frying. 2. Prepare breading station: flour in first bowl, beaten eggs in second, breadcrumbs in third. 3. Coat items in flour, dip in egg, roll in breadcrumbs. For extra crispy, double bread by repeating egg and breadcrumb steps. 4. Fry in batches 2-3 min until golden brown. Don't overcrowd. Maintain oil temperature. 5. Drain on paper towels, season with salt immediately. Serve hot.

Bacon wrapped onion rings.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 large sweet onions, 16 strips thick-cut bacon, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 cups panko breadcrumbs, 3 large eggs, beaten, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Line baking sheet with parchment paper and place wire rack on top. 2. Cut onions into 1-inch thick slices and separate into rings. Use the 16 largest rings. 3. Wrap each onion ring with 1 strip of bacon, securing ends with toothpick. 4. Set up breading station: flour in one dish, beaten eggs in second dish, panko mixed with garlic powder, paprika, and pepper in third dish. 5. Dredge each bacon-wrapped ring in flour, dip in egg, then coat in seasoned panko. 6. Place rings on wire rack. Bake for 30-35 minutes, flipping halfway, until bacon is crispy and onions are tender. 7. For extra crispy finish, broil for 2-3 minutes watching carefully. 8. Remove toothpicks. Serve hot with ranch and BBQ sauce for dipping.

Four cheese bacon mac.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb elbow macaroni, 8 slices bacon, chopped, 6 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup flour, 3 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 2 cups sharp cheddar, shredded, 1 cup Gruyere, shredded, 1 cup white cheddar, shredded, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook macaroni in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain well. Cook bacon in skillet until crispy, drain on paper towels. 2. In large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min, stirring constantly, to make roux. Gradually whisk in milk and cream. Bring to simmer, cook 5 min, whisking, until thickened. 3. Reduce heat to low. Add sharp cheddar, Gruyere, white cheddar, and half the Parmesan. Stir until melted and smooth. Add garlic powder, onion powder, salt, pepper. 4. Fold in cooked macaroni and bacon. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. 5. Toss panko with remaining Parmesan and 2 tbsp melted butter. Sprinkle over mac and cheese. 6. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and breadcrumbs are golden. Broil 2 min for extra browning. Rest 5 min before serving.

Loaded mac and cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb elbow macaroni, 8 slices bacon, chopped, 6 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup flour, 3 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 3 cups sharp cheddar, shredded, 1 cup Gruyere, shredded, 1 cup sour cream, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 4 g reen onions, sliced, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook macaroni in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain. Cook bacon until crispy, drain on paper towels. 2. In large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min to make roux. Gradually whisk in milk and cream. Simmer 5 min, whisking, until thickened. 3. Reduce heat to low. Add cheddar and Gruyere, stir until melted. Remove from heat, stir in sour cream, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, pepper. 4. Fold in macaroni, bacon, and green onions. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. 5. Toss panko with 3 tbsp melted butter, sprinkle on top. 6. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and golden. Rest 5 min before serving.

Brisket mac and cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb elbow macaroni, 2 lbs smoked beef brisket, chopped, 6 tbsp unsalted butter, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 4 cups whole milk, 3 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese, 2 cups shredded smoked gouda cheese, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 tsp black pepper, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 2 tsp salt, 1 cup BBQ sauce, 2 cups french fried onions, 1/4 cup chopped green onions. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Butter 9x13-inch baking dish. 2. Cook macaroni in salted boiling water until al dente. Drain and set aside. 3. In large pot over medium heat, melt butter. Whisk in flour and cook for 2-3 minutes. 4. Gradually whisk in milk. Simmer, whisking frequently, for 7-8 minutes until thick. 5. Remove from heat. Stir in cheddar, gouda, and Parmesan until melted. Season with pepper, paprika, and salt. 6. Fold in cooked pasta and chopped brisket. Pour half into prepared dish. 7. Drizzle 1/2 cup BBQ sauce over first layer. Add remaining mac and cheese. 8. Drizzle remaining BBQ sauce on top. Sprinkle with french fried onions. 9. Bake for 20-25 minutes until bubbly and onions are golden. 10. Garnish with green onions and serve hot.

Philly cheesesteak supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ribeye steak, thinly sliced, 4 hoagie rolls, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 2 large onions, sliced, 2 bell peppers, sliced, 8 oz mushrooms, sliced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 12 slices provolone cheese, 1 cup Cheese Whiz, warmed, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce. 1. In large skillet or on griddle over medium-high heat, melt 4 tbsp butter. Add onions and cook 8-10 minutes until caramelized. Remove and set aside. 2. Add another 2 tbsp butter. Cook bell peppers for 5-6 minutes until softened. Remove and set aside. 3. Add 2 tbsp butter and cook mushrooms for 5-6 minutes until browned. Add garlic, cook 1 minute. Remove and set aside. 4. Add remaining butter to hot griddle. Add sliced steak in single layer. Season with salt, pepper, and Worcestershire sauce. 5. Cook steak for 2-3 minutes without stirring to get good sear. Flip and cook another 2 minutes. 6. Divide steak into 4 portions on griddle. Top each portion with cooked onions, peppers, and mushrooms. 7. Place 3 slices provolone on each portion. Cover with dome or foil to melt cheese, about 2 minutes. 8. Split hoagie rolls and toast cut sides on griddle. 9. Spread Cheese Whiz generously inside each roll. 10. Using spatula, scoop each steak portion into a roll. Top with hot pepper relish if desired. Serve immediately.

Triple decker club.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 slices thick-cut white bread, toasted, 1 lb sliced turkey breast, 1 lb sliced ham, 16 strips bacon, cooked crispy, 8 slices American cheese, 8 slices Swiss cheese, 8 slices cheddar cheese, 2 large tomatoes, sliced, 8 lettuce leaves, 1 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup Dijon mustard, 16 toothpicks with decorative tops. 1. Cook bacon until crispy. Drain and set aside. 2. Toast all bread slices until golden brown. 3. Mix mayonnaise and Dijon mustard for spread. 4. For each of 4 sandwiches: Start with first toast slice, spread with mayo-mustard mixture. 5. Layer: 2 lettuce leaves, 1/4 of turkey, 2 slices American cheese, 2 strips bacon, tomato slices. 6. Add second toast slice. Spread both sides with mayo-mustard. 7. Layer: 1/4 of ham, 2 slices Swiss cheese, 2 strips bacon, 2 slices cheddar cheese. 8. Top with third toast slice, spread side down. 9. Press sandwich down gently. Cut into 4 triangular quarters. 10. Secure each quarter with decorative toothpick. Serve with potato chips.

Patty melt supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 1/2 lbs ground beef, 1 cup swiss cheese, shredded, 1 cup american cheese, shredded, 2 cups medium, diced caramelized onion, 8 slices rye bread, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup thousand island dressing. 1. Heat oil in deep pot to 375°F for frying. 2. Prepare breading station: flour in first bowl, beaten eggs in second, breadcrumbs in third. 3. Coat items in flour, dip in egg, roll in breadcrumbs. For extra crispy, double bread by repeating egg and breadcrumb steps. 4. Fry in batches 2-3 min until golden brown. Don't overcrowd. Maintain oil temperature. 5. Drain on paper towels, season with salt immediately. Serve hot.

ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts (6-8 oz each)
Fried chicken sandwich deluxe.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (6-8 oz each), 2 cups buttermilk, 2 tbsp hot sauce, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tbsp paprika, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp onion powder, 2 tsp cayenne pepper, 2 tsp black pepper, 1 tbsp salt, 4 brioche buns, toasted with butter, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tbsp hot sauce, 8 slices thick-cut bacon, cooked crispy, 4 slices pepper jack cheese, 1 cup shredded lettuce, 8 pickle slices, 4 slices tomato. 1. Pound chicken breasts to even 1/2-inch thickness. In large bowl, combine buttermilk and hot sauce. Add chicken and marinate for at least 2 hours or overnight. 2. In large shallow dish, whisk together flour, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne, black pepper, and salt. 3. Heat 2 inches of vegetable oil in large heavy skillet or Dutch oven to 350°F. 4. Remove chicken from buttermilk, allowing excess to drip off. Dredge in seasoned flour, pressing firmly to coat. Dip back in buttermilk, then dredge in flour again for extra crispy coating. 5. Carefully lower chicken into hot oil, frying 2 pieces at a time. Fry for 6-7 minutes per side until deep golden brown and internal temperature reaches 165°F. 6. Drain on wire rack. 7. Mix mayonnaise and hot sauce for spicy mayo. 8. Spread spicy mayo on both sides of toasted brioche buns. 9. On bottom bun, layer lettuce, fried chicken, 2 strips bacon, pepper jack cheese, pickles, and tomato. 10. Crown with top bun and secure with toothpick. Serve immediately.

French dip with extra au jus.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck roast, thinly sliced, 4 hoagie rolls, 8 slices provolone cheese, 4 cups beef broth, 2 cups water, 1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp dried thyme, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp black pepper, 1 tsp salt, 2 tbsp butter. 1. Preheat oven to 300°F. In large Dutch oven, combine beef broth, water, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, onion powder, thyme, bay leaves, salt, and pepper. 2. Add sliced beef to liquid, cover, and cook in oven for 2.5-3 hours until beef is very tender. 3. Remove beef from liquid with slotted spoon. Strain au jus and keep hot. 4. Split hoagie rolls and butter insides. Toast under broiler for 2-3 minutes until golden. 5. Pile beef high on toasted rolls, top each with 2 slices provolone cheese. 6. Return to broiler for 1-2 minutes until cheese melts. 7. Serve sandwiches with generous bowls of hot au jus for dipping. The more au jus, the better!

Cuban sandwich pressed.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 loaf Cuban bread (or French bread), 1 lb roasted pork shoulder, sliced thin, 1 lb ham, sliced, 12 slices Swiss cheese, 1 cup dill pickles, sliced, 1/2 cup yellow mustard, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened. 1. Preheat panini press or large skillet to medium-high heat (375°F). 2. Cut Cuban bread into 4 portions. Slice each portion in half horizontally. 3. Spread mustard generously on both cut sides of bread. 4. On bottom half, layer 3 slices Swiss cheese, then ham, then roasted pork, then pickles, then remaining cheese. 5. Top with other half of bread. Butter outside of sandwich generously. 6. Place sandwich in press (or in skillet with heavy pan on top). 7. Press and cook for 4-5 minutes per side until bread is crispy and golden and cheese is melted. 8. Remove from heat, let rest 2 minutes. Cut diagonally and serve hot.

ingredients: bags (14 oz each) restaurant-style tortilla chips
Supreme loaded nachos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 bags (14 oz each) restaurant-style tortilla chips, 4 cups shredded Mexican blend cheese, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1.5 lbs ground beef, 1 packet taco seasoning, 3/4 cup water, 2 cans (15 oz each) refried beans, 1.5 cups queso sauce, warmed, 1.5 cups sour cream, 1.5 cups guacamole, 1.5 cups pico de gallo, 1 cup sliced black olives, 1 cup pickled jalapeño slices, 1/2 cup sliced green onions, 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper. 2. Cook ground beef in skillet over medium-high heat until browned, about 10 minutes. Drain fat, add taco seasoning and water, simmer 5 minutes. 3. Warm refried beans in saucepan over medium heat until spreadable. 4. Divide chips between baking sheets. Drop spoonfuls of refried beans over chips. Sprinkle with Mexican blend and cheddar cheese. 5. Bake for 8-10 minutes until cheese melts completely. 6. Remove from oven and immediately top with seasoned ground beef. 7. Drizzle warm queso sauce generously all over. 8. Add large dollops of sour cream and guacamole throughout. 9. Top with pico de gallo, black olives, jalapeños, green onions, and cilantro. 10. Serve immediately with lime wedges.

Pulled pork nachos.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 bag (14 oz) restaurant-style tortilla chips, 2 lbs pulled pork (leftover or prepared), 3 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese, 1 cup BBQ sauce, 1 cup coleslaw, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup pickled jalapeños, 1/4 cup sliced green onions. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Line large baking sheet with parchment paper. 2. If pulled pork is cold, warm it in skillet with 1/2 cup BBQ sauce over medium heat for 5-7 minutes. 3. Spread tortilla chips on baking sheet. Top with cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese. 4. Bake for 6-8 minutes until cheese melts. 5. Remove from oven and immediately top with hot pulled pork. 6. Drizzle remaining BBQ sauce over pork. 7. Top with coleslaw, sour cream, and jalapeños. 8. Garnish with green onions and drizzle ranch dressing over everything. 9. Serve immediately while hot.

Carnitas nachos.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 bag (14 oz) restaurant-style tortilla chips, 2 lbs pork carnitas, shredded, 3 cups shredded Oaxaca cheese (or mozzarella), 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup refried beans, warmed, 1 cup salsa verde, 1 cup Mexican crema (or sour cream), 1 cup guacamole, 1/2 cup diced white onion, 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 2 limes, cut into wedges. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Line large baking sheet with parchment. 2. Spread tortilla chips on baking sheet. Drop spoonfuls of refried beans over chips. 3. Top with Oaxaca cheese and cheddar cheese. Bake for 7-9 minutes until cheese melts. 4. While nachos bake, heat carnitas in skillet over medium-high heat for 5 minutes until crispy. 5. Remove nachos from oven. Top with hot crispy carnitas. 6. Drizzle salsa verde generously over everything. 7. Add dollops of Mexican crema and guacamole. 8. Sprinkle with diced onion and cilantro. 9. Serve immediately with lime wedges and pickled jalapeños on the side.

Stuffed crust pizza.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, room temperature, 16 mozzarella string cheese sticks, 1 1/2 cups pizza sauce, 3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 cup shredded provolone cheese, 20 slices pepperoni, 1/2 cup sliced mushrooms, 1/2 cup sliced black olives, 1/2 cup diced bell peppers, 4 tbsp unsalted butter, melted, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp grated Parmesan cheese, 1 tsp Italian seasoning. 1. Preheat oven to 475°F. Grease large round pizza pan (14-16 inch). 2. Roll pizza dough into 16-inch circle on lightly floured surface. 3. Transfer dough to prepared pan, letting excess hang over edges. 4. Arrange string cheese sticks end-to-end around perimeter of dough, about 1 inch from edge. 5. Fold excess dough over cheese sticks, pinching and pressing firmly to seal cheese inside, creating stuffed crust. 6. Prick center of dough several times with fork. 7. Spread pizza sauce evenly over dough, leaving stuffed crust exposed. 8. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella and provolone cheese over sauce. 9. Top with pepperoni, mushrooms, black olives, and bell peppers. 10. Bake for 15-18 minutes until crust is golden brown and cheese is bubbly and starting to brown. 11. While pizza bakes, mix melted butter with minced garlic. 12. Remove pizza from oven. Brush stuffed crust with garlic butter and sprinkle with Parmesan and Italian seasoning. 13. Let cool for 5 minutes, slice, and serve with red pepper flakes.

Triple cheese quesadilla.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 large flour tortillas (10-inch), 3 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 2 cups shredded Oaxaca cheese (or mozzarella), 1 cup sautéed onions and peppers, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened, 2 cups sour cream for serving, 2 cups guacamole for serving, 2 cups salsa for serving. 1. Heat large skillet or griddle over medium heat (350°F). 2. Butter one side of each tortilla. 3. Place one tortilla butter-side down in skillet. 4. Sprinkle with 3/4 cup Monterey Jack, 1/2 cup cheddar, and 1/2 cup Oaxaca cheese. Add 1/4 cup sautéed vegetables. 5. Top with another tortilla, butter-side up. 6. Cook for 3-4 minutes until bottom is golden brown and crispy. Carefully flip. 7. Cook another 3-4 minutes until second side is golden and cheese is fully melted. 8. Remove to cutting board and let rest 2 minutes. Cut into 6 wedges. 9. Repeat with remaining tortillas. 10. Serve hot with sour cream, guacamole, and salsa for dipping.

Cheesy garlic bread supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 large Italian loaf, 1 cup butter, softened, 8 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1/2 tsp salt, 3 cups mozzarella, shredded, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 1 cup cheddar, shredded, 8 oz cream cheese, softened, 1/2 cup sour cream. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cut Italian loaf in half lengthwise. In bowl, mix butter, garlic, parsley, Italian seasoning, salt. Spread generously on both cut sides of bread. 2. In another bowl, mix cream cheese and sour cream until smooth. Spread over garlic butter. 3. In bowl, combine mozzarella, Parmesan, and cheddar. Pile cheese mixture generously on both bread halves. 4. Place on baking sheet. Bake 15-20 min until cheese is melted and bubbly and bread edges are golden. 5. Broil 2-3 min for extra browning and crispy cheese. Slice into pieces. Serve hot with marinara sauce for dipping.

Cheese-stuffed meatballs.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 1/2 lb Italian sausage, 1 cup breadcrumbs, 1/2 cup milk, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 8 oz mozzarella, cut into 20 cubes, 3 cups marinara sauce, 1 lb spaghetti. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Soak breadcrumbs in milk 5 min. In large bowl, combine beef, sausage, soaked breadcrumbs, eggs, Parmesan, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper. Mix gently. 2. Take 2 tbsp meat mixture, flatten in palm. Place mozzarella cube in center, wrap meat around cheese, seal completely. Form into ball. Repeat to make 20 meatballs. Place on baking sheet. 3. Bake 20-22 min until browned and cooked through (internal temp 160°F). 4. Heat marinara in large pot. Add baked meatballs, simmer gently 15 min. 5. Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente. Serve pasta topped with cheese-stuffed meatballs and sauce. Garnish with basil and Parmesan.

Breakfast burrito supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 large flour tortillas (12-inch burrito size), 12 large eggs, 1/2 cup whole milk, 1 lb breakfast sausage, 1 lb bacon, cooked and crumbled, 3 cups frozen hash browns, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup salsa, 1/2 cup diced green chiles, 1/4 cup butter. 1. Cook breakfast sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat until browned, about 10 minutes. Remove and set aside. 2. In same skillet, cook hash browns in sausage fat until crispy and golden, about 12 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside. 3. In bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. 4. Melt butter in clean skillet over medium heat. Add eggs and scramble until fluffy and just set, about 5-6 minutes. 5. Warm tortillas in microwave for 30 seconds to make pliable. 6. On each tortilla, layer scrambled eggs, sausage, bacon, hash browns, cheddar, and Monterey Jack cheese. 7. Add sour cream, salsa, and green chiles. 8. Fold in sides of tortilla, then roll tightly from bottom to top. 9. Optional: Grill seam-side down in skillet for 2-3 minutes to seal and crisp. 10. Cut in half and serve with hot sauce.

Monte Cristo sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 slices thick-cut white bread, 8 slices deli turkey, 8 slices deli ham, 8 slices Swiss cheese, 4 large eggs, 1/2 cup whole milk, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, 1 cup raspberry preserves for serving. 1. Make sandwiches: On each of 4 bread slices, layer 2 slices turkey, 2 slices ham, and 2 slices Swiss cheese. Top with remaining bread slices. 2. In shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, and nutmeg. 3. Heat large skillet over medium heat (325°F). Add 2 tbsp butter and let melt. 4. Dip each sandwich in egg mixture, coating both sides thoroughly. Let excess drip off. 5. Place 2 sandwiches in skillet. Cook for 4-5 minutes per side until golden brown and cheese is melted. 6. Remove to plate and keep warm. Repeat with remaining butter and sandwiches. 7. Cut each sandwich diagonally. Dust generously with powdered sugar. 8. Serve hot with raspberry preserves and maple syrup for dipping.

Chicken and waffles loaded.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 2 cups buttermilk, 2 tbsp hot sauce, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tbsp paprika, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 2 tsp cayenne pepper, 2 tbsp salt, 8 Belgian waffles (prepared), 1 cup unsalted butter, melted, 1 cup pure maple syrup, 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 cup hot sauce. 1. Pound chicken breasts to even thickness. Marinate in buttermilk and 2 tbsp hot sauce for at least 4 hours. 2. In shallow dish, mix flour, paprika, garlic powder, cayenne, and salt. 3. Heat 2 inches of oil in large skillet to 350°F. 4. Remove chicken from buttermilk. Dredge in seasoned flour, pressing firmly. Dip back in buttermilk, then flour again for double coating. 5. Fry chicken for 7-8 minutes per side until deep golden brown and internal temp reaches 165°F. 6. Drain on wire rack. Keep warm in 200°F oven. 7. Prepare or warm Belgian waffles. 8. Mix maple syrup, honey, and 1/4 cup hot sauce for spicy syrup. 9. Place 2 waffles on each plate. Top each waffle with fried chicken breast. 10. Drizzle with melted butter and spicy maple syrup. Dust with powdered sugar. Serve immediately.

ingredients: For biscuits: 2 cups flour, 1 tbsp baking powder, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 cup cold butter, 3/4 cup buttermilk
For gravy: 1 lb breakfast sausage, 1/3 cup flour, 3 cups whole milk, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/4 tsp cayenne
Biscuits and gravy loaded.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 eggs, fried, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 4 strips bacon, cooked and crumbled, 2 g reen onions, sliced. 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. Make biscuits: Mix flour, baking powder, salt. Cut in cold butter until crumbly. Stir in buttermilk. Pat 3/4 inch thick, cut rounds. Bake 12-15 min until golden. 2. Make gravy: Brown sausage in large skillet, breaking into crumbles. Don't drain. Sprinkle flour over sausage, cook 1 min. Gradually add milk, whisking constantly. Simmer 5-7 min until thick. Season with pepper and cayenne. 3. Fry eggs. 4. Split biscuits, ladle gravy over. Top with fried egg, cheese, bacon, green onions.

Elvis french toast.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 slices thick-cut Texas toast, 1 cup creamy peanut butter, 4 ripe bananas, sliced, 12 strips bacon, cooked crispy, 4 large eggs, 1 cup whole milk, 2 tsp vanilla extract, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, 1/2 cup honey. 1. Make peanut butter banana sandwiches: Spread peanut butter generously on 4 slices of bread. Top with sliced bananas and 3 strips of crispy bacon each. Top with remaining bread slices. 2. In shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon. 3. Heat large skillet or griddle over medium heat (325°F). Add 2 tbsp butter. 4. Dip each sandwich in egg mixture, coating both sides thoroughly. 5. Place sandwiches in skillet. Cook for 4-5 minutes per side until deep golden brown and crispy. 6. Add remaining butter as needed between batches. 7. Remove to serving plates. Cut diagonally. 8. Drizzle generously with honey. Dust with powdered sugar. 9. Top with whipped cream. Serve immediately while hot.

ingredients: unsalted butter, plus more for greasing
Triple chocolate lava cake.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup unsalted butter, plus more for greasing, 8 oz dark chocolate (70% cacao), chopped, 4 oz milk chocolate, chopped, 4 oz white chocolate chips (for center), 4 large eggs, 4 large egg yolks, 1/2 cup granulated sugar, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup cocoa powder, 1/2 tsp salt, 2 tsp vanilla extract. 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. Generously butter six 6-oz ramekins and dust with cocoa powder. Place on baking sheet. 2. In microwave-safe bowl, melt butter, dark chocolate, and milk chocolate together in 30-second intervals, stirring until smooth. Let cool slightly. 3. In large bowl, whisk eggs, egg yolks, and sugar vigorously for 3 minutes until thick and pale. 4. Fold melted chocolate mixture into egg mixture. 5. Sift flour, cocoa powder, and salt over mixture. Fold in gently with vanilla. 6. Fill each ramekin halfway with batter. Place 5-6 white chocolate chips in center of each. Top with remaining batter, covering chocolate completely. 7. Bake for 13-15 minutes. Edges should be set but centers should jiggle when shaken. 8. Remove from oven and let cool 1 minute. Run knife around edges. 9. Invert each onto serving plate, let sit 10 seconds, then lift off ramekin. 10. Top with vanilla ice cream, drizzle with chocolate syrup, add whipped cream. Serve immediately while centers flow.

ingredients: box (18 oz) brownie mix, plus ingredients per package
Brownie sundae supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 box (18 oz) brownie mix, plus ingredients per package, 1/2 cup chocolate chips (added to brownies), 1 quart vanilla ice cream, 1 quart chocolate ice cream, 2 cups hot fudge sauce, warmed, 1 cup caramel sauce, warmed, 2 cups whipped cream, 1 cup chopped peanuts, 1/2 cup mini chocolate chips, 1/4 cup rainbow sprinkles, 4 maraschino cherries. 1. Preheat oven per brownie package directions. Grease 9x13-inch pan. 2. Prepare brownie batter according to package. Fold in 1/2 cup chocolate chips. 3. Pour into pan and bake per package directions until just set (don't overbake - keep fudgy). 4. Let brownies cool for 20 minutes, then cut into large squares. 5. For each sundae: Place warm brownie in bowl. Top with 1 scoop vanilla ice cream and 1 scoop chocolate ice cream. 6. Drizzle generously with hot fudge and caramel sauce. 7. Top with large dollop of whipped cream. 8. Sprinkle with peanuts, mini chocolate chips, and rainbow sprinkles. 9. Crown with maraschino cherry. 10. Serve immediately with spoon.

Cookie skillet a la mode.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 cup unsalted butter, melted, 1 cup light brown sugar, packed, 1/2 cup granulated sugar, 2 large eggs, 2 tsp vanilla extract, 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tsp baking soda, 1 tsp salt, 2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips, 1 cup chopped walnuts (optional), 1 pint premium vanilla ice cream. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 12-inch cast iron skillet with butter. 2. In large bowl, whisk together melted butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar until smooth. 3. Beat in eggs and vanilla extract until well combined. 4. In separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt. 5. Fold dry ingredients into wet ingredients until just combined. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts. 6. Press cookie dough evenly into prepared skillet. 7. Bake for 25-30 minutes until edges are golden brown and center is still slightly soft. 8. Remove from oven and let cool for 5 minutes. 9. Top warm cookie with generous scoops of vanilla ice cream, drizzle with chocolate syrup, and add dollops of whipped cream. Serve immediately with spoons.

Fried banana split.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 ripe but firm bananas, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 tbsp granulated sugar, 1 tsp baking powder, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 cup cold club soda, 1 pint vanilla ice cream, 1 pint strawberry ice cream, 1 pint chocolate ice cream, 1 cup hot fudge sauce, warmed, 1 cup strawberry sauce, 1 cup pineapple chunks, 1 cup whipped cream, 1/4 cup chopped peanuts, 4 maraschino cherries. 1. In large heavy pot, heat 3 inches of vegetable oil to 375°F. 2. Peel bananas and cut in half lengthwise. 3. In medium bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Add club soda and whisk until smooth batter forms. 4. Dip banana halves in batter, coating completely. 5. Carefully lower battered bananas into hot oil, frying 2-3 minutes per side until deep golden brown and crispy. 6. Remove with slotted spoon and drain on paper towels. 7. Place 2 fried banana halves in each serving dish. 8. Top with 1 scoop each of vanilla, strawberry, and chocolate ice cream. 9. Drizzle with hot fudge and strawberry sauce. Add pineapple chunks. 10. Crown with generous whipped cream, sprinkle with peanuts and rainbow sprinkles, and top with cherry.

Churro ice cream sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tsp baking powder, 1/2 tsp salt, 2 tbsp granulated sugar, 2 large eggs, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, melted, 1 cup whole milk, 1 cup granulated sugar (for coating), 2 tbsp cinnamon, 1 quart vanilla ice cream, 1 cup dulce de leche. 1. In bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, and 2 tbsp sugar. 2. In another bowl, whisk eggs, melted butter, and milk. 3. Add wet ingredients to dry and mix until smooth batter forms. Let rest 10 minutes. 4. Heat 2 inches of oil in large pot to 375°F. 5. Pour batter into squeeze bottle or piping bag. Pipe 6-inch strips directly into hot oil. 6. Fry for 2-3 minutes per side until golden brown and puffy. Drain on paper towels. 7. Mix cinnamon and sugar. Roll warm churros in cinnamon sugar to coat. Let cool completely. 8. Cut each churro in half lengthwise. 9. Spread dulce de leche on bottom half. Add generous scoop of vanilla ice cream. Top with other churro half. 10. Drizzle with chocolate sauce. Serve immediately before ice cream melts.

Peanut butter bacon milkshake.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 strips thick-cut bacon, 1 quart vanilla ice cream, 1 cup creamy peanut butter, 1 cup whole milk, 1/4 cup chocolate syrup, 2 tbsp honey, 2 cups whipped cream, 1/4 cup crushed peanuts, 4 peanut butter cups, chopped. 1. Cook bacon until extra crispy. Drain on paper towels and let cool. Crumble into small pieces, reserving some for garnish. 2. In blender, combine ice cream, peanut butter, milk, chocolate syrup, and honey. 3. Add half the crumbled bacon. Blend on high for 30-45 seconds until smooth and thick. 4. If too thick, add more milk 2 tbsp at a time. If too thin, add more ice cream. 5. Pour into 4 large glasses. 6. Top each generously with whipped cream. 7. Garnish with reserved bacon crumbles, crushed peanuts, and chopped peanut butter cups. 8. Drizzle with additional chocolate syrup. 9. Serve immediately with thick straws and long spoons.

Loaded potato skins.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup sour cream. Bake potatoes, scoop out most of flesh. Brush with butter and bake until crispy. Fill with cheese and bacon. Bake again. Top with sour cream and chives.

Loaded tater tot casserole.directions: Ingredients needed: 1.5 lbs ground beef, 1 medium onion, diced, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of mushroom soup, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of chicken soup, 1 cup sour cream, 2.5 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 bag (32 oz) frozen tater tots, 6 strips bacon, cooked and crumbled, 4 g reen onions, sliced, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease a 9x13 baking dish. 2. In large skillet over medium-high heat, brown ground beef with diced onion, 8-10 minutes. Drain fat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. 3. In bowl, mix both cream soups and sour cream until smooth. 4. Stir soup mixture into beef. Mix well. Spread beef mixture evenly in baking dish. 5. Sprinkle 1.5 cups cheese over beef layer. Top with half the bacon. 6. Arrange tater tots in single layer on top, covering completely. 7. Bake 45-50 minutes until tater tots are golden brown and crispy. 8. Top with remaining cheese and bacon. Bake 5 minutes more until cheese melts. Let rest 5 minutes. Garnish with green onions.

Cheesy bacon ranch chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup ranch dressing. Season chicken and bake. Top with ranch, both cheeses, and bacon. Bake again until cheese is bubbly and bacon is crispy.

Bacon cheeseburger casserole.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 8 strips bacon, chopped, 1 large onion, diced, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 12 oz egg noodles, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of mushroom soup, 1 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup ketchup, 2 tbsp yellow mustard, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 9x13 baking dish. 2. Cook egg noodles according to package. Drain. 3. Cook bacon in large skillet until crispy, 8-10 minutes. Remove and set aside. 4. In same skillet with bacon fat, brown ground beef and onion, 8-10 minutes. Drain most fat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Season with salt and pepper. 5. In bowl, mix cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, mayonnaise, ketchup, mustard, and Worcestershire sauce. 6. Combine cooked noodles, beef mixture, sauce, half the bacon, 1.5 cups cheddar, and mozzarella. 7. Transfer to baking dish. Top with remaining cheddar and bacon. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. 8. Bake 30-35 minutes until bubbly and cheese is melted. Top with pickle slices before serving. Let rest 5 minutes.

Cheesy chicken bacon ranch pasta.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 3 cups cooked chicken, cubed, 8 slices bacon, chopped, 6 tbsp butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/3 cup flour, 2 cups chicken broth, 1.5 cups heavy cream, 1 packet ranch seasoning, 3 cups cheddar cheese, shredded, 1 cup Parmesan, grated. 1. Cook penne in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. Cook bacon in skillet until crispy, drain on paper towels. 2. In large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 1 min. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min. Gradually whisk in chicken broth and cream. Bring to simmer, cook 5-7 min until thickened. 3. Add ranch seasoning, stir to combine. Reduce heat to low. Add cheddar and Parmesan, stir until melted. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Fold in cooked pasta, chicken, and bacon. Add pasta water if needed for creamy consistency. 5. Serve garnished with green onions and extra cheese.

ingredients: ribeye steaks (14-16 oz each, 1.5 inch thick)
Smoked bacon fat ribeye.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 ribeye steaks (14-16 oz each, 1.5 inch thick), 6 strips thick bacon, 4 tbsp butter, 4 cloves garlic, smashed, 4 sprigs fresh thyme. 1. Let steaks come to room temp 45 min. Season generously with salt and pepper. 2. Cook bacon in cast iron over medium heat until crispy. Remove bacon, reserve for another use. 3. Increase heat to high. When fat is shimmering, add steaks. Sear 4 min without moving. Flip. 4. Add butter, garlic, and thyme to pan. Baste steaks with melted butter continuously for 3-4 min for medium-rare (130°F internal). 5. Rest 5-10 min before slicing. Spoon pan butter over top.

ingredients: filet mignon steaks (8 oz each, 2 inches thick)
Bacon wrapped filet mignon.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 filet mignon steaks (8 oz each, 2 inches thick), 4 strips bacon, 2 tbsp butter, 2 cloves garlic, 2 sprigs thyme. 1. Let steaks come to room temp 30 min. Season all over with salt and pepper. 2. Wrap each filet with 2 bacon strips, securing with toothpicks. 3. Heat oven to 400°F. Heat oven-safe skillet over high heat. 4. Sear steaks 2-3 min per side until bacon is crispy. 5. Add butter, garlic, thyme to pan. Transfer to oven. 6. Roast 6-8 min for medium-rare (130°F). Rest 5 min before serving.

Stuffed pork chop supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 thick-cut pork chops (2 inches thick), 8 oz cream cheese (softened), 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 4 slices bacon (cooked and crumbled), 1/4 cup jalapeños (diced), 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1 cup breadcrumbs, 1/2 cup parmesan (grated), 2 eggs (beaten), 1 cup flour. 1. Cut pocket in each pork chop by slicing horizontally through center. 2. Mix cream cheese, cheddar, bacon, jalapeños, and garlic. 3. Stuff each pork chop with cheese mixture, secure with toothpicks. 4. Season chops with salt and pepper. 5. Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, breadcrumbs mixed with parmesan. 6. Coat each chop in flour, then egg, then breadcrumb mixture. 7. Heat 1/2 inch oil in large skillet to 350°F. 8. Fry chops 6-7 min per side until golden brown and internal temp reaches 145°F. 9. Drain on paper towels, rest 5 min. 10. Remove toothpicks and serve.

Turducken sliders.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 s lider buns, 1 lb ground turkey, 1 lb ground duck, 1 lb ground chicken, 1/2 cup breadcrumbs, 2 eggs, 1/4 cup milk, 2 tbsp Cajun seasoning, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp onion powder, 12 slices Swiss cheese, 1 cup cranberry sauce, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 4 tbsp butter. 1. Mix turkey, duck, and chicken in large bowl. 2. Add breadcrumbs, eggs, milk, Cajun seasoning, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. 3. Form into 12 slider-sized patties. 4. Heat large skillet over medium-high heat, cook patties 4-5 min per side until internal temp reaches 165°F. 5. Top each patty with Swiss cheese, cover to melt. 6. Toast slider buns with butter. 7. Mix cranberry sauce with mayonnaise for spread. 8. Spread sauce on buns, add patties, and serve.

Louisiana chicken pasta supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb penne pasta, 2 lbs boneless skinless chicken breasts, sliced, 3 tbsp Cajun seasoning, 4 tbsp olive oil, 1 lb Andouille sausage, sliced, 1 red bell pepper, sliced, 1 g reen bell pepper, sliced, 1 onion, sliced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups heavy cream, 1 cup chicken broth, 1.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 1 tsp cayenne pepper. 1. Season chicken with 2 tbsp Cajun seasoning. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken 6-8 min until golden and cooked through. Remove. In same pan, brown sausage 5 min. Remove. 2. Cook pasta in salted water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 3. In same skillet, add bell peppers and onion. Cook 6 min until softened. Add garlic and remaining 1 tbsp Cajun seasoning, cook 1 min. 4. Add cream and broth, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5-7 min until thickened. Add Parmesan and cayenne, stir until cheese melts. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Return chicken and sausage to skillet. Add drained pasta, toss to coat. Add pasta water if needed. 6. Serve garnished with green onions.

Pasta carbonara supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb spaghetti, 8 oz pancetta, diced, 8 oz Italian sausage, casings removed, 5 egg yolks, 2 whole eggs, 1.5 cups Pecorino Romano, finely grated, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 2 tsp black pepper, freshly cracked, 4 cloves garlic, minced. 1. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Reserve 2 cups pasta water before draining. 2. Cook pancetta in large skillet over medium heat 8 min until crispy. Add sausage, cook 8 min breaking up meat. Add garlic, cook 1 min. Remove from heat. 3. In bowl, whisk egg yolks, whole eggs, Pecorino, Parmesan, cream, and black pepper. 4. Add hot drained pasta to skillet with meats, toss off heat 30 seconds. 5. Working quickly off heat, pour egg mixture over pasta, tossing vigorously. Add pasta water 2 tbsp at a time, tossing constantly, until creamy sauce forms. 6. Plate immediately, garnish with parsley, more cheese and pepper.

Fettuccine alfredo loaded.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb fettuccine, 8 slices bacon, chopped, 8 oz mushrooms, sliced, 2 cups broccoli florets, 1 cup butter, 2 cups heavy cream, 2.5 cups Parmesan, grated, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 tsp nutmeg. 1. Cook bacon in large skillet over medium heat 8 min until crispy. Remove to paper towels. In bacon fat, cook mushrooms 6 min until golden. Remove. In same pan, blanch broccoli with 1/4 cup water, covered, 3 min. Remove. 2. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Cook fettuccine until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining. 3. In large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 1 min until fragrant. Add heavy cream, bring to gentle simmer. Cook 5-7 min, stirring, until thickened. 4. Reduce heat to low. Gradually whisk in Parmesan until melted and smooth. Add nutmeg, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes. 5. Add drained pasta, bacon, mushrooms, broccoli to sauce. Toss to coat, adding pasta water if needed. 6. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and parsley.

ingredients: mayo mixed with 2 tbsp horseradish and 1 tsp paprika (dipping sauce)
Bloomin onion.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 large sweet onion, 2 cups flour, 2 tsp paprika, 1 tsp cayenne, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 cup buttermilk, 1 egg, 1/2 cup mayo mixed with 2 tbsp horseradish and 1 tsp paprika (dipping sauce). 1. Cut 1 inch off onion top. Peel. Cut into 16 wedges from top, stopping 1/2 inch from root. Soak in ice water 1 hour to open petals. 2. Mix flour with spices. Whisk buttermilk and egg. 3. Dry onion well. Dust with flour mixture, getting between petals. Dip in buttermilk, then flour again. 4. Heat oil to 375°F. Fry onion root-side up 4 min, then flip carefully and fry 4 min more until deep golden. 5. Drain on paper towels. Serve with spicy mayo dip.

Mozzarella stick tower.directions: Ingredients needed: 24 mozzarella sticks (store-bought frozen), 3 cups marinara sauce, warmed, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 tsp Italian seasoning. 1. Heat 3 inches oil in large pot to 350°F. Working in batches, fry frozen mozzarella sticks according to package directions, about 3-4 min, until golden brown and crispy. Don't overcrowd. 2. Remove to paper towel-lined plate. Season lightly with salt immediately. 3. To build tower: Place large dollop of marinara on serving plate. Stand 8 mozzarella sticks upright in circle, leaning against each other. Add more marinara in center. 4. Create second layer with 8 more sticks, positioning between gaps of first layer. Add more sauce. Create third layer with remaining 8 sticks. 5. Drizzle with more marinara sauce cascading down sides. Sprinkle with Parmesan and Italian seasoning. Top with fresh basil leaves and balsamic glaze. 6. Serve immediately with extra warm marinara for dipping. Pull sticks from tower to eat.

ingredients: Celery sticks and tortilla chips for serving
Buffalo chicken dip loaded.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded, 8 oz cream cheese, softened, 1/2 cup buffalo hot sauce, 1/2 cup ranch dressing, 1 cup shredded cheddar, 1/2 cup crumbled blue cheese. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 2. Mix cream cheese, hot sauce, and ranch until smooth. 3. Stir in shredded chicken and half the cheddar. 4. Spread in 8x8 baking dish. Top with remaining cheddar. 5. Bake 20-25 min until bubbly and golden on edges. 6. Top with blue cheese crumbles. Serve hot with celery and chips.

ingredients: frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
(14 oz) artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
Tortilla chips or bread for serving
Spinach artichoke dip supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 10 oz frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed dry, 1 can (14 oz) artichoke hearts, drained and chopped, 8 oz cream cheese, softened, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup parmesan, grated, 1 cup mozzarella, shredded, 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. 2. Mix cream cheese, sour cream, parmesan, and garlic until smooth. 3. Fold in spinach, artichokes, and half the mozzarella. 4. Transfer to baking dish, top with remaining mozzarella. 5. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and golden brown on top. 6. Let cool 5 min before serving with chips.

Pizza burger.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 1/2 cup pizza sauce, 1 cup mozzarella, shredded, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 1/2 cup pepperoni, diced, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 tsp garlic powder, 4 burger buns. 1. In bowl, mix beef, pizza sauce, shredded mozzarella, Parmesan, pepperoni, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, pepper. Mix gently until combined. 2. Form into 4 large thick patties, about 3/4 inch thick. Make small indentation in center of each. 3. Heat grill or skillet over medium-high heat. Cook burgers 5-6 min per side until internal temp reaches 160°F. In last 2 min, top each burger with mozzarella slice, cover to melt. 4. Toast burger buns. Place burgers on buns, top with warm marinara sauce. 5. Serve with fries or pasta salad.

Breakfast pizza.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, room temperature, 6 eggs, scrambled, 1 cup cooked breakfast sausage, crumbled, 6 strips bacon, cooked and crumbled, 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1/4 cup grated parmesan, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1/4 cup diced green onions. 1. Preheat oven to 450°F. Oil large baking sheet or pizza stone. 2. Roll or stretch dough into 14-inch circle, transfer to prepared pan. Brush with olive oil. 3. Sprinkle half the mozzarella on dough. Top with scrambled eggs, sausage, bacon. 4. Add remaining mozzarella, cheddar, and parmesan. 5. Bake 12-15 min until crust is golden and cheese bubbly. 6. Garnish with green onions, serve with hot sauce.

Cheesesteak egg rolls.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 , sliced bell pepper. Cook shaved steak with peppers and onions. Fill egg roll wrappers with steak mixture and provolone. Roll and deep fry until crispy.

ingredients: diced onions and mustard for topping
Garbage plate.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 1 lb hot dogs, 4 cups home fries or french fries, 2 cups macaroni salad, 1 onion (chopped), 2 tbsp chili powder, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 tsp cayenne, 2 cups ketchup, 1 cup beef broth, 1/4 cup mustard, 2 tbsp brown sugar. 1. Make meat sauce: brown ground beef with chopped onion in large pot 8-10 min. 2. Add chili powder, cumin, cayenne, salt, pepper, ketchup, beef broth, mustard, and brown sugar. 3. Simmer 30-40 min until thickened. 4. Grill hot dogs until charred. 5. Cook home fries or french fries until crispy. 6. For each plate: layer home fries, macaroni salad side by side. 7. Top with 2 hot dogs. 8. Smother everything with meat sauce. 9. Top with diced raw onions and mustard. 10. Serve immediately.

Bacon jam cheeseburger.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup packed brown sugar. Make bacon jam by cooking bacon with onions and brown sugar until jammy. Grill patty, top with cheese and generous bacon jam.

Philly cheesesteak nachos.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 , sliced bell pepper, 2 , sliced jalapeños. Layer chips with shaved steak, peppers, onions. Drizzle with cheez whiz and provolone. Bake until melty. Add jalapeños.

ingredients: Crispy bacon and green onions for topping
Beer cheese soup.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup flour, 4 cups chicken broth, 2 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 1 bottle (12 oz) lager beer, 4 cups sharp cheddar cheese, shredded, 1 cup Gruyere cheese, shredded, 1 onion, diced fine, 2 carrots, diced fine, 2 celery stalks, diced fine, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tsp Dijon mustard, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper. 1. In large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Sauté onion, carrots, celery 6-8 min until soft. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 2. Sprinkle flour over vegetables, stir to coat, cook 3-4 min until golden. 3. Gradually whisk in broth, then milk, then cream, stirring constantly until smooth and thickened, 8-10 min. 4. Reduce heat to low. Slowly stir in beer, Worcestershire, mustard, cayenne. Simmer gently 10 min. Do not boil. 5. Gradually add cheeses, stirring until melted and smooth. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Serve with soft pretzels for dipping. Top with crispy bacon and green onions.

ingredients: Extra cheese, sour cream for topping
Loaded baked potato soup.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 medium russet potatoes, 8 cups chicken broth, 1 onion, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 3/4 cup butter, 3/4 cup flour, 3 cups heavy cream, 1 cup sour cream, 4 cups sharp cheddar cheese, shredded, 12 slices bacon, cooked crispy and crumbled, 1 cup green onions, sliced. 1. Bake 4 potatoes at 400°F for 1 hour. Peel and cube remaining 4 potatoes. 2. In pot, combine cubed potatoes, broth, onion, garlic. Boil, then simmer 20 min until very tender. Use immersion blender to partially blend, leaving chunks. 3. Melt butter in pan, whisk in flour, cook 3 min. Gradually whisk in cream until smooth and thick. 4. Add cream mixture to soup, stir well. Simmer 5 min. 5. Scoop flesh from baked potatoes, add to soup. Stir in sour cream and half the cheese until melted. Add half the bacon and green onions. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Serve topped with remaining cheese, bacon, green onions, and dollop of sour cream.

Cheesy bacon pull apart bread.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 large round sourdough bread loaf, 12 slices bacon (cooked and crumbled), 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1/2 cup butter (melted), 4 cloves garlic (minced), 1/4 cup fresh parsley (chopped), 4 oz cream cheese (softened), 1/4 cup green onions (sliced). 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 2. Cut bread in crosshatch pattern (1-inch squares) without cutting through bottom. 3. Mix melted butter with garlic and parsley. 4. Mix cheddar, mozzarella, bacon, cream cheese, and green onions. 5. Stuff cheese mixture into all cuts in bread. 6. Drizzle garlic butter over entire loaf. 7. Wrap loaf in foil, place on baking sheet. 8. Bake 15 min. 9. Unwrap, bake another 10 min until cheese is melted and bubbly. 10. Serve hot with ranch dressing for dipping.

Burnt ends mac and cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb elbow macaroni, 2 cups burnt ends, chopped, 6 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup flour, 3 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 3 cups sharp cheddar, shredded, 1 cup smoked Gouda, shredded, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 1/2 cup BBQ sauce, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook macaroni in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain. 2. In large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min. Gradually whisk in milk and cream. Simmer 5-7 min, whisking, until thickened. 3. Reduce heat to low. Add cheddar and Gouda, stir until melted. Add garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt, pepper. 4. Fold in macaroni and burnt ends. Swirl in BBQ sauce. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. 5. Toss panko with 3 tbsp melted butter, sprinkle over top. 6. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and golden. Garnish with green onions.

Elote dip.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1/2 cup sour cream. Char corn and cut off cob. Mix with mayo, sour cream, cotija, chili powder, and lime. Serve warm with chips.

Fried pickles.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 tsp cayenne, 1/4 cup ranch dressing. Slice pickles into chips. Dredge in seasoned flour, dip in buttermilk, coat again. Deep fry until golden. Serve with ranch.

ingredients: ranch or comeback sauce for dipping
Beer battered onion rings.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 large yellow onions (cut into 1/2-inch rings), 2 cups all-purpose flour (divided), 1 1/2 cups beer (lager or pale ale), 1 tsp baking powder, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper, 2 tsp salt (divided), 1 tsp black pepper. 1. Separate onion slices into individual rings, soak in ice water 30 min. 2. Heat oil to 375°F in deep fryer or large pot. 3. Mix 1 cup flour with baking powder, paprika, garlic powder, cayenne, 1 tsp salt, and pepper. 4. Add beer, whisk until smooth batter forms. 5. Place remaining 1 cup flour in shallow bowl with remaining salt. 6. Drain onion rings, pat dry. 7. Coat rings in flour, then dip in batter, letting excess drip off. 8. Fry in batches 2-3 min until golden brown. 9. Drain on paper towels. 10. Serve hot with dipping sauce.

Cheesy bacon bomb.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup bbq sauce, 2 , sliced jalapeños. Weave bacon into mat. Layer ground beef mixed with cream cheese and cheddar. Roll into ball and wrap with bacon. Smoke or bake until 165°F. Glaze with bbq sauce.

Deep fried PBJ.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup powdered sugar. Make thick PBJ sandwiches. Dip in pancake batter and deep fry until golden. Dust with powdered sugar.

Chocolate bacon bark.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 slices thick-cut bacon, 12 oz dark chocolate chips, 8 oz milk chocolate chips, 1/4 cup toffee bits, 1/4 cup chopped pecans, 2 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tsp sea salt, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper (optional). 1. Preheat oven to 400°F, line baking sheet with parchment. 2. Arrange bacon on sheet, sprinkle with brown sugar. 3. Bake 15-20 min until crispy, drain and cool. 4. Chop bacon into small pieces. 5. Line another baking sheet with parchment. 6. Melt dark and milk chocolate together in double boiler or microwave. 7. Pour melted chocolate onto parchment, spread into 1/4-inch thick rectangle. 8. Sprinkle bacon, toffee bits, and pecans over chocolate. 9. Sprinkle with sea salt and optional cayenne. 10. Refrigerate 1 hour until firm, break into pieces.

Maple bacon donut sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup maple syrup. Slice maple donut in half. Layer with crispy bacon, fried egg, and cheese. Drizzle extra maple syrup.

Bacon wrapped stuffed dates.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup packed brown sugar. Pit dates and stuff with cream cheese and almond. Wrap in bacon, sprinkle with brown sugar. Bake until bacon is crispy.

Truffle butter steak frites.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 strip steaks (10 oz each), 1/4 cup truffle butter, 2 lbs russet potatoes, cut into fries. 1. Heat oil to 325°F. Fry potatoes 5 min until tender. Drain. Increase oil to 375°F. Fry again 3-4 min until crispy. Season with salt. 2. Season steaks with salt and pepper. Grill or pan-sear over high heat 4-5 min per side for medium-rare. 3. Top each hot steak with 1 tbsp truffle butter. Rest 5 min. 4. Serve steaks with frites. Garnish with parsley.

Butterfat shake.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups premium vanilla ice cream, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1/4 cup whole milk, 2 tbsp butter (melted), 2 tbsp malted milk powder, 3 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp vanilla extract. 1. Combine ice cream, heavy cream, whole milk, melted butter, malted milk powder, sugar, and vanilla in blender. 2. Blend on low speed 20-30 sec until just combined but still very thick. 3. Pour into chilled glasses. 4. Top with whipped cream, drizzle with chocolate sauce, add sprinkles. 5. Serve immediately with thick straw or spoon.

Ultimate grilled cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup mayonnaise. Spread mayo on bread exterior. Layer all three cheeses inside. Griddle in butter until deeply golden and cheese is flowing.

Nutella stuffed french toast.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 slices thick bread (brioche or challah), 1/2 cup Nutella, 1 banana, sliced, 4 eggs, 1/2 cup milk, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1/4 tsp cinnamon, 2 tbsp butter. 1. Spread Nutella on 4 bread slices, top with banana slices, cover with remaining bread to make sandwiches. 2. Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon in shallow dish. 3. Heat griddle or skillet over medium heat, melt butter. 4. Dip sandwiches in egg mixture, coating both sides. Let excess drip off. 5. Cook 3-4 min per side until golden brown and heated through. 6. Cut diagonally, dust with powdered sugar. Top with whipped cream and strawberries. Drizzle with extra Nutella if desired.

The Widowmaker burger.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup bbq sauce. Stack two 1/2 lb patties with pulled pork, bacon, onion rings, cheese, and fried egg. Drench in bbq sauce.

Bacon avalanche burger.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef (80/20), 12 slices bacon, 4 burger buns, 8 slices cheddar cheese, 4 onion rings (beer battered and fried), 1/2 cup BBQ sauce, 1/4 cup bacon bits, 1/4 cup ranch dressing. 1. Form ground beef into 4 thick patties, season with salt and pepper. 2. Cook bacon until crispy, set aside. 3. Grill or pan-fry burgers over medium-high heat 4-5 min per side for medium. 4. Top each burger with 2 slices cheese, cover to melt. 5. Toast buns. 6. Build burgers: bottom bun, ranch dressing, lettuce, burger with cheese, 3 bacon slices, onion ring, BBQ sauce, bacon bits, tomato, top bun. 7. Serve immediately with extra napkins.

The Coronary burger.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef (80/20), 8 slices bacon, 4 burger buns, 4 slices cheddar cheese, 4 slices American cheese, 4 eggs, 4 tbsp butter. 1. Form beef into 4 thick patties. Season heavily with salt and pepper. 2. Cook bacon until crispy. Set aside. Fry eggs in bacon fat. 3. Grill or pan-sear burgers over high heat 4 min per side for medium. Top each with both cheeses last min. 4. Toast buns in butter. 5. Build: bottom bun, mayo, burger with melted cheese, 2 bacon slices, caramelized onions, fried egg, top bun. Serve immediately.

Double double animal style.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef (80/20), 8 slices American cheese, 4 burger buns, 1 large onion (sliced), 2 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp ketchup, 2 tbsp sweet pickle relish, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp white vinegar. 1. Make special sauce: mix mayonnaise, ketchup, relish, sugar, and vinegar, refrigerate. 2. Caramelize onions in butter over medium heat 20-25 min until deep golden. 3. Form beef into 8 thin patties, season with salt and pepper. 4. Cook patties on griddle or large skillet over high heat 2-3 min per side, add mustard to one side while cooking. 5. Stack 2 patties together, top with 2 cheese slices. 6. Toast buns face-down on griddle. 7. Spread special sauce on both sides of buns. 8. Build: bottom bun, lettuce, tomato, double patty stack, caramelized onions, pickles, top bun. 9. Serve immediately.

The Meat Sweats burger.directions: Ingredients needed: 4-5 lbs brisket, 1/2 cup bbq sauce. Five meats on one bun: beef patty, pulled pork, sliced brisket, bacon, and breakfast sausage. Topped with cheese and bbq.

Nacho burger.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 4 burger buns, 1 cup crushed tortilla chips, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup nacho cheese sauce, 1 cup pickled jalapeños, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup guacamole, 1/2 cup pico de gallo, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp chili powder. 1. Mix ground beef with cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper. 2. Form into 4 thick patties. 3. Grill or pan-fry burgers 4-5 min per side for medium. 4. Top with shredded cheddar, cover to melt. 5. Toast buns, spread nacho cheese sauce on both sides. 6. Build burgers: bottom bun, lettuce, burger with melted cheese, crushed tortilla chips, jalapeños, sour cream, guacamole, pico de gallo, top bun. 7. Serve immediately with extra chips.

ingredients: sriracha mayo: 1/4 cup mayo mixed with 1 tbsp sriracha
Ramen burger.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 packages instant ramen noodles, 4 eggs (beaten), 1 lb ground beef, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp sesame oil, 1 tsp garlic powder, 4 slices American cheese. 1. Cook ramen noodles according to package, drain and cool. 2. Mix noodles with beaten eggs and sesame oil. 3. Form into 8 thin patties using ramekins or molds, freeze 30 min. 4. Mix ground beef with soy sauce, garlic powder, salt, and pepper, form into 4 patties. 5. Heat oil in skillet, fry ramen buns 3-4 min per side until golden and crispy, set aside. 6. Cook beef patties 4-5 min per side, top with cheese. 7. Assemble: ramen bun, sriracha mayo, lettuce, beef patty with cheese, tomato, ramen bun. 8. Serve immediately.

Luther burger.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 4 g lazed donuts (halved), 8 slices bacon, 4 slices American cheese, 1/4 cup butter. 1. Cook bacon until crispy, set aside. 2. Form ground beef into 4 patties, season with salt and pepper. 3. Grill or pan-fry burgers 4-5 min per side for medium. 4. Top each burger with cheese, cover to melt. 5. Butter cut sides of donuts, grill cut-side down 1-2 min until caramelized. 6. Build burgers: donut bottom, burger with cheese, 2 bacon slices, drizzle of maple syrup, donut top. 7. Serve immediately.

ingredients: powdered sugar and chocolate sauce for topping
Deep fried bacon wrapped Oreos.directions: Ingredients needed: 24 Oreo cookies, 12 slices bacon (halved), 1 1/2 cups milk, 2 eggs. 1. Wrap each Oreo with half slice of bacon, secure with toothpick. 2. Freeze wrapped Oreos 1 hour. 3. Heat oil to 375°F in deep fryer or large pot. 4. Make pancake batter according to package or mix ingredients. 5. Dip frozen bacon-wrapped Oreos in batter. 6. Fry 2-3 min until golden brown and bacon is crispy. 7. Drain on paper towels. 8. Remove toothpicks. 9. Dust with powdered sugar, drizzle with chocolate sauce. 10. Serve warm.

ingredients: jar (13 oz) Nutella (frozen in tablespoon-sized balls)
Deep fried Nutella balls.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 jar (13 oz) Nutella (frozen in tablespoon-sized balls), 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 eggs, 2 cups panko breadcrumbs, 1 cup graham cracker crumbs. 1. Freeze Nutella balls on parchment-lined tray overnight. 2. Heat oil to 375°F in deep fryer or large pot. 3. Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, panko mixed with graham cracker crumbs. 4. Working quickly, coat frozen Nutella balls in flour, then egg, then breadcrumb mixture. 5. Immediately fry 1-2 min until golden brown. 6. Remove quickly to prevent Nutella from melting out. 7. Drain on paper towels. 8. Dust with powdered sugar. 9. Serve immediately with whipped cream.

ingredients: powdered sugar and ice cream for serving
Deep fried cookie dough.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 package refrigerated chocolate chip cookie dough, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 eggs (beaten), 2 cups panko breadcrumbs, 1 tsp cinnamon. 1. Scoop cookie dough into tablespoon-sized balls, freeze 2 hours. 2. Heat oil to 375°F in deep fryer or large pot. 3. Mix panko with cinnamon. 4. Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, panko-cinnamon mixture. 5. Coat frozen dough balls in flour, then egg, then panko. 6. Fry 2-3 min until golden brown. 7. Drain on paper towels. 8. Dust with powdered sugar. 9. Serve immediately with ice cream.

Fried Kool-Aid.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup sugar, 1/4 cup powdered sugar. Mix Kool-Aid powder into batter. Drop spoonfuls into hot oil. Fry until crispy. Dust with powdered sugar.

ingredients: prepared mac and cheese (cooled and firm)
Deep fried mac and cheese bacon bombs.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 cups prepared mac and cheese (cooled and firm), 12 slices bacon, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 3 eggs (beaten), 2 cups panko breadcrumbs, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese. 1. Mix mac and cheese with shredded cheddar. 2. Form into 12 golf ball-sized balls, refrigerate 2 hours. 3. Wrap each ball with bacon slice, secure with toothpick. 4. Freeze 1 hour. 5. Heat oil to 350°F in deep fryer or large pot. 6. Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, panko. 7. Coat each ball in flour, egg, then panko. 8. Fry 4-5 min until bacon is crispy and coating is golden. 9. Drain on paper towels, remove toothpicks. 10. Serve hot with ranch dressing.

Deep fried lasagna.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cups flour, 4 eggs, beaten, 3 cups Italian breadcrumbs, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 2 cups marinara sauce, warmed. 1. Freeze lasagna squares 2 hours until very firm. This prevents falling apart during frying. 2. Set up breading station: flour in dish one, beaten eggs in dish two, breadcrumbs mixed with Parmesan and Italian seasoning in dish three. 3. Working with frozen lasagna squares, dredge in flour, dip in egg, coat completely in breadcrumb mixture. Press breadcrumbs on well. 4. Heat 3 inches oil in large pot to 350°F. Working in batches, fry lasagna squares 3-4 min, turning once, until golden brown and crispy. Don't overcrowd. 5. Remove with slotted spoon to paper towel-lined plate. Season with salt immediately. 6. Serve hot with warm marinara sauce for dipping. Garnish with basil and extra Parmesan.

Fried avocado tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 ripe but firm avocados (sliced), 1 cup flour, 2 eggs (beaten), 2 cups panko breadcrumbs, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp chili powder, 12 corn tortillas, 2 cups cabbage (shredded), 1 cup crema, 1/2 cup cilantro (chopped). 1. Heat oil to 375°F in deep fryer or large pot. 2. Mix panko with cumin, chili powder, and salt. 3. Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, seasoned panko. 4. Coat avocado slices in flour, egg, then panko. 5. Fry 2-3 min until golden brown. 6. Drain on paper towels. 7. Warm tortillas. 8. Build tacos: tortilla, shredded cabbage, fried avocado slices, crema, cilantro. 9. Serve with lime wedges and hot sauce.

Chicken fried steak fingers.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef cutlets (cut into strips), 2 cups buttermilk, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tbsp paprika, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tsp cayenne, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, 1/4 cup flour, 2 cups milk. 1. Soak beef strips in buttermilk 1 hour. 2. Mix flour with paprika, garlic powder, cayenne, salt, and pepper. 3. Heat 1/2 inch oil in large skillet to 350°F. 4. Dredge beef strips in seasoned flour, back in buttermilk, then in flour again. 5. Fry strips in batches 3-4 min per side until golden brown. 6. Drain on paper towels. 7. For gravy: reserve 1/4 cup pan drippings, whisk in 1/4 cup flour. 8. Cook 2 min, slowly whisk in milk. 9. Simmer 5-7 min until thickened, season with salt and pepper. 10. Serve steak fingers with gravy.

ingredients: Salt and white pepper to taste
Truffle lobster mac.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb cavatappi or shells, 1 lb lobster meat, chopped, 8 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup flour, 3 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 2 cups Gruyere, shredded, 1.5 cups white cheddar, shredded, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 3 tbsp truffle oil, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook pasta in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain. 2. In large pot, melt 6 tbsp butter over medium heat. Add garlic, cook 1 min. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min. Gradually whisk in milk and cream. Simmer 5-7 min, whisking, until thickened. 3. Reduce heat to low. Add Gruyere, white cheddar, and half the Parmesan. Stir until melted. Add truffle oil, nutmeg, salt, white pepper. 4. Fold in pasta and lobster meat. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. 5. Toss panko with remaining Parmesan and 2 tbsp melted butter. Sprinkle over top. 6. Bake 20-25 min until bubbly and golden. Garnish with chives and extra truffle oil drizzle.

Bacon explosion mac.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb elbow macaroni, 1 lb bacon, chopped, 6 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup flour, 3 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 3 cups sharp cheddar, shredded, 1 cup smoked Gouda, shredded, 1 cup Pepper Jack, shredded, 8 oz cream cheese, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs, 4 g reen onions, sliced. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook macaroni in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain. Cook bacon in skillet until crispy, drain on paper towels. Reserve 2 tbsp bacon fat. 2. In large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min. Gradually whisk in milk and cream. Simmer 5-7 min, whisking, until thickened. 3. Reduce heat to low. Add cheddar, Gouda, Pepper Jack, and cream cheese. Stir until melted and smooth. Add garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt, pepper. 4. Fold in macaroni and bacon. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. 5. Toss panko with reserved bacon fat and 2 tbsp melted butter. Sprinkle over top. 6. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and golden. Garnish with green onions.

ingredients: Ranch or blue cheese dressing for serving
Buffalo chicken mac and cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb elbow macaroni, 3 cups cooked chicken, shredded, 1/2 cup buffalo sauce, 6 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup flour, 3 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 3 cups sharp cheddar, shredded, 1 cup Monterey Jack, shredded, 4 oz cream cheese, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 cup blue cheese crumbles, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook macaroni in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain. Toss chicken with buffalo sauce. 2. In large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min. Gradually whisk in milk and cream. Simmer 5 min, whisking, until thickened. 3. Reduce heat to low. Add cheddar, Monterey Jack, and cream cheese. Stir until melted and smooth. Add garlic powder, salt, pepper. 4. Fold in macaroni and buffalo chicken. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. Sprinkle blue cheese crumbles on top. 5. Toss panko with 3 tbsp melted butter, sprinkle over top. 6. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and golden. Drizzle with ranch or blue cheese dressing before serving.

Philly cheesesteak mac.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb elbow macaroni, 1.5 lbs ribeye steak, thinly sliced, 3 tbsp olive oil, 1 onion, sliced, 1 g reen bell pepper, sliced, 8 oz mushrooms, sliced, 6 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup flour, 3 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 3 cups white American cheese, cubed, 1 cup Provolone, shredded, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook macaroni in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain. Season steak with salt and pepper. Heat oil in skillet over high heat. Sear steak 2 min, don't overcook. Remove. Add onion, pepper, mushrooms to pan. Cook 8 min until softened. Remove. 2. In large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min. Gradually whisk in milk and cream. Simmer 5-7 min until thickened. 3. Reduce heat to low. Add American cheese and Provolone, stir until melted. Add garlic powder, salt, pepper. 4. Fold in macaroni, steak, and vegetables. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. Toss panko with 3 tbsp melted butter, sprinkle on top. 5. Bake 25 min until bubbly and golden.

Pulled pork mac and cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb elbow macaroni, 2 cups pulled pork, 6 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup flour, 3 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 3 cups sharp cheddar, shredded, 1 cup smoked Gouda, shredded, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 1/2 cup BBQ sauce, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook macaroni in salted water 2 min less than package directions. Drain. 2. In large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour, cook 2 min.
