Gradually whisk in milk and cream. Simmer 5-7 min, whisking, until thickened. 3. Reduce heat to low. Add cheddar and Gouda, stir until melted. Add garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt, pepper. 4. Fold in macaroni and pulled pork. Drizzle BBQ sauce throughout, swirl gently. Transfer to greased 9x13 baking dish. 5. Toss panko with 3 tbsp melted butter, sprinkle over top. 6. Bake 25-30 min until bubbly and golden. Top with crispy fried onions before serving.

Garbage pail fries.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs frozen french fries, 1 lb ground beef, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup bacon (cooked and crumbled), 1 cup ranch dressing, 1/2 cup blue cheese crumbles, 1/4 cup buffalo sauce, 1/4 cup green onions (sliced), 1/4 cup jalapeños (sliced). 1. Bake fries according to package directions until extra crispy. 2. Brown ground beef in skillet, season with salt and pepper, drain. 3. Layer hot fries on large platter. 4. Top with ground beef, shredded cheddar, and bacon. 5. Broil 2-3 min until cheese melts. 6. Drizzle with ranch and buffalo sauce. 7. Top with blue cheese crumbles, green onions, jalapeños, and dollops of sour cream. 8. Serve immediately.

Poutine supreme.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs frozen french fries, 3 cups cheese curds, 1/4 cup flour, 3 cups beef broth, 2 tbsp ketchup, 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 cup bacon bits, 2 g reen onions (sliced). 1. Bake fries according to package directions until extra crispy. 2. Make gravy: melt butter in pot, whisk in flour, cook 2 min. 3. Slowly whisk in beef broth, ketchup, Worcestershire, and garlic powder. 4. Simmer 10-15 min until thickened, season with salt and pepper. 5. Heat pulled pork. 6. Layer hot fries on plates. 7. Top with cheese curds, pulled pork, and bacon bits. 8. Pour hot gravy over everything. 9. Garnish with green onions. 10. Serve immediately.

ingredients: gochujang mayo: 1 cup mayo mixed with 2 tbsp gochujang
Kimchi fries.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs frozen french fries, 2 cups kimchi (chopped and drained), 1 lb bulgogi beef (thinly sliced), 1 cup gochujang mayo: 1 cup mayo mixed with 2 tbsp gochujang, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 4 eggs (fried sunny-side up), 2 g reen onions (sliced). 1. Bake fries according to package directions until extra crispy. 2. Cook bulgogi beef in hot skillet 3-4 min until caramelized. 3. Layer hot fries on platter. 4. Top with bulgogi beef, kimchi, and mozzarella. 5. Broil 2-3 min until cheese melts. 6. Fry eggs sunny-side up. 7. Drizzle gochujang mayo over fries. 8. Top with fried eggs, green onions, and sesame seeds. 9. Serve immediately.

Brisket loaded fries.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs frozen french fries, 2 cups smoked brisket (chopped), 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup BBQ sauce, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup pickled jalapeños, 1/4 cup red onion (diced), 1/4 cup cilantro (chopped). 1. Bake fries according to package directions until extra crispy. 2. Heat brisket with half the BBQ sauce. 3. Layer hot fries on large platter. 4. Top with hot brisket and shredded cheddar. 5. Broil 2-3 min until cheese melts. 6. Drizzle with remaining BBQ sauce and ranch dressing. 7. Add dollops of sour cream. 8. Top with pickled jalapeños, red onion, and cilantro. 9. Serve immediately.

Irish loaded potato skins.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 large russet potatoes, 1/2 cup butter (melted), 2 cups corned beef (diced), 2 cups shredded Swiss cheese, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup sauerkraut (drained), 1/2 cup Thousand Island dressing, 4 slices bacon (cooked and crumbled), 1/4 cup green onions (sliced). 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. 2. Bake potatoes 1 hour until tender. 3. Let cool, cut in half lengthwise, scoop out flesh leaving 1/4-inch shell. 4. Brush shells inside and out with melted butter, season with salt and pepper. 5. Bake 10 min until crispy. 6. Fill each skin with corned beef, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and cheddar. 7. Bake 10-12 min until cheese melts and bubbles. 8. Drizzle with Thousand Island dressing. 9. Top with bacon and green onions. 10. Serve with sour cream.

The Gut Buster.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 4 large flour tortillas, 2 cups refried beans, 2 cups Spanish rice, 2 cups shredded cheese, 1 lb bacon (cooked), 8 eggs (scrambled), 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup guacamole, 1 cup salsa, 1 cup queso, 1/2 cup jalapeños. 1. Brown ground beef with salt and pepper, drain. 2. Cook bacon until crispy, scramble eggs. 3. Warm large tortillas. 4. Layer each tortilla with: refried beans, Spanish rice, ground beef, bacon, scrambled eggs, and shredded cheese. 5. Fold into burrito, tucking in ends. 6. Grill seam-side down in skillet 2-3 min per side until golden. 7. Top with queso, sour cream, guacamole, and salsa. 8. Add jalapeños and hot sauce. 9. Serve immediately with fork and knife.

ingredients: 1/2 lbs beef tenderloin or strip steak
Shooter's sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 round crusty bread loaf, 1 1/2 lbs beef tenderloin or strip steak, 8 oz mushrooms, sliced, 4 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp Dijon mustard. 1. Season steak heavily with salt and pepper. Sear in hot skillet 2 min per side. Rest. 2. Sauté mushrooms in butter until browned, 8 min. Season well. 3. Slice top off bread, hollow out most of interior. Spread mustard inside. 4. Layer: mushrooms on bottom, sliced steak, arugula. Replace bread top. 5. Wrap tightly in foil. Weight down with heavy books or cans. Refrigerate weighted overnight. 6. Unwrap, slice into thick wedges. Portable indulgence.

ingredients: pork belly or boneless pork shoulder
Porchetta sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lb pork belly or boneless pork shoulder, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp fresh rosemary, chopped, 2 tbsp fresh sage, chopped, 1 tbsp fennel seeds, crushed, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes, 2 tbsp olive oil. 1. Preheat oven to 450°F. Butterfly pork if using shoulder, or score fat side of pork belly in crosshatch pattern. 2. Mix garlic, rosemary, sage, fennel seeds, lemon zest, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes, olive oil into paste. 3. Rub herb paste all over inside of pork. Roll tightly, tie with kitchen twine every 2 inches. Rub outside with olive oil, salt, pepper. 4. Place on rack in roasting pan. Roast 30 min at 450°F. Reduce heat to 300°F, roast 2-3 hours more until internal temp reaches 195°F and exterior is crispy. Baste every 30 min. 5. Rest 20 min. Remove twine, slice thinly. 6. Pile sliced porchetta on split Italian rolls. Top with arugula. Drizzle with pan juices. Serve hot.

ingredients: pork or beef brains (cleaned and membranes removed)
Fried brain sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pork or beef brains (cleaned and membranes removed), 2 cups buttermilk, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tbsp Old Bay seasoning, 1 tsp cayenne pepper, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper, 4 burger buns. 1. Soak brains in cold salted water 1 hour, drain. 2. Simmer brains in salted water 20 min, drain and cool. 3. Slice brains into 1/2-inch thick pieces. 4. Soak in buttermilk 30 min. 5. Mix flour with Old Bay, cayenne, salt, and pepper. 6. Heat 1/2 inch oil to 375°F in large skillet. 7. Dredge brain slices in seasoned flour. 8. Fry 3-4 min per side until golden brown and crispy. 9. Drain on paper towels. 10. Serve on toasted buns with mustard, pickles, onion, and hot sauce.

Italian beef dipped.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 lb beef chuck roast, 2 tbsp olive oil, 6 cups beef broth, 2 cups water, 1 onion, quartered, 8 cloves garlic, smashed, 3 bay leaves, 2 tbsp Italian seasoning, 1 tbsp dried oregano, 2 tsp garlic powder, 2 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp red pepper flakes. 1. Preheat oven to 300°F. Season roast with salt, pepper, Italian seasoning, oregano, garlic powder, onion powder. Heat oil in Dutch oven over high heat. Sear roast 4 min per side until browned on all sides. 2. Add beef broth, water, onion, garlic, bay leaves, red pepper flakes. Bring to boil. Cover tightly, transfer to oven. Braise 4-5 hours until beef is fall-apart tender. 3. Remove beef to cutting board, tent with foil. Strain braising liquid through fine mesh strainer into pot. Skim fat from surface. Keep jus warm on low heat. 4. Shred beef with forks, discarding any large fat pieces. Return meat to pot with jus to keep warm. 5. Split rolls, dip both sides in hot jus. Fill with shredded beef. Top with giardiniera if desired. Serve with small bowl of jus for dipping.

Meat tornado pizza.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, 1/2 lb ground beef, cooked, 1/2 lb Italian sausage, cooked and crumbled, 1/2 lb bacon, cooked and crumbled, 1/2 cup pepperoni, sliced, 1 cup pizza sauce, 3 cups mozzarella, shredded, 1 cup cheddar, shredded, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 tsp Italian seasoning. 1. Preheat oven to 475°F. Roll pizza dough into 14-inch circle. Transfer to greased pizza pan or baking sheet. 2. Spread pizza sauce over dough, leaving 1 inch border. Sprinkle half the mozzarella. 3. Evenly distribute all the meats: ground beef, sausage, bacon, and pepperoni. This is the meat tornado. 4. Top with remaining mozzarella, cheddar, and Parmesan. Sprinkle with Italian seasoning and red pepper flakes. 5. Bake 12-15 min until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly and starting to brown. 6. Let cool 5 min. Slice and serve hot.

Mac and cheese pizza.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, 2 cups prepared mac and cheese, 2 cups mozzarella, shredded, 1 cup cheddar, shredded, 8 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled, 4 g reen onions, sliced, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 tbsp butter, melted, 1 tsp garlic powder. 1. Preheat oven to 475°F. On floured surface, roll pizza dough into 14-inch circle. Transfer to greased pizza pan or baking sheet. 2. Brush dough with melted butter mixed with garlic powder. Sprinkle half the mozzarella on dough. 3. Spread mac and cheese evenly over pizza, leaving 1 inch border for crust. Top with remaining mozzarella, cheddar, and bacon. 4. Bake 12-15 min until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly and starting to brown. 5. Remove from oven, top with green onions and Parmesan. Drizzle with ranch dressing. Let cool 5 min, slice and serve.

Cheeseburger pizza.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, 1 lb ground beef, 1 onion, diced, 1 cup pizza sauce or ketchup-mustard mix, 3 cups cheddar cheese, shredded, 1 cup mozzarella, shredded, 8 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled. 1. Preheat oven to 475°F. Brown beef with onion in skillet over medium-high heat 8 min, breaking up meat. Drain fat. Season with salt and pepper. 2. Roll pizza dough into 14-inch circle. Transfer to greased pizza pan. 3. Spread sauce over dough. Sprinkle cheddar and mozzarella. Top with seasoned beef, bacon, and pickle slices. 4. Bake 12-15 min until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly. 5. Remove from oven, top with shredded lettuce and diced tomatoes. Drizzle with special sauce (mayo, ketchup, relish mix). Slice and serve.

Detroit style pepperoni pizza.directions: Ingredients needed: 2.5 cups bread flour, 1 tsp instant yeast, 1 tsp sugar, 1.5 tsp salt, 1 cup warm water, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 lb brick cheese or mozzarella, cubed, 6 oz pepperoni slices, 2 cups pizza sauce, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 1 tsp dried oregano. 1. In bowl, combine flour, yeast, sugar, salt. Add water and oil, mix until shaggy dough forms. Knead 5 min until smooth. Cover, let rise 1 hour until doubled. 2. Preheat oven to 500°F. Grease 9x13 metal baking pan generously with olive oil. Press dough into pan, stretching to corners. Let rest 30 min. 3. Press dough to corners again. Place cheese cubes all the way to edges in even layer (this creates crispy cheese edge). Top with pepperoni slices. 4. Bake 12-15 min until crust is golden and cheese edge is crispy and caramelized. 5. Remove from oven. Spoon pizza sauce in 3 stripes across top (Detroit style). Sprinkle with Parmesan and oregano. 6. Let rest 5 min. Run spatula around edges to release. Slice into squares and serve.

ingredients: breakfast sausage links, cooked and sliced
The Kitchen Sink breakfast.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 eggs, scrambled, 4 strips bacon, cooked, 2 breakfast sausage links, cooked and sliced, 2 cups hash browns, cooked crispy, 1 cup diced ham, 1 cup shredded cheese, 1/2 cup diced peppers and onions, sautéed, 4 slices toast with butter, 4 pancakes. 1. Cook bacon in large skillet until crispy, 6-8 min. Remove, set aside. 2. Cook sausages in same pan, 8-10 min. Remove, slice. 3. Cook hash browns in skillet until crispy, 8-10 min. 4. Sauté peppers and onions 5 min. Add ham, heat through. 5. Scramble eggs in butter until just set, 3-4 min. 6. Make pancakes and toast. 7. Plate everything together: eggs, bacon, sausage, hash browns, ham mixture, cheese over hot items. Serve with toast, pancakes, and maple syrup on the side.

Breakfast lasagna.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb breakfast sausage, 12 lasagna noodles, cooked, 12 eggs, scrambled, 2 cups ricotta cheese, 3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 cup grated parmesan cheese, 2 cups shredded hash browns, 1/2 cup diced bell peppers, 1/2 cup diced onions. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease 9x13 inch baking dish. 2. Brown sausage with peppers and onions, 8-10 min. Drain fat. 3. Scramble eggs, season with salt and pepper, cook until just set. 4. Layer in dish: 4 noodles, half the ricotta, half the eggs, half the sausage mixture, half the hash browns, 1 cup mozzarella. Repeat layers. Top with remaining 4 noodles, remaining mozzarella, and parmesan. 5. Cover with foil, bake 30 min. Uncover, bake 15 min more until cheese golden and bubbly. Let rest 10 min before slicing.

ingredients: (8 count) refrigerated cinnamon rolls with icing
Cinnamon roll waffles.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 can (8 count) refrigerated cinnamon rolls with icing, 4 eggs, scrambled (optional), 4 strips bacon, cooked (optional). 1. Preheat waffle iron and spray with nonstick spray. 2. Open cinnamon roll can, separate rolls. Set icing aside. 3. Place one cinnamon roll in center of waffle iron, close lid gently. Cook 2-3 min until golden brown and cooked through. 4. Repeat with remaining rolls. 5. Drizzle with reserved icing. Serve with scrambled eggs, bacon, fresh berries, and maple syrup for a sweet and savory breakfast.

Stuffed french toast.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 slices thick bread (challah or brioche), 8 oz cream cheese, softened, 1/4 cup strawberry or blueberry jam, 4 eggs, 1/2 cup milk, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 2 tbsp butter. 1. Mix cream cheese and jam until smooth. 2. Spread cream cheese mixture on 4 bread slices, top with remaining slices to make sandwiches. 3. Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon in shallow dish. 4. Heat griddle or large skillet over medium heat, melt butter. 5. Dip each sandwich in egg mixture, coating both sides. Let excess drip off. 6. Cook 3-4 min per side until golden brown and heated through. 7. Dust with powdered sugar, top with fresh berries, serve with maple syrup.

Bacon pancake dippers.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 strips thick-cut bacon, 1.5 cups all-purpose flour, 3.5 tsp baking powder, 1 tbsp sugar, 1/4 tsp salt, 1.25 cups milk, 1 egg, 3 tbsp melted butter, 12 wooden skewers or chopsticks. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Thread each bacon strip onto skewer in wave pattern. Place on wire rack over baking sheet. Bake 15-18 min until crispy. 2. Make pancake batter: Whisk flour, baking powder, sugar, salt. Add milk, egg, melted butter. Mix until smooth. 3. Heat griddle to 375°F. Pour batter into tall glass. 4. Dip each bacon skewer into batter, coating completely. Place on griddle, cook 2-3 min per side until golden. 5. Serve bacon pancake dippers with maple syrup for dipping.

ingredients: For Russian dressing hollandaise: 3 egg yolks, 1/2 cup melted butter, 2 tbsp ketchup, 1 tbsp horseradish, 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce, salt
Eggs Benedict Arnold.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 English muffins, split, 8 slices corned beef or pastrami, 8 eggs, 1 tbsp white vinegar. 1. Make Russian dressing hollandaise: Whisk egg yolks, ketchup, horseradish, Worcestershire in double boiler over simmering water. Slowly drizzle in melted butter, whisking constantly until thick, 3-4 min. Season with salt, keep warm. 2. Bring pot of water to gentle simmer, add vinegar. Poach eggs 3-4 min. 3. Toast English muffins. Heat corned beef in skillet 1-2 min per side. 4. Assemble: muffin half, corned beef, optional sauerkraut, poached egg, Russian hollandaise. Garnish with fresh dill.

Croissant breakfast sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 large croissants, split, 8 eggs, scrambled, 8 slices bacon, cooked, 4 slices Gruyère cheese, 2 tbsp butter. 1. Cook bacon until crispy. Scramble eggs in butter until soft and creamy. Season with salt, pepper, chives. 2. Toast croissants lightly. 3. Fill each with scrambled eggs, 2 bacon slices, and cheese slice. Serve hot.

ingredients: box devil's food cake mix (plus ingredients on box)
chocolate shavings and crushed cookies for topping
Death by chocolate cake.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 box devil's food cake mix (plus ingredients on box), 1 box chocolate instant pudding, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup vegetable oil, 4 eggs, 1/2 cup water, 2 cups chocolate chips, 3 cups powdered sugar, 1/2 cup cocoa powder, 1/4 cup heavy cream, 1 tsp vanilla, 1 cup heavy cream. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F, grease 9x13 inch pan. 2. Mix cake mix, pudding mix, sour cream, oil, eggs, and water until smooth. 3. Fold in chocolate chips. 4. Pour into pan, bake 45-50 min until toothpick comes out clean. 5. Cool completely. 6. Make frosting: beat butter, gradually add powdered sugar and cocoa, add cream and vanilla, beat until fluffy. 7. Spread frosting on cooled cake. 8. Make ganache: heat cream, pour over chocolate chips, stir until smooth. 9. Pour ganache over frosted cake. 10. Top with chocolate shavings and crushed cookies, refrigerate until set.

ingredients: cinnamon sugar: 1/2 cup sugar mixed with 2 tbsp cinnamon
chocolate sauce and whipped cream for topping
Fried cheesecake chimichanga.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 oz cream cheese (softened), 1/4 cup sugar, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1 cup strawberries (diced), 6 large flour tortillas. 1. Beat cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla until smooth. 2. Fold in diced strawberries. 3. Divide filling among tortillas, placing in center. 4. Fold sides in, then roll tightly, secure with toothpicks. 5. Freeze 1 hour. 6. Heat oil to 375°F in deep fryer or large pot. 7. Fry chimichangas 3-4 min until golden brown. 8. Drain on paper towels, remove toothpicks. 9. Roll in cinnamon sugar while hot. 10. Drizzle with chocolate sauce, top with whipped cream, serve immediately.

ingredients: box brownie mix (plus ingredients on box: eggs
Slutty brownies.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 package chocolate chip cookie dough, 1 package Oreo cookies (about 18), 1 box brownie mix (plus ingredients on box: eggs. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F, spray 9x13 inch pan. 2. Press cookie dough in even layer on bottom of pan. 3. Place Oreos in single layer on cookie dough. 4. Prepare brownie batter according to package directions. 5. Pour brownie batter over Oreos, spread evenly. 6. Bake 35-40 min until brownie top is set (toothpick will have moist crumbs). 7. Cool completely in pan. 8. Cut into squares and serve.

Bacon maple donut ice cream sandwich.directions: Ingredients needed: 6 g lazed donuts (halved horizontally), 1 pint vanilla ice cream (softened slightly), 12 slices bacon (cooked crispy), 1/2 cup maple syrup, 1/4 cup chopped pecans. 1. Cook bacon until extra crispy, brush with maple syrup while hot. 2. Chop bacon into small pieces. 3. Mix softened ice cream with bacon pieces and pecans. 4. Refreeze ice cream until firm. 5. Scoop ice cream onto bottom half of each donut. 6. Top with other donut half, press gently. 7. Roll edges in chocolate chips. 8. Wrap individually in plastic wrap, freeze until solid. 9. Remove from freezer 5 min before serving.

Triple threat milkshake.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 pint vanilla ice cream, 1 pint chocolate ice cream, 1 pint strawberry ice cream, 1 cup whole milk, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1/4 cup chocolate syrup, 1/4 cup strawberry syrup. 1. Blend vanilla ice cream with 1/3 cup milk until thick. 2. Pour into bottom third of large glass. 3. Blend strawberry ice cream with 1/3 cup milk and strawberry syrup. 4. Carefully pour over vanilla layer. 5. Blend chocolate ice cream with remaining milk, cream, and chocolate syrup. 6. Pour over strawberry layer. 7. Top with mountain of whipped cream. 8. Drizzle with chocolate and strawberry sauces. 9. Top with sprinkles, chocolate chips, cookies, and brownie chunks. 10. Serve with thick straw and long spoon.

Fried apple pie a la mode.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup cinnamon sugar. Fill pie dough with apple filling. Seal and fry until golden. Roll in cinnamon sugar. Serve with ice cream and caramel.

ingredients: chocolate chip cookie mix (plus ingredients on box)
Brookies.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 package brownie mix (plus ingredients on box), 1 package chocolate chip cookie mix (plus ingredients on box), 1 cup brown sugar, 1/2 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 2 tsp vanilla, 2 1/2 cups flour, 1 tsp baking soda, 1/2 tsp salt, 2 cups chocolate chips. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F, spray 9x13 inch pan. 2. Prepare brownie batter according to package. 3. Prepare cookie dough according to package. 4. Spread brownie batter in bottom of pan. 5. Drop spoonfuls of cookie dough over brownie batter. 6. Gently spread cookie dough to cover most of brownie layer. 7. Bake 30-35 min until top is golden and center is just set. 8. Cool completely before cutting into squares.

Bacon wrapped water chestnuts.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 cans (8 oz each) whole water chestnuts (drained), 1 lb bacon (slices cut in half), 1 cup brown sugar, 1/2 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup ketchup, 2 cloves garlic (minced). 1. Preheat oven to 375°F, line baking sheet with foil. 2. Wrap each water chestnut with half slice bacon, secure with toothpick. 3. Arrange on baking sheet. 4. Mix brown sugar, soy sauce, ketchup, and garlic in bowl. 5. Brush sauce over wrapped chestnuts. 6. Bake 30 min. 7. Brush with more sauce, bake another 10-15 min until bacon is crispy. 8. Let cool 5 min before serving.

Loaded totchos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs frozen tater tots, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup cooked bacon (crumbled), 1 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup green onions (sliced), 1/2 cup jalapeños (sliced), 1/4 cup ranch dressing, 1/4 cup BBQ sauce. 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. 2. Spread tater tots on baking sheet, bake 25-30 min until crispy. 3. Transfer tots to oven-safe platter. 4. Top with shredded cheddar and bacon. 5. Broil 2-3 min until cheese melts. 6. Drizzle with ranch and BBQ sauce. 7. Add dollops of sour cream. 8. Top with green onions and jalapeños. 9. Serve immediately.

Crack dip.directions: Ingredients needed: 16 oz cream cheese (softened), 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1 lb bacon (cooked and crumbled), 1 package ranch seasoning mix, 2 g reen onions (sliced), 1/4 cup pickled jalapeños (diced). 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 2. Mix cream cheese and sour cream until smooth. 3. Stir in cheddar cheese, half the bacon, ranch seasoning, green onions, and jalapeños. 4. Spread in 9-inch baking dish. 5. Top with remaining bacon. 6. Bake 20-25 min until hot and bubbly. 7. Serve hot with crackers and vegetables.

Jalape\u00f1o popper dip.directions: Ingredients needed: 16 oz cream cheese (softened), 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup mayonnaise, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese (divided), 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 can (4 oz) diced jalapeños (drained), 1/2 cup fresh jalapeños (diced), 1 cup panko breadcrumbs, 4 tbsp butter (melted), 1/2 cup parmesan cheese (grated). 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. 2. Mix cream cheese, sour cream, and mayonnaise until smooth. 3. Stir in 1 1/2 cups cheddar, mozzarella, canned jalapeños, and half the fresh jalapeños. 4. Spread in 9x13 inch baking dish. 5. Mix panko, butter, remaining cheddar, and parmesan. 6. Sprinkle topping over dip. 7. Top with remaining fresh jalapeños. 8. Bake 25-30 min until golden and bubbly. 9. Serve hot with tortilla chips.

Pimento cheese stuffed peppers.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 mini bell peppers (halved and seeded), 8 oz cream cheese (softened), 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1 jar (4 oz) diced pimentos (drained), 1/4 tsp garlic powder, 1/4 tsp cayenne, 1/2 cup bacon (cooked and crumbled), 1/4 cup breadcrumbs, 2 tbsp butter (melted). 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. 2. Make pimento cheese: mix cheddar, cream cheese, mayo, pimentos, garlic powder, and cayenne. 3. Fill each pepper half with pimento cheese mixture. 4. Top with bacon. 5. Mix breadcrumbs with melted butter, sprinkle over peppers. 6. Arrange on baking sheet. 7. Bake 20-25 min until peppers are tender and topping is golden. 8. Let cool 5 min before serving.

Cheesy pull apart sliders.directions: Ingredients needed: 24 s lider rolls (in connected sheet), 2 lbs deli ham, 1 1/2 lbs Swiss cheese (sliced), 1 lb cheddar cheese (sliced), 3 cloves garlic (minced), 1 tbsp Dijon mustard, 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tbsp poppy seeds, 1 tbsp dried minced onion. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 2. Slice slider rolls in half horizontally without separating individual rolls. 3. Place bottom half in 9x13 inch baking dish. 4. Layer ham and both cheeses on bottom half. 5. Place top half of rolls on cheese. 6. Mix melted butter, garlic, mustard, Worcestershire, poppy seeds, and onion. 7. Pour butter mixture evenly over rolls. 8. Cover with foil, bake 15 min. 9. Uncover, bake 10 min until golden and cheese melts. 10. Cut into individual sliders and serve.

Bacon wrapped stuffed mushrooms.directions: Ingredients needed: 24 large button mushrooms (stems removed), 12 slices bacon (cut in half), 8 oz cream cheese (softened), 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1/4 cup parmesan (grated), 2 cloves garlic (minced), 2 tbsp green onions (sliced), 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F, line baking sheet with foil. 2. Mix cream cheese, cheddar, parmesan, garlic, green onions, and cayenne. 3. Fill each mushroom cap with cheese mixture. 4. Wrap each stuffed mushroom with half slice bacon, secure with toothpick. 5. Arrange on baking sheet. 6. Bake 25-30 min until bacon is crispy and mushrooms are tender. 7. Let cool 5 min before serving.

ingredients: Toppings: pickles, diced tomatoes, shredded lettuce, sesame seeds
Bacon cheeseburger soup.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 12 slices bacon, chopped, 1 onion, diced, 3 carrots, diced, 3 celery stalks, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 4 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed, 6 cups beef broth, 2 cups whole milk, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/2 cup flour, 1/2 cup butter, 3 cups sharp cheddar cheese, shredded, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tbsp Dijon mustard. 1. In large pot, cook bacon until crispy, 8 min. Remove, set aside. 2. In bacon fat, brown ground beef, breaking into crumbles, 8 min. Remove, drain most fat. 3. In same pot, sauté onion, carrots, celery 5 min. Add garlic, cook 1 min. 4. Add broth and potatoes. Boil, then simmer 15 min until potatoes are tender. 5. Melt butter in pan, whisk in flour, cook 2 min. Gradually whisk in milk and cream until thick. 6. Add cream mixture to soup. Return beef to pot. Simmer 5 min. 7. Stir in cheese, Worcestershire, mustard until cheese melts. Season with salt and pepper. 8. Top with crispy bacon, diced pickles, tomatoes, shredded lettuce, sesame seeds.

Chicken bacon ranch casserole.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 cups cooked chicken, diced, 12 oz penne pasta, 8 strips bacon, cooked and crumbled, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of chicken soup, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup ranch dressing, 1/2 cup milk, 1 cup crushed Ritz crackers, 3 tbsp butter, melted, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp onion powder. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 9x13 baking dish. 2. Cook penne according to package directions. Drain. 3. In large bowl, combine cream of chicken soup, sour cream, ranch dressing, milk, garlic powder, and onion powder. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Stir in cooked pasta, chicken, half the bacon, 1.5 cups cheddar, and mozzarella. 5. Transfer to baking dish. Top with remaining cheddar. 6. In small bowl, mix crushed crackers with melted butter. Sprinkle over casserole along with remaining bacon. 7. Bake 30-35 minutes until bubbly and topping is golden brown. Let rest 5 minutes. Garnish with green onions.

ingredients: large heads cauliflower, cut into florets
Loaded cauliflower casserole.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 large heads cauliflower, cut into florets, 8 strips bacon, cooked and crumbled, 3 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup sour cream, 1/2 cup cream cheese, softened, 1/4 cup heavy cream, 4 g reen onions, sliced, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp onion powder, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 2 tbsp butter. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease a 9x13 baking dish. 2. Bring large pot of salted water to boil. Add cauliflower florets and cook 8-10 minutes until tender. Drain very well and pat dry. 3. In large bowl, mix sour cream, cream cheese, heavy cream, garlic, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper until smooth. 4. Fold in cooked cauliflower, 2 cups cheddar cheese, half the bacon, and half the green onions. 5. Transfer to baking dish. Top with remaining cheddar, Parmesan, and bacon. Dot with butter pieces. 6. Bake 25-30 minutes until bubbly and top is golden brown. Let rest 5 minutes. Garnish with remaining green onions.

ingredients: mall corn tortillas, cut into strips
Fresh cilantro, jalapeños, and green onions for garnish
Cheesy beef enchilada casserole.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained, 1 can (15 oz) corn, drained, 1 can (10 oz) enchilada sauce, 1 can (10 oz) Rotel tomatoes, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of chicken soup, 1 cup sour cream, 3 cups shredded Mexican cheese blend, 12 s mall corn tortillas, cut into strips, 1 medium onion, diced, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 packet (1 oz) taco seasoning, 1 tbsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 9x13 baking dish. 2. In large skillet over medium-high heat, brown ground beef with onion, 8-10 minutes. Drain fat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. 3. Stir in taco seasoning, chili powder, cumin, black beans, and corn. Cook 3 minutes. 4. In bowl, mix enchilada sauce, Rotel, cream of chicken soup, and sour cream. 5. Spread one-third of tortilla strips in baking dish. Layer with half the beef mixture, one-third of sauce, and 1 cup cheese. 6. Repeat with another third of tortillas, remaining beef, another third of sauce, and 1 cup cheese. 7. Top with remaining tortillas, sauce, and cheese. Cover with foil. 8. Bake 35 minutes. Remove foil and bake 10-15 minutes until bubbly and cheese is golden. Let rest 10 minutes. Garnish with cilantro, jalapeños, and green onions.

ingredients: (10 oz) Rotel tomatoes with green chiles
King ranch chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 4 cups cooked chicken, shredded, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of chicken soup, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of mushroom soup, 1 can (10 oz) Rotel tomatoes with green chiles, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 large onion, diced, 1 red bell pepper, diced, 1 g reen bell pepper, diced, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 3 cups shredded Mexican cheese blend, 12 corn tortillas, cut into strips, 2 tbsp butter, 1 tbsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 9x13 baking dish. 2. Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat. Sauté onion and bell peppers 6-7 minutes until softened. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. 3. In large bowl, combine both soups, Rotel, chicken broth, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper. Mix well. 4. Stir in sautéed vegetables and shredded chicken. 5. Layer one-third of tortilla strips in baking dish. Top with one-third of chicken mixture and 1 cup cheese. Repeat layers twice, ending with cheese. 6. Cover with foil. Bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and bake 15 minutes more until bubbly and cheese is golden. Let rest 10 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

Philly cheesesteak casserole.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ribeye steak, thinly sliced, 12 oz egg noodles, 2 g reen bell peppers, sliced, 2 medium onions, sliced, 8 oz mushrooms, sliced, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups shredded provolone cheese, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of mushroom soup, 1 cup beef broth, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 4 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 3 tbsp olive oil. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 9x13 baking dish. 2. Cook egg noodles according to package. Drain. 3. Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in large skillet over high heat. Season steak with salt and pepper. Sear in batches 2-3 minutes until browned. Remove and set aside. 4. In same skillet, heat remaining olive oil and 2 tbsp butter. Sauté peppers, onions, and mushrooms 8-10 minutes until softened and caramelized. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. 5. In bowl, whisk cream of mushroom soup, beef broth, heavy cream, and Worcestershire sauce. 6. In baking dish, combine noodles, steak, vegetables, sauce, 1.5 cups provolone, and mozzarella. Mix well. 7. Top with remaining provolone. Dot with remaining butter. Bake 25-30 minutes until bubbly and cheese is golden. Let rest 5 minutes.

ingredients: (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
(10 oz) Rotel tomatoes with green chiles
Green onions and jalapeños for garnish
Cowboy casserole.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs ground beef, 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed, 1 can (15 oz) corn, drained, 1 can (10 oz) Rotel tomatoes with green chiles, 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of mushroom soup, 1 cup sour cream, 1 packet (1 oz) taco seasoning, 3 cups shredded Mexican cheese blend, 1 bag (32 oz) frozen tater tots, 1 medium onion, diced, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup milk. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease a 9x13 baking dish. 2. In large skillet over medium-high heat, brown ground beef with onion, 8-10 minutes. Drain fat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. 3. Stir in taco seasoning, black beans, corn, and Rotel. Cook 3-4 minutes. 4. In bowl, mix cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, and milk. 5. Combine beef mixture with soup mixture and 2 cups cheese. Spread in baking dish. 6. Arrange tater tots in single layer on top. 7. Bake 45-50 minutes until tater tots are golden and crispy. 8. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more until melted. Let rest 5 minutes. Garnish with green onions and jalapeños.

Bacon wrapped meatball sub.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb ground beef, 1/2 lb ground pork, 1/2 cup breadcrumbs, 1/4 cup milk, 1 egg, 1/4 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 12 slices bacon, 2 cups marinara sauce, 4 hoagie rolls, 8 oz mozzarella, shredded. 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Soak breadcrumbs in milk 5 min. In bowl, combine beef, pork, soaked breadcrumbs, egg, Parmesan, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper. Form into 12 large meatballs. 2. Wrap each meatball with 1 slice bacon, secure with toothpick. Place on wire rack over baking sheet. Bake 25-30 min until bacon is crispy and meatballs reach 160°F internal temp. 3. Heat marinara in pot. Add baked bacon-wrapped meatballs, simmer 10 min to meld flavors. 4. Split hoagie rolls, toast lightly. Fill each with 3 meatballs and sauce. Top with mozzarella. Broil 2 min until cheese melts. 5. Garnish with basil. Serve hot.

Turducken.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 whole turkey (12-15 lbs, 1 whole duck (4-5 lbs, 1 whole chicken (3-4 lbs, 2 lbs sausage stuffing, 2 lbs cornbread stuffing, 1/4 cup Cajun seasoning, 1/4 cup garlic powder, 2 tbsp salt, 2 tbsp black pepper. 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. 2. Lay deboned turkey skin-side down, season with Cajun seasoning, salt, and pepper. 3. Spread half the sausage stuffing over turkey. 4. Lay deboned duck on top, season. 5. Spread cornbread stuffing over duck. 6. Lay deboned chicken on top, season. 7. Spread remaining sausage stuffing over chicken. 8. Roll turkey around all layers, tie with kitchen twine every 2 inches. 9. Place seam-side down in roasting pan. 10. Roast 3-4 hours until internal temp reaches 165°F throughout. 11. Let rest 30 min before slicing.

Lamb bacon chops.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 lamb chops (1 inch thick), 16 slices bacon, 4 tbsp olive oil, 4 cloves garlic (minced), 2 tbsp fresh rosemary (chopped), 1 tbsp Dijon mustard, 2 tbsp balsamic vinegar. 1. Season lamb chops with salt, pepper, garlic, and rosemary. 2. Wrap each chop with 2 bacon slices, secure with toothpicks. 3. Mix olive oil, mustard, and balsamic vinegar. 4. Brush lamb chops with mixture. 5. Heat large skillet over medium-high heat. 6. Sear chops 4-5 min per side until bacon is crispy and lamb is medium-rare (135°F internal temp). 7. Let rest 5 min, remove toothpicks. 8. Serve immediately.

Birria queso tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs beef chuck, cubed, 4 dried guajillo chiles, 2 dried ancho chiles, 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes, 1 onion, quartered, 6 cloves garlic, 2 cups beef broth, 12 corn tortillas, 2 cups shredded Oaxaca cheese, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, 1 white onion, diced. 1. Toast dried chiles in dry pan 2 min. Soak in hot water 20 min. 2. Blend soaked chiles, tomatoes, onion, garlic until smooth. 3. Season beef with salt. Brown in Dutch oven over high heat 3-4 min per side. 4. Add chile sauce and broth. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cover, cook 3 hours until beef is fork-tender. Shred meat, return to broth (consommé). 5. Dip tortillas in consommé. Fry in skillet over medium heat, add cheese and birria meat. Fold, cook until tortilla is crispy and cheese melts. 6. Serve with small bowl of consommé for dipping. Top tacos with cilantro and onion.

ingredients: spicy mayo: 1 cup mayo mixed with 2 tbsp sriracha
Fried chicken tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs chicken tenders, 2 cups buttermilk, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tbsp Cajun seasoning, 12 flour tortillas, 2 cups cabbage (shredded), 1 cup pickled jalapeños, 1/2 cup cilantro (chopped). 1. Marinate chicken in buttermilk 2 hours. 2. Mix flour with Cajun seasoning. 3. Heat oil to 350°F in deep fryer or large pot. 4. Dredge chicken in seasoned flour. 5. Fry 6-8 min until golden brown and internal temp reaches 165°F. 6. Drain on paper towels. 7. Warm tortillas. 8. Slice chicken into strips. 9. Build tacos: tortilla, shredded cabbage, fried chicken, spicy mayo, pickled jalapeños, cilantro. 10. Serve with lime wedges and hot sauce.

Breakfast tacos deluxe.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 s mall flour or corn tortillas, 8 eggs, scrambled, 1 cup cooked chorizo or breakfast sausage, 1 cup refried beans, warmed, 1 cup shredded cheese, 1 cup pico de gallo, 1 avocado, sliced, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro. 1. Cook chorizo in skillet until browned, 6-8 min. Remove, set aside. 2. Scramble eggs in same skillet with residual fat, 3-4 min until just set. 3. Warm tortillas in dry skillet 30 sec per side or wrap in damp towel and microwave 30 sec. 4. Spread beans on each tortilla. Top with eggs, chorizo, cheese, pico de gallo, avocado. 5. Garnish with sour cream, cilantro. Serve with lime wedges and hot sauce.

Brisket tacos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs smoked brisket (sliced or chopped), 12 corn tortillas, 1 cup white onion (diced), 1/2 cup cilantro (chopped), 1 cup salsa verde, 1 cup BBQ sauce, 2 limes (cut into wedges). 1. Heat brisket with BBQ sauce in skillet until warmed through. 2. Char tortillas directly over gas flame or in dry skillet until slightly charred. 3. Build tacos: tortilla, brisket, onion, cilantro, salsa verde. 4. Top with queso fresco and pickled jalapeños. 5. Serve with lime wedges and hot sauce.

Bacon wrapped scallops.directions: Ingredients needed: 24 large sea scallops (patted dry), 12 slices bacon (cut in half), 3 tbsp olive oil, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1 tsp paprika. 1. Preheat oven to 425°F, line baking sheet with foil. 2. Season scallops with salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic. 3. Wrap each scallop with half slice bacon, secure with toothpick. 4. Arrange on baking sheet. 5. Brush with olive oil and lemon juice. 6. Bake 12-15 min until bacon is crispy and scallops are opaque. 7. Can also finish under broiler 2-3 min for extra crispy bacon. 8. Serve with lemon wedges.

Fried ravioli.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb refrigerated cheese ravioli, 2 cups Italian breadcrumbs, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 cup flour, 3 eggs, beaten, 2 cups marinara sauce, warmed. 1. Set up breading station: flour in shallow dish, beaten eggs in second dish, breadcrumbs mixed with Parmesan, Italian seasoning, and garlic powder in third dish. 2. Dredge each ravioli in flour, shake off excess. Dip in egg, let excess drip. Press into breadcrumb mixture, coating completely. Place on baking sheet. 3. Heat 2 inches oil in large pot to 350°F. Working in batches of 5-6, fry ravioli 2-3 min, turning once, until golden brown and crispy. Don't overcrowd. 4. Remove with slotted spoon to paper towel-lined plate. Season with salt immediately. 5. Serve hot with marinara sauce for dipping. Garnish with parsley and extra Parmesan.

ingredients: cheese sauce or mustard for dipping
Cheese stuffed pretzel bites.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 package pizza dough (or frozen bread dough), 8 oz cheddar cheese (cut into small cubes), 1/4 cup baking soda, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 1 tbsp parsley (chopped). 1. Preheat oven to 425°F, line baking sheet with parchment. 2. Roll dough into ropes, cut into 2-inch pieces. 3. Flatten each piece, place cheese cube in center, seal dough around cheese. 4. Bring large pot of water to boil, add baking soda. 5. Boil pretzel bites in batches 30 sec, remove with slotted spoon. 6. Arrange on baking sheet, sprinkle with coarse salt. 7. Bake 12-15 min until deep golden brown. 8. Brush with garlic butter immediately. 9. Serve hot with cheese sauce or mustard.

Bacon fat popcorn.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/2 cup popcorn kernels, 1/4 cup bacon fat (reserved from cooking bacon), 4 tbsp melted butter, 1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 1/2 cup bacon bits. 1. Heat bacon fat in large pot over medium-high heat. 2. Add 3-4 test kernels, cover. 3. When test kernels pop, add remaining kernels, cover. 4. Shake pot constantly until popping slows to 2-3 sec between pops. 5. Remove from heat immediately. 6. Transfer to large bowl. 7. Drizzle with melted butter. 8. Toss with parmesan, garlic powder, paprika, bacon bits, and salt. 9. Serve immediately.

Cheese curds.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb cheese curds (preferably Wisconsin white cheddar), 2 cups all-purpose flour (divided), 2 eggs (beaten), 1 cup milk, 1 tsp baking powder, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper. 1. Heat oil to 375°F in deep fryer or large pot. 2. Place 1 cup flour in shallow bowl. 3. Mix remaining flour with eggs, milk, baking powder, garlic powder, cayenne, and salt. 4. Coat cheese curds in flour, then dip in batter. 5. Fry in batches 2-3 min until golden brown. 6. Drain on paper towels. 7. Serve immediately while cheese is hot and melty, with ranch dressing.

Garbage bread.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, 8 oz Italian sausage, cooked and crumbled, 8 oz pepperoni, diced, 2 cups mozzarella, shredded, 1 cup cheddar, shredded, 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated, 1 cup cooked bacon, crumbled, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 egg, beaten. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Roll pizza dough into 12x16 inch rectangle on floured surface. 2. Leaving 1 inch border on all sides, layer sausage, pepperoni, mozzarella, cheddar, Parmesan, bacon, and garlic evenly over dough. Sprinkle with Italian seasoning. 3. Starting from long side, tightly roll dough into log, pinching seam and ends to seal completely. Place seam-side down on greased baking sheet. 4. Brush all over with beaten egg. Cut 3-4 diagonal vents on top for steam. 5. Bake 30-35 min until golden brown and internal temp reaches 190°F. Let cool 10 min. 6. Slice into thick pieces. Serve warm with marinara sauce for dipping.

Pepperoni bread.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb pizza dough, 8 oz pepperoni slices, 2 cups mozzarella, shredded, 1 cup Parmesan, grated, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 3 tbsp butter, melted, 1 egg, beaten. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Roll pizza dough into 12x16 inch rectangle on floured surface. 2. Brush dough with melted butter, leaving 1 inch border. Sprinkle garlic, Italian seasoning, red pepper flakes. Layer pepperoni slices, mozzarella, and Parmesan evenly. 3. Starting from long side, tightly roll dough into log. Pinch seam and ends to seal completely. Place seam-side down on greased baking sheet. 4. Brush all over with beaten egg. Cut 3-4 diagonal vents on top. 5. Bake 30-35 min until golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped. Let cool 10 min. 6. Slice into thick pieces. Serve warm with marinara sauce for dipping.

Sausage cream cheese pinwheels.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 , sliced jalapeños. Spread cream cheese on pastry. Top with cooked sausage and cheese. Roll and slice. Bake until golden.

Bacon cinnamon rolls.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 package refrigerated cinnamon rolls (with icing), 12 slices bacon (cooked crispy), 1/4 cup brown sugar, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 1/2 cup chopped pecans. 1. Preheat oven to 350°F, grease 9x13 inch baking dish. 2. Crumble bacon into small pieces. 3. Unroll each cinnamon roll, sprinkle with bacon pieces and brown sugar. 4. Re-roll and place in baking dish. 5. Drizzle maple syrup over rolls. 6. Sprinkle with pecans. 7. Bake 20-25 min until golden brown. 8. Let cool 5 min, spread with icing from package. 9. Serve warm.

Candied bacon.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb thick-cut bacon, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tsp black pepper, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper (optional), 1/4 tsp cinnamon. 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Line large baking sheet with parchment paper, place wire rack on top. 2. Mix brown sugar, maple syrup, black pepper, cayenne, cinnamon in bowl. 3. Dredge each bacon strip in sugar mixture, coating both sides. Place on wire rack without overlapping. 4. Bake 20-25 min until bacon is crispy and sugar caramelized. Watch carefully in last 5 min to prevent burning. 5. Remove from oven, let cool on rack 5 min. Bacon will crisp up as it cools. Break into pieces or serve whole.

Bacon wrapped cream cheese chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 , sliced jalapeños, 1/2 cup bbq sauce. Butterfly chicken and stuff with cream cheese, jalapeños, and cheddar. Wrap in bacon. Bake and glaze with bbq sauce.

ingredients: powdered sugar and honey for topping
Fried butter on a stick.directions: Ingredients needed: 1 lb butter (frozen solid), 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 eggs (beaten), 1 cup milk, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1 tsp cinnamon. 1. Cut frozen butter into 2-inch cubes, insert wooden stick in each. 2. Keep frozen until ready to fry. 3. Heat oil to 375°F in deep fryer or large pot. 4. Mix flour, eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, and cinnamon for batter. 5. Working quickly, dip frozen butter on stick in batter. 6. Immediately fry 1 min until golden brown (no longer or butter melts out). 7. Remove quickly, drain briefly. 8. Dust with powdered sugar, drizzle with honey. 9. Serve immediately.

Bacon mac n cheese dogs.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 hot dogs, 8 hot dog buns, 3 cups prepared mac and cheese, 1 lb bacon (cooked and crumbled), 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1/4 cup green onions (sliced). 1. Grill or pan-fry hot dogs until charred. 2. Toast buns. 3. Heat mac and cheese, stir in half the bacon. 4. Place hot dogs in buns. 5. Top each with generous scoop of bacon mac and cheese. 6. Sprinkle with shredded cheddar, remaining bacon, and green onions. 7. Top with fried onions. 8. Serve immediately.

Triple fried chicken.directions: Ingredients needed: 3 lbs chicken pieces, 3 cups buttermilk, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tbsp Cajun seasoning, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp paprika, 2 tsp cayenne pepper, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp black pepper. 1. Marinate chicken in buttermilk overnight. 2. Mix flour with all seasonings. 3. Heat oil to 325°F in deep fryer or large pot. 4. Dredge chicken in seasoned flour, shake off excess. 5. Fry 8-10 min until light golden, drain. 6. Let rest 10 min, heat oil to 350°F. 7. Dredge chicken again in seasoned flour. 8. Fry 5-7 min until medium golden, drain. 9. Let rest 10 min, heat oil to 375°F. 10. Dredge chicken third time in seasoned flour. 11. Fry 4-5 min until deep golden and extra crispy. 12. Drain and serve immediately.

Cheesecake stuffed strawberries dipped i.directions: Ingredients needed: 1/4 cup powdered sugar. Hollow strawberries and fill with sweetened cream cheese. Dip in chocolate. Drizzle with white chocolate.

ingredients: BBQ sauce and ranch for dipping
Deep fried brisket bites.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs smoked brisket (cut into 1-inch cubes), 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 eggs (beaten), 2 cups panko breadcrumbs, 1 tbsp Cajun seasoning, 1 tsp garlic powder. 1. Heat oil to 375°F in deep fryer or large pot. 2. Mix panko with Cajun seasoning and garlic powder. 3. Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, seasoned panko. 4. Coat brisket cubes in flour, then egg, then panko. 5. Fry in batches 3-4 min until golden brown and crispy. 6. Drain on paper towels. 7. Serve hot with BBQ sauce and ranch for dipping.

Bacon jam grilled cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 slices sourdough bread, 1 onion (diced), 1/4 cup brown sugar, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 2 tbsp balsamic vinegar, 8 slices sharp cheddar cheese, 4 tbsp butter. 1. Make bacon jam: cook bacon in skillet until crispy, remove. 2. In bacon fat, cook onion 10 min until caramelized. 3. Return bacon, add brown sugar, maple syrup, and vinegar. 4. Simmer 15-20 min until thick jam consistency, cool. 5. Butter one side of each bread slice. 6. On unbuttered side, spread bacon jam. 7. Add 2 cheese slices, top with second bread slice (buttered side out). 8. Grill over medium heat 3-4 min per side until golden and cheese melts. 9. Serve immediately.

Inside out grilled cheese.directions: Ingredients needed: 8 slices bread (white or sourdough), 12 slices American cheese, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 4 tbsp butter (softened), 1/4 cup mayonnaise. 1. Heat large skillet or griddle over medium heat. 2. Butter one side of each bread slice. 3. Place 4 slices buttered-side down on work surface. 4. Top each with 2 American cheese slices. 5. Cover with second bread slice, buttered-side up. 6. Spread shredded cheddar on griddle in 4 piles the size of bread slices. 7. Place sandwiches cheese-side down onto shredded cheese piles. 8. Cook 3-4 min until cheese crust is golden and crispy. 9. Carefully flip, cook another 3-4 min. 10. Flip once more to crisp both cheese crusts. 11. Serve immediately.

ingredients: hollandaise or cheese sauce for drizzling
Loaded breakfast totchos.directions: Ingredients needed: 2 lbs frozen tater tots, 8 eggs (scrambled), 1 lb breakfast sausage (cooked and crumbled), 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup bacon (cooked and crumbled), 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup green onions (sliced), 1/4 cup jalapeños (sliced). 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. 2. Spread tater tots on baking sheet, bake 25-30 min until crispy. 3. Cook sausage until browned, scramble eggs. 4. Transfer tots to platter. 5. Top with scrambled eggs, sausage, bacon, and shredded cheddar. 6. Broil 2-3 min until cheese melts. 7. Drizzle with hollandaise or cheese sauce. 8. Add dollops of sour cream. 9. Top with green onions and jalapeños. 10. Serve immediately.

Chocolate bacon bark with pretzels.directions: Ingredients needed: 12 slices thick-cut bacon, 12 oz dark chocolate chips, 8 oz milk chocolate chips, 2 cups mini pretzels (broken), 1/4 cup toffee bits, 1/4 cup chopped peanuts, 3 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tsp sea salt, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper (optional). 1. Preheat oven to 400°F, line baking sheet with parchment. 2. Arrange bacon, sprinkle with brown sugar. 3. Bake 15-20 min until crispy, cool and chop. 4. Line another baking sheet with parchment. 5. Melt both chocolates together in double boiler or microwave. 6. Pour melted chocolate onto parchment, spread into 1/4-inch thick rectangle. 7. Immediately sprinkle with bacon, pretzels, toffee bits, and peanuts. 8. Press toppings gently into chocolate. 9. Sprinkle with sea salt and optional cayenne. 10. Refrigerate 1 hour until firm, break into pieces.

Classic Eggs Benedict.directions: Toast English muffins. Cook Canadian bacon until browned. Poach eggs in simmering water with vinegar for 3-4 minutes. Make hollandaise: whisk egg yolks and lemon juice over double boiler, slowly drizzle in melted butter until thick. Season with cayenne and salt. Assemble: muffin, bacon, poached egg, hollandaise.

Fluffy Buttermilk Pancakes.directions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt. Whisk buttermilk, eggs, melted butter, vanilla. Combine wet and dry until just mixed. Pour 1/4 cup batter onto greased griddle at 375°F. Cook until bubbles form, flip, cook until golden. Serve with butter and maple syrup.

Country Breakfast Skillet.directions: Cook bacon and sausage in cast iron skillet. Remove, crumble. Cook potatoes in drippings 15 minutes until crispy. Add onions and peppers, cook 5 minutes. Create wells, crack eggs in. Cover and cook until whites set. Top with cheese, meat. Season and serve.

Belgian Waffles with Strawberries.directions: Separate eggs. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, salt. Combine milk, oil, vanilla, yolks. Mix into dry ingredients. Beat whites to stiff peaks, fold in. Cook in preheated waffle iron until golden. Top with strawberries, whipped cream, powdered sugar.

Denver Omelet.directions: Sauté ham, peppers, onion in butter until tender. Beat eggs with milk, salt, pepper. Pour over vegetables in hot buttered pan. Cook, lifting edges to let uncooked egg flow under. Add cheese to one half, fold over. Serve immediately.

Eggs Florentine.directions: Sauté spinach with garlic until wilted. Toast muffins. Poach eggs in simmering vinegar water 3-4 minutes. Make hollandaise: whisk yolks and lemon over double boiler, drizzle in butter. Season. Assemble: muffin, spinach, egg, hollandaise.

Blueberry Pancakes.directions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt. Combine buttermilk, eggs, melted butter. Mix wet into dry until just combined. Fold in blueberries. Pour 1/4 cup portions onto hot griddle. Cook until bubbles form, flip. Serve with syrup.

Corned Beef Hash.directions: Parboil potatoes 5 minutes. Sauté onion in butter until soft. Add potatoes, cook until crispy 15 minutes. Add corned beef, Worcestershire, paprika. Press flat, cook until crust forms. Flip sections. Top with fried or poached eggs.

French Toast.directions: Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon. Dip bread slices, coating both sides. Cook in buttered skillet over medium heat 3-4 minutes per side until golden. Dust with powdered sugar, serve with maple syrup.

Cinnamon Roll French Toast.directions: Slice cinnamon rolls in half horizontally. Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla. Dip roll halves in mixture. Cook in buttered pan until golden on both sides. Top with cream cheese frosting mixture and powdered sugar.

Biscuits and Sausage Gravy.directions: Brown sausage, breaking into crumbles. Sprinkle flour over sausage, cook 1 minute. Gradually whisk in milk. Simmer until thick, 5-7 minutes. Season with salt, pepper, cayenne. Split warm biscuits, ladle gravy over.

Eggs in a Basket.directions: Cut hole in center of bread with glass. Butter both sides. Place in hot skillet, crack egg into hole. Cook until bread is golden and egg white sets. Flip carefully, cook to desired doneness. Season and serve with toast cutout.

Western Scramble.directions: Sauté ham, peppers, onion until tender. Beat eggs with milk, salt, pepper. Add to pan, gently scramble over medium-low heat until soft curds form. Fold in cheese. Serve immediately with toast.

Breakfast Burrito.directions: Cook sausage and hash browns. Scramble eggs. Warm tortillas. Layer eggs, sausage, hash browns, cheese, salsa down center. Fold sides in, roll tight. Serve with extra salsa and sour cream.

Steak and Eggs.directions: Season steak with salt, pepper, garlic powder. Sear in hot cast iron 4 minutes per side for medium-rare. Rest 5 minutes. Fry eggs in butter to desired doneness. Serve steak sliced alongside eggs and crispy hash browns.

Banana Nut Pancakes.directions: Mash bananas. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt. Combine buttermilk, eggs, melted butter, bananas. Mix wet into dry. Fold in walnuts. Cook 1/4 cup portions on griddle until bubbles form, flip. Serve with syrup.

Huevos Rancheros.directions: Fry tortillas until slightly crispy. Warm beans and ranchero sauce. Fry eggs sunny-side up. Layer: tortilla, beans, egg, sauce, cheese. Top with sliced avocado, sour cream, cilantro.

Bagel with Lox and Cream Cheese.directions: Toast bagel halves. Spread generously with cream cheese. Layer smoked salmon on top. Garnish with thin red onion rings, capers, fresh dill. Serve with lemon wedge.

Eggs Sardou.directions: Warm artichoke bottoms in butter. Sauté spinach until wilted. Poach eggs. Place artichoke on plate, top with spinach, then ham, then poached egg. Cover with hollandaise sauce.

Cheese Omelet.directions: Beat eggs with milk, salt, pepper. Heat butter in nonstick pan over medium heat. Pour in eggs, cook while lifting edges. When almost set, add cheese to half. Fold over, slide onto plate. Garnish with chives.

Chocolate Chip Pancakes.directions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt. Combine buttermilk, eggs, melted butter. Mix wet into dry. Fold in chocolate chips. Cook 1/4 cup portions on griddle until bubbles form, flip. Top with whipped cream.

Breakfast Sandwich.directions: Cook bacon until crispy. Toast English muffin. Fry egg in butter, break yolk if desired. Assemble: muffin bottom, cheese, egg, bacon, muffin top. Serve hot.

Chicken Fried Steak and Eggs.directions: Pound steak thin. Season flour with salt, pepper, cayenne. Dip steak in buttermilk, then flour. Fry in hot oil until golden. Make gravy from drippings, flour, milk. Serve steak with fried eggs and gravy.

Pecan Waffles.directions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, salt. Combine milk, oil, yolks, vanilla. Mix into dry ingredients. Beat whites to peaks, fold in with pecans. Cook in waffle iron until golden. Serve with butter and maple syrup.

Breakfast Quesadilla.directions: Scramble eggs. Layer cheese, eggs, bacon on tortilla, top with another tortilla. Cook in buttered pan until golden on both sides. Cut into wedges. Serve with salsa and sour cream.

Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal.directions: Cook oats with milk and water. Add diced apple, cinnamon, salt. Simmer until tender. Top with brown sugar, butter, walnuts. Serve hot.

Sausage Egg and Cheese McGriddle Style.directions: Add maple syrup to pancake batter. Cook small pancakes. Cook sausage patty. Fry egg. Assemble: pancake, cheese, sausage, egg, pancake. Press and serve.

Avocado Toast with Poached Egg.directions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon, salt, pepper. Poach eggs in simmering water with vinegar 3-4 minutes. Spread avocado on toast, top with poached egg. Season with red pepper flakes.

Bacon and Cheese Grits.directions: Cook bacon until crispy, crumble. Cook grits in milk and water until tender, 20 minutes. Stir in butter, cheese, garlic powder. Season. Top with crumbled bacon. Serve hot.

Stuffed French Toast.directions: Slice bread thick, cut pocket. Mix cream cheese with jam, stuff into pocket. Dip in egg mixture. Cook in butter until golden on both sides. Dust with powdered sugar.

Eggs Over Easy with Toast.directions: Melt butter in skillet. Crack eggs in, cook until whites are set. Flip gently, cook 30 seconds more. Season. Serve with buttered toast.

Potato Pancakes.directions: Grate potatoes and onion, squeeze dry. Mix with eggs, flour, salt, pepper. Fry spoonfuls in hot oil until golden and crispy on both sides. Serve with sour cream and applesauce.

Croque Madame.directions: Make béchamel with butter, flour, milk, nutmeg. Spread on bread with mustard. Layer ham and cheese, sandwich. Spread more béchamel on top, add cheese. Broil until bubbly. Top with fried egg.

Shakshuka American Style.directions: Sauté onion and pepper in olive oil. Add garlic, spices. Add tomatoes, simmer 10 minutes. Make wells, crack eggs in. Cover, cook until whites set. Top with feta and parsley. Serve with bread.

Pigs in a Blanket Breakfast.directions: Wrap each sausage link in crescent roll dough. Place on baking sheet. Bake at 375°F for 12-15 minutes until golden. Serve with maple syrup for dipping.

Spinach and Feta Omelet.directions: Sauté spinach and garlic until wilted. Beat eggs with milk, salt, pepper. Cook in buttered pan. Add spinach and feta to one side, fold over. Serve immediately.

Cinnamon Sugar Toast.directions: Toast bread. Spread generously with soft butter. Sprinkle with cinnamon sugar mixture. Serve warm.

Eggs Chesapeake.directions: Toast muffins. Pan-fry crab cakes until golden. Poach eggs. Assemble: muffin, crab cake, poached egg, hollandaise. Sprinkle with Old Bay.

Breakfast Potatoes.directions: Parboil potatoes 5 minutes. Heat oil and butter in skillet. Cook potatoes until crispy, 15 minutes. Add onions and peppers, cook 5 more minutes. Season with paprika, garlic powder, salt, pepper.

Monte Cristo Sandwich.directions: Layer ham, turkey, cheese between bread slices. Dip in egg-milk mixture. Cook in butter until golden on both sides. Dust with powdered sugar. Serve with raspberry jam.

Granola Parfait.directions: Layer yogurt, granola, berries in a glass. Repeat layers. Drizzle with honey. Serve immediately.

Ham and Cheese Croissant.directions: Slice croissant. Spread with mustard. Layer ham and cheese. Butter outside, toast in pan until cheese melts. Serve warm.

Breakfast Tacos.directions: Cook sausage. Scramble eggs. Warm tortillas. Fill with eggs, sausage, cheese. Top with salsa, avocado, cilantro.

Crab Cake Benedict.directions: Toast muffins. Pan-fry crab cakes. Poach eggs. Stack: muffin, crab cake, egg, hollandaise. Garnish with chives.

Lemon Ricotta Pancakes.directions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, salt. Combine ricotta, eggs, milk, lemon zest and juice. Mix wet into dry. Cook 1/4 cup portions until bubbles form, flip. Serve with butter and syrup.

Smoked Salmon Benedict.directions: Toast muffins. Poach eggs. Assemble: muffin, smoked salmon, poached egg, hollandaise. Garnish with capers and dill.

Breakfast Club Sandwich.directions: Toast bread. Cook bacon and fry egg. Layer: toast, mayo, lettuce, tomato, bacon, cheese, egg, toast. Cut diagonally. Serve with hash browns.

Egg White Omelet.directions: Sauté vegetables in olive oil. Beat egg whites with salt and pepper. Pour over vegetables, cook until set. Add feta, fold. Serve immediately.

Sweet Potato Hash.directions: Cook bacon, set aside. Cook sweet potatoes in bacon fat until crispy. Add onion and peppers. Season. Make wells, add eggs. Cover until eggs set. Top with bacon.

Baked Oatmeal.directions: Mix oats, baking powder, cinnamon, salt. Combine milk, eggs, sugar, melted butter, vanilla. Mix together with berries. Pour in baking dish. Bake at 350°F for 35-40 minutes.

Brioche French Toast.directions: Whisk eggs, cream, vanilla, cinnamon. Soak brioche slices. Cook in butter over medium heat until golden on both sides. Dust with powdered sugar, serve with berries and syrup.

Mushroom and Swiss Omelet.directions: Sauté mushrooms with thyme until golden. Beat eggs with milk, salt, pepper. Cook in buttered pan. Add mushrooms and cheese to one side, fold. Serve immediately.

Eggs Royale.directions: Toast muffins. Poach eggs. Assemble: muffin, salmon, egg, hollandaise. Season with pepper, garnish with chives.

Cheddar Bacon Biscuits.directions: Cut butter into flour, baking powder, salt. Add cheese and bacon. Stir in buttermilk. Pat out, cut rounds. Bake at 425°F for 15 minutes until golden.

Breakfast Flatbread.directions: Brush flatbread with oil, bake at 400°F until crisp. Top with cheese, return to oven until melted. Add scrambled eggs, bacon, green onions. Slice and serve.

Cream Cheese Danish.directions: Mix cream cheese, sugar, egg yolk, vanilla, lemon zest. Cut pastry into squares. Add filling, fold corners. Brush with egg wash. Bake at 400°F for 15 minutes. Drizzle with powdered sugar glaze.

Loaded Breakfast Nachos.directions: Layer chips on sheet pan. Top with cheese, bake until melted. Add scrambled eggs, sausage, jalapeños, green onions. Serve with salsa and sour cream.

Pumpkin Spice Pancakes.directions: Mix dry ingredients. Combine buttermilk, pumpkin, eggs, melted butter. Mix together. Cook 1/4 cup portions on griddle. Serve with butter, syrup, whipped cream.

Sausage and Cheese Breakfast Casserole.directions: Brown sausage. Layer bread, sausage, cheese in baking dish. Whisk eggs, milk, mustard, salt, pepper. Pour over. Refrigerate overnight or bake immediately at 350°F for 45 minutes.

Bacon Egg and Cheese Bagel.directions: Toast bagel. Cook bacon. Fry or scramble eggs with salt and pepper. Assemble: bagel, cheese, eggs, bacon. Serve immediately.

Overnight Oats.directions: Mix oats, milk, yogurt, chia seeds, maple syrup, vanilla. Refrigerate overnight. Top with fresh berries before serving.

Hash Brown Casserole.directions: Mix hash browns, sour cream, soup, cheese, onion, salt, pepper. Spread in baking dish. Top with crushed cornflakes mixed with melted butter. Bake at 350°F for 60 minutes.

Cinnamon Swirl Pancakes.directions: Make pancake batter. Mix cinnamon with brown sugar and butter for swirl. Pour batter, drizzle cinnamon mixture, swirl with toothpick. Cook until done. Drizzle with cream cheese frosting.

Eggs Blackstone.directions: Toast muffins. Cook bacon. Poach eggs. Assemble: muffin, bacon, tomato slice, poached egg, hollandaise. Season and serve.

Apple Fritter Pancakes.directions: Cook diced apples with brown sugar and cinnamon. Make pancake batter with nutmeg. Fold in apples. Cook until golden. Drizzle with vanilla glaze.

Smoked Sausage and Egg Breakfast Bowl.directions: Cook hash browns until crispy. Sauté sausage until browned. Fry eggs. Layer in bowl: hash browns, sausage, eggs, cheese, green onions. Serve with hot sauce.

Challah French Toast.directions: Slice challah thick. Whisk eggs, cream, vanilla, cinnamon. Soak bread. Cook in butter until golden on both sides. Serve with berries and syrup.

Western Omelet with Hash Browns.directions: Cook hash browns until crispy. Sauté ham, peppers, onion. Beat eggs, pour over mixture. Cook until set, add cheese, fold. Serve with hash browns and toast.

Biscuit Breakfast Pizza.directions: Press biscuits into pizza pan, bake until golden. Spread gravy on crust. Top with scrambled eggs, sausage, bacon, cheese. Broil until cheese melts.

Steel Cut Oatmeal with Brown Sugar.directions: Bring water and milk to boil. Add oats, reduce heat. Simmer 25-30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in butter, cinnamon, salt. Top with brown sugar, walnuts, raisins.

Bacon Wrapped Egg Cups.directions: Line muffin cups with bacon. Crack egg into each. Top with cheese. Bake at 375°F for 20-25 minutes. Season, garnish with chives.

Chorizo Breakfast Hash.directions: Cook chorizo, breaking up. Remove. Cook potatoes in drippings until crispy. Add onion, peppers. Return chorizo. Make wells, add eggs. Cover until set. Top with cheese, cilantro, salsa.

Eggs Oscar.directions: Blanch asparagus. Sauté crab in butter. Toast muffins. Poach eggs. Assemble: muffin, asparagus, crab, egg, hollandaise.

Red Velvet Waffles.directions: Mix flour, cocoa, sugar, baking powder. Combine buttermilk, eggs, oil, vanilla, food coloring. Mix together. Cook in waffle iron. Top with cream cheese frosting.

Breakfast Stuffed Peppers.directions: Cook sausage and hash browns. Scramble eggs. Mix together with cheese. Stuff pepper halves. Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes until peppers tender.

Egg Salad on Toast.directions: Chop eggs. Mix with mayo, mustard, celery, chives, salt, pepper. Serve on toast.

Sausage Gravy Breakfast Bowl.directions: Crumble biscuits in bowl. Top with hot gravy, scrambled eggs, cheese, bacon, green onions. Serve immediately.

Croissant Breakfast Sandwich.directions: Cook bacon. Scramble or fry eggs. Slice croissant, spread with mustard. Layer cheese, eggs, bacon. Serve warm.

Cottage Cheese Pancakes.directions: Blend cottage cheese, eggs, flour, vanilla, salt. Cook small pancakes in butter until golden on both sides. Serve with berries and syrup.

Tex-Mex Migas.directions: Fry tortilla strips until crispy. Sauté onion, jalapeño, tomato. Add beaten eggs, scramble. Fold in tortilla strips and cheese. Serve with salsa and cilantro.

Caramelized Banana French Toast.directions: Cook bananas in butter and brown sugar until caramelized. Make French toast with egg-milk-cinnamon mixture. Top toast with caramelized bananas and whipped cream.

Country Ham and Eggs.directions: Fry ham steak in skillet. Remove. Add coffee to drippings for red-eye gravy. Fry eggs. Serve ham with eggs, biscuits, gravy.

Gingerbread Pancakes.directions: Mix dry ingredients with spices. Combine buttermilk, eggs, molasses, melted butter. Mix together. Cook pancakes until done. Top with cream cheese frosting.

Breakfast Sausage Patties.directions: Mix pork with all seasonings. Form into patties. Cook in skillet over medium heat 4-5 minutes per side until cooked through.

Tomato Cheese Omelet.directions: Beat eggs with milk, salt, pepper. Cook in buttered pan until almost set. Add tomato, cheese, basil to one side. Fold and serve.

French Toast Sticks.directions: Cut bread into strips. Dip in egg-milk-cinnamon mixture. Cook in butter until golden on all sides. Dust with powdered sugar. Serve with syrup for dipping.

California Omelet.directions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Cook in buttered pan. Add bacon, tomato, cheese. Fold. Top with avocado slices and sour cream.

English Muffin Breakfast Pizza.directions: Toast muffin halves. Top with cheese, broil until melted. Add scrambled eggs, bacon, green onions. Serve immediately.

Waffle Breakfast Sandwich.directions: Toast waffles. Cook bacon and fry eggs. Assemble: waffle, cheese, egg, bacon, drizzle of syrup, waffle on top.

Classic Reuben Sandwich.directions: Butter bread. Layer corned beef, sauerkraut, cheese on bread. Spread dressing on other slice. Grill until cheese melts and bread is golden. Serve with pickles and chips.

BLT Sandwich.directions: Toast bread. Cook bacon crispy. Spread mayo on toast. Layer lettuce, tomato, bacon. Season. Top with second slice. Cut diagonally and serve.

Club Sandwich.directions: Toast 3 slices bread. Layer: toast, mayo, turkey, cheese, toast, mayo, bacon, lettuce, tomato, toast. Secure with toothpicks. Cut into quarters.

Philly Cheesesteak.directions: Sauté onions and peppers until soft. Cook steak slices quickly. Season. Place in roll, top with cheese. Broil to melt. Serve immediately.

Grilled Cheese Sandwich.directions: Butter outside of bread slices. Place cheese between unbuttered sides. Grill over medium heat until golden on both sides and cheese melts.

Tuna Melt.directions: Mix tuna, mayo, celery, onion, salt, pepper. Toast bread on one side. Pile tuna on untoasted side, top with cheese. Broil until melted.

French Dip Sandwich.directions: Sauté onion in butter with garlic. Toast bread. Warm roast beef in broth. Pile beef and onions on bread, top with cheese. Broil. Serve with au jus for dipping.

Patty Melt.directions: Form patty, season, cook to desired doneness. Caramelize onions. Butter bread, layer cheese, patty, onions, cheese, bread. Grill until golden.

Turkey Club Wrap.directions: Spread ranch on tortilla. Layer turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, avocado. Roll tightly, tucking ends. Cut in half diagonally.

Chicken Caesar Wrap.directions: Toss chicken, lettuce, Parmesan, dressing. Place on tortilla, add croutons. Roll tightly. Cut and serve.

Cobb Salad.directions: Arrange lettuce on platter. Arrange chicken, bacon, eggs, avocado, tomatoes, blue cheese in rows. Drizzle with vinaigrette. Serve.

Chef Salad.directions: Arrange greens on plates. Top with ham, turkey, cheeses, eggs, tomatoes, cucumber. Serve with ranch dressing.

Chicken Salad Sandwich.directions: Mix chicken, mayo, celery, grapes, pecans, salt, pepper. Serve on split croissant with lettuce.

Egg Salad Sandwich.directions: Chop eggs. Mix with mayo, mustard, celery, salt, pepper. Serve on bread with lettuce.

Buffalo Chicken Sandwich.directions: Bread and fry chicken. Toss in hot sauce mixed with butter. Serve on bun with blue cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles.

Crispy Chicken Sandwich.directions: Brine chicken in pickle juice. Dredge in flour, dip in buttermilk, dredge again. Fry until golden and cooked through. Serve on bun with pickles and mayo.

Pulled Pork Sandwich.directions: Heat pulled pork with BBQ sauce. Pile on bun. Top with coleslaw and pickles. Serve with extra sauce.

Meatball Sub.directions: Heat meatballs in marinara. Split roll, fill with meatballs and sauce. Top with mozzarella and Parmesan. Broil until cheese melts.

Sloppy Joe.directions: Brown beef with onion and pepper. Add ketchup, brown sugar, Worcestershire, mustard. Simmer 10 minutes. Serve on buns.

Hot Dog with the Works.directions: Grill or boil hot dogs. Toast buns. Place dog in bun. Top with mustard, ketchup, relish, onion, sauerkraut.

Chicago Style Hot Dog.directions: Steam or boil hot dog. Toast bun. Add dog, then mustard, relish, onion, tomato, pickle, peppers. Sprinkle with celery salt. Never ketchup!

Classic Cheeseburger.directions: Form patties, season with salt and pepper. Grill to desired doneness, add cheese to melt. Toast buns. Assemble with toppings.

Bacon Cheeseburger.directions: Cook bacon crispy. Form and grill patties. Add cheese to melt. Toast buns. Stack: bun, lettuce, tomato, patty, bacon, onion, pickles, sauces, bun.

Mushroom Swiss Burger.directions: Sauté mushrooms in butter with garlic. Grill patties, top with cheese and mushrooms. Toast buns. Spread mayo, assemble burger.

BBQ Bacon Burger.directions: Grill patties, brush with BBQ sauce. Add cheese to melt. Toast buns. Stack with bacon and crispy onion rings.

Turkey Burger.directions: Mix turkey with seasonings. Form patties. Grill until cooked through. Serve on buns with avocado, lettuce, tomato.

Veggie Burger.directions: Mash beans. Mix with breadcrumbs, vegetables, spices, egg. Form patties. Pan-fry until crispy. Serve on buns with toppings.

Fish and Chips.directions: Cut potatoes into fries, fry until golden. Make beer batter with flour, baking powder, beer. Dip fish, fry until golden. Season with salt. Serve with vinegar and tartar sauce.

New England Clam Chowder.directions: Cook bacon, sauté onion and celery. Add flour, cook 1 minute. Add clam juice, potatoes, thyme, bay leaf. Simmer until potatoes tender. Add clams and cream. Heat through.

Tomato Soup with Grilled Cheese.directions: Sauté onion and garlic in butter. Add tomatoes, broth, simmer 20 minutes. Blend smooth, add cream. Make grilled cheese. Serve soup with sandwich.

Chicken Noodle Soup.directions: Poach chicken in broth, shred. Sauté vegetables in butter. Add broth, chicken, herbs. Simmer 20 minutes. Add noodles, cook until tender. Season and serve.

Beef Vegetable Soup.directions: Brown beef. Add broth, tomatoes, onion, garlic, Worcestershire. Simmer 1 hour. Add vegetables, cook 30 minutes more until tender.

Minestrone Soup.directions: Sauté vegetables in olive oil. Add broth, tomatoes, beans, Parmesan rind, herbs. Simmer 30 minutes. Add pasta, cook until tender. Add spinach. Serve with Parmesan.

Loaded Baked Potato Soup.directions: Bake potatoes, scoop flesh. Cook bacon. Make roux with butter and flour. Add broth, potatoes, cream. Simmer until thick. Serve topped with cheese, bacon, sour cream, onions.

Caesar Salad.directions: Tear lettuce into pieces. Toss with dressing. Top with Parmesan and croutons. Squeeze lemon, crack pepper. Serve immediately.

Wedge Salad.directions: Cut lettuce into wedges. Top with bacon, blue cheese, tomatoes, onion. Drizzle with dressing. Garnish with chives.

Spinach Salad with Hot Bacon Dressing.directions: Cook bacon, reserve drippings. Make dressing with drippings, vinegar, sugar, mustard. Arrange spinach with eggs, mushrooms, onion. Drizzle hot dressing. Top with bacon.

Waldorf Salad.directions: Mix apples, celery, walnuts, grapes. Combine mayo with lemon juice, toss with salad. Serve on lettuce leaves.

Southwestern Chicken Salad.directions: Slice chicken. Arrange greens with beans, corn, tomatoes, avocado, cheese. Top with chicken and tortilla strips. Drizzle with dressing.

Asian Chicken Salad.directions: Slice chicken. Toss greens with oranges, wonton strips, almonds, onions. Top with chicken. Drizzle with dressing.

Greek Salad.directions: Combine cucumber, tomatoes, onion, olives, pepper, feta. Whisk oil, vinegar, oregano. Toss salad with dressing.

Chicken Tenders with Fries.directions: Dredge tenders in flour, dip in egg, coat with breadcrumbs. Fry until golden and cooked through. Bake fries. Serve with dipping sauces.

Nachos Supreme.directions: Brown beef with taco seasoning. Layer chips on sheet pan. Top with beef, beans, cheese. Bake until cheese melts. Add toppings. Serve immediately.

Chicken Wings.directions: Season and fry wings until crispy. Toss in hot sauce mixed with melted butter and garlic powder. Serve with celery, carrots, and dressings.

Loaded Potato Skins.directions: Bake potatoes. Halve, scoop most of flesh. Brush with butter, season. Bake until crispy. Fill with cheese and bacon. Bake until cheese melts. Top with sour cream and onions.

Mozzarella Sticks.directions: Freeze cheese sticks. Dredge in flour, dip in egg, coat with breadcrumbs. Repeat for extra crispy. Fry until golden. Serve with marinara.

Spinach Artichoke Dip.directions: Mix all ingredients except chips. Spread in baking dish. Bake at 350°F for 25 minutes until bubbly. Serve with tortilla chips.

Buffalo Chicken Dip.directions: Mix chicken, cream cheese, hot sauce, ranch. Spread in dish, top with cheddar. Bake at 350°F until bubbly. Serve with celery and chips.

Onion Rings.directions: Slice onions into rings. Make batter with flour, buttermilk, baking powder, cayenne. Dip rings in batter. Fry until golden. Season with salt.

Jalape\u00f1o Poppers.directions: Halve peppers, remove seeds. Mix cream cheese, cheddar, bacon. Fill peppers. Top with breadcrumbs. Bake at 400°F for 20 minutes. Serve with ranch.

Corn Dogs.directions: Make batter with dry ingredients, egg, milk. Insert sticks into hot dogs. Dip in batter. Fry until golden. Serve with mustard and ketchup.

Tuna Salad Sandwich.directions: Mix tuna, mayo, celery, onion, lemon juice, salt, pepper. Spread on bread with lettuce and tomato.

Cuban Sandwich.directions: Layer mustard, ham, pork, cheese, pickles on bread. Butter outside. Press in panini press or skillet with weight until crispy and cheese melts.

Italian Sub.directions: Layer meats and cheese on bread. Add lettuce, tomato, onion, pepperoncini. Drizzle with oil and vinegar. Season with Italian seasoning.

Turkey Avocado Sandwich.directions: Toast bread. Spread with mayo and mustard. Layer turkey, bacon, cheese, avocado, lettuce, tomato. Top with second slice.

California Chicken Sandwich.directions: Toast roll. Spread with chipotle mayo. Layer chicken, cheese, bacon, avocado, tomato, sprouts. Serve warm.
