Lobster Roll.directions: Mix lobster, mayo, lemon, celery, chives, salt, pepper. Toast buttered bun. Fill with lobster salad. Serve immediately.

Po' Boy Sandwich.directions: Fry shrimp or oysters until golden. Split bread, spread with remoulade. Layer lettuce, tomato, seafood, pickles. Serve immediately.

Chicken Parmesan Sandwich.directions: Fry chicken cutlet until golden. Top with marinara and mozzarella. Broil until cheese melts. Place in roll, sprinkle with Parmesan and Italian seasoning.

BBQ Chicken Pizza.directions: Stretch dough. Spread with BBQ sauce. Top with chicken, onion, cheeses. Bake at 450°F for 12-15 minutes. Top with fresh cilantro.

Pepperoni Pizza.directions: Stretch dough, brush with oil. Spread sauce, top with cheese and pepperoni. Bake at 475°F for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden.

Margherita Pizza.directions: Stretch dough. Spread crushed tomatoes seasoned with garlic and salt. Add torn mozzarella. Bake at 500°F for 10-12 minutes. Top with fresh basil and olive oil drizzle.

Meat Lovers Pizza.directions: Stretch dough. Spread sauce, add cheese and all meats. Bake at 450°F for 15-18 minutes until crust is golden and toppings are cooked.

Vegetable Pizza.directions: Stretch dough. Spread sauce, top with cheese and vegetables. Bake at 450°F for 15 minutes until crust is golden.

Macaroni and Cheese.directions: Cook pasta. Make roux with butter and flour. Add milk, whisk until thick. Add cheese, mustard, salt, pepper. Combine with pasta. Top with breadcrumbs. Bake at 350°F for 25 minutes.

Baked Mac and Cheese with Bacon.directions: Cook pasta and bacon. Make cheese sauce. Mix with pasta and bacon. Top with panko mixed with butter. Bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.

Potato Salad.directions: Boil potatoes until tender, cube. Mix mayo, mustard, relish, salt, pepper. Fold in potatoes, celery, onion, chopped eggs. Sprinkle with paprika. Chill before serving.

Coleslaw.directions: Mix mayo, vinegar, sugar, celery seed, salt, pepper. Toss with cabbage and carrots. Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.

Pasta Salad.directions: Cook pasta, cool. Toss with dressing and vegetables. Add cheese and seasoning. Chill before serving.

Three Bean Salad.directions: Drain and rinse beans. Mix with onion. Whisk oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper. Pour over beans. Refrigerate several hours before serving.

Deviled Eggs.directions: Halve eggs, remove yolks. Mash yolks with mayo, mustard, vinegar, salt, pepper. Pipe or spoon into whites. Dust with paprika.

Chicken Pot Pie.directions: Make roux with butter and flour. Add broth and cream, cook until thick. Add chicken, vegetables, seasonings. Pour into pie dish, top with crust. Bake at 400°F for 35 minutes.

Beef Stew.directions: Brown beef. Add vegetables, broth, tomato paste, Worcestershire, herbs. Simmer 2 hours until tender. Thicken with flour slurry if needed.

Salisbury Steak.directions: Mix beef, half onion, breadcrumbs, egg, Worcestershire, salt, pepper. Form patties. Brown in skillet. Remove. Sauté mushrooms and remaining onion. Add flour, broth. Simmer sauce. Return patties, cook 10 minutes.

Meatloaf Sandwich.directions: Toast bread in butter. Warm meatloaf slices. Layer meatloaf on bread with ketchup, lettuce, tomato. Serve warm.

Hot Turkey Sandwich.directions: Place bread on plate. Layer turkey over bread. Cover with hot gravy. Serve with mashed potatoes and cranberry sauce.

Hot Roast Beef Sandwich.directions: Place bread on plate. Layer roast beef over bread. Ladle hot gravy over everything. Serve with mashed potatoes.

Fried Green Tomatoes.directions: Slice tomatoes thick. Season cornmeal and flour mixture. Dip tomatoes in buttermilk-egg, then coating. Fry until golden on both sides. Serve with remoulade.

Hush Puppies.directions: Mix dry ingredients. Add onion, egg, buttermilk. Drop spoonfuls into hot oil. Fry until golden brown, 3-4 minutes. Drain and serve hot.

Fried Catfish.directions: Soak catfish in buttermilk. Mix cornmeal, flour, Cajun seasoning. Dredge fish. Fry until golden and cooked through. Serve with lemon and tartar sauce.

Fried Pickles.directions: Pat pickles dry. Dredge in flour, dip in buttermilk, coat with seasoned breadcrumbs. Fry until golden. Serve with ranch.

Shrimp Basket.directions: Season flour-cornmeal mix. Dip shrimp in buttermilk, dredge in coating. Fry until golden. Serve with fries, coleslaw, cocktail sauce.

Clam Strips.directions: Dredge clams in flour, dip in buttermilk, coat with breadcrumbs. Fry until golden. Season with salt. Serve with tartar sauce, lemon, fries.

Oyster Po' Boy.directions: Dredge oysters in seasoned cornmeal-flour mix. Fry until crispy. Split bread, spread with remoulade. Add lettuce, tomato, oysters. Drizzle with hot sauce.
